card.name: Mastering the Elements
card.text:
Unique
Reaction: After this card enters play, target your Spell and pay Gold equal to its base Gold Cost: This card permanently copies the Spell's keywords, traits, and its base abilities that do not themselves copy abilities.

(MRP)
card.flavor: Some shugenja focus on a single element. Some find that far too limiting.

card.name: Raido no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
Will only enter play from a province.
After Raido enters play: Lose 6 Honor.
Raido may not perform Battle actions while your current army has higher total Force than the current enemy army.

(MRP)
card.flavor: "I have seen them fighting the Destroyers, and fighting alongside the Destroyers. I prefer to let them kill themselves, honestly." - Hida Fujita

card.name: Blue Tanuki Bar
card.text:
Sake Works
Bow this card: Produce 1 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card and target a Personality: Give him a +1F Sake token.
card.flavor: "It is a den of sin and iniquity," said Akodo Shigetoshi. "But for the less disciplined samurai, it offers a night of respite from the war."

card.name: Green Nightshade Blend
card.text: Limited: Target two Personalities: You may transfer one or more tokens from one to the other. Destroy each of the two that now has a Fire, Poison, and Sake token.
card.flavor: "Here, drink this..."

card.name: Recruitment Officer
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold.
Reaction: After engaging at a battlefield where you control one or more units, bow this card: Create a 2F/2C/2PH Ronin • Samurai Personality there. Remove him from the game when this turn ends.
card.flavor: "More men. Always we need more men." - Seppun Tashime

card.name: Lying in Ambush
card.text: Reaction: After the resolution of your Battle, Limited, or Open action that created a non-Shadowlands Personality: Create a 2F/2C/2PH Samurai Personality with your Clan alignment at the same location.
card.flavor: "Remain here, men. When the enemy diverts through this wood in an attempt to escape, ensure that none survive." - Shinjo Dun

card.name: Fukurokujin's Wisdom
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
You have +1 maximum hand size.
Battle: Discard this card and choose one or more of your performing Personalities: Move them home. Straighten the unit of each of them who moved.
card.flavor: "The Seven Fortunes will never abandon Rokugan. Now, more than ever, we should be beseeching their aid." - Seppun Kiharu

card.name: Minor Blackmail
card.text:
Unique
Choose another player's Personality in play. After the next time this game his unit is assigned or an action resolves that he performed, dishonor him, and his controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor:
"Just take your filthy money and go."
"There is no reason to be hostile. One could imagine how much every koku helps the Scorpion defend the southern borders."

card.name: Signs and Portents
card.text:
Unique
Look at the top four cards of any Fate deck. You may discard one of them. Put the rest back in any order.
card.flavor:
"It is a marvel," Tsukimi said.
"A painfully costly marvel," Bairei replied. "But it will allow us to contact the Mantis."

card.name: Magistrate's Stipend
card.text:
Mine
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if paying for a Magistrate.
Reaction: After you announce a non-Iaijutsu action, choose your performing Magistrate: Give him +1C until the action ends.
card.flavor: "It is unfortunate, but justice can be expensive." - Shosuro Takagi

card.name: Miya Masatsuko
card.text:
Imperial • Courtier • Herald • Singular
Political Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor: Draw an additional card during your next End Phase.
card.flavor: "There are rumors that our services will no longer be needed. I do not believe it. Will the wind carry our words?"

card.name: Tadatsugu
card.text: Ronin • Samurai • Cavalry • Kensai • Paragon
card.flavor: He thought that the ways of the empire meant nothing to him, but now war will not let him be.

card.name: Deadlands
card.text:
Shadowlands
After this card enters play: Lose 4 Honor.
Limited: If there are any cards in this province, discard this card: Discard a card from the province, refilling it face-up with an Undead Personality in your discard pile.
card.flavor: Once green and lush, the God-Beast left the lands scarred and wounded.

card.name: Bounty Hunter
card.text: Battle: Target a dishonorable Personality or an attachment: Bow it.
card.flavor: Though loath to do so, sometimes magistrates need to turn to others to find their quarry.

card.name: Inexpensive Armor
card.text:
Armor
Ranged Attacks targeting this Personality have -2 strength.
card.flavor: "It is forged quickly and with substandard materials. It looks impressive on display but has significant shortcomings on the battlefield." - Hida Fubatsu

card.name: Hunger of the Fire
card.text:
Fire
Battle: Destroy this card, bow this Shugenja unless he is Fire, and target an enemy card without attachments in a unit whose Personality has Force lower than or equal to your Shugenja's Force or Chi: Destroy the enemy card.
card.flavor: "Never underestimate what it is capable of when given reign. Master the flames, or be consumed." - Tamori Wotan

card.name: Costly Feud
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -3F. Bow it if its Force is now 0.
card.flavor: "How foolish and arrogant, to pursue a personal vendetta in the midst of a greater war. Have I fallen this far? Am I no better than these self-indulgent fools?" - Shosuro Jimen

card.name: Near Miss
card.text:
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets one of your attachments: Negate the attachment's destruction from the action's effects.
Reaction: When paying for an attachment: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "The archers were skilled, but not skilled enough. I live, and soon, they will not."

card.name: Masatane
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Duelist • Kensai
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "The Kakita study the Kakita. The Mirumoto study the Mirumoto. I study both and will best them all."

card.name: Wyrmbone Katana
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force than this Personality and no attachments: Destroy it.
Battle: Move this Personality to the current battlefield if he assigned there.
card.flavor: Forged in the northern mountains, as effective as they are controversial.

card.name: Stone of Remembrance
card.text:
Unique
This card does not count towards your minimum deck size.
Reaction: After another player's action targets one of your cards, remove this card from the game, then tear it in half: Negate the target's destruction from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Flesh, bone, and even stone, will fade away, but courage and nobility are eternal." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Hyobuko
card.text:
Void • Monk • Shugenja • Fudo • Singular
Attaches Heart of Fudo ignoring Gold Cost.
Limited: Discard Hyobuko: He searches for an ancient relic. Search your discard pile, then Fate deck, for a card titled Heart of Fudo. Show it and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "You ask why I seek? Better to ask why you do not."

card.name: War-ravaged Plain
card.text: Limited: Discard this card and target a Region: Destroy it.
card.flavor: There were those that thought that Rokugan would never be the same after this war. Where the dead fell, the Lion had to burn, leaving nothing but destruction behind.

card.name: Fudo Cultist
card.text:
Fudo
Attaches to a Nonhuman Fudo Personality ignoring Gold Cost.
This card has +1F for each other Fudo card you control.
card.flavor: "Their ranks grow, Empress. Should we deal with them?" - Togashi Satsu

card.name: Ebisu's Honesty
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Your provinces have +2 strength.
Limited: Destroy your rightmost province and discard this card: Gain 4 Honor; This gain will not be negated.
card.flavor: "The plague is a perversion of everything he represents. We shall work harder and pray more diligently that his blessings fall upon us." - Phoenix peasant

card.name: Saibankan's Justice
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Other players may not lobby.
Open: Target one or two Personalities controlled by the same player and discard this card: Dishonor them.
card.flavor: "The Scorpion laid the foundations for the legal system still in place today. He was an honest, upright, and honorable man. Pity few of his ilk can be found among his clan today." - Akodo Kobi

card.name: Never Enough Soldiers
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase three turns from now begins, you may target Followers in your discard pile with the Equip rulebook action.
card.flavor:
"Reiha-sama, a unit of men has appeared, and they bear the Spider mon."
"Do they have oni or goblins with them? If not, put them on the left flank. The line is getting thin."

card.name: Too Close to Home
card.text: You may choose and destroy a Region. Until your next turn begins, negate all movement to and from battlefields.
card.flavor:
"Toson, I know the commander of that legion, and he is inept. Dispose of him so that Shigetoshi can put someone competent in his place."
"Your will, Lady Miyoko."

card.name: Beautiful Host
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Political Open: If another player's action has caused you an Honor loss this turn, choose your performing Personality: Give him a +1F Revenge token.
card.flavor: A shift of the head, a lift of the chin, and a dismissive lift of the fan. Those are the only weapons she needs to ruin careers.

card.name: Seaside Bazaar
card.text:
Farm • Market • Port
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: When paying a Gold cost: Produce 1 Gold. (This can be used together with bowing this card to produce Gold.)
card.flavor: The Mantis and Crane continue in their trade, undisturbed by the foreign threats facing them.

card.name: Stolen Merchandise
card.text:
Kolat • Retainer • Unique
Open: Target another player's Holding with a base Gold Cost from 1 to 4: This card copies one of its base abilities that does not itself copy abilities, or one of its Gold-producing traits.
card.flavor: Their threat is not yet ended...

card.name: Indomitable Home
card.text:
Castle
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Siege Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, bow this card: Increase the current battlefield's province's strength by 2.
card.flavor: "What a pitiful name. We shall put it to the test." - Legulus

card.name: Hida Yamadera
card.text:
Crab Clan • Shadowlands • Berserker • Damned
Reaction: After Yamadera enters play from a province: Refill it face-up.
Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Kill me! My life means nothing and I cannot even throw it away because you are too pathetic to take it!"

card.name: Hida Fujita
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Commander • Blessed of the Fortune of Persistence
Reaction: Before the resolution of another player's action, if Fujita is at the current battlefield: Negate the destruction of your Followers from its effects.
card.flavor: "I grew up an orphan, never knowing my parents. I will kill these demons with my hands and teeth if it will spare one child that misery."

card.name: Hiruma Akio - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Chui • Commander • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Your Followers at Akio's location have +1F while you have Reconnaissance.
Battle: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "Perhaps these samurai were not directly responsible for my brother's death. That does not mean I shall spare their lives."

card.name: Nijugun
card.text:
Crab Clan • Nonhuman • Mujina • Cavalry • Scout • Enigma
Battle: Bow your performing Follower and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he moved, and you have Reconnaissance or you are a Unicorn Clan player, negate his movement.
card.flavor: The Hiruma and their allies struck the Destroyers' rear flank, engaging them on a second front.

card.name: Kaiu Nakano
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Hero • Siege • Tactician
Tactical Battle/Open: Nakano has +3F while he is in an army and while all Personalities in that army are Siege.
card.flavor: "I would prefer that the Empire had not suffered so, but think of the opportunities! Think of the chances to improve, redesign, and rebuild! It is a thrilling time to be alive."

card.name: Kaiu Iemasa
card.text:
Crab Clan • Daimyo • Samurai • Siege • Tactician • Loyal • Unique • Jade Hand
Limited: You help rebuild another clan's defenses. Gain 3 Honor. You may not declare an attack.
Battle: Target an enemy card with Force lower than or equal to this battlefield's province's strength: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Destruction is only the first step."

card.name: Yasuki Dokansuto
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Kolat • Merchant
Reaction: When paying for a Holding, bow Dokansuto: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "Do not worry, lord Jinn-Kuen. Once the Crab lands are rebuilt, our agents will be present in every court and dojo. It will be child's play."

card.name: Asahina Nanae
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja
Open: Target an Air Personality: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "It is true, my family does not fight. But we feel the suffering of the southern armies, and we will aid you with all of our strength. Nor do we come alone. Lady Doji has sent the armies of the Daidoji with us."

card.name: Takayuki
card.text: Crane Clan • Nonhuman • Kenku • Cavalry • Duelist
card.flavor: "Why am I here? Where else should I be? Heaven's newest daughter is battling the Champion of Jigoku. There are no battles to be found like the battles here."

card.name: Daidoji Masafuni
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout
Battle: Bow Masafuni unless you have Reconnaissance, and target a Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Strange days, to be fighting alongside the Crab and Lion to defend the Scorpion! But if we lose here, Toshi Ranbo is imperiled."

card.name: Doji Shigeyuki
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate
Battle: Target a Personality with lower Personal Honor than Shigeyuki's Chi: Shigeyuki challenges him. He may refuse; if he does, move him home. Both Personalities use their Personal Honor as their duel stat. Bow the duel's loser's unit.
card.flavor: "Lady Doji is... displeased."

card.name: Kakita Yasunori
card.text:
Crane Clan • Artisan
Limited: Remove a card in your Fate discard pile from the game and target your Personality: Create a +1F/+0C Weapon Item and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "The proper task of an artisan is to create beauty. But while this war rages, all of our strength goes to defending the Empire."

card.name: Kakita Nara
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier
You may use your Stronghold's abilities even if it is bowed.
Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor: Give each of your provinces +2 strength.
card.flavor: "Let them prattle. I am Kakita Noritoshi's vassal, and I will serve him intil death."

card.name: Kakita Munemori - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Experienced • Unique
Political Open: Target a Personality: He may not perform actions until the current phase ends.
card.flavor: "I am a wicked man, Noritoshi-sama, but I am your man all the same. You are safe here as long as you desire, and I will find the information you need."

card.name: Xijkt
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Nonhuman • Zokujin • Mountaineer
Xijkt may assign during Cavalry Maneuvers if you are the Defender.
Battle: Bow Xijkt or one of your Mines, and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Fire gone, yes, but not danger. Foolish humans."

card.name: Togashi Sakata
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Tattooed • Drunken Master
Limited: Give Sakata a +1F Fire or Sake token.
Battle: Sakata breathes fire. Ranged 4 Attack, with +1 strength for each Sake token on Sakata.
card.flavor: "Like you, I revel in the world, including sake. Unlike you, I find a reversal of fortunes to have gratifying effects."

card.name: Kitsuki Fujimura
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Justicar • Magistrate • Loyal • Scourge of the Scorpion
Limited: Bow Fujimura and target a dishonorable Personality: Fujimura exposes his crimes. His controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "If the Emerald Champion is corrupt, there is neither evidence nor testimony to prove it. Should we turn a blind eye to his eveil, then? I say no."

card.name: Mirumoto Inokuchi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Unbreakable
Battle: Even if Inokuchi is bowed: Straighten him. You may take an additional Battle action, which must be Iaijutsu and which Inokuchi must perform. If you don't, bow him.
card.flavor: "I am disturbed by the emergence of this Fusami Technique. We are allies today, but the Crane must prepare for tomorrow." - Kakita Korihime

card.name: Mirumoto Houken
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Master of the Blade
Battle/Open: Target a Personality with a Weapon: Straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "That the Phoenix ended a threat we should have eliminated long ago is a stain that we will not soon forget. To blame them for such a thing, however, would be petty and shameful."

card.name: Mirumoto Yozo - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality without attachments: Destroy it. Remove it from the game if it is a Lion Clan Personality.
card.flavor: "I save your life today only so that I may take it tomorrow, Lion!"

card.name: Tamori Shosei
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Imperial • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist • Archivist • Jade Hand
Limited: If you control a Temple, bow Shosei or one of your Temple Holdings: Shosei prays to the Fortunes. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "His work is absolutely essential to our endeavors. Without him, how much knowledge would have already been lost?" - Seppun Tashime

card.name: Akodo Tezuka
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon
Battle/Open: Discard a card and target a Bushido Virtue in your discard pile: Take an additional action to play it for one of its Battle, Limited, or Open actions, as appropriate to the current phase. Remove it from the game after its action ends.
card.flavor: The aftermath of the zombie march across the Lion lands had repercussions for months after the first threat had been neutralized.

card.name: Akodo Kobi - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Tactician • Experienced • Unique
After the resolution of your Tactical action: Give Kobi +1F.
Reaction: After another player's Battle action resolves which destroyed one of your Lion Clan Personalities at the current battlefield: During the next End Phase, if the destroyed Personality is dead, bring him into play, ignoring costs and Honor Requirements.

card.name: Akodo Ashiko
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Deathseeker • Hero
Battle: If Ashiko is face-up in one of your provinces: Bring her into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs, and reducing her Gold cost by 2 if there are more units on the enemy side than on your side.
card.flavor: "Let the Destroyers come! I shall die with them at Shamate Pass!"

card.name: Pride of the Hand
card.text:
Lion Clan • Nonhuman • Lion • Scout • Legendary
Pride of the Hand has +1F while you control a Terrain at its battlefield.
card.flavor: "They seem to have gained a taste for Destroyer flesh, such as it is." - Matsu Benika

card.name: Ikoma Ayumu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Reaction: Even if Ayumu is bowed, after you announce a Tactical action, if he is at the current battlefield: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "If nothing else, this war has proven the Lion were not ready to face this strange, corrupted enemy. We must be more diligent and learn new tactics."

card.name: Ikoma Shinohara
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Commander
Battle: Target a Follower in your hand and one of your Personalities: Attach the Follower to the Personality, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "I am an old man, Lord Shigetoshi. I have lived a long life. Would that it had reached its conclusion without seeing such a war."

card.name: Matsu Kaido
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Hero
Kaido has +1F while attacking.
Fear Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Reduce its Force to 0.
card.flavor: "The time for subtlety and brilliance is over. We need brutality and raw power. Now it is my time."

card.name: Yoritomo Tarao
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Extortionist • Magistrate • Naval
Open: Pay 2 Gold: Choose a player. He targets one of his unbowed Personalities or Holdings or a card in his hand. If the targeted card is in his hand, discard it. Otherwise, bow it.
card.flavor: "There is a profit to be made here. Enough for the clan, and enough for me as well."

card.name: En'you
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Shojo • Prophet
As an additional cost of En'you entering play, either remove a card in your hand from the game or destroy one of your Sake tokens.
card.flavor: The first sailors who saw him were accused of being too far in their cups, but after the third report, even the most cynical started keeping an eye out for him.

card.name: Moshi Umiko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval • Storm Rider
Umiko has +2F while she has a Spell.
Reaction: After a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give the Ranged Attack +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: "Many of the Mantis are away but the Destroyers should not think that we cannot defend ourselves."

card.name: Tsuruchi Yashiro
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Scout
Enters play paying 2 less Gold if you are a Lion Clan or Scorpion Clan player.
Battle: Bow Yashiro unless you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "They have both wronged us, but a brother from a different clan is still a brother."

card.name: Yoritomo Zinan
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Commander • Naval
Battle: Target an attachment: Put it in its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "We are far from Rokugan, yet still we fight Kali-ma. Our cause is just."

card.name: Yoritomo Sachina - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Courtier • Seductress • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Sachina's base ability will not be copied.
Political Limited: Once per game, target a Personality, pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost plus four, and bow Sachina: Take control of him. After the next time this game Sachina leaves play, give control of him to his owner.

card.name: Yoritomo Singh - exp2
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Ambassador • Magistrate • Naval • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: When paying an action's Gold cost: Produce 3 Gold.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Duty bade me leave, and duty brought me back."

card.name: Asako Heiwa
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Monk • Henshin
Battle/Open: Target another Personality or a Follower: Give it a Force bonus or penalty equal to Heiwa's Chi.
card.flavor: "The Dark Fire has waned and the people of the Phoenix can rest again. It is my responsibility to soothe our wounds. It is the Shiba's to rejoin the southern front."

card.name: Asako Izuna
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Villain
Reaction: After Izuna enters play, target another player's Personality with Personal Honor lower than or equal to Izuna's Chi: She coerces testimony of a family's secret. Dishonor the targeted Personality and permanently give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "Yes, I think his absence would be most convenient."

card.name: Isawa Sakonoko
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Water • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Unique
Reaction: After another player's action targets one of your other Personalities at Sakonoko's location, bow Sakonoko or one of his Spells: Negate the destruction of the Personality from the action's effects.
card.flavor: With the threat of the Army of Dark Fire ended the Phoenix began the long process of healing their wounds.

card.name: Isawa Kaname
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Shugenja • Yojimbo
Reaction: After a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give the Ranged Attack +2 strength.
Battle: Any number of times per turn: Ranged 1 Attack.
card.flavor: "There are some threats that no blade can slay and no armor can ward. The kami and I stand against them."

card.name: Shiba Jouta - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Even if Jouta is dead, choose your performing Shugenja, who may be at any location unless Jouta is dead: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "He charges into the heart of battle against the Destroyers with no fear. His example inspires greatness." - Shiba Danjuro

card.name: Shiba Ryuba
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
Battle: Target your Personality: Move him home. If he moved, straighten him.
card.flavor: "Send me against the Destroyers! The creatures of the Dark Oracle posed no threat. Maybe these shall."

card.name: Kunji
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Nonhuman • Fenghuang • Shugenja • Cavalry
Battle/Open: Target a Personality: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: "It came to fight the Dark Fire. Will it stay with its purifying light, or will it leave no that the threat has passed?" - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Bayushi Shibata
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Resourceful
Your provinces have +1 strength while another player controls a dishonorable Personality.
card.flavor: "I will exploit every resource, my lady. Every fool and sinner I have known in twenty years of service shall pay the price for their actions, and all to our benefit."

card.name: Bayushi Ebara
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Bitter Lies • Kensai
Battle/Open: Target a Weapon in your hand: Attach it to Ebara, paying all costs: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Fighting alongside Crab and Lion, all shedding blood for the defense of my home... I hardly know what to think of it."

card.name: Soshi Komiko
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Junshin • Magistrate • Iron Flower
Political Battle: Target a Personality with Personal Honor lower than or equal to Komiko's Chi: Bow the Personality. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "We have reason to believe that Noritoshi has abandoned all pretense, my lord. He is on his way here, to the Imperial City."

card.name: Shosuro Tsuji
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Assassin
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it.
card.flavor: "The Destroyers are iron, but their leaders, their officers, are living creatures. And the living can be killed. Do this, and teach them what it means to cross the Scorpion." - Bayushi Miyako

card.name: Bayushi Suwabe
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Courtier at any location: Give Suwabe a Force bonus equal to the Courtier's Chi.
card.flavor: "Will it be me that kills you? My brother? Cousin? Neighbor? All that matters is that the Scorpion will end you."

card.name: Shosuro Toson - exp2
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Daimyo • Ninja • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After engaging at Toson's battlefield: Discard a card from the current battlefield's province. If this discarded a Personality, you have the first opportunity to take a Battle action in this battle, which must be performed by Toson.
card.flavor: At times, a Shosuro lord must bloody his blade.

card.name: Wrathful Dead
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Nonhuman • Goryo • Cavalry • Spirit
Battle: Target a card without attachments in a unit led by a dishonorable Personality: Destroy the targeted card.
card.flavor: "The destruction of our lands has unleashed the wrath of the spirits. Our dead visit their anger upon the Destroyers, and I celebrate them for it." - Soshi Yukimi

card.name: Chuda Kiuchi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Shugenja • Artisan • Vicious • Worker of Flesh
After Kiuchi enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Open: Choose your performing Personality and your performing Nonhuman or Undead Personality: Set each Personality's Force equal to the higher base Force of the two.
card.flavor:
"Fingers, an eye, some blood and thread,
A loving toy made from the dead!"

card.name: Daigotsu Miki
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Conqueror • Paragon • Undead • Dark Fist of Iron
After Miki enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
After your Events Phase: You may remove a Dark Virtue in your hand or discard pile from the game. If you did not remove one, destroy Miki.
card.flavor: "The Destroyers' goddess prepares for the final act of this farce. We must be ready to answer her."

card.name: Daigotsu Yajinden - exp3
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Shugenja • Artisan • Bloodspeaker • Khadi • Experienced 3 • Loyal • Unique
After Yajinden enters play: Lose 4 Honor.
Limited: Target a dead Personality: Yajinden raises him from the dead. Bring him into play (under your control) ignoring costs and Honor Requirements. Remove him from the game when the turn ends.
card.flavor: "Hmm, Anguish. Yes, it needs more anguish."

card.name: Goju Sawaki
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Immortal
After Sawaki enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets Sawaki, destroy him: Create two 1F/1C/0PH Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja Personalities at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "The Destroyers are wholly within the Empire," he whispered. "The clans have taken their toll upon the ranks."

card.name: Daigotsu Bukaro
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror
After Bukaro enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Limited: Pay 2 Gold and target a Personality: Create a 1F Follower and attach it to the Personality.
card.flavor: "Do nothing yet. Wait for the whelps that carry the Tao. We act only when they have made their choice."

card.name: Taishuu - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Courtier • Samurai • Paragon • Experienced Mirumoto Taishuu • Loyal • Unique • Ambassador to the Empire
Other player's maximum hand sizes are reduced by 1.
Reaction: After another player's Political action targets one of your Personalities: Negate its effects.
card.flavor: "Shall I tell you what Togashi saw before he left?"

card.name: Omigawa
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Face of Ghosts • Master Sensei
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Force or without attached Weapons: Omigawa knocks him aside. Move the targeted card home. Bow him if he moved and Omigawa has a Weapon.
card.flavor: "Do you see your brothers in my face, samurai? When the Destroyers fall, you are next!"

card.name: Iuchi Kota - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Kota has +2F while he has a Spell.
Reaction: After an action targets one of your Personalities at Kota's battlefield: Negate the Personality's movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "I relish the chance to work with the Crab again."

card.name: Iuchi Yupadi
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Ghost Guard
Limited: Bow Yupadi or one of her Spells, and target a Personality: Give him Naval.
card.flavor: "She was born an Utaku, but her training with the Iuchi proved her of such exceptional ability that she was wed into the daimyo's extended family and took their name." - Moto Chen

card.name: Shinjo Byung
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Tactician
card.flavor: "If we are to give our lives to give Katamari and Benjiro time to defeat the enemy, then we will visit the Shi-Tien Yen-Wang with pride."

card.name: Moto Hailung
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander
Battle: Target a Follower in your hand: Attach it to Hailung, paying all costs and paying 4 less Gold if he is defending or if you are a Crab Clan player.
card.flavor: "Never have I felt such exhaustion, friend Hiruma. But if you, whose home is lost, will fight on, then I will fight beside you."

card.name: Shinjo Dak-ho
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Scout
Battle: Create a 2F/2C/2PH Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Scout Personality at this battlefield. Remove him from the game after this battle ends.
card.flavor: "I have studied Akodo's Leadership, but the Lion commanders have found new ways to wage war."

card.name: Utaku Eun-ju
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "None will dare question our loyalty again. We stand with Rokugan, now and forever!"

card.name: Utaku Tairu - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician • Experienced • Unique • Advisor to the Amethyst Champion
Reaction: After a Personality assigns or moves, if he is now opposing Tairu: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "I have been honored to serve with the Amethyst Champion, but duty first brings me to war. With her blessing I fight in her name."

card.name: The Great Death
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Bake-kujira • Water • Naval • Undead
After The Great Death enters play: Create three 1F Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Raptor • Cavalry • Undead Followers, attach them to it, and lose 6 Honor.
card.flavor: "We call ourselves masters of the sea. But we are merely deceiving ourselves." - Yoritomo Sunagawa

card.name: The Red Hunger
card.text:
Nonhuman • Bashe
Battle: Target one or two attachments, or a Personality without attachments, with a total Force lower than The Red Hunger's Force: He swallows them whole. Destroy the targeted cards.
card.flavor: "The loss of the Ivory Kingdoms' warriors means that many horrors they held in check now wander the world." - Yoritomo Singh

card.name: Komori Taruko
card.text:
Bat Clan • Air • Shugenja
Open: Even if Taruko is bowed: Straighten her.
card.flavor: "We were brought along to the Kingdoms to facilitate communication, but the Phoenix have made that purpose redundant. We must find new purpose in this land to cement our alliances." - Komori

card.name: Stone-Hewed Shrine
card.text:
Mountain • Temple
Defending Earth Personalities have +1F while at this province's battlefield.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, bow your performing Earth Personality at any location: Give the current battlefield's province +3 strength.
card.flavor: Chosai left little unharmed.

card.name: Temple of the Seven Fortunes
card.text:
Temple • Singular
Open: If it is not your turn, choose your two performing unbowed Personalities with Clan alignments that do not share a Clan alignment, and bow one of them: Gain 1 Honor. Give your provinces +2 strength.
card.flavor: "Rokugan must stand together to survive. How often must we learn this simple lesson?" - Asako Barei

card.name: Ashigaru Elite
card.text:
Ashigaru • Elite • Unique
Battle: Any number of times per turn, bow one of your Farms: Give +1F to each of your Ashigaru Personalities and Followers at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "The samurai believe they are the strength of the Empire. Lucky for them, we are willing to let them believe that." - Sachika

card.name: Ashigaru Recruits
card.text:
Ashigaru
Reaction: After this card enters play from your hand, target your Personality: Create a 0F Ashigaru Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "If they do not fight, they will die. If they fight they will likely die. Better a slim chance than none." - Akodo Kuma

card.name: Horse Archers
card.text:
Cavalry
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "I have ridden with them and against them. Let the Destroyers taste their arrows this day." - Akodo Masao

card.name: Hida Defenders
card.text: Reaction: After the resolution of your action that bowed, destroyed, or moved a Personality who has opposed this card at the current battlefield: Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: With their lands occupied, all must do their duty, no matter what their training.

card.name: Brothers of Goemon
card.text: Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit, if you control any Rings: Negate the card's bowing from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "We stand with the samurai of Rokugan, as our patron would have done."

card.name: The Crimson Mark
card.text:
Ninja
As a Focus Effect: You may destroy an attachment on a Personality involved in this duel.
Battle: Destroy this card and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: Even the Scorpion dislike them, but they serve their lords well.

card.name: Genji's Students
card.text:
Siege
Battle/Open: Bow this card and target a province: Give it +3 or -3 strength.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each other Follower in this unit.
card.flavor: Slowly, the lessons of the Kaiu spread.

card.name: Vigilant Riders
card.text:
Cavalry
After this card bows: Straighten it.
Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit: Negate this card's destruction from the action's effects.
card.flavor: With Rokugan itself threatened, all who could fight answered the call.

card.name: Rumormonger
card.text: Political Open: Bow this card and target a Personality controlled by a player who controls a dishonorable Personality: Give the targeted card a Force penalty equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "I heard from a courtier very close to their delegation that a certain samurai may not be as she seems..."

card.name: A Simple Yari
card.text:
Weapon
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, bow its winner.
Reaction: After one of your Personalities enters play: Attach this card to him, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "Sometimes, nothing else is needed." - Shiba Jouta

card.name: Record of Failure
card.text:
Attaches to a Courtier paying 2 less Gold.
Political Limited: Remove this card from the game and target a dishonorably dead Personality: His owner loses Honor equal to the Personality's base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "Not all those who have fallen in this war have fallen with their honor intact. It is painful, but we must remember their shame as well." - Miya Shoin

card.name: Crimson Shadow Armor
card.text:
Armor
Fear Battle: Target an enemy Follower: Bow it.
card.flavor: "They say that they hate us, that we disgrace them, that they would wipe us out. But in their hearts, they fear us. As they should." - Bayushi Muhito

card.name: Hunger
card.text:
Shadowlands • Weapon • Unique
You must declare an attack each turn and assign this Personality to attack if possible.
Reaction: After an action targets this Personality: Negate this Personality's movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Ahh, Togashi Nyoko. A woman after my own heart, truly." - Daigotsu Yajinden

card.name: Tsubute
card.text:
Ninja • Weapon
Will only attach to a Ninja.
Battle: Choose your performing Ninja, and destroy this card or discard it from your hand: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "Such a simple thing can be so useful in the hands of the properly trained." - Shosuro Toson

card.name: Words of Consecration
card.text:
Air
After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Choose a player, who gains or loses 1 Honor.
Open: Bow this Shugenja and target another player's Personality: After the next time (this turn) he assigns to attack you, gain 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if you control a Temple.

card.name: Drawing on the Mountain
card.text:
Earth
While this Shugenja is Earth, your provinces have +1 strength.
Battle/Open: Bow this Shugenja, destroy this card, and target a bowed Personality: Negate his next straightening this game.
card.flavor: "This castle may fall, my friend Shiba, but it will not fall today!"

card.name: Seek the Stain
card.text:
Void
You may attach this card from your discard pile to your Void Shugenja.
Open: Bow this card and target another player's Personality: You find out his dark secret. Give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "I feel them! So... so befouled!"

card.name: Erosion
card.text:
Water
While this Shugenja is Water, other players' provinces have -1 strength.
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that moved a Personality to the current battlefield: Give him -4F.
card.flavor: "The ridge on which they stand will not be a problem in just a moment, my lord."

card.name: Ember's Final Fire
card.text:
Fire
While this Shugenja is Fire, he has +1F.
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The priest clutched his bloodied stomach. "It is too late for me," he rasped. "But I will not enter the next world alone. Run while you can. I will end this."

card.name: Death, Defeated
card.text:
Maho
This Shugenja has +2F and Shadowlands.
Battle: Remove a target dead Personality in any player's discard pile from the game: Create a 2F/2C/0PH Shadowlands • Undead Personality at the current battlefield. Remove him from the game after this battle's resolution. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Do you still judge me, samurai?"

card.name: The Tapestry Perceived
card.text:
Void
While this Shugenja is Void, your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
Limited: Bow this card: Look at the top card of any Fate deck. You may destroy this card; if you do, discard the card you looked at.
card.flavor: "The future is never clear, but now... now it is almost completely obscured. I fear its meaning." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: A Dragon's Favor
card.text:
Thunder
While this Shugenja is Thunder, he has +1C.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged Attack with strength equal to this Shugenja's Chi.
card.flavor: "The power our shugenja now possess is wondrous and terrible, but we must never become reliant upon it. If it were revoked, I would not have my clan founder in its absence." - Yoritomo Naizen

card.name: Of One Instant
card.text:
Iaijutsu
As a Focus Effect: Give your Personality in this duel Tactician.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Duelist: Give him a Force bonus equal to his own base Chi.
card.flavor: A duelist learns the limits of his mind and body, so that he may bypass them for one perfect moment.

card.name: Anger Management
card.text:
Heroic
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Hero and target an enemy card: If it has no attachments, and is bowed or Nonhuman, destroy it. Bow it.
card.flavor: "Finally. Something I can utterly destroy for a change."

card.name: The World Disappears
card.text:
Void • Kiho
Open: Bow your performing Monk unless his is Void: He meditates. Put a Kiho Strategy in your discard pile into your hand.
card.flavor: "It is more important than ever, now, to touch the fundamentals of the world."

card.name: Destructive Priorities
card.text:
Kata • Political
You have the ability, "Political Reaction: Before you gain Honor during your turn, bow your performing Courtier: Negate the gain. Choose a player. He loses 2 Honor."
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Katas.
card.flavor: "All my plans and machinations are nothing without you."

card.name: Firm Censure
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Samurai and target another player's Personality or Follower: Negate the effects of the next action performed by the targeted card (this turn). Bow it if it has no attachments and is not a Samurai.
card.flavor: "You told a guest your true feelings? You ignorant fool! Control yourself!"

card.name: A Gentle Word
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing Magistrate and target a dishonorable Personality: Rehonor him. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: In Rokugan, testimony of an honorable man is stronger than a mountain of evidence. A single sentence from a respected samurai can undo months of suspicion.

card.name: Spirit of the Warrior
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Commander, permanently give him the ability, "Battle: Bow one of this Personality's performing Followers and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it." Otherwise, permanently give him Commander.
card.flavor: At the heart of the battle, warriors must bear the weight of command or crack under the pressure. Those who succeed often prove the best leaders of all.

card.name: The Killing Grounds
card.text:
Terrain
After the first time, while this card remains in play, that a player passes instead of announcing a Battle action: He chooses and destroys one of his Personalities at the current battlefield.
Battle: Put this card into play at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "This land shall see death. Theirs or ours."

card.name: Dismissing the Cur
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Destroy him if he has no attachments. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You disgrace the name you bear and the Empire you serve. Get out of my sight before my actions turns ungracious."

card.name: Disrupting Communication
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Scout and target an enemy card: Bow it. The enemy leader discards a card of his choice, or a random card if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: "By sheer weight of numbers, the Destroyers continue onward," Hiruma Ikuya said, "but out vigilance will keep them back as long as we can."

card.name: Necessary Evil
card.text: Open: If you control a Personality, target a Personality and pay Gold equal to the number of Personalities you control, or 4, whichever is higher: The targeted Personality may not assign to battlefields.
card.flavor: "We must ensure that the Phoenix know neither too much, nor too little. Determine which is the case and we will deal with it." - Shosuro Toson

card.name: Ascending the Ranks
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Paragon, bow him unless this is the Attack Phase, and target a Personality with lower Force: Bow him. Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "I am greatful for all that you have taught me. I am sure you are honored to be the first to discover just how much I have learned."

card.name: Amazing Feat
card.text: Limited: Bow your performing Artisan Personality and target a non-Unique Personality: Create a Personality with the same base Force, Chi, Personal Honor and keywords as the targeted Personality, who permanently copies all his base abilities except those that copy abilities. Remove the created Personality from the game when your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "The greatest masters are forgotten. Their legacies are immortalized in their stead." - Kakita Yasunori

card.name: Favors
card.text:
Political
Limited: Bow your performing Courtier: Choose a player. He gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Praise, rebuke, or observation, it matters not. The truths we share control the courts, and through them, the empire." - Doji Domotai

card.name: Fear Me!
card.text:
Fear • Iaijutsu
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Move him home. If he moved, choose a player, who either gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Do you see?" Inokuchi shouted. "Do you see what you face?"

card.name: Brothers in Battle
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Duty
Battle/Open: Choose two or three of your performing Samurai: Each of them has +1F and the ability, "Battle: Ranged 4 Attack" while in an army with one or more of the others.
card.flavor: Even among former enemies, the bonds forged on the battlefield cannot easily be broken.

card.name: Headbutt
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Berserker, bow him unless he was not in play when this Combat Segment began, and target an enemy card without attachments and with equal or lower Force: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Do you think you are safe because my steel is gone? Fool of a gaijin! I need no weapon for scum like you!"

card.name: Stockpiled Resources
card.text: Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Personality at the current battlefield and target an attachment in your hand: Attach it to your Personality, paying all costs and paying 4 less Gold if he is a Commander.
card.flavor: "Perhaps bandits placed these here, or ronin. It does not matter. We will put them to better use than their owner could ever have hoped."

card.name: Forging Destiny
card.text:
Reaction: Before an Event resolves: Negate its effects.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Move him home. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "That wretched Daughter is dead, my love," Shahai whispered. "What could be gained by seizing her power for your own?"

card.name: String of Victories
card.text: Battle/Open: Straighten all of your Rings. You may put a Ring in your Fate discard pile into your hand. You may take an additional action appropriate to this phase.
card.flavor: "Center your spirit. Steel your flesh. Execute your will. There can be no defeat if these are done properly."

card.name: Beyond the Line
card.text: Battle: Take an additional action to use a Limited or Open Recon ability as a Battle action, which must target the current battlefield's province. If you do, draw a card after the action's resolution.
card.flavor: "This may be our only chance," Todori whispered. "Find out everything you can. Take any risk necessary. We will succeed or die in the attempt."

card.name: Iron Will
card.text: Reaction: After another player targets your Paragon with a Battle action performed by a Personality with lower Personal Honor: The action's costs are ignored and its effects are negated. That player may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: The warrior chuckled. "Did you think to kill me, Scorpion? Perhaps to purge a weakness from the ranks? That will still happen, but you were confused about which of us would die."

card.name: Spirit of the Blade
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Kensai, permanently give him the ability, "Battle: Bow one of this Personality's Weapons and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it." Otherwise, permanently give him Kensai.
card.flavor: "Bamboo or Bloodsword, your spirit must be stronger than your blade if you are to prevail. Forget this for a moment and you will be consumed." - Isawa Mitsuko

card.name: Spirit of the Truth
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Magistrate, permanently give him +1C and the ability, "Political Open: If it is not your turn, bow this Personality and target a dishonorable Personality: Bow him." Otherwise, permanently give him Magistrate.
card.flavor: "Our task is to defend Rokugan from within. The southern line will not hold for a day if the Empire crumbles behind it." - Doji Shigeyuki

card.name: Fury of a Mob
card.text: Battle: If your current army has more units than the current enemy army, bow your two performing Nonhumans and target an enemy unit: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Fortunes, that is an ugly way to die," Bayushi Arashii said. The priest shrugged. "With our lands invaded, such things are inevitable. Lead them to our next target."

card.name: Measure of Devotion
card.text: Reaction: After the resolution of a Battle action that destroyed one of your Deathseekers: Create a 2F/2C/0PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Deathseeker Personality at the current battlefield. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "As their numbers dwindled, the Deathseekers have become even more intent on wreaking destruction. I have never feared my kin before, but I begin to see them differently..." - Ikoma Ayumu

card.name: One Action, Two Strikes
card.text: Battle: If the enemy leader has taken any Battle actions during this battle: You may take two additional Battle actions after this one. You will not take any other additional Battle actions this battle.
card.flavor: "Arishia, take Gidayu and scout along the coast. We are going to clean every last cultist from this wreck of a kingdom. And then we are going to find a way to turn a profit in this land." - Moshi Kalani

card.name: Sly Deceiver
card.text:
Ninja
Limited: Choose your performing Ninja Personality and target a non-Unique Personality: Your Ninja permanently copies the Personality's base keywords, except Clan Champion, Daimyo, or Shugenja, and permanently copies his base abilities which do not themselves copy abilities.
card.flavor: "No one will ever notice."

card.name: Spirit of the Shadows
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Ninja, permanently give him the ability, "Ninja Battle: Target two Personalities controlled by the same player at different locations: Switch their locations." Otherwise, permanently give him Ninja.
card.flavor: "You can hide in a dark corner, or you can hide in the complacency of men's minds. Use whatever works." - Yogo Rieko

card.name: Show of Restraint
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Negate all current Force penalties on him from actions. If he has a Weapon, negate the next card effect that moves him home or bows him.
card.flavor: "You are an amazing idiot. I should kill you, but your Empire needs even idiots right now." - Tetsuo

card.name: No Time for Games
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After an attacking player announces a Battle action before the Defender's first normal opportunity to act or pass: Negate its effects.
Open: Choose your performing dishonorable Personality: Rehonor him. After the next time (this turn) you lose Honor from another player's card effect, give him three +1F Revenge tokens.

card.name: Reckless Rush
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Personality and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment or its base Gold Cost is 0. Before this battle's resolution, straighten your Personality.
card.flavor: The Crane and the Lion fought shoulder to shoulder and back to back.

card.name: Revenge
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Determination
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if another player's action has destroyed one of your Personalities since the end of your last Battle action this battle.
card.flavor: The Spider fought alongside the rest of Rokugan, but some remembered past days.

card.name: Rocky Terrain
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle's resolution: You may bow one or two attacking Personalities at the current battlefield.
Battle: Put this card into play at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: Choosing battle sites was one of the few advantages the Empire's defenders had.

card.name: Strength of the Mountain
card.text:
Earth • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing Monk, who must be unbowed unless he is Earth, and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Bow it.
card.flavor: Their homes are destroyed but the mountains endure.

card.name: Tsunami Tattoo
card.text:
Water • Tattoo
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. This movement will not be negated if your Personality is Water. If the enemy Personality moved, bow his unit.
card.flavor: "We are wounded but never defenseless."

card.name: Unorthodox Attack
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card: Bow it.
card.flavor: Following the lead of the Lion, the defenders of Rokugan tried tactics they had never tried before, with surprising success.

card.name: Advance Warning
card.text: Battle: Move your performing Scout Personality home: Straighten his unit. Raise or lower the current battlefield's province's strength by your Scout's Force.

card.name: Defending Their Home
card.text:
Heroic
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Hero: Give him +2F for each Personality you control not at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: Once battle was its reward. Now it meant something else - preserving a way of life.

card.name: Readied Steel
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Kensai: Straighten his unit if he has a Weapon. You may attach a Weapon to him from your discard pile, paying all costs and paying 2 less Gold.
card.flavor: With each loss, the Dragon fought harder. They did not fight for the lost homes or castles, but for the land itself.

card.name: Control the Board
card.text:
Battle: Target a Terrain: Destroy it.
Tactical Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -6F. Bow it.
card.flavor: Go taught much, but only to those who could understand that it was not merely a game.

card.name: The Second Feint
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Move your performing Ninja Personality home and target an enemy card: Bow it. Negate its next straightening (this turn).
card.flavor: If you see one, the other two have already passed your vigil.

card.name: The Spirit of Knowledge
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Tactician, permanently give him the ability, "Tactical Battle: Bow this Personality: Draw a card." Otherwise, permanently give him Tactician.
card.flavor: "There is no greater teacher than experience, and both victory and defeat are necessary for mastery. I fear I shall lead a generation of true masters." - Akodo Shigetoshi

card.name: Scars of War
card.text:
Political
Limited: Bow your performing Courtier and target a Holding: Until the game ends, after each time it bows or an ability on it resolves, its controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Our lands have suffered greatly, but we will find advantage from this and emerge stronger for it." - Bayushi Miyako

card.name: Disgraceful Conduct
card.text: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, pay Gold equal to a target Personality or unit's total Gold Cost minus 4: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Remember your purpose. Make it convincing, or everyone will know of your shame at the Kyuden Bayushi winter court." - Bayushi Shibata

card.name: The Sound of Thunder
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Battle Maiden and target an enemy Personality: Move your Battle Maiden to the current battlefield. Straighten her if she moved. Give the enemy Personality -3F.
card.flavor: The Lion laughed, blood staining his lips. "Hear that, Destroyer?" he sputtered. "We held you long enough. The Unicorn come for you now."

card.name: Thoughts of Wind
card.text:
Air • Kiho
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: Give him Cavalry. If you control any Rings or he is Air, give him +4F.
card.flavor: "You think like Earth. Do not be restricted. Think like the wind, and all is possible."

card.name: Shadow Tactics
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, the loser's controller draws a card.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Rehonor him. If he is opposed, straighten him. You may move him home.
card.flavor: "Some Scorpion become so lost in their trade, so consumed by their duty, that they become something almost inhuman. They, too, have their uses." - Shosuro Toson

card.name: Visage of the Orochi
card.text:
Thunder • Fear
Battle: Choose your performing opposed unbowed Thunder Personality: Raise his Force to 6. You may target and bow an enemy card with lower Force and no attachments.
card.flavor: "There are things about this phenomenon of Thunder we do not yet understand, and I recommend strongly against angering the Mantis until we do." - Asako Bairei

card.name: Detained
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After engaging, bow your performing Magistrate and target an enemy dishonorable Personality at the current battlefield: Move him home. If he moved, bow his unit, and his controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Hold, you disgraceful lout! Your weakness endangers us all, and I will not have it!"

card.name: A Champion in Court
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may substitute one of your Yojimbo Personalities for your Personality in this duel.
Reaction: After another player's action destroys one of your Courtier or Shugenja Personalities, choose your performing Yojimbo Personality: Give him three +1F Revenge tokens.
card.flavor: "Please, my lord, allow me this honor."

card.name: Consuming Weakness
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing Shadowlands Personality and remove a target dead Personality in any discard pile from the game: Give your Personality +3F, or +4F if he is Undead.
card.flavor: "Use the dead on the front line, and feast on their energy when they are destroyed. The dead are nothing if not versatile." - Chuda Mishime

card.name: The Agony of Her Gaze
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, after the resolution of any Battle action, give each of your Nonhumans who performed it a +1F Frenzy token.
card.flavor: "Finally, the Destroyer and her elite took to the battlefield. Some hearts shattered, unable to bear her presence. Others were kindled to consuming rage." -Chronicles of the Bitter Spring

card.name: The Price of Honor
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing Courtier and target another player's dishonorable Personality: He is asked to make a sacrifice. The player may show you his hand. If he does, you may discard a card from it. If he does not choose this, his Personality will not be affected by the rulebook seppuku action.

(MRP)

card.name: Heavy Infantry Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality and bow this card: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: "Our daimyo send us to war, and our generals win the day, but it is the sensei who train our soldiers. Without them, all would be lost." - Mirumoto Mareshi

card.name: Gaining Experience
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Samurai: Permanently give him either Cavalry or Tactician.
card.flavor: "The years of war and strife have taken their toll upon the Empire's population. If there can be any benefit, it is that those who remain are the most skilled and promising of a generation lost." - Miya Shoin

card.name: Temple of Harmony
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if paying for a Monk.
card.flavor: "Enlightenment does not only come in times of peace." - Togashi Gato

card.name: The Seekers' Temple
card.text:
Temple • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Open: Destroy this card: Search your Fate deck for a Ring. Show it and put it in your hand. Shuffle your Fate deck.
card.flavor: Those who quest for knowledge and enlightenment may seek respite and the company of others within.

card.name: Tempest of Flame
card.text:
Fire • Void
Attaches to a Fire or Void Shugenja paying 1 less Gold.
This Personality has +2F.
Battle: Bow this Shugenja: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "Part your ranks and stand aside!" he roared with the voice of a wildfire.

card.name: Fury of the Sea
card.text:
Water
Battle: If this Shugenja is unbowed, bow him unless he is Water: In turn order, each player who now controls a unit in the current enemy army targets and moves home one of his units there.
card.flavor: Those who stand against the Phoenix are shattered like the land before the tsunami.

card.name: A Warrior's Wisdom
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Give him a Force bonus equal to his Chi (until the turn ends). You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "Warrior monks are a dangerous breed, but I would prefer to face a dozen of them than those tattooed madmen from the Dragon Clan." - Ikoma Toraji

card.name: Chokehold
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Bow him.
card.flavor: "I sincerely believe that your philosophy is flawed, my friend. Now that I have your attention, let me explain why..."

card.name: Striking Through the Void
card.text:
Void • Kiho
Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target one to three Personalities controlled by other players: Give one of them -1F (until the turn ends). Give a second different Personality you targeted -2F (until the turn ends). Give a third different Personality you targeted -3F (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: "Distance has no meaning in the Void." - Togashi Akagi

card.name: Shameful Rebuke
card.text:
Political
Battle: In turn order, starting with you, each player targets and moves one of his Personalities at the current battlefield home. Then, choose a player who loses Honor equal to the number of Personalities this moved.
card.flavor: "You are a disgrace. Leave this place at once!"

card.name: The Lion's Charge
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 2 Attack, with +2 strength if your Personality or your Follower's Personality is a Paragon. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Forward! There is no glory in restraint this day!"

card.name: Begone, Fool!
card.text:
Political
Battle: Target an allying Personality: Dishonor him. Move him home. His controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "This does not concern you. You and yours are not welcome here!"

card.name: Shameful Death
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate Personality and target an enemy dishonorable Personality: Reduce his Force to 0 (until the turn ends). Give your Magistrate a Force bonus equal to the amount of Force the Personality lost (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: "Urk!"

card.name: Ryoshun's Guidance
card.text:
Kami • Unique
Your Personalities have +1C while they are not involved in a duel.
Reaction: When another player's action would target one of your cards, discard this card: Choose another of your non-Stronghold cards at the same location. The action targets it instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "He guards the dead and guides the living."

card.name: Assault in the Jungle
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, all players have the ability: "Battle: Choose your performing unbowed attacking Personality, bow all unbowed cards in his unit, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it."
card.flavor: "The air was filled with flames, smoke, battle cries, the screams of the dying. It was glorious. Few escaped our righteous blades." - Yamazaki

card.name: Burning Dreams
card.text:
Unique
Any player who controls the Imperial Favor discards it. Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, actions that discard the Imperial Favor as a cost have their effects negated if they target a Nonhuman Personality. Until the game ends, Nonhumans may not perform Political actions.
card.flavor: "Mara's body was not recovered from the ruins."

card.name: Willing Spirits
card.text:
Unique
After your next turn begins, permanently give each of your provinces +2 strength.
card.flavor: "The people of the Empire, willing to uproot themselves and move across the world to enact the will of the Empress, are blessed among all mortal people." - The Voice of the Empress

card.name: Ageless Shrine
card.text:
Forest • Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold when paying for a Nonhuman.
Open: Bow this card and target a Nonhuman or Samurai: Straighten him. Straighten one of his attachments if he is Nonhuman.
card.flavor: The Rokugani assumed the Naga temples to be ruined or abandoned. Their hubris proved costly.

card.name: Colonial Harbor
card.text:
Port
You may use your Stronghold's abilities even if it is bowed.
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
card.flavor: The years following the Mantis discovery of the new lands were prosperous for the Empire. Trade over and across the sea brought about new opportunities for the industrious.

card.name: Hida Fubatsu - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Naga • Samurai • Artisan • Blacksmith • Hero • Tactician • Experienced • Unique
Limited: Target your Personality: Create a +1F Armor or Weapon Item and attach it to him.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If it is an attachment, remove it from the game.
card.flavor: "Something dark was born this day."

card.name: Toritaka Chokichi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Bow your performing Follower: Ranged 4 Attack which may target a Personality with attached Followers if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: "We will find Fubatsu, or those who took him. We will not suffer a serpent to live..."

card.name: Daidoji Takichi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout
Battle: Target a Personality opposing Takichi at the current battlefield: Move the Personality and Takichi to the same adjacent unresolved battlefield.
card.flavor: "I know little about the Naga, but were they men I would say they behaved as sleepwalkers do, moving thruogh the world around them but unaware of it. Is this the action of the Akasha scholars speak of, or is some other force at work?"

card.name: Doji Hakuseki - exp2
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique • First Magistrate
Open: Target a Personality: Choose one of his abilities; it may not be used.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Hakuseki issues him an unrefusable challenge. The controller of the duel's winner gains 2 Honor. Bow the duel's loser, and destroy him if he is dishonorable.

card.name: Mirumoto Kojinrue
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai
Battle: Bow Kojinrue or one of his Weapons, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The history between the Dragon Clan and Naga race was turbulent. When the time came to take up arms against the children of teh Black Pearl, some Mirumoto were eager for the chance to slay Naga.

card.name: Togashi Osawa - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Air • Monk • Tattooed • Experienced • Unique
Battle/Open: Even if Osawa is bowed, target a Personality at Osawa's location: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "You say a force of Naga threatens us? It hardly matters to me. The Empire has faced greater threats and yet still stands. Disturb my meditation again, and I will show you why I have faither in the strength of our defenders."

card.name: Akodo Tsudoken - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Commander • Tactician • Experienced • Unique • Head of the Second City Guardsmen
Battle: Even if Tsudoken is bowed: Straighten him. He rallies the guards. You may target a Personality and bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "We will find the Governor's murderer, or I will claim the lives of every man on duty the might he was slain. I will have answers!"

card.name: Matsu Koyama
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon
Battle: Target an enemy unit: Reduce the Force of each Personality and Follower in it by Koyama's Personal Honor. Bow any cards in the unit whose Force is now 0.
card.flavor: "Endless years of peace when a warrior's heart craves war, and now these attacks take place and the clans wish only to discuss it? Where is bushido's fire?"

card.name: Moshi Sasako
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval
Battle resolution does not bow cards in this unit.
card.flavor: "Something is disturbing the soul of the ocean. I can feel the turmoil in the waves; I hear trouble in the roar of the surf. Are the Phoenix causing it, or are they also puzzled by it?"

card.name: Tsuruchi Nobukatsu
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Bounty Hunter • Magistrate
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, you may target and straighten a Holding.
card.flavor: "There are two things that I love above all else: money and justice. Truly my job is a blessed one."

card.name: Kitsune Hisano - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Naval • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Reaction: Once per game, after Hisano enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Fox • Spirit • Unique Personality with the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy attacking Personality: Move him home."
card.flavor: "I do not know what sank those ships, but I will not rest until we discover the cause."

card.name: Yoritomo Haruhiko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Scout • Naval
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack with +2 strength if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: "We found bodies on the beach, washed up with ship wreckage and seaweed. A few still breathed. When they finally awake, we will know who is attacking our ships, and who needs to be killed."

card.name: Asako Karachu
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Monk • Golden Arm • Henshin
After Karachu bows: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "The world asks questions of those who would listen. Discover the questions, and you can begin to seek the answers." - The Lessons of Oyo

card.name: Asako Chukage
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Water • Monk • Shugenja • Cavalry • Henshin • Unique • Elemental Master
After Chukage enters play: Search your discard pile, then hand, then deck, for a Ring of Water. Put it into play or in your hand.
Reaction: Even if Chukage is bowed, after the resolution of an action that moved your Personality: Move Chukage to the Personality's location. Straighten Chukage's unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "Seek the ever-changing mysteries of water, and find yourself."

card.name: Asako Kaitoko
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Void • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force to 0. Destroy a card without attachments in his unit if he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "They are guilty, and their lives forfeit. Favors, status, statue in the Empire... they will be as nothing to you. Deal harshly with tsukai, for you protext the purity of the Empire." - The teachings of Isawa Mitsuko

card.name: Shiba Sawaken
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -5F.
card.flavor: "I think it unwise to explore this ruin without first informing the clan of your discovery, my lord. My duty is to follow, however."

card.name: Bayushi Higaonna
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, its owner loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: The magistrate held his badge of office for all to see. "I will say it once more," he said quietly. "What happened here?"

card.name: Bayushi Toshimo
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Bitter Lies • Kensai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If Toshimo has a Weapon or you control a Courtier, negate the card's straightening.
card.flavor: He held the item in his hand and felt a smile creep onto his face. He followed every order to the letter, even if he did not understand.

card.name: Shosuro Makiko
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Seductress • Loyal
Political Open: Bow Makiko: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: "Why, this is exactly what I needed. Thank you for helping me. I will be willing to help you in return if you would like..."

card.name: Shosuro Aroru - exp2
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Duelist • Experienced 2 • Unique
Will not attach non-Ninja Followers.
Reaction: When an action would target a Ninja at Aroru's location: Choose another of your cards. The action targets it instead, if legal. After the action's resolution, you may move Aroru to a different location.
Battle: Other players may not take Reactions until this action ends. Ranged 5 Attack.

card.name: Daigotsu Gyoken - exp2
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror • Dark Death • Paragon • Experienced 2 • Unique
After Gyoken enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle/Open: Target your Personality and a non-Unique attachment in any player's discard pile: Attach it to the Personality, paying all costs and ignoring Honor Requirements. You may take an additional action appropriate to this Phase.

card.name: Ninube Shiho
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Shugenja • Unmaker
After Shiho enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Put Shiho on top of your Dynasty deck and target an enemy Personality: Put all cards without attachments in his unit on the bottom of their owners' appropriate decks.
card.flavor: "In a moment, it will be as if you never were."

card.name: Yamazaki
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of Venom
Open: Target your Holding: Yamazaki threatens the workers. Straighten it.
card.flavor: The abominations that attacked the Spider in the distant colonies were as different from the Naga of Rokugan as were the salamanders from the Burning Sands. Slowly, the truth of their race began to unfold.

card.name: Daigotsu Murota
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Conqueror • Dark Stalker • Paragon
After Murota enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card, which must have no attachments unless Murota has performed a Dark Virtue action this turn: Bow it.
card.flavor: "I have never killed a Naga. I look forward to the experience."

card.name: Iuchi Abodan
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest
Battle: Choose a Personality in a discard pile, remove him from the game, and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Bow him if the Personality you chose was dead.
card.flavor: "This is an insult to our ancestors and our heritage. It must be answered with blood."

card.name: Moto Xiao - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Experienced • Unique
Followers in Xiao's army have +1F.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The Unicorn armies raced across the plains, in pursuit of those they believed were responsible. The enemies disappeared into the heart of the forest, where no cavalry could ever follow.

card.name: Shinjo Junpei
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Battle: Even if Junpei is not at the current battlefield, target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. If it is a Personality, negate his next movement.
card.flavor: "We must understand our enemy before we blindly rush into combat. Who knows what secrets they may have ready to strike?"

card.name: Utaku Ji-Yun
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
Negate Ji-Yun's dishonoring from other players' cards' effects.
card.flavor: "When our hidden enemies destroyed the Shinomen Tower, they killed my brothers... I must keep my calm when we enter battle or I will lose everything."

card.name: The Shakash
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Commander • Conqueror
Enters play paying 1 less Gold for each Nonhuman you control, up to 3 less Gold.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him or move him home.
card.flavor: "You set me free, dark master. Name your enemies, and I will end them for you."

card.name: The Dark Naga
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Pearl • Shugenja • Champion • Unique
After The Dark Naga enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Reaction: After another player targets The Dark Naga with an action: You may bow one of your Forests. If you did, negate The Dark Naga's destruction from the action's effects.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: If he is Nonhuman, take control of him (he joins your army). If he is human, bow his unit. Destroy him before this turn ends.

card.name: The Sleepless One
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Pearl • Shugenja • Abomination
Enters play paying 1 less Gold.
Battle: Twice per turn, bow one of your Forests or Pearls: Give each of your Nonhuman cards at the current battlefield +1F.
card.flavor: "Before man walked the earth, we were cursed. Our greatest strength became our greatest weakness."

card.name: The Second City
card.text:
Unique
Each of your cards that is a Courtier or Magistrate has +1F.
Political Open: Bow this card and target a face-down card in a province: You claim a new tract of land. Turn the card face-up. You may increase the province's strength by 2.
card.flavor: A shining jewel amid the wilderness.

card.name: Hunter of Harmony
card.text: Limited: Remove this card from the game: Choose a Kiho Strategy in your discard pile. Put it into your hand.
card.flavor: "It is all the more important to keep calm in times of great strife."

card.name: Scourge of the Sea
card.text:
Nonhuman • Orochi • Cavalry
This Personality has Naval.
card.flavor: The Orochi Riders of the Mantis made pacts with many of the strange beasts, but some Orochi are impossible to tame.

card.name: The Vengeful
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Unique
Battle: Ranged 7 Attack.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed, if this Personality is Nonhuman: Straighten this unit.
card.flavor: "They take our rightful place as masters of the world. We will correct this offense with their deaths!"

card.name: Black Pearl - exp
card.text:
Pearl • Experienced • Unique
