Limited: Destroy this card and target a Personality in any player's discard pile: Bring him into play (under your control), paying all costs, but paying 4 less Gold if the Personality is Nonhuman.
card.flavor: The words haunted their dreams, recited perfectly in the Qatol's voice. "What are they?" he asked. "What are they? "

card.name: Pearl of Embers
card.text:
Pearl
Battle/Open: Bow this card: Straighten this Personality.
card.flavor: "There is so much we could learn from these noble creatures," Chukage said sadly. "If only Bairei-sama were still with us."

card.name: The Mountain's Power
card.text:
Earth
While this Shugenja is Earth and defending, negate his destruction from other players' cards' effects.
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "You do not face a man. You face the mountain!"

card.name: Wind of the Moon
card.text:
Air • Political
While this Shugenja is Air, he straightens during each player's Straighten Phase.
Open: Bow this Shugenja and target a face-up Personality out of play: Give him +1PH or +1 Gold Cost.
card.flavor: The black has eclipsed the gold, and Rokugan suffers for it.

card.name: Thunder's Wrath
card.text:
Thunder
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F.
Battle: Destroy this card: Ranged 4 Attack with +2 strength if it targets a Follower. If this Shugenja is Thunder and the Ranged Attack destroyed a Follower, Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "The seas shall be ours again!" - Yoritomo Naizen

card.name: Pearl of Rage
card.text:
Pearl • Unique
This Shugenja has +1F for each Pearl card you control and in your discard piles.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged Attack with strength equal to this Shugenja's Chi, plus the number of Pearl cards you control and in your discard piles.
card.flavor: Their combined power was great.

card.name: The Perfect Moment
card.text: Reaction: After the end of an Attack Phase in which you were the Defender: Create an additional Attack Phase with the previous phase's Attacker as the Defender. During this Attack Phase, you will not destroy more than one of the Defender's provinces and your Personalities may not assign and will not move unless they are Paragons or Battle Maidens.
card.flavor: "Even during the chaos of battle, there are times when opportunity presents itself."

card.name: Fruitless Search
card.text:
Imperial • Political • Unique
Reaction: After engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Create a 4F/4C/3PH Imperial • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate Personality on your side there. Remove him from the game after this battle ends.
card.flavor: "I seek information, fool. Can you satisfy my inquiry or shall I move on?"

card.name: Sundering Strike
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality: You may target one of his attachments and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost minus four. If you did, destroy it. Move the Personality home.
card.flavor: "Hello, friend! You do not appear pleased to see me. Shall we discuss why your anger seems to overcome civility?"

card.name: Heart of Darkness
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle's resolution: Choose and bow zero to two cards at the current battlefield with 4 or greater Force.
Battle: If no Terrain is at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: Few can venture into the depths of the jungles and hope to survive.

card.name: Steadfast Defense
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Straighten him. If you control a Temple, you may target a Personality or Follower and bow or straighten it.
card.flavor: They knew the disappearances were no accidents. Many felt the old Hitomi blood stir within them and were fueled to action with reckless abandon.

card.name: Feint & Strike
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel's resolution, its winner's controller discards a card.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target an enemy Personality: If your Commander has a Follower, you may target and destroy an attachment in the Personality's unit. Move him home.
card.flavor: "Tell me what you know of the attacks on the Crab, Dragon, and Mantis... or only one of us shall leave this place."

card.name: Intimidation
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing Berserker Personality and target another player's Personality not at the current battlefield: Move them both there. Straighten each unit that this moved.
card.flavor: "Do not just stand there, Phoenix! Make your peace, lift your blade, and test your strength!"

card.name: Seeking the Truth
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Put a non-Unique Battle Strategy in your discard pile into your hand. After this battle ends, if you did not destroy the battlefield's province or an army, discard a card at random.
card.flavor: "Poor, accursed creatures..."

card.name: Siege Volley
card.text:
Siege
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield: Increase or decrease its province's strength by the number of Castles you control.
card.flavor: "Let's see what their precious Void has to say about this. Threaten the Scorpion and you deal with the Crab!"

card.name: Duel of Haiku
card.text: Political Open: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your Personality duels the other. In this duel, each Personality uses Personal Honor as his duel stat. The duel's winner's controller gains 1 Honor. Bow and dishonor the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "A masterful poem, my lady. If I may, I think I have one you may enjoy even more."

card.name: Sword for Hire
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Limited: Target another player's Personality: Create a 0F/3C/0PH Assassin • Duelist Personality. He duels the targeted Personality. Destroy the duel's loser. After the duel ends, remove the created Personality from the game.
card.flavor: "Know me? No, you do not. But we have business today regardless."

card.name: Accidental Confession
card.text:
Imperial • Political
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier, discard the Imperial Favor, and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller may not assign him, and he will not move, to battlefields this turn.
card.flavor: "Your poem revealed that you knew too much about the incident at the temple. The magistrates will wish to speak with you now."

card.name: Consideration
card.text: Open: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target another of your Personalities: Give the Personality +3F. After the next time this turn another player's action targets him, negate its effects.
card.flavor: "We must double the guard if our next caravan is to reach the Second City. No expense can be spared."

card.name: Gripped by Terror
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing Personality and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. If your Personality is Nonhuman, give each of your Personalities at the current battlefield +1F.
card.flavor: "There are things in this world of such horror that one can only scream." - Ninube Shiho

card.name: Asset Denial
card.text:
Ninja Open: Bow your performing Ninja Personality and target a Retainer: Destroy it.
Battle: Choose your performing Ninja Personality with no non-Ninja Followers at the current battlefield: Move him to a different location. If he moved, straighten his unit. Discard a card in a province.
card.flavor: "Your master will have to continue without you."

card.name: Pearls & Spirits
card.text:
Pearl
Battle: Bow your performing Shugenja, and destroy him unless he is Nonhuman: Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Force plus Chi.
Battle: Bow your performing Shugenja: Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Force or Chi.

card.name: Petty Squabbles
card.text:
Limited: Target one or two face-down cards in provinces: Turn them face-up.
Battle/Open: Target an attachment owned by another player: He may pay 4 Gold. If he did not, return it to its owner's hand.
card.flavor: "As the mystery of the missing ships deepened, tempers became shorter. Everyone agreed something had to be done, but no one agreed on what." - Legacy of a Pearl and a Dream

card.name: Creating Order
card.text:
Unique
Battle/Open: Target one or two Personalities: Either negate all current and new Force bonuses and penalties on them from actions, or straighten their units.
card.flavor: "I do not care what serpents held sway here thousands of years ago. These lands were given to the Spider to bring into the Empire!"

card.name: Entrenched Position
card.text:
Reaction: After the Attacker announces a Battle action before the Defender's first normal opportunity to act or pass: Negate its effects.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: If there was a legacy to the attack by the Destroyers, it was that the samurai of Rokugan knew how to defend their homes.

card.name: Rise of the Dark Naga
card.text: Open: If you control two or more Nonhuman Personalities, choose your performing Nonhuman Personality face-up in your province: Bring him into play, paying all costs. Refill the province face-up.
card.flavor: The oceans turned against the Mantis and a nightmare emerged.

card.name: Grateful Reward
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Compassion
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Samurai at the current battlefield: Create a 1F Ashigaru • Cavalry Follower and attach it to him. If he is a Paragon, gain 2 Honor and draw a card.
card.flavor: After the attack on the Second City, Rokugani of all castes wished to aid in the defeat of the enemy.

card.name: Broken Alliance
card.text:
Battle/Open: Target an attachment and pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost minus two: Destroy it.
Battle: If there are enemy units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: The Dragon felt little for the Naga. The Naga considered the Dragon to be abominations.

card.name: Cast Aside the Weak
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Strength
Open: Choose your performing Samurai: Straighten his unit.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if your Samurai is a Paragon.
card.flavor: "Your needs are inconsequential in the great scheme of things."

card.name: Honor Never Falls
card.text:
Unique
As a Focus Effect: Delay all consequences of losing this duel (from any source) until the end of the turn.
Battle: Choose your performing bowed Personality: Straighten him. If he is Unique, you may take an additional Battle action to use one of his base abilities.

card.name: Oblivious
card.text: Open: Bow your two performing Nonhuman Personalities, and target a card without attachments in a unit and with a lower Gold Cost than the combined Gold Cost of the Nonhumans: Destroy the targeted card.
card.flavor: "Fascinating that this temple has gone undetected all these years. There must be mystical concealment at work here. I wonder what other defenses might be in place?"

card.name: A Yojimbo's Duty
card.text:
Open: Destroy your performing Yojimbo and target your discarded Courtier or Shugenja: Bring him into play, paying all costs but reducing his Gold cost to enter play by your Yojimbo's base Gold Cost plus 1.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. You may take an additional action appropriate to this phase.
card.flavor: "Look out, my lord! Move!"

card.name: Economic Repercussions
card.text:
Political
Other players' Personalities and Followers in play have -2 Gold Cost and all players have the ability "Political Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor or pay 6 Gold: Discard a card titled Economic Repercussions from play."
Limited: Put this card into play.
card.flavor: "I believe this bears your seal, does it not?"

card.name: A Game of Dice
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Draw two additional cards during your next End Phase.
card.flavor: "I enjoy a pleasant diversion, but who understands the games the Mantis play with these strange gaijin dice?" - Yasuki Daiki

card.name: The Forgotten Temple
card.text:
Forest • Temple
You do not gain Honor. You may not take Political actions. You do not lose Honor from cards you own. Before you lose Honor: Reduce the loss to 1, which may not be increased.
Limited: Target your discarded Nonhuman Personality and discard a card in one of your provinces: Refill the province face-up with the Personality.

card.name: Desperate Mediation
card.text:
Political
Battle: In turn order, starting with you, each player targets and moves home one of his Personalities at the current battlefield. Then, gain Honor equal to the number of Personalities this moved.
card.flavor: "Honorable samurai, please! Think of what you are doing!"

card.name: Embracing Virtue
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Duty
Before an End Phase begins, if this card is in your discard pile: You may put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "This is what it means to have honor. This is what it means to be samurai."

card.name: Game of Sincerity
card.text:
Political
Battle: Dishonor your performing unbowed Personality and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller loses 2 Honor. Neither Personality contributes Force in this battle's resolution.
card.flavor: Even in the midst of battle, words can but as easily as steel, and the shame can linger far, far longer.

card.name: Prideful Allies
card.text:
Bushido Virtue
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an allying unit: Move it home. Gain 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "A thousand thanks to you, brother Crane, but this day the battlefield belongs to the Lion and the Lion alone."

card.name: Bamboo Harvesters - exp
card.text:
Forest • Experienced • Unique
This card will not straighten before your third turn.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card: Draw a card. If you now have 6 or more cards in your hand, discard a card.
card.flavor: In the wilderness, serenity.

card.name: Border Keep - exp
card.text:
Experienced • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: If it is your first turn, twice per turn: Put one or more cards in your provinces at the bottom of your deck, refilling the provinces face-up.
Limited: Once per game: Put one to three cards in your hand at the bottom of your deck. Draw cards equal to the number you put on the bottom.

card.name: Hiruma Nikaru
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. He may not perform actions.
card.flavor: All of Fubatsu's students were dead and the Sensei was missing. The Crab swore that blood would flow for this, whether that blood be red or not.

card.name: Yasuki Daiki
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant
Political Open: Target another player's Personality: His controller chooses to either pay 4 Gold, lose 2 Honor, or do neither. If he did not pay 4 Gold or lose 2 Honor, the Personality may not be assigned, and will not move, into attacking armies.
card.flavor: "There are many ways to win a war."

card.name: Asahina Shigemitsu
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja
Open: Bow Shigemitsu or one of his Spells: Give each of your provinces +1 strength. If it is not your turn, before it ends, if none of your provinces were destroyed this turn, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "These are troubling signs, and our clan is still recovering from the troubles of the past. We must be vigilant so that our rebuilding is not jeopardized."

card.name: Doji Rengetsu
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Artisan
Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target a Personality or Holding: Choose one of its abilities; it may not be used.
card.flavor: "The new Imperial Governor must be someone of vision and boldness. Great things can come from these new lands, and we must not be timid in grasping them."

card.name: Kitsuki Nubane
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate
Open: Target an attachment: Bow it.
card.flavor: The Kitsuki family interpreted their initial failure to explain the disappearance of Mirumoto Mareshi as a failure of their methods. Throughout the Empire, Kitsuki-trained magistrates attempted to find answers to the mystery.

card.name: Tamori Kazushige
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Kazushige has +2F while defending.
Open: If it is another player's turn, target one of his Personalities: Before this phase ends, straighten him. Before this turn ends, if the Personality did not assign to attack this turn, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You seek to cut the earth with a blade?"

card.name: Kitsu Kagako
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
Reaction: After Kagako enters play: She summons an ancestor. Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I implore aid, grandmother, though I am unworthy."

card.name: Ikoma Tsukasa
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Target a card in a unit; the card must have no attachments unless you control a Terrain: Bow or straighten the card.
card.flavor: "No, I do not ride a horse. You assumed I would, and that is why I am victorious and you lay dying."

card.name: Cursed Relic
card.text:
Cursed • Weapon
Battle: Any number of times per turn, give this Personality -1C: Ranged 3 Attack.
Battle: Bow this card, give this Personality -1C, and target an enemy card without attachments: Remove it from the game.
card.flavor: "Some secrets of the kingdom are best left forgotten." - Yoritomo Singh

card.name: Returning Home
card.text: Reaction: After a battle ends in which you destroyed a province as the Attacker: Create a Holding with the trait "Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold" (it enters play bowed). Draw a card.
card.flavor: "For too long our people have slept while the upstart humans have carved out their empire from our lands. No more! We shall gather our people and rekindle their greatness, and then we shall wipe our lands clean of these invaders." - The Shahismael

card.name: Never Beyond My Reach
card.text: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, choose your performing unbowed Kensai, who may be at an adjacent battlefield to the current one if he has a Weapon attached: Ranged 6 Attack (against a target at the current battlefield).
card.flavor: "Flee the region, flee the province, flee the entire Empire. You will never escape my vengeance."

card.name: Wanted for Questioning
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Your Magistrate takes him into custody. If he is dishonorable, destroy his attachments. Move him home.
card.flavor: "Murder? Arson? I will not have it! Bring me the scum from which one might typically expect such an act."

card.name: Yotsu Ueda
card.text:
Samurai • Commander • Gunso • Kensai
Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality without Followers with Force equal to or lower than 4: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "The devastated lands are filled with survivors who desperately need assistance. Who is bold enough to accompany me behind the Destroyer lines?"

card.name: Yotsu Ueda's Chosen
card.text:
Attaches to Yotsu Ueda paying 2 less Gold.
Battle: Target an attachment: Bow or straighten it.
card.flavor: "We will join you, gunso. To abandon those in need would be an unforgiveable crime."

card.name: Natsu-Togumara's Guidance
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
After this card enters play: You may choose a Personality. While this card remains in play, battle resolution does not bow cards in that Personality's unit.
Battle: If there are any enemy units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality and discard this card: Move him to the current battlefield. If he moved, straighten his unit.

card.name: Open Recruitment
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, after each time an unaligned Human Personality turns face-up in one of your provinces, permanently give him your Clan alignment. He has sworn fealty to you.
card.flavor: The stresses of the Destroyer War drove many clans to offer fealty to ronin, something they had never before done.

card.name: All That Will Be Lost
card.text: You may choose and bow a Personality.
card.flavor: "My predecessors and I have struggled against the Empire for more than one thousand years. Always seeking its destruction or its subjugation. Now that moment seems at hand and I find myself... remorseful. I want only respect for Fu Leng. If all of Rokugan is dead, who will exalt his name?" - Daigotsu

card.name: Twisted Fate
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase three turns from now begins, there is an additional Action Phase each turn which occurs between the Dynasty and End Phases.
card.flavor: "In this time of crisis, many have united to serve the Empire. Others seek to advance their own fortunes. In their struggles, it is difficult to distinguish the former from the latter." - Matsu Kenji

card.name: Merchant Atoll
card.text:
Castle • Port
Your provinces have +1 strength.
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
card.flavor: "A mid-sea merchant outpost for kobune crews! It will be expensive, of course, but think of the profits!" - Tashiki

card.name: Shrine to the Heavens
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
After one of your Celestials is revealed in a province: You may choose one of your Celestials in play. If you do, it is not discarded because of the other Celestial entering play.
card.flavor: It can be easy to forget the simple things during war, but some simple things should never be forgotten.

card.name: Tashiki
card.text:
Merchant • Settler
Open: Bow Tashiki and target a Market or Port Holding: Straighten it.
card.flavor: "Yes, yes, this is perfect! The location is excellent! The samurai will need parangu to cut these plants, and larger clay bottles for the heat. I will be a wealthy man!"

card.name: Masaya
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai
Open: If Masaya is face-up in one of your provinces: Bring him into play, paying all costs and paying 2 less Gold. Before the turn ends, put him on top of your Dynasty deck.
card.flavor: "Whatever you require, my lord. But these are desperate times, and many have need of my talents."

card.name: Jahan
card.text:
Gaijin • Kshatriya • Scout
While Jahan is at the current battlefield, other players may not play Terrains.
card.flavor: "I have lost everything except my life, which has no value. If you wish my help, it is yours, but know the value of that which you desire."

card.name: Kamalakar
card.text:
Courtier • Calvary • Gaijin • Kshatriya • Tactician • Unique
After the first time each turn a Political action targets Kamalakar: Negate it's effects.
Battle: Kamalakar confounds the enemy. Move Kamalakar home or to a battlefield with enemy units.
card.flavor: "I will not see my father's lands in chaos. If you bring order, then I am your ally."

card.name: The Ivory Coast
card.text:
Singular
Battle: Choose your performing Personality and bow this card: Move him home. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "Most of the coast is in ruins. We will not disturb it, other than to harvest what resources remain within. The gods frown upon the wasteful." - Yoritomo Naizen

card.name: Master Scouts
card.text:
Elite • Gaijin • Scout
After the resolution of a Recon action you took: Give this card +1F.
card.flavor: "I do not know them, but I know the look in their eyes. They will not betray us, my lord. We are all they have." - Yoritomo Singh

card.name: Coin Pouch
card.text:
This card enters play bowed.
This Personality has +2 Gold Cost.
Reaction: When a Holding bows to produce Gold, bow this card: The Holding produces one additional Gold.
card.flavor: "There are almost no problems that cannot be solved with sufficient funds. Unfortunately we no longer have sufficient funds." - Yoritomo Utemaro

card.name: Colonist's Mark
card.text: Reaction: After an action targets this Personality, discard a card: Negate this Personality's movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "All our people shall carry them, and they will be closely guarded. I will not suffer infiltration." - Moshi Kalani

card.name: All Within the World
card.text:
Unique
Battle/Open: If this Shugenja shares an element keyword with a Ring you control: Either straighten the Ring or this Shugenja.
card.flavor: "Earth and sky, fire and water, Empire and the Kingdoms... all are the same if you but know how to look." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Channeling the Fallen
card.text:
Fire
This Shugenja has +5F.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 5 Attack, or Ranged 6 Attack if this Shugenja is Fire.
card.flavor: "The spirits in this land are strange indeed. They answer my prayers, but the sensation is completely different."

card.name: Economic Manipulation
card.text:
Kolat
This card has -1 Gold Cost if you control a Merchant.
Limited: Target a Holding with a base Gold Cost of 4 or less controlled by a player who controls five or more Holdings: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "A whisper in the competitor's ear and the objective is handled quite nicely." - Yasuki Jinn-Kuen

card.name: A Brave New World
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality and discard a card: Move your Personality to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "I will not lie to you, kinsman," Naizen said. "The journey will be unpleasant, and the work more difficult than you can imagine. The rewards, however, are without measure."

card.name: Quick Recovery
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality and target a bowed card in his unit (which may be him): Before this battle's resolution, straighten the targeted card.
card.flavor: "Steel yourselves, sisters!" Yu-Pan shouted. "We have lost too many to allow minor setbacks to break us! Be unbending, and be victorious!"

card.name: Blessings of the Shi-Tien Yen-Wang
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
After your turn begins: You may choose your dead Personality and put him at the top of your deck.
Battle: Choose your performing opposed Personality and discard this card: The Lords of Death grant him strength. Give him +1F for each dead Personality in all players' discard piles. Negate the next card effect that bows, destroys, or moves him.

card.name: Jurojin's Blessing
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Limited: Look at the top card of your Fate deck. You may discard it.
Open: Discard this card and target a non-Unique Strategy in your Fate discard pile: Put the Strategy into your hand.
card.flavor: "The blessings of a long life can be considerable. Unfortunately, the burden that accompanies such a blessing is considerable as well." - Asako Moeru

card.name: Rebuilding Kyuden Hida
card.text:
Unique
Until your second turn from now begins, the Attacker may not announce a Battle action before the Defender's first normal opportunity to act or pass in a battle.
card.flavor: "I cannot promise that it shall never fall again. But the Crab shall always be here to rebuild it." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Times of Strife
card.text:
Unique
Until your second turn from now begins, all provinces have a maximum strength equal to their base strength, and after each time another player who controls no units at the current battlefield announces a Battle action, he discards a card.
card.flavor: With the ranks of the Great Clans depleted, it was difficult to enforce the Empress' laws.

card.name: Harsh Choices
card.text:
Unique
You may destroy the province this Event was revealed in. If you did, draw 3 cards.
card.flavor: "Take what we are owed. Leave the rest for the crows." - Kakita Idzuki

card.name: Formal Apology
card.text:
Unique
After the next time this game your Honor is below its starting value, you have a tea ceremony; gain 5 Honor.
card.flavor:
"Five magistrates died! An entire district was burned to the ground!"
"Yes, Shiba-san, and we shall address the consequences in time. Please, let us discuss how we might make amends..."

card.name: War Weariness
card.text:
Unique
Until your second turn from now begins, after the resolution of the first action each phase that one or more Personalities performed, bow them.
card.flavor: By the end of the Destroyer War, many had perished, much land went fallow, and even samurai learned the despair that comes with months of hunger.

card.name: Archery Range
card.text:
Dojo
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: After a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it +1 strength.
card.flavor: "Feel the arrow, children! Surrender to the flame, empty your soul, and strike with harmony."

card.name: Tranquil Garden
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Open: Bow this card, and target a Ring in play or in your discard pile: If the Ring is in play, straighten it. Otherwise, put it into your hand and destroy this card.
card.flavor: The years pass, but the search for enlightenment never changes.

card.name: Slanderer
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
Political Limited: Choose your performing Courtier or Magistrate, bow this card, and target a Personality: Dishonor him.
card.flavor: "I can ruin you with a word," she said. Her voice wrapped around him like a warm caress. He was not fooled by her charms.

card.name: Red Crane Dojo
card.text:
Ninja
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold, or 4 Gold when paying for a Ninja card.
Reaction: Even if this card is bowed, after an action targets your Personality: Remove Ninja and Shadowlands from him until the action ends.
card.flavor: There are those who embrace unacceptable solutions...

card.name: Temple of Hotei
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Bow your performing Shugenja: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: It is simple to chase the thought of contentment. It is another to accept it entirely.

card.name: Hida Mochitoko - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Jade • Samurai • Commander • Hero • Experienced • Unique • Advisor to the Ruby Champion
Reaction: Twice per turn, after an action targets your Follower at Mochitoko's location: Negate its bowing and destruction from that action's effects.
card.flavor: "Faster, dogs! There are three more chests to carry and you fall behind schedule!"

card.name: Hida Mimori
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker
Battle: Target a bowed enemy card: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The Empire faced no wars as it recovered from the devastating push from Kali-Ma's forces. The Crab continued to train, fight, and wait.

card.name: Hiruma Tensin
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: If you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack.
Battle: Bow your performing Follower in Tensin's unit: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: He loves paintings, laughter, and music. He has earned the respect and friendship of his superiors. He is no normal Hiruma, yet he is the perfect Crab.

card.name: Yasuki Tsujiken
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Crime Boss • Merchant
Reaction: After Tsujiken enters play, target a Holding: Until Tsujiken leaves play, after each time its controller bows it, he loses 1 Honor.
Open: Bow Tsujiken and target a Holding: Straighten it. You may bow it if its base Gold Cost is 4 or lower.
card.flavor: "What is this pittance? Come back when you are serious."

card.name: Kaiu Watsuki
card.text: Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
card.flavor: "We sometimes play a game amongst each other. One Kaiu devises the strongest fortification possible, and the others must figure out its weaknesses. Me? I have never lost."

card.name: Yasuki Jinn-Kuen - exp2
card.text:
Crab Clan • Daimyo • Courtier • Kolat • Merchant • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique • Master Coin
Political Open: Target a Holding or Stronghold: Straighten it.
Political Reaction: After an action targets your Merchant, pay 2 Gold: Negate the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Rest, regroup, and restructure. We will never die."

card.name: Asahina Munefusa
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja
Open: Target your Temple Holding: Straighten it.
Battle: Even if Munefusa is not at the current battlefield, target an attacking Personality: Move him home. If he moved, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "My days are full of honorable duties, but when the wind blows I hear whispers of distant lands..."

card.name: Doji Dainagon
card.text:
Crane Clan • Imperial • Courtier
You may lobby as an Open action if Dainagon performs it.
card.flavor: "All the strings of power in the Empire run towards the Imperial Palace. And I intend to have my hand on all of them."

card.name: Doji Yoshitada
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate
Political Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If he is dishonorable, choose a player who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "The Mantis need to be taught that their command of the sea ends at the dock. This port is my responsibility, and I will see that the laws of the Crane are upheld here."

card.name: Daidoji Yuki - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Recon Reaction: After engaging at Yuki's battlefield, if all your Personalities there are Scouts: You have Reconnaissance there. You have the first opportunity in this battle to take a Battle action or pass.
card.flavor: "Of course, Ebizo-sama, I would be honored to help you capture him."

card.name: Daidoji Ebizo
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Bounty Hunter • Iron Crane • Scout
After the resolution of your Recon action: Give Ebizo +1F.
Battle: Ranged Attack with strength equal to Ebizo's Force.
card.flavor: "Finding men is an art all its own, and as a Crane it is my duty to excel in an art."

card.name: Kakita Maratai
card.text:
Crane Clan • Artisan • Sculptor
Reaction: After a duel ends that your Personality won, bow Maratai: She sculpts a statue to honor the winner. Gain 2 Honor. Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: "Only through art do the deeds of heroes shine for a thousand years."

card.name: Togashi Hizumi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Monk • Empty Hand • Tattooed
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that bowed a Personality at Hizumi's battlefield, target the Personality: Negate his next straightening (this turn).
Battle: Give the current battlefield's province +4 or -4 strength.
card.flavor: "There is truth in devastation."

card.name: Togashi Meiyu
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Tattooed
Reaction: After Meiyu enters play: Give her three +1F Fire tokens.
card.flavor: "The lord of this province has declared war on his neighbor? Why do you disturb us with such things? Resolve such minor squabbles yourselves."

card.name: Mirumoto Ezuno
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
Reaction: When another player's action would target one of your Shugenja at Ezuno's location: It targets Ezuno instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "You will stand aside, or you will die. I will not tolerate inconvenience to myself or my charge."

card.name: Kitsuki Horume
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Gamekeeper • Justicar • Magistrate
Reaction: After Horume enters play: Choose a player. He gains or loses 1 Honor.
Reaction: After a duel ends that Horume won: He boasts of his talents. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "A worthy attempt! It has been an honor to face you. Surely, in your next life, you will prevail..."

card.name: Mirumoto Yumaru
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: If Yumaru has a Weapon, you may move her home and you may move the Personality home. Otherwise, move both of them home.
card.flavor: "You are welcome to test your style against mine. To whom should I send your daisho?"

card.name: Tamori Yayu
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist • Mountaineer
Yayu has +2F and Cavalry while it is not your turn.
Battle: Bow or destroy one of Yayu's Spells: He lobs an alchemical potion at the enemy. Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "It is wonderful how the kami can be called upon to aid or to destroy, is it not?"

card.name: Tamori Ruya
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist • Unique
Reaction: After the resolution of your action that bowed a Personality, target a Personality at the same location: Bow him.
card.flavor: "Redemption. That is what we seek. Our family was founded by a traitor, and his successor also came from our ranks. We may never be able to cleanse the stain of that shame, but our duty demands that we try."

card.name: Kitsu Fukui
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja • Head Librarian
Battle: Bow or destroy your performing Ancestor Personality, and target an enemy card: Bow it. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "There is nothing more important than protecting our past for the sake of the future."

card.name: Kitsu Akai
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
Limited: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality.
Battle: Bow your performing Ancestor Personality and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "With your help I shall avenge your death, brother."

card.name: Ikoma Sugo
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Hero • Scout
Sugo has +4F while attacking.
card.flavor: "Our cheers shall pierce the heavens, and the Fortunes themselves shall know that the Lion alone are worthy of the mantle of the Heavens!"

card.name: Akodo Kakihara
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon
Reaction: After another player's action targets Kakihara: Give him a Force bonus equal to his Personal Honor.
card.flavor: He traveled across the Empire after his gempukku. After a year passed, he asked permission to continue his musha shugyo... and his journey continues to this day.

card.name: Akodo Kamina
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Tactical Open: Bow Kamina or discard a card, and target a Personality: Give him +4F.
card.flavor: "We are the unrivaled masters of war. It has been proven time and time again, and we will show anyone who would challenge our might."

card.name: Matsu Kasei - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Artisan • Experienced • Unique • Turquoise Champion
Kasei has +2F while attacking.
Battle: Target a defending Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Few would ever guess upon seeing him, but the young Matsu held the soul of a poet within. He could tell a riveting tale that would rival that of the greatest omoidasu." - Kakita Idzuki

card.name: Kitsune Tokoru
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Tokoru enters play: Create a 4F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Bear • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Battle: Target an attacking enemy card: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment."
card.flavor: "I trust you, of course, but my friend has doubts about your intentions in our forest."

card.name: Kitsune Ohsuki
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After Ohsuki enters play: Create a 0F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Sparrow • Cavalry • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Limited: If none of your provinces were destroyed since your last turn ended: Gain 3 Honor."
card.flavor: "What news of home, little one?"

card.name: Yoritomo Emoto
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Commander • Naval • Captain of the Third Kama
Battle: Bow your performing Follower and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Bandits foolish beyond measure and the occasional mysterious gaijin vessel. The route between Empire and Colonies is not without peril."

card.name: Tsuruchi Yakusho
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Scout
Reaction: After you announce an action, if Yakusho is at the current battlefield: Ranged Attacks from the action's effects will not have their strength reduced.
card.flavor: "Every step I take within these cursed jungles, I feel eyes upon me. What shadows haunt this place I do not know, but I do no doubt their presence."

card.name: Moshi Tomeno
card.text: Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval • Loyal
card.flavor: "More than two decades and we have barely scratched the surface of the mysteries held in this place. We must forego the constant securing of position and instead delve with all fervor into our exploration!"

card.name: Yoritomo Sakuma
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Courtier • Bully • Merchant
Reaction: When paying a Gold Cost, bow Sakuma: Produce 2 Gold.
Political Reaction: After another player's Political action targets one of your Personalities, bow Sakuma: The player may pay 2 Gold. If he did not, negate the action's (remaining) effects.

card.name: Yoritomo Minori
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Half-Naga • Magistrate • Naval
Minori has +1F for each other Magistrate in her army.
card.flavor: "Her parentage is uncertain, but there can be no question that she is born of man and Naga. In a different age, such unique qualities would be valuable. In the wake of the Shahismael's return, however, they may be a weakness." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Isawa Mitsuko - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Experienced • Unique • Elemental Master
Open: Target an Air Shugenja or a Holding: Straighten it.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. Destroy him if he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: Where she walks, only the pure remain.

card.name: Asako Rikate
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Shadowlands • Earth • Monk • Golden Arm • Henshin • Blood of Kinuye
Maho Battle: Target an enemy Personality: His controller may put any attachments in that unit into his hand. Give the Personality -2C.
card.flavor: "What am I becoming?"

card.name: Asako Moeru
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Void • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Ishiken • Magistrate
card.flavor: "No! Your status is nothing to me! You, and your students, shall not escape judgment."

card.name: Agasha Kodo
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Courtier
Political Open: Target a Holding: Straighten it.
card.flavor: "Kodo-san's beauty hides a keen mind and a peerless devotion to duty. Her efforts have given us many opportunities to improve our clan and protect the spirit of the Empire." - Isawa Emori

card.name: Shiba Kudome
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Samurai • Duelist • Legion of Flame • Yojimbo
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Kudome duels him. Bow the duel's loser. Give Kudome a +1F Fire token if she won and you control a Shugenja.
card.flavor: The Shiba continued to serve, as always. Those who sought to assail the Phoenix, failed.

card.name: Isawa Kojiro
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry
Kojiro has Naval while he has a Spell.
card.flavor: "The kami of water are always willing to assist. The challenge is remaining dry after receiving their attentions."

card.name: Bayushi Kahoku - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Final Student • Magistrate • Experienced • Unique
Ranged Attacks from actions performed by Kahoku may target dishonorable Personalities with attached Followers.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: He did not miss war. Keeping the law was similar enough.

card.name: Bayushi Nori
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow the Personality or all of his attachments. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Many things have changed. People have not. They are still the basest of all creatures."

card.name: Shosuro Hawado
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Shadowspawn
Battle: Even if Hawado is bowed, remove a Dynasty card in any discard pile from the game: Move Hawado home or to a battlefield with one or more enemy units. If she moved, straighten her.
card.flavor: "You have been reading too many children's stories. There is no such person." - Bayushi Nori

card.name: Shosuro Rin
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Actor • Artisan • Eye of Shadow
Political Open: Bow Rin and target an honorable Personality: Rin shames him in a performance. The Personality's controller may dishonor him. If he did not choose this, bow him and negate his straightening (this turn).
card.flavor: With a word she can create or destroy.

card.name: Shosuro Ritoru
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Bitter Lies • Kensai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it. Destroy it if it has no attachments and you control a Courtier.
card.flavor: "He is often overlooked due to his stature. It is a mistake most will never be able to make a second time." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: Soshi Neiru
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Air • Shugenja • Prodigy
You may equip Air Spells to Neiru as an Open action.
card.flavor: "It is not ambition that drives me, but rather practicality. If I can be a greater asset to the Scorpion, then why would I not take whatever risk is necessary?"

card.name: Yogo Adi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Air • Courtier • Shugenja • Ward Master • Loyal
Political Open: Target another player's Personality: If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 1 Honor. Otherwise, give your provinces +2 strength.
card.flavor: "Let none approach who do not have your best interests at heart..."

card.name: Daigotsu Bofana
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Dark Scion of Fire • Paragon • Loyal
After the first time each phase another player's action targets Bofana: If the action was not performed by a card with (current) Force equal to or higher than Bofana's base Force, the player discards a card.
card.flavor: "He has no way to hide his fury. And no desire to do so." - Daigotsu Gyoken

card.name: Daigotsu Shikenuro
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror • Silk Fever • Undead
After Shikenuro enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: He fell during the razing of the Shinomen. He had only begun to serve.

card.name: Fukuzo - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Bog Hag • Samurai • Magistrate • Experienced Chuda Fukuzo • Unique • Advisor to the Emerald Champion • Infiltrator
Open: Remove a target Personality in any player's discard pile from the game: Fukuzo wears his skin. Until the next time this game this ability is used, Fukuzo copies one keyword, and one ability that does not itself copy abilities, from the Personality.

card.name: Goju Yurishi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Dragon Child
After Yurishi enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets Yurishi: He disappears into the shadows. Move him home. If he is no longer a legal target for the action, negate its effects on him.
card.flavor: Though they would never admit it, even the other Goju fear him.

card.name: Sutigu
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Tiger's Claw
Battle: Bow Sutigu or one of his Weapons, and target an enemy card: Negate its straightening (until the turn ends) if it is an attachment. Bow it.
card.flavor: "He strikes with the precision of thought. He kills with the surety of night." - Ninube Shiho

card.name: Daigotsu Hotako - exp3
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Naval • Paragon • Experienced 3 • Unique • Obsidian Champion
Enters play paying 2 less Gold if you are a Lion Clan player.
After Hotako enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Fear Open: Target a Personality: He may not perform actions this turn.
card.flavor: "You have failed me. Farewell."

card.name: Moto Ming-Gwok
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest • Moon-Blessed
Battle: If there is a dead Personality in any player's discard pile: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "Who can escape the power of the Lords? Death comes to all things; it stands behind us and before us. If I must travel over the face of the Empire to teach the correct respect of them, then that is what I will do."

card.name: Moto Jun-Ni
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Demon Slayer
Followers in this unit have Cavalry.
Limited: Target a Follower in any player's discard pile: Attach it to Jun-Ni, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "If you are to serve in my command, there is much you must become accustomed to. This is one of them."

card.name: Shinjo Kinto
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Scout
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Move him home. This movement will not be negated if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: "If you can hear my voice, then know this; this is your only chance to flee. These woods are my domain, and you are unwelcome."

card.name: Shinjo Sanenari
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Sacrosanct • Tactician
card.flavor: "His brother married into the Imperial famillies, and is much beloved in court. The bond between the brothers is well known, and any who lifts a blade against Sanenari invites the wrath of the Imperials" - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Utaku Liu Xeung - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon • Experienced • Unique
After the resolution of an action that gave a Force penalty to an enemy card at Liu-Xeung's battlefield: Give Liu-Xeung +1F.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Your will, my hands, Lady Naleesh."

card.name: Utaku Mai
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Imperial • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: You may move Mai to the current battlefield. If she is now there, give the targeted card a Force penalty equal to Mai's Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "The betrothal of Unicorn and Dragon Champions is a matter of increasing debate."

card.name: Takasho
card.text:
Shadowlands • Air • Ninja • Shugenja • Unique • Onyx Champion
After Takasho enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move Takasho there. You may take an additional Battle action which Takasho must perform.
Maho Battle: Ranged 5 Attack.

card.name: Keppo
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Goblin • Scout
After Keppo enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle: If you have Reconnaissace, target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "To sleep at night is a foolish thing. Humans so stupid, not know any better."

card.name: Kuronada - exp2
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Duelist • Hero • Kensai • Tactician • Experienced 2 • Unique
Will not gain a Clan alignment.
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "With each passing year he looks more like his father, and his fear of becoming like Karatsu grows. I feel his fear in needless, but I am grateful for it." - The Journals of Utagawa

card.name: Shikaro
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Cavalry • Scout
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "My allegiance is for sale, but I am no honorless dog. Hire me and I shall serve loyally and true, so long as that which you ask of me is fit duty for a man of honor."

card.name: Sea Troll Predator
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Troll • Earth • Tactician
After Predator enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Battle: Target a Personality opposing Predator at the current battlefield: Move the Personality and Predator to the same adjacent unresolved battlefield.
card.flavor: "To 'sleep with the trolls' is a terrible and very real fate, though many consider it a euphamism." - Yoritomo Emoto

card.name: Overgrown Grove
card.text:
Forest
Battle: Discard the top 3 cards of your Fate deck and target an attacking Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: As the Empire grew, new areas became the subject of conflict between the Great Clans. Although it took great effort to accurately survey new lands, those who did enjoyed great benefits during times of conflict.

card.name: Shinden Shorai
card.text:
Unique
Limited: If it is not your first or second turn: Bring a face-up Personality in this province into play, paying all costs. You may ignore the Personality's Honor Requirement if he is Lion Clan.
card.flavor: "I am sorry to interrupt you, but your services are required."

card.name: Quagmire
card.text:
Swamp
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that bowed a Personality at a battlefield at this province or an adjacent province, target him and bow this card: Negate his next straightening (this turn).
card.flavor: Swamps are home to many threats: disease, bogs, and predators...

card.name: Legion of the Bat
card.text:
Bat Clan • Cavalry
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Crane Clan player.
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that moved a target enemy Infantry Personality to this card's battlefield: Bow the Personality.

card.name: Fading Shadows
card.text:
Ninja
You may include up to 10 copies of this card in your deck. Will only attach to a Ninja.
After this card enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: If this card is in your hand, choose your performing Ninja: Attach it to him.
card.flavor: "Silence! Did you hear something?"

card.name: Singh Remnants
card.text:
Ranged Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -3 strength.
Political Reaction: After your performing Personality enters play, if this card is in your hand or your discard pile: Attach this card to him, paying all costs. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Singh leads what remains of his kinsmen into battle. They are assets, allies, and friends." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Elite Sentry
card.text:
Elite • Unique
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
Battle/Open: Even if this card is bowed: Straighten this card's unit.
card.flavor: "Men such as they are rare indeed. Let us see them well tested." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Champion of Thunder
card.text:
Thunder • Cavalry • Storm Rider
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Mantis Clan player.
Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit: Negate the action's effects on this card.
Battle: Ranged 6 Attack.

card.name: Moto Gunso
card.text:
Cavalry • Gunso
Battle: Give each of your other Followers at the current battlefield and at each adjacent battlefields +1F.
card.flavor: "A generation ago, the Moto were loathed and feared for the actions of their Khan. Their family's efforts since that time finally earn some measure of respect." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Blade of Champions
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Reaction: When a Battle action would target a card in this unit, bow this card: The action targets another of your cards instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "This sword was forged in honor of the new Governor, long may he reign." - Akodo Tsudoken

card.name: Flesh Cutter Arrows
card.text: Reaction: After a Ranged Attack from an action performed by this Personality targets a card without an attached Armor, bow this card: Give the Ranged Attack +2.
card.flavor: After a war, some of the time is spent finding new ways to effectively fight the next one.

card.name: Fubatsu Plate
card.text:
Armor
Battle: Even if this card is bowed: Straighten this Personality or move him home.
card.flavor: "There is fascinating inspiration to be found in the distant colonies, if one is but willing to examine the relics brought back from that place." - Hida Fubatsu

card.name: Nightingale Blade
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment and this Personality is Dragon Clan or a Kensai.
card.flavor: "Are they actually lighter than a normal daisho or does the wielder simply find them that way?" - Sensei Fusami of the Dragon Clan

card.name: Satoshi's Dual Warfans
card.text:
Tessen • Weapon
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Lion Clan player.
Reaction: After this card enters play from your hand: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "They are primarily for the relaying of orders, but enemies who stray too close will find their other use."

card.name: Bo of Water
card.text:
Water
While this Shugenja is Water, he contributes Force to his army even if bowed.
Limited: Once per game: Create a +2F/+0C Water • Weapon Item with the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it" and attach it to one of your Personalities.

card.name: Control Your Destiny
card.text:
Void
Limited: Bow this Shugenja unless he is Void: Look at the top three cards of your Fate or Dynasty deck. You may put one or two of these cards on the bottom of your deck. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order.
card.flavor: She focused her thoughts. She was no Ishiken, but she could hear the Void whisper.

card.name: Stormless Fury
card.text:
Thunder
Reaction: After the resolution of a Battle action, if this card is in your hand, choose your performing Thunder Shugenja: Attach this card to him.
Reaction: After the resolution of a Battle action, if this Shugenja is at the current battlefield, target a Personality who performed it: Bow him.
card.flavor: "I need no storm to strike you down. I am that storm."

card.name: Taming the Beast
card.text:
Earth
Reaction: After another player's action targets your defending Personality, if this Shugenja is Earth, destroy this card: Negate the Personality's destruction from the action's effects.
Battle/Open: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja and target your Nonhuman: Straighten it.

card.name: Essence of Undeath
card.text:
Maho
Battle/Open: Destroy this card and target your dead Personality: Bring him into play at this Shugenja's location, paying all costs. Permanently give him Shadowlands and Undead. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Oh, Fortunes, no. What have I done? What have I done?" - Soshi Neiru

card.name: Intervening Spirit
card.text:
Water
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, if any enemy units are there, target your Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved. If he is an Ancestor and this Shugenja is Water, you may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "Do not fear, granddaughter. I stand with you."

card.name: Winds of Dismissal
card.text:
Air
Limited: Bow this Shugenja and target another player's Personality: If he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor. If this Shugenja is Air, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I cannot speak with you today, assassin. Perhaps another time."

card.name: Katana of Fire - exp
card.text:
Fire • Experienced
Limited: Once per game: Create a +3F/+1C Fire • Weapon Item with the ability, "Battle: Bow this card unless this Personality is Fire, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it" and attach it to one of your Personalities.
card.flavor: "I am a priestess, yes, but I am much more."

card.name: Rage of the Spirits
card.text:
Earth
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja and your performing Spirit, and target an enemy card without attachments and with Force lower than or equal to your Spirit's: Destroy the enemy card. If this Shugenja is Earth, gain 1 Honor.

card.name: Strength of the Tsunami
card.text:
Water
This Shugenja has +6F.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed, if this Shugenja is Water: Straighten him. You may move him home.
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he moved, negate his (future) movement.

card.name: The Earth Flows
card.text:
Earth
After you gain Honor from destroying an army in battle resolution, if this Shugenja is Earth and in the winning army: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: If you are the Defender, target a Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "Control the terrain. Control the battle." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: On the Hunt
card.text:
Battle: Choose your performing Samurai: Attach an attachment in your hand to him, paying all costs but paying 4 less Gold.
Open: Choose your performing Samurai with an attachment: Straighten his unit.
card.flavor: A small contingent of the Hiruma traveled to new forests, scouring them for anything that might threaten the Empire.

card.name: Nakanu Technique
card.text: Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed opposed Personality at the current battlefield: Create two 1F Shadowlands • Undead Followers and attach them to him. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The old ways are the best ways, after all..."

card.name: Visitation
card.text:
Open: Destroy your performing Ancestor Personality and target a Personality: Bow him. Negate his straightening until your next Events Phase begins.
Limited: If you control an Ancestor Personality: Gain 2 Honor. Each player who does not control an Ancestor Personality loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Fukui. My murderer was not a Crane or a Scorpion as you suspected, but one of our own..."

card.name: Ancient Feud
card.text:
Terrain
This battlefield's province has a maximum strength equal to its base strength.
Battle: Destroy all other Terrains at the current battlefield. Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: The Crab and the Scorpion came to a mutual understanding within the war against the Destroyers, but some found old hatreds hard to swallow.

card.name: Brawl
card.text:
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
Battle/Open: Target a Region (at any province) or a Terrain: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The Shiro Moto Winter Court of 1180 is best unmentioned in polite company.

card.name: Bow Before My Will
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy card: Bow it. Negate its next straightening (this turn) if your Paragon is Shadowlands. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You play in the shadows but cling to the light. Your vague notion of honor cripples you and makes you weak."

card.name: Engulfing Flames
card.text:
Fire • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: You may target and destroy an enemy attachment. If your Monk has any Fire tokens, Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "You pretend to be an ise zumi to earn food and respect from the villagers? Despicable."

card.name: Disreputable Deal
card.text:
Political
As a Focus Effect: You may put a non-Unique Strategy with a Political ability in your discard pile into your hand.
Open: Bow your performing Courtier and target a Personality: Give him -3F. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.

card.name: Discovering a Conspiracy
card.text:
Political
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, gain 2 Honor.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target a Personality: His lord casts him out for treachery. Permanently remove his Clan alignment keywords. Dishonor him. If he is at a battlefield, bow him and choose a player, who gains or loses 1 Honor.

card.name: Silent Terror
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality and target an enemy card: Bow it. You may discard a card in the current battlefield's province.
card.flavor: Yurishi stood, wordless, in front of the guards. He was not the designated assassin, but he would enjoy the bloodshed anyways.

card.name: Interference
card.text:
Political
Open: Target a Stronghold: Its abilities may not be used. If it is your turn, bow it.
card.flavor: "The governor is visiting relatives this month. See to it that his return is delayed an additional week."

card.name: Great Sacrifice
card.text: Battle: Destroy your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy unit with total Force equal to or lower than your performer's Force, plus Personal Honor, plus one if he is defending: Destroy the enemy unit.
card.flavor: "Flee, my lord. We cannot prevail this day, but I can ensure that you will not be followed."

card.name: Hasty Fortifications
card.text:
Siege • Terrain
After each resolution of one of your Battle actions (including this card's): Give this province +1 strength until this card leaves play.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

card.name: Wrathful Ancestor
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Spirit and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. This movement will not be negated.
card.flavor: Rokugani revere their ancestors. Terror strikes deeply when their ancestors judge them unworthy.

card.name: Goju Plot
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Destroy your performing Shadowlands Ninja Personality and target a Ninja Personality in your discard pile: Bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs but reducing his Gold Cost to enter play by the performer's Gold Cost. Lose 2 Honor. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: Nothing will save you.

card.name: Hibernation
card.text: Open: Bow your performing Nonhuman: It hibernates. Negate its straightening until your next turn begins. After the next time this game another player's Battle action targets it, negate the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Many creatures sleep the winter away. Some are innocent. Some... less so."

card.name: Costly Opportunity
card.text: Battle: Destroy your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy card without attachments: Abilities on other cards now in its unit may not be used. Destroy the targeted card.
card.flavor: "You think to end my life, priest? Perhaps so, but I will outlive you!"

card.name: Know Their Minds
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Insight
Open: Bow your performing Samurai: Choose a player. He chooses a face-up Personality in one of his provinces. Turn the Personality face-down.
card.flavor: "He is a good leader, but puts little faith in his men. Pass word that his lieutenant seeks his position, and allow mistrust to ruin his unit's morale." - Daigotsu Hotako

card.name: Dislodge the Foe
card.text: Battle: Choose one or more of your performing Tacticians at the same battlefield and target a Personality opposing them: He is lured into a trap. Move them all to the current battlefield.
card.flavor:
"The castle is well fortified, my lord."
"Blockade the roads. We will see how useful their walls are once their water runs out."

card.name: Unexpected Support
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target an enemy card with as many or fewer Followers: Bow it. Negate its next straightening (this turn).
card.flavor: "Stay your blade, Scorpion. We serve the same master. Forget that, and I shall have no reason to remember it either."

card.name: Strategic Sacrifice
card.text:
Siege
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Siege Personality, and target a card with Force lower than or equal to the current battlefield's province's strength in a unit: Bow or straighten the card. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "The Crab will use anything as a weapon, no matter how sacred. It is their strength." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Bonds of Coin
card.text:
Political
Open: Target one to three attachments with a 0 Gold Cost: Destroy them.
Limited: Bow your Stronghold and discard the Imperial Favor: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: "Bonds of blood are important, but sometimes bonds made in coin can hold more power." - Yoritomo Sakuma

card.name: Effortless Counterattack
card.text:
Reaction: Before the resolution of a Battle action that was taken as an additional action: Negate its effects.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target a Personality without attachments: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Spend less time being clever and more time training, monk!"

card.name: Know No Fear
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Courage
Reaction: After another player's action targets your performing Samurai: Negate his bowing and movement from the action's effects.
Reaction: After a Fear action targets your performing Samurai: Negate its effects.
card.flavor: "If you were smarter, demon, you would run."

card.name: Tireless Efforts
card.text:
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Negate all current and new Force penalities on him.
card.flavor: "We have one more run in us before the night is through, don't we old girl?"

card.name: Again!
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Kensai: Straighten him and all his Weapons. Battle abilities on his Weapons may be used a second time this turn. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "In the two decades of peace since the Destroyer War, there was but a single war between the clans. There were, however, countless duels and skirmishes." - The Miya Histories

card.name: Surety of Purpose
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Paragon and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You disgrace your noble people, creature! I will stand for them when they cannot stand for themselves!"

card.name: Insulting Gesture
card.text:
Political
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier: Take the Imperial Favor.
Battle: Discard the Imperial Favor and target an enemy Personality: Dishonor him. Bow him. Move him home. His controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "This dust distracted me. Were your words important?"

card.name: Scandalous Rumors
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location: The Attacker may target any of his Personalities at the current battlefield and move them home. He loses 1 Honor for each of his Personalities there that this did not move, then dishonors them.
card.flavor: Many honorable samurai have been undone by the whispering tongues of idle maidens.

card.name: Shiotome Plains
card.text:
Terrain
While at this battlefield, Cavalry cards have +1F and Infantry cards have -1F.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: War had ravaged much of Rokugan, but there were still places that remembered they were once serene.

card.name: Never Safe
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing Ninja and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. After this battle ends, if this card is in your discard pile, you may put it into your hand.
card.flavor: Some felt they were safe behind their walls or in their homes. They were, but only so long as their enemies were likewise deluded.

card.name: Spirit of the Berserker
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Berskerker, permanently give him +2F and the ability, "Reaction: After another player's action targets this Personality: Delay his destruction from the action's effects until before this turn ends." Otherwise, permanently give him Berserker.
card.flavor: Embrace anger.

card.name: Spirit of the Duelist
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Duelist, permanently give him the ability, "Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: This Personality duels him. Move the duel's loser home." Otherwise, permanently give him Duelist.
card.flavor: Embrace precision.

card.name: Spirit of the Paragon
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Paragon, permanently give him the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality with either equal or lower Force, or equal or lower Personal Honor: Bow him." Otherwise, permanently give him Paragon.
card.flavor: Embrace perfection.

card.name: Spirit of the Scout
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Scout, permanently give him the ability, "Battle: Bow this Personality unless you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack." Otherwise, permanently give him Scout.
card.flavor: Embrace preparation.

card.name: Spirit of the Yojimbo
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Yojimbo, permanently give him the ability, "Reaction: After another player's action targets one of your Personalities at this Personality's location: The action targets this Personality instead, if legal." Otherwise, permanently give him Yojimbo.
card.flavor: Embrace dedication.

card.name: Dispensing Justice
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: If he has no attachments and is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, destroy him. Move him home.
card.flavor: "The threat of the Shadowlands is ever present, and servants of Rokugan must always be wary. The promise of a dark god means nothing." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Superior Reach
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Kensai and target an enemy Personality without Weapons: Reduce his Force to 0. While your Kensai has a Weapon, actions the Personality performs may not target your performer.
card.flavor: The Spider were no longer outlaws, but when have warriors needed a reason to take one another's lives?

card.name: Tales of Dishonor
card.text:
Political Reaction: After the resolution of a battle at a province, if you destroyed any enemy units or a province in that resolution: The battle's loser loses 4 Honor.
Battle: Choose your performing Magistrate: Straighten him.
card.flavor: Both success and failure increased in the telling.

card.name: Improved Defenses
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Artisan at any location and discard the top card of your Fate deck: Increase the current battlefield's province's strength by the card's Focus Value plus one.
card.flavor: "Art and practicality are not always at odds." - Doji Rengetsu

card.name: A Quiet Transaction
card.text:
Open: Target a dishonorable Personality and pay Gold equal to his base Personal Honor plus one: He may not be assigned, and will not move, to battlefields this turn.
Open: Target a dishonorable Personality: Give him two -2 Gold Cost tokens.
card.flavor: "All you need do is look the other way. Can that be so difficult, truly?"

card.name: Spirit of the Monk
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: If he is a Monk, permanently give him the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality without Armor: Bow him." Otherwise, permanently give him Monk.
card.flavor: Embrace harmony.

card.name: The Weakness of Man
card.text:
Kiho
Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target a Personality whose Force is different from his own base Force: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "Your weakness of flesh and spirit, your embrace of vice, weakens the fabric of all men. I will tolerate it no longer!

card.name: Scavenging Party
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, give its winner -3F.
Limited: Target your discarded Personality: Discard a card from one of your provinces and refill it face-up with the Personality.
Open: Give each of your provinces +2 strength.
card.flavor: "This stone has stood the test of time well. Let's put it to good use."

card.name: To First Blood
card.text:
Iaijutsu
As a Focus Effect: Negate any destruction for losing this duel. After this duel ends, its winner's controller gains 2 Honor.
Reaction: After another player's Iaijutsu action targets your Personality: Negate his destruction from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Let us settle this once and for all."

card.name: Volcano Tattoo
card.text:
Fire • Kiho • Tattoo
Battle: Bow your performing Tattooed Monk and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Destroy a card without attachments in his unit. Straighten your Personality if he is Fire and this destroyed an attachment.
card.flavor: "Fire without as within. If you temper your own flame, others are simple to manipulate."

card.name: Skipping the Puddle
card.text:
Water • Kata
You have the ability, "Water Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Water Shugenja: Move him there. You may take an additional Battle action which he must perform."
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata.

card.name: Redoubled Attack
card.text: Reaction: After a battle's resolution ends, choose one or two performing Personalities at the current battlefield: Straighten their units. They will not bow from the battle's resolution.
card.flavor: "Rest and resupply? I do not think so. That was just a skirmish to whet the appetite. My men and I are eager for the main course!"

card.name: Barred Passage
card.text:
Heroic
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Hero, who must be the only Personality in his army, and target an enemy unit: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Apologies, my friend. It must have been difficult to hear me with all that stone in your ear. I said you may not pass."

card.name: A Fugitive Apprehended
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card without attachments and with lower Gold Cost: Bow the targeted card. If your Personality is a Magistrate, you may target an enemy card and reduce its Gold Cost to 0.
card.flavor: "Two decades of peace have honed the skills and aggression of the samurai caste. It is a poor time to be a criminal." - Doji Hakuseki, First Magistrate

card.name: Your Clan Needs You!
card.text: Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality in one of your provinces: Bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs but paying 6 less Gold. After the battle ends, if he is in play, discard all his attachments and put him into one of your provinces, face-up, discarding any card there.
card.flavor: "Bring the new regiments to the front line immediately. I do not care what it costs!" - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Mahatsu
card.text:
Ronin • Shugenja • Alchemist
Open: Give Mahatsu Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.
card.flavor: The dangers inherent in maintaining relations between the Empire and its Colonies, combined with the depopulation of war for generations, has greatly increased the worth of trustworthy ronin vassals.

card.name: Tamori Potion
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Personality: Ranged 4 Attack with +1 strength if he is an Alchemist and +1 strength for each different element keyword in his unit.
card.flavor: "Why should we be beholden to what lesser men envision as magic? We wield forces the other clans cannot comprehend, much less counteract." - Tamori Shimura

card.name: Benten's Blessing
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
After this card enters play: Choose zero to two face-up Personalities in or out pf play. They have +1PH while this card remains in play.
Reaction: When another player's action would target one of your Personalities, choose your performing Personality and discard this card: The action targets him instead, if legal.

card.name: The Amethyst Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Courtiers in play. Persmanently give him +1PH and the ability, "Political Open: Target another Personality: This Personality copies one of the targeted Personality's Political abilities which does not itself copy abilities."
card.flavor: "Go and bring the Imperial presence to the lesser courts." - Mandate of the Amethyst Champion

card.name: The Emerald Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Personalities in play. Permanently give him Imperial • Magistrate and the ability, "Battle/Open: Even if this Personality is bowed, target a Personality: Straighten him."
card.flavor: "Shosuro Jimen brought both glory and shame to the position. Let us see what his successors can offer the Empire." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: The Jade Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Shugenja in play. Permanently give him the traits, "Shadowlands Personalities and Followers have -1F while at this Personality's location" and "After the resolution of an action from a Spell: Straighten this Personality."
card.flavor: To follow in the footsteps of the legendary Kuni Daigo is a burden coveted by many.

card.name: The Obsidian Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Personalities in play. Permanently give him +1F, Shadowlands, and the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment."
card.flavor: "Stand firm and let us see which of us is worthy of service." - Daigotsu Hotako

card.name: The Onyx Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Shugenja in play. Permanently give him Shadowlands and the ability, "Maho Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy your target Personality: Search your discard pile, then deck, then provinces for an Oni Personality. Bring him into play, paying all costs. Lose 3 Honor."
card.flavor: "Stand aside or die, fools!" - Takasho

card.name: The Ruby Championship
card.text:
Unique
