Choose one of your Personalities in play. Permanently give him Imperial • Magistrate and the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If he is dishonorable, destroy a card without attachments in his unit."
card.flavor: "I served the dojo with honor to the best of my abilities. Do the same, and stand tall." - Yasuki Miliko

card.name: The Topaz Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Personalities in play without abilities. Permanently give him +1F/+1C, the trait "Before the first time each turn another player's card effect destroys this Personality: Negate the destruction", and the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it."
card.flavor: The Empire's finest gather in Tsuma every year...

card.name: The Turquoise Championship
card.text:
Unique
Choose one of your Personalities in play. Permanently give him Artisan and the ability, "Limited: Choose a player. He gains or loses 1 Honor."
card.flavor: "The arts are as important as steel or prayers. They sustain and uplift us when our spirits are at their lowest point." - Doji Rengetsu

card.name: Halls of the Forgotten
card.text: Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets your Berserker: Delay its effects on him until after this battle ends.
card.flavor: "It is much like a tomb, cold and quiet. It only comes alive in times of war, which its denizens not only embrace, but celebrate. Were they turned upon the Empire, it would tremble." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Yasuki Palaces - exp
card.text:
Experienced
This card produces 1 less Gold when paying for a Personality.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed and even if you control no units at the current battlefield, target an attacking Personality and pay 3 Gold: Move him home. If he moved, his controller loses 1 Honor.

card.name: Hidden Falls Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
Recon Open: Target one or two provinces: You have Reconnaissance at their battlefields. After each Cavalry Maneuvers Segment there is an additional Infantry Maneuvers Segment in which only your Scout Personalities may be assigned and only to the targeted provinces' battlefields.

card.name: Kalani's Landing
card.text:
Port
This card will not produce Gold when paying for an attachment.
After each phase begins: Straighten this card.
Reaction: After an action is announced, target a card (in play): Give it -2 Gold Cost.

card.name: Koshin Keep
card.text: Recon Reaction: After engaging: You have Reconnaissance at the current battlefield. Until this battle ends, your Ranged Attacks that do not destroy their target have the additional effects, "reduce the target's Force by the Ranged Attack's strength and you may take an additional Ranged Attack Battle action that may only target the same card".
card.flavor: "Naming it for the Fortune of Roads was a bit of irony."

card.name: Midday Shadow Court
card.text:
When a Lobby action checks Family Honor, your Honor is treated as 20 points higher.
Political Open: Even if this card is bowed, target another player's Personality: After the next time this turn he is assigned, or an action that he performed ends, dishonor him and his controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "If you meet a friendly Scorpion, run" - Munemori's Memoirs

card.name: The Otoro Estate
card.text:
You do not lose Honor from Ninja cards you own.
Ninja Open: Look at all face-down cards in one player's provinces.
Ninja Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality: Ranged 4 Attack. You may move your Ninja home.
card.flavor: Scorpion holdings are rarely obvious to others.

card.name: Plains of the Maiden
card.text: After you destroy a province or army in battle resolution as the Attacker: Gain Honor equal to the number of your Battle Maidens at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "The other families can devote their time to the Colonies if they wish. They know Rokugan is well protected." - Utaku Ryoko

card.name: Journey's End Keep
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target a Personality with as many or fewer Followers attached: Move him home; this will not be negated or delayed.
card.flavor: Here the Unicorn welcome their brothers to the Colonies after weeks of traveling. The celebrations they hold are legendary.

card.name: Kyuden Hida - exp
card.text:
Experienced
Recon Reaction: After engaging: You have Reconnaissance at the current battlefield. Create and attach a 0F Scout Follower to each of one to three of your Personalities in your current army. Remove those Followers from the game after the battle ends.
card.flavor: "Rebuilt, stronger than ever." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Carpenter Castle
card.text:
Castle
Seige Battle: Bow your target Castle or Siege card: Ranged 5 Attack. If this targeted a card, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "If war were a thing you could touch and feel, this is where it would be made." - Kaiu Iemasa

card.name: The Aerie
card.text: Iaijutsu Battle: Even if this card is bowed, choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target another player's Personality: Your Samurai duels the Personality. Bow and dishonor the duel's loser. The winner's controller gains 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "It is said the masters of the Doji Magistrates can see to the Mantis Islands." - Kakita Mitohime

card.name: Shinden Asahina
card.text:
Temple
Open: Even if this card is bowed, bow your performing Shugenja and target another player's unbowed Personality: His controller may choose to bow him and negate his straightening (this turn). If he did not choose this, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Here, all is serenity and truth.

card.name: Kyuden Kitsune - exp
card.text:
Forest • Experienced
Your forests are maddening. Negate the first movement each battle into attacking armies at your province's battlefields from other player's actions.
Limited: Bow your target Forest: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "We are never alone." - Mantra of the Kitsune

card.name: Suitengu's Torch
card.text:
Thunder
Reaction: After you announce a Thunder Battle action: Its effects will not be negated or delayed.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: The sea can be harnessed, but never controlled...

card.name: Law of Darkness Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
After another player loses Honor from your Battle action: He loses 1 Honor.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed, target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. Bow him if he is dishonorable.

card.name: Shiro Chugo
card.text:
Political Reaction: Before an action's resolution, choose your performing unbowed Courtier: Reduce any Honor gain or loss from the action's effects by 2.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: Melee 4 Attack, with +1 strength if he is Loyal.
card.flavor: "All I ask for is your life" - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: The Temple of Death - exp
card.text:
Temple • Experienced
Limited: Target a discarded Personality: He becomes honorably dead.
Battle/Open: If you own a dead Personality, choose your performing unbowed Shugenja and target a Personality: Straighten him. You may bow him if this is the Combat Segment.

card.name: The Khan's Estate
card.text: Tactical Limited: Choose your performing Tactician: He may not be assigned to attack this turn. Draw a card.
card.flavor: "The division of Unicorn Champion and Khan was done to decentralize the clan's power, to ensure that the tragedy of Chagatai might never be repeated." - Miya Histories

card.name: Kyuden Otomo - exp
card.text:
Imperial • Experienced
You may substitute discarding a Favor token from this card for discarding the Imperial Favor as a cost.
After you take the Imperial Favor: You may discard it; if you did, add a Favor token to this card.
Political Open: Bow your performing honorable Courtier: Add a Favor token to this card.

card.name: Dragon's Breath Castle
card.text:
After another player's Dynasty Phase begins, if he controls any Personalities and he assigned none of them to an attacking army this turn: Gain 2 Honor.
Reaction: Even if this card is bowed, after engaging at a battlefield at one of your provinces: The Attacker targets and bows one of his Personalities there.

card.name: Foothills Keep
card.text:
Equipping Weapons is a Battle/Open action for you.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Kensai and target a Weapon in your discard pile. Attach it to him, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "It is a humble name for a school of exceptionally dangerous enemies." - Matsu Hachiro

card.name: Pillars of Virtue
card.text: Reaction: After the resolution of a Kiho Battle action you took: Take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "The pillars themselves remain within the Empire. The pillars within our spirit remain within us no matter where we go." - Togashi Osawa

card.name: Watchful Eye Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
Iaijutsu Open: Even if this card is bowed, choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your performer challenges the target. He may refuse; if he did, dishonor him and gain 1 Honor. Bow the duel's loser.

card.name: Eternal Victory Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
Your deck may include four copies each of one or two non-Unique Strategies with Battle abilities.
Reaction: After your Tactical action resolves: Draw a card after the next End Phase begins.
card.flavor: "The Lion train for war even during decades of peace. I find them both great and terrible." - Asahina Michiru

card.name: Halls of Memory
card.text:
Your Ancestor Personalities have -1F while attacking.
Your Shugenja may use their base Battle abilities even if they are not at the battlefield.
After your Ancestor Personality is destroyed during a Combat Segment: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Here the Kitsu remember their ancestors...

card.name: Shamate Keep
card.text:
Your dishonorable Paragons do not have a maximum Personal Honor of 0 from the rulebook.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target a Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Gain 2 Honor if you do not control him.
card.flavor: "The Destroyers are gone, but we would be foolish to assume we will never be threatened." - Matsu Kenji

card.name: The Golden Plains
card.text: Recon Reaction: After engaging: You have Reconnaissance at the current battlefield. Create a Terrain Strategy with the ability, "Battle: If this card is in play, destroy it and target a Terrain in your hand: Take an additional Battle action to play it." Put it into play there.
card.flavor: "I have traveled farther than any Lion in history, but nothing is so beautiful as home." - Ikoma Shika

card.name: Shiro Shiba
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai: Melee 4 Attack, with +2 strength if you control a Shugenja.
card.flavor: "An unassuming home for an unassuming people. They are what all warriors should strive to become." - Isawa Tamaki

card.name: Temple of Purity
card.text:
Temple
Open: Even if this card is bowed, target another player's Personality: Give him -4F, which will not be negated. If he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, you control an Inquisitor, and it is not your turn, choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.

card.name: Waystation of the Path
card.text:
Temple
Reaction: After another player's action targets your performing Henshin, target another of your Personalities: The Henshin is reborn. Transfer his attachments and tokens to the other Personality. The action's effects that would destroy your Henshin instead overlay him onto the Personality.

card.name: Keep of the Dead
card.text:
You do not lose Honor from Spider Clan and Fate cards you own. You ignore Honor Requirements on your Followers.
Battle: Choose your performing Commander: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield or he assigned there, move him there. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "This land is dead, but we will resurrect it." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Steel Soul Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
You do not lose Honor from Spider Clan and Fate cards you own.
After the resolution of the first Dark Virtue action you took each phase: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Serve your lord until you are strong enough to take his place. It is the way of the Spider." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: The Shadow's Lair
card.text:
You do not lose Honor from Ninja and Fate cards you own.
Ninja Battle: Once per battle, even if this card is bowed and even if you control no units at the current battlefield, target one or more unopposed units with combined total Force of 9 or lower, or one opposed unit: Move each target home; this will not be negated or delayed if you control a Ninja.

card.name: The Spider's Web
card.text: After your Personality enters play: You may attach a Weapon to him from your hand, paying all costs but, once per turn, paying 4 less Gold if he is a Kensai.
card.flavor: "Those who bear the Spider's mon and who are without the touch of Jigoku may remain within the Empire as monks." - Voice of the Emperor

card.name: Abandoning the Fortunes
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, before each player's turn ends, if his Dynasty deck has no cards, he chooses and destroys one Personality or Holding he controls for each of his provinces without a Dynasty card in it.
card.flavor: "This land is fraught with peril, and not only the physical. Our souls must remain pure." - Yung

card.name: Boastful Proclamation
card.text:
Unique
If any other player controls a Personality, then at the start of your next turn, if this province still exists, permanently give it +3 strength and gain 3 Honor. Until your next turn begins, after battle resolution destroys this province, give each Personality in the attacking army a +1F token and the Attacker may draw a card.
card.flavor: "You will die waiting for us to surrender, dogs!"

card.name: Cross-Clan Wedding
card.text:
Unique
Choose a Personality you control and another player. The player takes control of the Personality. If he now controls the Personality, he chooses another Personality he controls; take control of him.
card.flavor: A popular means of cementing treaties and alliances is through marriage between the clans. Those who participate consider it a duty, nothing more.

card.name: Glory of the Shogun
card.text:
Shogun • Unique
Until the game ends, equipping is a Battle/Open action (for all players), and after the first time each turn each player attaches a card with a base Gold Cost of 5 or more from his hand, that player may draw a card.
card.flavor: "In times when the Emperor cannot defend the Empire, the Shogun must do so in his place." - Sun Tao

card.name: Cherry Blossom Festival
card.text:
Festival • Unique
No players may take Reactions until your next Events Phase begins.
card.flavor: "Rokugan is a land of festivals. It is necessary for the common people to have release from the tedium of their honorable labors. They serve the Empress loyally, and in return she offers them grand celebrations." - Voice of the Emperor

card.name: Wisdom Gained
card.text:
Unique
Starting with you, each player may search his discard pile and Fate deck for a Ring, show it, and put it in his hand.
card.flavor: "In twenty years of relative peace and exploration, we have learned so much. We must be ever vigilant to ensure that wisdom is not forsaken for war." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Moneylender
card.text:
After this card enters play: Put a number of Wealth tokens on it equal to the amount of Gold you paid for it.
Bow this card and remove one or more Wealth tokens from it: Produce Gold equal to the number of tokens removed.
Limited: Bow this card and pay any amount of Gold: Put a number of Wealth tokens on this card equal to the amount of Gold you paid.

card.name: Falling Rain Dojo
card.text:
Dojo • Singular
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: Before Focus Effects resolve, if your Duelist has a lower duel stat than the Personality facing him: Give your Duelist +1 to his duel stat until the duel ends.
card.flavor: "Do not tolerate lies. Not in others, not in yourself. Fill yourself with truth, and your strength will overflow." - Doji Hakuseki

card.name: Copper Mine
card.text:
Mine
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Lion Clan player.
card.flavor: "Concern for money is said to be beneath a samurai's notice, but no general can ignore the importance of logistics. I want complete reports on the profits of our mines and where that koku goes." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Shrine to Hachiman
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle/Open: Target an attachment: Straighten it.
card.flavor: "No samurai should go into battle without first purifying his heart with prayer. Only then can he possess the oneness of mind that victory requires." - Asako Nobunori

card.name: Den of Iniquity
card.text:
This card will not be destroyed. Other players will not lose Honor from your Spells.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Political Limited: Bow this card and target another player's dishonorable Personality: His controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor, or 3, whichever is lower. You may not declare an attack this turn.
card.flavor: "What? I've never been here before!"

card.name: Gold Mine
card.text:
Mine
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Dragon Clan player.
card.flavor: "Nothing of worth grows on our mountains, and yet we are fed and clothed by their bounty. We live on the surface of a riddle, never questioning its meaning." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: Governor's Court
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Political Open: Even if this card is bowed, choose your performing Courtier and bow him or this card: Choose another player with an unbowed Personality in play. He may choose to target and bow one of his unbowed Personalities. If he did not choose this, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "A new governor brings possibilities and risks." - Shosuro Makito

card.name: Iron Mine
card.text:
Mine
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Crab Clan player.
card.flavor: "Iron for weapons, iron for armor, iron for siegeworks. They say honor is the strength of a samurai, but iron forms its sinews." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Kobune Port
card.text:
Port
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Mantis Clan player.
card.flavor: "Our ships bring strange luxuries that add luster to our Empress's court and enrich her tax coffers. That we turn a tidy profit on the deal is simply an added benefit." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Marketplace
card.text:
Market
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Crane Clan player.
card.flavor: "Of course trade makes the Crane wealthy, but you can't define my clan by just that. That would be like thinking that a cherry tree's worth lay in its bark, and never seeing it blossom." - Doji Makoto

card.name: Disgrace
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase two turns from now begins, other players may not target your Personalities with Limited actions.
card.flavor: "Your actions have brought shame to your entire family. Others will shoulder a share of your burden until such time as your disgrace can be forgotten."

card.name: Shinomen Marsh
card.text:
Swamp
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Spider Clan player.
card.flavor: "The Empress's power is unquestioned, and by her decree we have this land. Lesser men would bemoan their lot; we prove our strength by prospering. Someday we shall show it in other ways." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Stables
card.text:
Stables
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Unicorn Clan player.
card.flavor: "Our horses are like kin to us. They bear our burdens and risk their lives in battle just as we do for our lords, though they generally are better-natured about it." - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Rugashi Bazaar
card.text:
This card will not be destroyed.
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold.
Revenge Battle/Open: If you have lost Honor from another player's action during the Action Phase since your last turn ended, choose one to four of your performing Personalities: Give them each a Force bonus equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "I cringe at the sight of a Spider mon." - Asako Rinshi

card.name: Hida Horu
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Soul of Hida Hebi
Horu does not contribute Force to his army during battle resolution while there are two or more units in his army.
card.flavor: "They called my father a serpent, and yet he is legendary. They say worse of me and my Scorpion allies, so imagine the glory for which I will be remembered!"

card.name: Hida Kisada
card.text:
Crab Clan • Clan Champion • Samurai • Kensai • Siege • Tactician • Loyal • Unique • Little Bear
Reaction: When another player's Battle action would target Kisada: He outmaneuvers it. Choose another Personality you control at Kisada's location. The action targets the Personality instead, if legal.
Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Grant me wisdom, great-grandfather. Show me the path."

card.name: Hida Takeuchi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Soul of Hida Kosedo
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that attached a Follower from your hand to Takeuchi: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "The Shadowlands are too quiet. I need battle. I need blood. Send me to the Colonies, my lord."

card.name: Hida Watari
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Veteran • Unique • Wyrm Rider • Soul of Hida Tobashi
While Watari has exactly one Follower, that Follower has Cavalry.
Fear Battle: Target an enemy unit: Bow all Followers with 3 or lower Force in it.
card.flavor: "Every man dreams of exceeding his father's deeds. For me that is likely impossible."

card.name: Kaiu Kawachi
card.text: Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
card.flavor: "Other families wage war, but the Kaiu literally make war. Our every endeavor furthers the cause of the Crab military. We are the architects of destruction, the artisans of death."

card.name: Kaiu Esumi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack. If this targeted a card, give the current battlefield's province +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: "Some men are great leaders because of their innate billiance. Others, because of a terrible cruelty." - Kaiu Kawachi

card.name: Toritaka Shishido
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout • Soul of Toritaka Okabe
Ranged Attacks from actions performed by cards in Shishido's army have +1 strength.
card.flavor: "The other families protect the Empire from the Shadowlands, but we Toritaka protect it from the Spirit Realms. It is a different task, but the similarities and dangers are many."

card.name: Yasuki Tanimura
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant
Reaction: When paying for an action: Produce 3 Gold.
Political Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets Tanimura: The player may pay 4 Gold. If he did not pay the Gold, he loses 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "The finest knives in Rokugan!"

card.name: Asahina Michiru
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja
Open: Target your Personality: Michiru creates a barrier of air. Before the next time (this turn) another player's action destroys the Personality, negate that destruction and move him home.
card.flavor: "I will cause no harm to our enemies, but I will not allow harm to come to you either."

card.name: Asahina Yasutora
card.text: Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja
card.flavor:
"What do you see, when you look out over the land?" Makoto asked.
"My Champion, I am listening to the kami. The wind is full of their voices."
"It would be very useful to be able to track your enemies armies in such a fashion."
"It is more than that; it is a reminder that enemies themselves can change into friends with a shift of the wind."

card.name: Doji Tatsuki
card.text: Crane Clan • Samurai • Courtier • Soul of Doji Ayano
card.flavor: "The students of Doji Ayano fill the courts like pests. Elegant, brilliant pests. I would damn her for it, but truthfully I find intelligent opponents far less tedious than stupid ones." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Doji Shunya
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Soul of Doji Yoshiaga
Political Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor: Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Our champion is brilliant and charming. How fortunate I know how to make use of these advantages."

card.name: Doji Makoto
card.text:
Crane Clan • Clan Champion • Courtier • Samurai • Duelist • Loyal • Unique
Political Open: Makoto uses his mastery of politics. Take the Imperial Favor.
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Makoto duels him. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "I am the lord of the Crane. I will allow no one to harm my clan."

card.name: Doji Atsumichi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Doji Tadenori
Battle: Target a Personality with lower Personal Honor: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "The Empire is full of samurai who have been trained for a war that may never come in their lifetime. It is fortunate we have the Colonies to draw their attention and give them the challenge they crave."

card.name: Kakita Genshi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Artisan • Duelist • Master of Ceremonies • Soul of Kakita Yosuga
Iaijutsu Limited: Target another player's Personality. His controller may dishonor him. If he did not choose to dishonor him, gain 1 Honor and choose one of the Personality's abilities; it may not be used until your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "No, I do not think so."

card.name: Kakita Tadanobu
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Unique • Soul of Kakita Soichi
Political Reaction: After the resolution of an action that created a duel that Tadanobu won, discard the Imperial Favor: Draw 2 cards.
card.flavor: "In the moment of the duel, you think of the duel, and only the duel. After you win, you can think about how much your lord will benefit from your victory."

card.name: Kakita Kazan
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Commander • Duelist • Magistrate • Soul of Kakita Idzuki
Battle: Target an enemy dishonorable Personality: Bow him. His controller loses 2 Honor. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You are a shame on your lord and your family. These are my words, and I will prove them with my sword if necessary."

card.name: Mirumoto Katagi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Unique
Weapons attached to Katagi will not be transferred.
Non-Unique Weapons attaching to Katagi from your hand enter play paying 4 less Gold.
card.flavor: "These blades are my burden. No other is fit to bear them."

card.name: Kitsuki Kinaro
card.text: Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate • Soul of Kitsuki Nakai
card.flavor: Most courtiers see the Kitsuki Method as an insult to tradition, a defiance of the idea that once a samurai has spoken, nothing else matters. The Kitsuki, for their part, do not care how others feel about their techniques.

card.name: Kitsuki Yataku
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Justicar • Soul of Kitsuki Yasu
Political Reaction: After an action targets a target Samurai, bow Yataku: The Samurai's controller may not choose to refuse any challenge created by the action.
card.flavor: "The protocol is obvious, as are the obligations of the challenged in this instance."

card.name: Togashi Korimi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Monk • Tattooed • Soul of Togashi Oki
Korimi has +2F while defending.
After Korimi enters play: You may bow her; if you did, draw a card.
card.flavor: "Her manner may be pleasing, and her presence welcome, but if she will not attire herself appropriately, I cannot permit her to attend services." - Asahina Yasutora

card.name: Mirumoto Reiyu
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Poet • Soul of Mirumoto Tsubasa
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it a Force penalty equal to Reiyu's Force.
card.flavor: "Like her mentor, Reiyu expresses herself with her blades when her words are no longer up to the task."

card.name: Mirumoto Shikei
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Clan Champion • Naga • Monk • Samurai • Duelist • Kensai • Tattooed • Loyal • Unique
Limited: Shikei meditates. Draw a card.
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Shikei duels him. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "My bloodline? I am Dragon. I will not be defined by you."

card.name: Togashi Tsukagi
card.text: Dragon Clan • Void • Monk • Tattooed • Soul of Togashi Akagi
card.flavor: "He arrived atop the mountain, claiming descent from Togashi Akagi. He has his father's gifts, and his father's curse of rage. Let us hope we can bring him more peace than his father knew." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: Tamori Muzu
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist
Your other Earth Personalities have +1F while defending.
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it if it is attacking or has no attachments. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Two bottles will be sufficient. You do want some to survive, after all."

card.name: Togashi Torazu
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Tattooed • Soul of Togashi Shintaro
Reaction: After Torazu enters play: Give him three +1F Fire tokens.
Battle: Destroy a Fire token on Torazu: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "My enlightenment shall be found in battle, on the bodies of my victims."

card.name: Akodo Dairuko
card.text:
Lion Clan • Clan Champion • Samurai • Paragon • Tactician • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: Even if Dairuko is bowed, before the resolution of a battle at her battlefield: Dairuko rallies her troops. That battle's resolution will not bow cards in your army.
Battle: Melee 8 Attack.
card.flavor: "A Lion's duty is always foremost, but duty changes over time."

card.name: Matsu Hachiro
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Soul of Matsu Gohei
Hachiro has +2F while attacking.
card.flavor: Completely devoid of ambition, his only desire was to wreak havoc in the name of the Lion. His only fear was lasting peace.

card.name: Akodo Makotai
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Commander • Tactician • Soul of Akodo Mirotai
Tactical Limited: Create a 2F Follower and attach it to Makotai.
card.flavor: "It is the destiny of the Lion to lead. This is not hubris, but simple truth. All could benefit from our leadership."

card.name: Matsu Arata
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Justicar • Paragon • Soul of Matsu Nishijo
Arata has +2F while attacking.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it a Force penalty equal to Arata's Personal Honor. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Greatness should be the goal of every samurai. This is not for their gratification, but to honor those who came before them."

card.name: Kitsu Sorano
card.text: Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
card.flavor: "Many samurai speak of their ancestors. We speak to them. They are more than our history. They are our land, our bodies, our soul. With them, we are everything. Without them, we are nothing."

card.name: Ikoma Shika
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
card.flavor: Shika took to the forest like a Kitsune. Well before her gempukku, some saw in her a wildness that could not hope to be tamed, only nurtured and utilized.

card.name: Matsu Yuuto
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Matsu Agetoki
Ranged Attacks may not target cards in this unit.
card.flavor: "He took a name that means 'gentle' when he became an adult. I assume it was an attempt at irony." - Kitsu Tamasine

card.name: Matsu Hana
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Unique • Soul of Matsu Fumiyo Experienced
Fear Battle: Target an enemy unit: Bow each card in it with equal or lower Force than Hana. Gain 1 Honor for each card this bowed.
card.flavor: "Strength of mind, body and spirit. If you are missing even one, you will not stand."

card.name: Kitsu Tamasine
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja • Sodan Senzo
Reaction: After Tamasine enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality.
Battle: Bow Tamasine and target your Ancestor, or one to four of your Ancestors if you have lost Honor from another player's action during an Action Phase since your last turn began: Give each target +4F.

card.name: Ikoma Shinju
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Target a Terrain and an enemy card without attachments: Destroy both targets.
card.flavor: "When possible, choose the terrain on which to fight. When not possible, destroy the terrain your opponent has chosen."

card.name: Tsuruchi Isas
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Naval • Skirmisher • Soul of Mukami
Battle: Bow Isas: Ranged 3 Attack. Move Isas home.
card.flavor: "My arrow and its perfect flight is the only thing that never strays. I will never love or trust again. I serve my clan, and that is the only thing that defines me."

card.name: Yoritomo Nakoshi
card.text: Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Scout • Soul of Yoritomo Saburo
card.flavor: "The other clans dwell in cages made of trees, of mountains, of grasses. They have no idea what it means to be free."

card.name: Tsuruchi Tomaru
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Twice per turn: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "I never dreamed to find myself in a land such as this, with wonders such as these. If this is my duty, then truly I have been blessed."

card.name: Tsuruchi Samuru
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Yojimbo • Unique • Soul of Tsuruchi Mochisa Experienced
Battle: Ranged 6 Attack that you compare against Gold Cost.
card.flavor: "He is the greatest hunter in the realm. He tracked a traitor across the Colonies and mainland Rokugan for seven months. He returned with his head." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Tsuruchi Kosoko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Soul of Tsuruchi Saya
Battle: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "Brilliant, beautiful, and virtuous. She is all that is right and true within our clan. We can become greater if we but become more like her." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Moshi Madoka
card.text: Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Scout
card.flavor: "The Dragon of Thunder blessed us years ago. Our clan maintains our devotion to the dragon still. We will not relinquish our commitment, no matter what dissension may strike it."

card.name: Yoritomo Hiromi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Clan Champion • Thunder • Samurai • Naval • Loyal • Unique
Bowing, destruction, and movement from Battle actions Hiromi performs will not be negated or delayed.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments, or an enemy unit, with a lower total Gold Cost than Hiromi's unit: Hiromi strikes with the power of Thunder. Destroy the target.
card.flavor: His brooding rage has given him the name Growing Storm.

card.name: Yoritomo Hama
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Extortionist • Magistrate • Naval • Soul of Yoritomo Manzo
Battle: Target a card with lower Gold Cost in a unit: Bow or straighten the target.
card.flavor: "Only the citizens of our Great Clan matter. I will lie to and cheat other samurai as I need to bring wealth to the Mantis."

card.name: Yoritomo Naoto
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Soul of Yoritomo Isoshi
Battle: Target an enemy unit: Until this battle ends, abilities on cards now in that unit may not be used.
card.flavor: "I ply the seas in the name of my lord. I serve him faithfully in all things. This does not require me to find delight in his every action."

card.name: Kitsune Gina
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Gina enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Fox • Spirit Personality with the trait "Enemy attacking Personalities and Followers at this card's battlefield have -1F".
card.flavor: "Tell me, brother... Where have the smugglers hidden the cache?"

card.name: Agasha Ryo
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Void • Shugenja • Acolyte • Soul of Agasha Seruma
Reaction: After Ryo enters play from a province: Refill it face-up.
card.flavor: "The harmony and prosperity the Empire has enjoyed has simply proven than we were correct in our love of peace. Abundance and wisdom flower when weapons are put aside."

card.name: Asako Tsunefusa
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate
Open: Target another player's Personality: Give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Whatever you may be, I will end you now."

card.name: Asako Niou
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Void • Monk • Henshin
card.flavor: "I fear that the matters in the Second City will create trouble here in the Empire," Tsukimi said. Niou laughed. "We create our own troubles, Tsukimi-sama, and then make up stories about how they came to be. But you of all people should know how easy it is to see the truth of the world."

card.name: Asako Yorisada
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Monk • Henshin
Battle: Target a Personality whose Force is different from his base Force: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "You cannot stand if you are out of harmony with your earth. Here, I will show you."

card.name: Isawa Tomohiro
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Air • Void • Shugenja • Alchemist • Ishiken • Soul of Isawa Kumai
card.flavor: "I do not understand my cousin. What could be so interesting about a city made up of the same five elements to be found here at home? What could be more fascinating than the dance of the elements, and how they are all like and unlike the void?"

card.name: Isawa Shunsuko
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Soul of Isawa Yutako
card.flavor: "The sea, the sea! Someday I will travel to the new Colonies, and see the marvelous city I hear tales of. Until then I will listen to the ocean's whispers of it."

card.name: Isawa Norimichi
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Earth • Shugenja • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After another player's action targets your Earth Shugenja at Norimichi's location: Negate the Shugenja's destruction from the action's effects.
Battle: Until this battle ends, while there are any units in your army, your army has +5 total Force.
card.flavor: "I abide."

card.name: Shiba Sansesuke
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo • Soul of Shiba Danjuro
Reaction: When an action would target your Shugenja at Sansesuke's location, bow Sansesuke: The action targets him instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "The Shiba stand ready to die in the defense of the clan. That has been our glory since the days of our first ancestors."

card.name: Shiba Tsukimi - exp4
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Clan Champion • Daimyo • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced 4 • Loyal • Unique • Blind Phoenix • Shiba's Soul
Reaction: Twice per battle, after the resolution of another player's Battle action: Tsukimi displays incredible reflexes. Move her home or to the current battlefield.
Battle: Melee 6 Attack, with +2 strength if you control a Shugenja.

card.name: Shosuro Rokuta
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Soul of Shosuro Takuro
Reaction: After the resolution of a battle, or an action or trait from a card that another player owns, if the resolution or card destroyed Rokuta: Create a 0F/2C/1PH Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Apprentice Personality (in your home). Choose a player, who loses 3 Honor.
card.flavor: The Scorpion always stand ready to avenge their fallen.

card.name: Bayushi Nitoshi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Clan Champion • Courtier • Ninja • Samurai • Sociopath • Loyal • Unique • Shoju's Soul
Political Limited: Target a Personality and destroy a different one of your Personalities: Nitoshi kills his own and blames another. Dishonor the target. His controller loses 3 Honor.
Political Battle: Target a dishonorable Personality or a card without attachments in a unit: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Soon, old crimes shall be avenged."

card.name: Bayushi Waru
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Battle/Limited: If you control a Courtier or this is a Combat Segment, target a Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: "No! I will not hear more of your lies! You insulted my master, and for that you will suffer unspeakably!"

card.name: Soshi Yorimi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Air • Courtier • Shugenja • Unique • Soul of Shosuro Dazai Experienced
Twice per turn, you may ignore the cost of bowing Yorimi, if it is the cost of a Political action or an action on a Spell.
card.flavor: "Do you see any reason to doubt that I have lived in harmony with the elements?"

card.name: Bayushi Hurunayi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Ninja • Soul of Bayushi Muraisan
Open: Remove Ninja from Harunayi.
card.flavor: "Ninja? Do not be foolish. I have found no evidence that they exist, let alone were involved in this theft." - Kitsuki Kinaro

card.name: Bayushi Kahoku
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Final Student • Magistrate
Kahoku has +2F while another player controls a dishonorable Personality.
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack, with +2 strength if the target is dishonorable.
card.flavor: The secret of the Final Lesson is passed down from one generation to the next, with one man carrying it each time.

card.name: Bayushi Mitsuo
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Samurai • Soul of Bayushi Muhito
Reaction: After the resolution of a Battle action that moved Mitsuo: Take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "What became of my uncle Muhito, Crane? I know you know something, and I will find out what it is, no matter the cost."

card.name: Daigotsu Misaki
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror
Followers attaching to Misaki enter play paying 2 less Gold.
Battle: Bow Misaki's performing Follower: Melee Attack with strength equal to the Follower's Force.
card.flavor: "Cultists, creatures, and demons! All fall before me like wheat before the scythe!"

card.name: Daigotsu Negishi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Soul of Daigotsu Arima
After Negishi enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle/Open: Target your Personality: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "These jungles hold horrors such as make the Shadowlands sound like a paradise."

card.name: Daigotsu Gyoken
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai
After Gyoken enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I was born corrupted, but among the Spider there is no limit to how high I can rise. Ultimately we are answerable to the Empress, but in the short term it is only power that matters."

card.name: Daigotsu Ishibashi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Samurai • Gunso • Paragon • Dark Resolve • Soul of Daigotsu Shiraki
Fear Battle: Show a Dark Virtue card in your hand: Ranged Attack with strength equal to the card's Focus Value plus one.
card.flavor: "They think us without discipline? Who among them could carve a world from this primal wasteland as we have?"

card.name: Daigotsu Kanpeki - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Clan Champion • Monk • Samurai • Kensai • Paragon • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After the resolution of a Battle action from a Strategy, if Kanpeki performed it: Take an additional Battle action.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Force: Kanpeki snaps him like a twig: Destroy him.
card.flavor: "Bow before me, or fall before me."

card.name: Daigotsu Aya
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Paragon • Unique • Dark Perfection • Soul of Daigotsu Setsuko Experienced
After Aya enters play: Lose 2 Honor and you may put a Dark Virtue from your discard pile into your hand.
Open: Give Aya Cavalry, Duelist, or Tactician.
card.flavor: "My father was an Imperial Guard. One day I shall stand within the Imperial Palace as he did."

card.name: Ohaba
card.text: Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Soul of Momiji
card.flavor: "They willingly revere the Fallen Kami without accepting his blessings. They claim membership in the Spider Clan but remain within the Empire. These monks are a living contradiction. Perhaps in that they find wisdom." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: Sandayu
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Soul of Torao
Battle/Open: Target a Personality with a Weapon: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "Get back, buffoon! Your blood is unworthy to stain my steel!"

card.name: Moto Rani
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest
card.flavor: "Rani was a beautiful, bubbly child before she learned of her talents. Now? Frankly, she scares me." - Moto Taha

card.name: Moto Tetsuo
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • White Guard • Soul of Moto Shanyu
Battle: If you control any Cavalry units at the current battlefield: Move Tetsuo there. If he moved, Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "The notion that the Lady Shinjo reborn should become a Mirumoto is a blasphemy. The Dragon should suffer for their audacity in even suggesting such a thing!"

card.name: Moto Naleesh
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Clan Champion • Naga • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Kami • Paragon • Tactician • Loyal • Unique
Naleesh's unit straightens during each player's Straighten Phase.
Battle: Target an enemy unit: Naleesh overruns it. Bow it. Destroy all cards in it without attachments and without Cavalry.
card.flavor: The Living Goddess leads her Clan with grace and cunning.

card.name: Shinjo Taeken
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Soul of Shinjo Tae-hyun
card.flavor: "My father stood proud before the Empire and claimed the mantle of the Topaz Champion in Tsuma. I can do no less for my clan!"

card.name: Moto Shigeru
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Moto Gurban
Shigeru has +1F while she has an Item.
Reaction: After a Limited action targets your Personality: Negate the action's effects. Permanently reduce Shigeru's Personal Honor by the number of other Personalities you control. If her Personal Honor is now 0, she commits seppuku.

card.name: Shinjo Itao
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Shinjo Goshi
Reaction: After Itao enters play, target a Follower in your hand: Attach it to Itao, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "Life on the sea, freedom? The idea is laughable. Freedom is the wind and the plains, feeling the ground race beneath your steed's hooves. The sea is nothing but churning and sickness."

card.name: Shinjo Horibe
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Soul of Shinjo Hwarang
Battle: If Horibe is opposed, target a Personality: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "Our duty is to secure the land route to the Colonies, and we will not falter. Be proud, brothers! We are the guardians of the Empire!"

card.name: Shinjo Ki-Chang - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Tactician • Experienced • Unique
Reaction: After your target Personality enters play: Create a 1F Cavalry Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "He is old, but he will not leave my side. His wisdom had proven invaluable countless times." - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Moto Taha
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Tactician • Soul of Moto Munoru
card.flavor: "The Unicorn will be the Right Hand of the Iweko dynasty. We must fightr and prove our worth to the Imperial Dynasty."

card.name: Utaku Ryoko
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon • Soul of Utaku Liu-Xeung
Reaction: After engaging at Ryoko's battlefield, target a Personality or Follower opposing her: Give it a Force penalty equal to Ryoko's Personal Honor.
card.flavor: The Utaku Battle Maidens form the greatest heavy cavalry unit in the world. Their strength is unrivaled.

card.name: Daigotsu Matsuda
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Paragon • Obsidian Claw • Soul of Daigotsu Kurai
After Matsuda enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Do not all samurai inherit their father's weapon? Most receive a blade, but I consider this no different."

card.name: Ten Thousand Temples
card.text:
Temple • Singular
Before you lose Honor, destroy this card: Negate the Honor loss.
Limited: If your Family Honor is 9 or lower, bow this card: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Some called it the Temple of the Builders, as there was always a shrine under construction.

card.name: Kaiu Village
card.text:
Unique
Reaction: After your performing Personality enters play from a province, pay 2 Gold: Create a +1F/+1C Weapon Item and attach it to him.
Reaction: After your performing Personality enters play from a province, pay 2 Gold: Create a +1F Armor Item and attach it to him.
card.flavor: Rebuilding, one stone at a time.

card.name: Plains of Otosan Uchi
card.text:
Imperial • Unique
This province holds two Dynasty cards; do not reveal the second card in the Events Phase this card enters play. You decide each time which card slot is revealed, resolved, or refilled first.
Before this province is destroyed: Lose 10 Honor.
card.flavor: Once the seat of power for an Empire, it became overgrown and neglected over the course of years.

card.name: Refuge of the Three Sisters
card.text:
Singular
Limited: Destroy this card and remove your performing unbowed Personality from the game: Search your Fate deck for a card with a lower Focus Value than your Personality's Chi. Show it and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "The sisters abide there still. Are they the original sisters, or newcomers? Does it matter?" - Togashi Osawa

card.name: Apprentice Shinobi
card.text:
Ninja
After the resolution of a Ninja action: Give this card +1F.
card.flavor: "Do nothing but observe, and survive to report. Your skills are insufficient for anything more, and your death serves no purpose." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: Hiruma Sniper
card.text:
Scout
Battle: If you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "Take the shot if you have it, gunso. If you can do it with one arrow, please do. I despise inefficiency." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Legion of Pain
card.text:
Shadowlands • Lost
After this card enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Actions performed by Personalities with a Gold Cost of 7 or lower may not target this Personality.
card.flavor: "We serve the Empress as our lord commands, but our appetites remain unsatisfied."

card.name: Khol Regulars
card.text:
Cavalry
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
Reaction: If this card is at the current battlefield, after a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it +2 Strength.
card.flavor: "They are undyingly loyal to the Khan, but to the clan first. As it should be." - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Shinjo's Children
card.text: Cavalry
card.flavor: "Ride, brothers! Ride for battle and glory! Ride for freedom and the wind! Ride for the Lady Shinjo!"

card.name: Village Guardian
card.text: Reaction: After this card enters play from your hand: Draw one card for each player who has had a province destroyed this game.
card.flavor: "Calm yourself, man! Get the others and form a bucket line. The fire must be put out quickly, and have the women check the adjacent buildings for any sign of embers. We dare not risk the harvest this close to tax season. Now move!"

card.name: Outriders
card.text: Cavalry
card.flavor: "The Colonies can only be reached by land under the protection of the Unicorn, or by sea on the ships of the Mantis. Both paths are treacherous, Empress, but both can be relied upon." - The Imperial Herald

card.name: Stalking Tiger
card.text:
Nonhuman • Cat
Battle: Melee 6 Attack.
card.flavor: The Ivory Kingdoms have been witness to countless tragedies, but the predators have never left.

card.name: Armor of the Heavens
card.text:
Armor • Imperial
Political Reaction: After another player targets this Personality with an action: Choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: Some suits of armor are associated with prestigious positions, and long legacies of honorable duty. Serious consequences result from striking at their wearers.

card.name: Maga-yari
card.text:
Weapon
This card will not be transferred.
Attaches to a Paragon or Kensai paying 3 less Gold.
card.flavor: "It is a weapon most popular among certain sects of Lion bushi, but it has gained some popularity among other clans as well." - Kaiu Onizuka

card.name: Chrysanthemum Blossom
card.text:
Imperial
Reaction: After this Personality is assigned: Give him a +1F token. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: The blossoms are signs of favor from the throne and the courts. Those bearing these treasures find that the Empire is eager to laud their accomplishments on the battlefield.

card.name: Modifications
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Draw a card.
card.flavor:
"That... is a very strange weapon."
"I have faced very strange opponents."

card.name: Tsuruchi Daikyu
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor:
"I can hit the bird from one hundred paces!"
"Only one hundred?"

card.name: Spiked Tetsubo
card.text:
Weapon
After this Personality enters a duel: The other Personality in the duel loses Duelist.
card.flavor: "A cruel weapon? Of course. If my enemy survives the strike, he must be too crippled to flee from the killing blow."

card.name: Ring of Air
card.text:
Air • Unique
After you resolve your third or later Spell or Kiho action in one turn from cards with different titles: You may put this card into play from your hand.
Battle/Open: Bow this card or discard it from your hand, and choose your performing Personality: Straighten his unit.
card.flavor: Agility.

card.name: Ring of Earth
card.text:
Earth • Unique
After the resolution of a battle that you won, if there were ever any enemy units at that battlefield and none of your Personalities were destroyed during the battle: You may put this card into play from your hand.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, bow this card or discard it from your hand: Give a province +3 or -3 strength.
card.flavor: Stability.

card.name: Ring of Water
card.text:
Water • Unique
After you resolve your fourth or later Battle action in one battle from cards with different titles: You may put this card into play from your hand.
Battle: Bow this card or discard it from your hand, and choose your performing Personality: Move him home or to a battlefield with one or more enemy units. If he moved, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: Fluidity.

card.name: Hanabi
card.text:
Unique
Political Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy this card: Gain 4 Honor.
card.flavor: Above all else, shugenja are priests, holy men and women entrusted with sacred duties. The Empire turns to them for wisdom and guidance. Their presence is welcomed with open arms during weddings, festivals, and other events of importance, and their approval brings great honor upon their hosts.

card.name: Unnatural Flood
card.text:
Water • Unique
Battle: Bow this Shugenja and target an enemy Personality: Move him home; if this Shugenja is Water, this movement will not be negated. If the target moved, bow him and negate his (future) movement.
card.flavor: "When the enemy cannot be broken, find a way to prevent him from arriving at the conflict." - Tangen's Lies

card.name: Thunder's Favor
card.text:
Thunder
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 4 Attack, or Ranged 6 Attack if this Shugenja is Thunder.
card.flavor: "The magic of the elements can do many things: it can heal, it can teach, it can carry people and ideas over great distances. However, the magic of Thunder can do something I consider far more noteworthy: it can destroy." - Moshi Madoka

card.name: Warded Paths
card.text:
Earth
While this Shugenja is defending, he has +3F.
While this Shugenja is Earth and you are the Defender, you decide the order in which battles resolve.
card.flavor: The Tamori have learned many secrets from the mountains. One that they use particularly often is how to deny their foes access to key areas.

card.name: Ancestral Protection
card.text: Reaction: After an action targets your Personality, destroy your performing Ancestor: Negate the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Grandfather! Thank you for answering my prayers. I am glad I have the strength of Akodo Jin by my side."

card.name: A Stain Cleansed
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate, target an enemy card without attachments or an enemy unit, and pay Gold equal to the card or unit's total Gold Cost minus 2: Destroy it.
card.flavor: Asahina Keitaro's disgrace is rarely discussed. A hidden alliance of Dragon and Crane samurai scour the land to destroy all of the fallen daimyo's Tainted creations.

card.name: A Forefather's Vengeance
card.text:
Limited: Gain 3 Honor, or 1 Honor for each Ancestor you have in play, whichever is lower.
Battle: Destroy your performing unbowed Ancestor and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: Tengoku may have receded, but Yomi will never abandon its descendants.

card.name: Bad Kharma
card.text: Reaction: After another player with Family Honor of -1 or lower announces an action on a Strategy: He ignores the action's costs. Negate its effects.
card.flavor: "Do not lose hope, brother. Our folly will never be uncovered."

card.name: Besieged
card.text:
Siege • Unique
Open: Destroy a performing Personality you own and control: Increase or decrease the strength of all players' provinces by an amount equal to the Personality's base Chi.
card.flavor: The Crab Clan's work is never done.

card.name: Blind Rage
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Berserker: Give him +5F. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "What do you say now? Does the workmanship still look shoddy?"

card.name: Goju Kobashi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Consumer
After Kobashi enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy attachment: Kobashi consumes it. Destroy it. You may target one of your Ninja, create a 1F Shadowlands • Ninja Follower, and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "Such a place, so teeming with life. My hunger shall never go unfulfilled!"

card.name: Burn the Towers
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed Scout Personality at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Give its province -3 strength.
card.flavor: The beauty of the plains is without equal, but the risk of fire during the summer months is one that can never be ignored.

card.name: Obscured Pathways
card.text:
Earth • Forest
While this Shugenja is Earth, this card's Battle ability may be used even if this unit is not at the current battlefield.
Battle: Bow this Shugenja if he is home, bow this card and target an attacking Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: The Kitsune smiled. "All forests are one."

card.name: Inexplicable Challenge
card.text:
Political
Battle: Choose your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "I do not question your bravery, nor your skill at arms. I question your lord's judgment for sending you here today."

card.name: Falling Leaf Strike
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Move your Monk to the current battlefield. Give the target -3F. Bow it if its Force is now 0.
card.flavor: "Impossible? Only because you believe it to be so!"

card.name: Focus
card.flavor: "The primary thing when you take a sword in your hands is your intention to cut the enemy, whatever the means. Whenever you parry, hit, strike or touch the enemy's cutting sword, you must cut the enemy in the same movement." - Miyamoto Musasahi

card.name: Feign Death
card.text: Reaction: After the resolution of an action or a battle that destroyed a performing Personality you own: Bring him into play (in your home), ignoring costs and Honor Requirement. Bow him. Dishonor him. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "They will not stop until they find the body. Produce one for them." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Bend like a Reed
card.text:
You may only play one copy of Bend like a Reed per duel.
Reaction: Before Focus Effects resolve, if your performing Personality in the duel did not strike: Give him +2 to his duel stat until the duel ends.
card.flavor: Unconventional tactics can be frowned upon in a formal duel, but a desperate man will do whatever he must to survive.

card.name: Flooded Pass
card.text:
Terrain
This province has +2 strength for each unit in the attacking army.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, if there are no Terrains there: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "Who knew inconvenience could be so beautiful?" - Shinjo Itao

card.name: Footsteps of Madness
card.text: Reaction: Before the resolution of an action from a Stronghold, pay Gold equal to the Stronghold's base Gold Production: Negate the action's effects.
card.flavor: "Unlike some other clans, we keep a close watch on our holdings in the new lands, to prevent embarassing incidents from occuring." - Yasuki Jinn-Kuen

card.name: Fortitude
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Berserker and target an enemy unit with lower total Force than your Berserker's base Force: Bow the target. Negate all current and new Force penalties on your Berserker from actions.
card.flavor: "Come at me again, demon! Come at me a hundred times and be turned away one hundred and one!"

card.name: Hard Pressed
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle's resolution: Move a unit home from the current battlefield. You may bow it.
Battle: If there are no Terrains in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "A true vassal of the Scorpion must be prepared to face any foe at any time. Only through victory can your loyalty be assured." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: He's Mine!
card.text: Reaction: Before your target Personality enters a duel, bow him and choose your performing unbowed Samurai at the same location: Your Samurai enters the duel instead. Bow him after the duel ends.
card.flavor: Duels in Rokugan are ritualized. The challenge, the terms, and the ceremony are all subject to centuries of tradition. One tradition is the privilege of having another to stand in the place of the challenged, when circumstances are right.

card.name: Heart of Rokugan
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle resolves: Give each of your Human Personalities and Followers at the current battlefield +1F, and give each Nonhuman Personality and Follower there -1F.
Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "Not today, demon! Not today or any other day!"

card.name: Breath of the Heavens
card.text:
Fire • Tattoo
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Fire or Tattooed Personality: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each Fire token on your Personality. Give your Personality a +1F Fire token.
card.flavor: "Do I like my sake chilled? Do not be ridiculous!"

card.name: No Hiding Place
card.text: Reaction: After you announce an action with a Ranged Attack: Give one Ranged Attack from the action -1 strength. That Ranged Attack may target a card in the Defender's home (if otherwise legal).
card.flavor: "Of course I told him to take his offer and begone. I have no patience for such an affront, and I am perfectly safe in this house."

card.name: Selfless Defense
card.text:
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Yojimbo Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Bow him if you control a Courtier or Shugenja.
Battle: Destroy your performing Yojimbo and target one or more of your Courtier or Shugenja Personalities: Move them home.
card.flavor: Duty is never sacrifice.

card.name: Awed Witness
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Your Personality duels the target. Bow the duel's loser. The duel's winner's controller may create a 2F/2C/2PH Samurai Personality with that player's Clan alignment on his side of the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "His skill... amazing!"

card.name: Introspection
card.text: Reaction: After one of your Rings enters play: Search your Fate deck for a card. Put it in your hand.
card.flavor: The notion of enlightenment is ephemeral, but the Empire seeks it anyway. Countless individuals search, and each comes away with a different lesson.

card.name: Knife in the Darkness
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing Ninja Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move both Personalities home; this movement will not be negated. Bow them.
card.flavor: "If a village must be burned so that your victim's death is not discovered, then so be it." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: Hundred-Fold Cut
card.text:
Reaction: After another player's action targets your performing Kensai, bow or destroy one of his Weapons: Negate his destruction from the action's effects.
Battle: Bow your performing Kensai or one of his Weapons: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: Arrows. Swords. Men. Nothing stops a kensai whose blades are ready.

card.name: Guided by Honor
card.text: Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing unbowed Paragon: Move him to the current battlefield. If he moved, you may target and bow an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "My cause is just, and my mien, righteous. You will not impede my path."

card.name: Torch's Flame Flickers
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Negate the next card effect that bows one or more of your Personalities who is there (at the time).
card.flavor: "Do not underestimate the Hiruma. Other Crab may be brutes, but the Hiruma are exceedingly dangerous." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: Murderous Intent
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Paragon: Give him +1F for each of his keywords except "Soul of" keywords. Lose 4 Honor.
card.flavor: "We are certain this ronin is the culprit," the magistrate said. "Execute him at once," Bayushi Nitoshi said. "The murderer of Otomo Teruken should not be allowed even a minute more of life than necessary."

card.name: One Koku
card.text: Reaction: When paying a Gold Cost: Produce one Gold.
card.flavor:
This card is worth one koku.
"The Yasuki Daimyo is as slippery as a live fish and metaphorically as smelly as an old one. He has a mind only for money and the power it brings. A dangerous opponent, and one I plan to keep an eye on." - Doji Dainagon

card.name: Summoned to Justice
card.text:
Political
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier at any location and target an attacking Personality: Move him home. If he moved, bow him. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: Even when armies stand idle, the cause of justice is never still.

card.name: Inspired Devotion
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Yojimbo: Give him +2F or a Force bonus equal to the highest Chi of any Courtier or Shugenja you control.
card.flavor: "Isawa made a great sacrifice to save the Empire. Our service is given freely, to honor a noble man." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Prosperous Village
card.text:
Enters play paying 1 less Gold for each Personality you control.
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
card.flavor: "Prosperity brings men and women of destiny, which in turn only enhances a village's prosperous nature." - Yung

card.name: Rhetoric
card.text:
Political
Reaction: Before a player gains or loses Honor from an action's effects, bow your performing Courtier: Choose another player. If the Courtier's Chi is higher than or equal to the Honor gain or loss, the chosen player instead of the original player takes the gain or loss.
card.flavor: "I have heard the tale differently."

card.name: The Fires of War
card.text:
Unique
Battle/Open: You may use each ability on your Stronghold a second time this turn.
card.flavor: "In the long years since the Destroyer War, only one war between the clans marred the Empire: that of the Phoenix and Scorpion. The War of the Twins was unfortunate, and cost many lives. May we never see its like again." - The Miya Histories

card.name: Immovable Object
card.text:
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Berserker: Straighten him.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Berserker and target an enemy Personality or Follower with lower Force: Bow it.
card.flavor: Wounds that would incapacitate or even cripple lesser warriors merely serve to anger berserkers.

card.name: Snake Tattoo
card.text:
Tattoo
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets your Tattooed Personality: Move him to an adjacent battlefield. If he is no longer a legal target for that action, negate its effects.
card.flavor: The rivalry among the monks of the Dragon and Spider never fully resolved, but bloodshed was rare.

card.name: Sniping
card.text: Reaction: After a Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it a strength bonus equal to its current strength.
card.flavor: Protecting the forests did not always mean protecting them from external threats. Not all their denizens were benign. Not all spirits were pure.

card.name: Spinning Heel Kick
card.text:
Air • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing Monk: Straighten him. You may take an additional Battle action, which he must perform.
card.flavor: With the monks, it is difficult to tell where mastery of the body ends and mastery of the spirit begins.

card.name: Well Prepared
card.text: Battle: If you control a Terrain, target a card in a unit: Bow or straighten it.
card.flavor: "Two and a half decades of peace can make a man weak and complacent. I will not have such things. We will have active drills twice per week. There will be no further breaches of the Second City." - Akodo Tsudoken

card.name: Strength in Terror
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing Paragon and target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force by an amount equal to your Paragon's Force. You may target and destroy one of the Personality's attachments. Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "It is a strategy not lost upon the samurai of Rokugan. Look at their mempo. Some among us do not require such adornments, however." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Strength of Purity
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality with 3 or higher Personal Honor: Give him +3F.
card.flavor: "Honor is a well from which a samurai can draw great strength. When you have your honor you never fight alone." - The Journals of Utagawa

card.name: Veteran Advisor
card.text: Battle: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "We are only ronin warriors and they do not trust us. I've stolen the tactics used in every battle the Lion Clan has fought for the last twenty years. These should prove useful if we ever need new employment, brother."

card.name: Tell the Tale
card.text: Limited: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Twenty five years ago today, the age that the Ikoma and Miya historians have chosen to call the Age of Conquest began." - Matsu Kasei

card.name: The Compassion of the Unicorn
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed Unicorn Clan Personality and target another unit: Straighten it. Gain 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if you do not control the target.
card.flavor: A samurai remains such even when his saya is filled.

card.name: The Slow Death
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, give its winner +3F.
Battle: Target an opposed unit: Straighten it.
card.flavor: "It seemed a simple cut at the time, but it would not stop bleeding. In moments, he was weakened, and then he was dead. Unfortunate, but such things happen." - Bayushi Mitsuo

card.name: The Courage of the Mantis
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing unbowed Mantis Clan Personality: Move him there. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: No enemy is so great as to require retreat.

card.name: The Courtesy of the Crane
card.text:
Political
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if you won it, give all your provinces +2 strength.
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Crane Clan Personality: Choose another player. He may draw a card. Draw two cards.
card.flavor: The open hand holds no weapon.

card.name: The Duty of the Crab
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle: If you control any units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Crab Clan Personality who is face-up in your provinces or discarded (not dead): Bring him into play there, paying all costs.
card.flavor: A soul of strength knows no fear.

card.name: The Loyalty of the Scorpion
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Reaction: After an action targets your Scorpion Clan Personality, destroy your performing Scorpion Clan Personality: Negate either the bowing, movement, or destruction of the target from the action's effects.
card.flavor: Absolute devotion is absolute harmony.

card.name: Ninja Tricks
card.text:
Ninja
Reaction: After an action on a Strategy is announced, bow your performing Ninja Personality at the current battlefield: Negate the action's effects. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Smoke bombs and wild chases in the dark are the stuff of kabuki plays. No one seriously expects to get things done that way." - Shosuro Makiko

card.name: The Honor of the Lion
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing unbowed honorable Lion Clan Personality: Permanently give him a bonus raising his PH to 4 and the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 2 Honor."
card.flavor: Act only with honor and all is glory.

card.name: The Light of Justice
card.text:
Imperial • Political
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Magistrate Personality at home: Move him to the current battlefield. If he moved, straighten his unit. If any dishonorable Personalities are now opposing him, you may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "You will suffer for your crimes!"

card.name: The Shadow Court
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing defending Courtier and target an enemy Personality: Bow him. After the next time this turn another player's action or a battle resolution destroys your Courtier, draw a card, and choose a player, who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "The Imperial Court is by far the most important court, but by no means the only important court." - Doji Makoto

card.name: The Strength of the Spider
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Spider Clan Personality and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Destroy it if it is bowed. Reduce its Force by an amount equal to your Personality's Force. Bow it if its Force is now 0.
card.flavor: Conquest crushes all fear and doubt.

card.name: Shameful Injury
card.text: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, target a Personality: Negate all current and new Force bonuses and penalties on him from actions.
card.flavor: "Better to die than live and become a burden upon your lord." - Tangen's Lies

card.name: Unimpeachable Name
card.text:
Political
Reaction: Before the resolution of another player's action: Reduce each Honor loss from its effects by 3 (minimum 0). You may target and rehonor a dishonorable Personality.
Battle: Bow your performing Shugenja and target an enemy card: Bow it. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Do not speak ill of her. You only harm yourself."

card.name: Dangerous Indulgence
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target a Personality with equal or lower Chi: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "I love Ryoko Owari..."

card.name: Vigilant Eyes
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Insight
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target a Personality: Give him a Force penalty equal to your Samurai's Force.
card.flavor: Consumed with the aftermath of the Destroyer War for many years, the Scorpion slowly began to insert themselves more fully in the affairs of the Empire, much to the regret of the other Great Clans.

card.name: Wall of Honor
card.text: Battle: Move your performing opposed Personality home: Increase or decrease the strength of the current battlefield's province by an amount equal to the number of units on the enemy side there. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Seal it up," Kisada commanded. "For the love of the Heavens, Nitoshi, you must seal it up in stone and steel."

card.name: White Shore Plain
card.text:
Terrain
While at the current battlefield, each of your Tacticians has the ability "Tactical Reaction: Before this battle's resolution: Give this Tactician a Force bonus equal to his Chi."
Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: It is a place heavy with destiny.

card.name: Ever-Winter Copse
card.text:
Forest • Winter
When another Holding produces Gold to pay for a Nonhuman, bow this card: Produce 1 Gold.
card.flavor: There are places blessed by the spirits of winter, forever touched by the preserving chill of snow and ice.

card.name: Winter Sled
card.text:
While you control a Winter card, other players' cards' effects will not negate this Personality's movement.
Reaction: After engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield, bow this card: Move this Personality there.
card.flavor: "Is there no end to the oddities the Unicorn acquired in gaijin lands?" - The Voice of the Emperor

card.name: Surprise Attack
card.text: Battle: Choose one or more of your performing Nonhuman Personalities at the current battlefield and target one of the enemy leader's Personalities there or at home: Create a battlefield (not associated with any province). Move all the performers and targets there.
card.flavor: The return of the Naga was welcomed by few, and feared by many.

card.name: Riverside Port
card.text:
Port • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: If it is your first turn: Put one or more cards in your provinces at the bottom of your deck, refilling the provinces face-up.

card.name: Imperial Gift
card.text:
Imperial • Unique
Gain 2 Honor and search your Fate deck for an Item, show it, and put it into your hand.
card.flavor: "I bear a gift for you, commander, to commemorate your service and glorious victory for the Empress."

card.name: Hida's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
Before the first straightening each battle of a Personality whose enemy leader is a Crab Clan player: Negate that straightening.
Battle: If you are a Crab Clan player, discard this card and target a Personality: Bow him. Bow his unit if he is attacking.
card.flavor: The Little Bear carries his great-grandfather's spirit.

card.name: Doji's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
Crane Clan players may take the rulebook Favor Political Battle action even if they control no units at the current battlefield.
Open: If you are a Crane Clan player, discard this card: Put a non-Unique Strategy with a Political ability in your discard pile into your hand.
card.flavor: Makoto, the Smiling Blade, is graceful, calm and focused in court and battle.

card.name: Togashi's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
Dragon Clan players' maximum hand size is increased by two.
Battle/Open: If you are a Dragon Clan player, discard this card: You may either put a Ring in your hand into play, or search your discard pile, then Fate deck, for a Ring and put it into your hand.
card.flavor: The Laughing Dragon balances the Togashi and Mirumoto.

card.name: Akodo's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
Lion Clan players may target defending enemy units with the rulebook Favor Political Battle action.
Battle: If you are a Lion Clan player, discard this card and choose your performing Personality: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: The Steel Lion is new to the Championship, but her swordsmanship and tactical prowess are reminiscent of Akodo One-Eye.
