card.name: Yoritomo's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
After engaging, if the Attacker is a Mantis Clan player: Reduce the current battlefield's province's strength to 5.
Limited: If you are a Mantis Clan player, discard this card and target your discarded Port holding: Put it into play (bowed), paying all costs but paying 2 less Gold.
card.flavor: The Growing Storm's reign shall shake the Empire.

card.name: Shiba's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
After a battle resolution ends in which a Phoenix Clan player destroyed one or more provinces or enemy cards: He draws a card.
Battle/Open: If you are a Phoenix Clan player, discard this card: Put a non-Unique Spell or Kiho in your discard pile into your hand.
card.flavor: The Soul of Shiba has been Tsukimi's constant companion for decades.

card.name: Bayushi's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
After a player's turn begins, if he is Scorpion Clan: Each other player loses 1 Honor.
Open: If you are a Scorpion Clan player, discard this card and target one or more face-up Personalities in provinces: Put each one at the bottom of its owner's deck in any order. Refill the provinces face-up.
card.flavor: Nitoshi, the Poison Mask, strikes in the night against the Empire's enemies.

card.name: Daigotsu's Guidance
card.text:
Unique
After a Celestial enters play (including this one): Discard all Kami Celestials in play.
Battle: If you are a Spider Clan player, discard this card and target an enemy unit: Destroy all bowed cards in it. Bow it.
card.flavor: "Father... I wait. I will lead our people to victory."

card.name: Shinjo's Guidance - exp
card.text:
Kami • Experienced • Unique
Unicorn Clan Personalities have +1F while they have an attachment.
Limited: Discard this card: Search your discard pile, then Dynasty deck, for Moto Naleesh and put her into one of your provinces, face-up, discarding the card that was there.
card.flavor: "They say I am Shinjo reborn. Why do I not feel different?" - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Benefices of the Emperor
card.text:
Imperial • Unique
Each player in turn order starting with you may choose a card in his hand. Discard all chosen cards. If exactly one player's card has the lowest Focus Value of all those cards, he gains a province to the left of his leftmost province. If exactly one player's card has the highest Focus Value of all those cards, permanantly increase his maximum hand size by three, and he draws three cards.
card.flavor: Iweko Setai often represents his wife in court.

card.name: Naoharu's Gift
card.text:
Winter • Unique
Show a card in your hand to another player. You offer it as a gift. He may put it in his hand; if he does, you gain Honor equal to its base Focus Value. If you showed a card and he did not put it in his hand, discard the card and draw 2 cards.
card.flavor: "Naoharu is long since gone, but his lessons endure for a new generation to learn." - Doji Shunya

card.name: Moon and Sun
card.text:
Unique
Each player may shuffle an Event in his discard pile into his deck.
card.flavor: "Onnotangu and Amaterasu gave way to Hitomi and Yakamo, who gave way to the Obsidian Moon and the Jade Sun. The Heavens are complete and their blessings are showered upon the mortal realm." - Matsu Kasei

card.name: Successful Bounty
card.text:
Unique
Until your Events Phase three turns from now begins, after each time a Personality opposing a Magistrate or Courtier becomes dishonorable from an action, the Personality's controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Good day, Champion. I am pleased to surrender this fugitive to you for justice. I believe there is a stipend for his capture?"

card.name: Suspicions
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, before each of your Events Phases ends, each player in turn order starting with you loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The greatest dramas always leave the matter of guilt or innocence slightly ambivalent. Is it any surprise the Scorpion feature prominently in so many?" - Bayushi Hurunayi

card.name: Alter History
card.text:
Unique
After the next time this game you destroy a province as the Attacker, the Defender loses 5 Honor. If this loss brings him below his starting Family Honor, then until the game ends, he may ignore Honor Requirements when bringing Personalities into play.
card.flavor: "Ambitious men might succub to temptation. Our duty is to record without bias. We alone can do so." - Miya Shoin

card.name: Rebuilding the Empire
card.text:
Unique
Any player with three or fewer provinces may gain a province to the right of his rightmost province. Each player who gained a province from this has his Family Honor lowered to its starting value, and he may not declare an attack until your next turn begins. This Honor loss will not be negated or given to another player instead.
card.flavor: The end of an era, the beginning of another.

card.name: Venerable Master
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Open: Bow and destroy this card, and pay 2 Gold: Create a 3F/3C/3PH Samurai Personality with your Clan alignment.
card.flavor: "A generation of warriors has grown up never knowing war. How long can this last? How long should it last?" - Kuronada

card.name: Deeds and Words
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: Before the resolution of an action during the Action Phase, destroy this card: Choose one of the Honor gains or losses from its effects. Reduce it to 0.
card.flavor: "Trouble comes and trouble goes, and none of it really exists until it is recorded in the Imperial Histories." - Miya Nishio

card.name: Family Library
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Target a discarded (not dead) Personality in your discard pile and a face-up card in one of your provinces, and destroy this card: Discard the face-up card, refilling the province face-up with the Personality.
card.flavor: "A man who is learned in the Tao can bring forth treasures old and new." - Makito

card.name: Traveling Peddler
card.text:
Singular
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card and pay 3 Gold: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "They are poor, only one step above a beggar. They travel everywhere, and no samurai ever gives them a second thought. They are perfect, really." - Yasuki Jinn-Kuen

card.name: Luxurious Silk
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: Even if this card is bowed, when paying for an action: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "A samurai's appearance is as clear as a war-fan's signal, for those who know how to read it. A vain man and a dutiful one will both choose their clothes with care, but the result is far different. Vice cannot be hidden, and virtue will find a way to be heard." - Kakita Hideo

card.name: Public Records
card.text:
Singular
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. Put them back in any order.
card.flavor: "The world will never lack for stories. Even something as mundane as a barley harvest can generate a winter's worth of tales, if the teller knows his craft." - Matsu Kasei

card.name: Well-Tended Farm
card.text:
Farm
Bow this card: Produce 1 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Being concerned with money is considered crass, but no one listens to a poor man. When push comes to shove, wealth creates its own respectability." - Yasuki Jekku

card.name: Hiruma Nitani
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Jade Hand • Scout • Soul of Hiruma Hidora
Battle: Bow Nitani unless you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack, with +2 strength if the target is Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "With the Spider, we clutch a serpent to our breast. Our vigil must never waver. Their ancestors can never become ours."

card.name: Hida Komatsu
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Hero • Unique • Soul of Hida Rikyu Experienced
Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality with lower Force and no attachments: Bow it.
Battle: Target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "They tell me these things were Naga once. They just look like blood and bone to me. They just look like prey."

card.name: Kuni Shinoda
card.text:
Crab Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Soul of Kuni Yasashii
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield and Shinoda is at another battlefield: You may target another Crab Clan Personality at Shinoda's battlefield. Move Shinoda and the target, if any, to the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "Catch me if you can, demon! The only prize you will find is death!"

card.name: Yasuki Tono
card.text: Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant
card.flavor: "We are not warriors, scouts, engineers or priests. In order to carry our share of the Crab's burdens, we must ensure that all our kinsmen have the funds to do as they see necessary, no matter the cost."

card.name: Yasuki Jekku
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Loyal
Political Limited: Pay Gold equal to a target Personality's base Personal Honor minus 1: Dishonor him. His controller loses 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if his base Personal Honor is 3 or greater.
card.flavor: "Thank you, my dear. Do not worry. I will ensure the matter is quickly forgotten."

card.name: Kaiu Hideaki
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Soul of Kaiu Seison
Reaction: After engaging at Hideaki's battlefield: Increase its province's strength by 3 until the battle's resolution begins.
card.flavor: "The Crab exist in a state of perpetual war, either defending or attacking an eternal foe. I envy the majesty of such a simple existence." - Ikoma Shika

card.name: Asahina Keigo
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja • Soul of Asahina Yoshino
Reaction: When paying a Gold cost, bow Keigo and discard a card: Produce Gold equal to its Focus Value.
card.flavor: "I leave the worries over the Second City and its governor to the Doji. My duty is to keep our temples in good repair."

card.name: Daidoji Tametaka
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Commander • Iron Crane • Scout • Soul of Daidoji Zoushi
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. You may target one of your Personalities and move him home.
card.flavor: "For over twenty years, our clan has prepared for the day the long peace would end. Is that day coming soon? I am ready for it."

card.name: Doji Genshin
card.text: Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate
card.flavor: "They think I will not be able to discover who is guilty. They think I will not be able to find them. They think I can be frightened or bought off. They think they can best me in a duel."

card.name: Kakita Seishi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Artisan • Soul of Kakita Ariteko
Open: Bow Seishi and target a dishonorable Personality: Rehonor him.
card.flavor: "Her songs are a wonder and a delight. She moves the hearts and uplifts the souls of all who hear her." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Asahina Kitiaru
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Unique • Soul of Konetsu
Political Open: Target a Personality: Kitiaru copies one of his Political abilities that does not itself copy abilities.
card.flavor: "The Asahina have a tradition of fulfilling a number of roles. Those without the gift of the kami often find themselves in court." - Doji Makoto

card.name: Kitsuki Daisuke
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Daisuke duels him. Move the duel's loser home; if he is dishonorable, this movement will not be negated.
card.flavor: "By questioning my evidence, you question my methods. By questioning my methods, you question my school. By questioning my school, you question my honor. I demand an opportunity to respond to your slight."

card.name: Mirumoto Ichizo - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Ichizo duels him. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "The years may have robbed me of my speed, but my technique is as crisp as ever."

card.name: Mirumoto Gobashi
card.text: Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Soul of Mirumoto Ino
card.flavor: "Every year, I have the honor of training a new crop of students. Every year, I have the duty to teach them to avoid the mistakes their predecessors have made. It is a joy and a burden, and I revel in both." - The Journal of Kitsuki Fusami

card.name: Tamori Tomaru
card.text: Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist
card.flavor: "As always, they insist that their paths are their own, and that no others are fit to judge their conduct. Their secrecy and eccentricity raise unsettling questions." - Isawa Mitsuko

card.name: Tsai-tsu
card.text: Dragon Clan • Nonhuman • Ryu • Cavalry • Tactician
card.flavor: "Under Iweko I, the Empire prospered. The heavens showered their blessings upon Rokugan, in ways both obvious and subtle." - The writings of Miya Shoin

card.name: Akodo Kisho
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Commander • Paragon • Soul of Akodo Dosei
card.flavor: "Somewhere beyond the Empire, there is a threat such as we have never known. Pushing forward into the Colonies increases the risk of a premature conflict with the Yodotai, and we must not permit that to happen."

card.name: Ikoma Natsu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Ikoma Otemi
Natsu will not be controlled by a Unicorn Clan player.
card.flavor: "I have studied my namesake and learned much about out former enemy. If the Unicorn ever march on Rokugan again, I will be ready."

card.name: Akodo Kano
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician • Unique • Master Tactician • Soul of Kitsu Motso
Limited: Give Kano a Master token.
Battle: Bow Kano and destroy a Master token on him: Take two additional Battle actions.
card.flavor: "Duty is not always as it seems. There are many ways to serve."

card.name: Kitsu Suki
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
Limited: Each player who controls an Ancestor gains 1 Honor. For any player who controls no Ancestors, and with higher Honor than his starting Family Honor, you may cause him to lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "They are in all things, thus all things need be honored."

card.name: Akodo Suoh
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician • Soul of Akodo Shunori
card.flavor: "To understand war, you must understand your enemy. To understand your enemy, you must understand yourself. To understand yourself, you must understand the world."

card.name: Yoritomo Doho
card.text: Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Magistrate
card.flavor: Doho traveled far and wide, across the Colonies and mainland Rokugan. He found the first clue in a Crab port city. A small token, embossed with the Kolat insignia.

card.name: Kitsune Denhei
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Denhei enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Snake • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Open: Target a Personality: He is bitten. His base abilities may not be used."
card.flavor: "The souls of those slain in the Colonies will not rest until they have slaughtered the guilty. I will provide them their solace."

card.name: Moshi Yokohime
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval • Soul of Moshi Yuriko
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Hiromi-sama's twin sister Harumi forsook all claim to the Championship to take up the duties of a priestess. She will not jeopardize her piety with the distractions of political intrigue, and for that she is worthy of our loyalty."

card.name: Kitsune Kohaki
card.text: Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Kitsune • Earth • Shugenja • Spirit
card.flavor: Many Kitsune strayed far from their home in the Kitsune Forest. Those who traveled to the Colonies still maintain a powerful link to the Realm of Animals

card.name: Unmei
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Shapeshifter • Spirit • Unique
Unmei has Earth, Thunder, Courtier, Samurai, Shugenja, Cavalry, Duelist, Magistrate, Naval, Scout, and/or Tactician while you control another Mantis Clan Personality with the same keyword.
While Unmei has Samurai or Shugenja, it has +3F and "Battle: Bow Unmei: Ranged 5 Attack."
card.flavor: "Do you require the wisdom of ten lifetimes, child?"

card.name: Asako Nobunori
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Monk • Henshin
Battle: Melee 4 Attack that you may compare against base Force if the target has no attachments.
card.flavor: "Fire is a riddle of itself. It destroys so to maintain its life, and in its death it clears the way for new life. And now I will clear the way to your new life."

card.name: Asako Rinshi
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate
card.flavor: "You will answer my questions. You will answer them quickly and you will answer them completely. These are Phoenix lands, and we do not tolerate the stench of corruption here."

card.name: Isawa Kimi - exp2
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Void • Shugenja • Enlightened • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique
Your other Personalities at Kimi's location that share any element keywords with her or with any of her Spells have +1F.
Reaction: Even if Kimi is bowed, after the resolution of an action that put any cards into another player's hand: That player chooses and discards a card from his hand.

card.name: Asako Ume
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Shugenja • Soul of Isawa Furiko
Ume has +1F while she has a Spell.
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "She is beautiful, impulsive, brilliant. Do not make mistakes around her. In fact, try nothing around her at all." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Shiba Kataken
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo • Soul of Shiba Goto
Iaijutsu Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Stay here, my lord, and I will clear the way for you."

card.name: Shosuro Kameyoi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Seductress • Loyal
Political Limited: Target a Personality: If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if his base Personal Honor is 3 or greater. Dishonor him.
card.flavor: "The Scorpion thrive on weakness and vice. They enjoy nothing more than bringing ruin upon the righteous." - Akodo Kane

card.name: Bayushi Rentatsu
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier• Unique • Soul of Bayushi Goshiu Experienced 3
Limited: Bow Rentatsu: While Rentatsu remains bowed, you may negate his straightening and after each of your turns begins, choose a player; he loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Friends, the eloquence of the testimony makes his shame... obvious."

card.name: Bayushi Yasashiku
card.text: Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Tactician • Soul of Bayushi Himaru
card.flavor: "He trained with the Unicorn, gained their trust and became their brother. He loves them as his family, but will betray them in an instant if it is required of him. It is glorious, to be a Scorpion." - Shosuro Kameyoi

card.name: Shosuro Tanzaki
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier
Political Open: Target another Personality: Give him +4F.
card.flavor: "See this blade? It is now yours, at considerable cost to the clan. See to it that our efforts are not wasted."

card.name: Shosuro Koshiba
card.text: Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate
card.flavor: Testimony from those high in station eclipses all other forms of proof. Guilt or innocence often hinge on the words of those in power.

card.name: Ninube Onchi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Shugenja • Cavalry
After Onchi enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Open: Target a Personality: Remove one of his abilities (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: "The master has commanded this ruin become a Shadow's Lair. Let our work begin."

card.name: Goju Oyoto
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Shugenja • Soul of Goju Utsuei
After Oyoto enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "In the Empire, or even the Second City, he would be killed on sight. Here in the jungle, he has his uses. The other clans do not presume to instruct us in our domain." - Daigotsu Aya

card.name: Temples of Gisei Toshi
card.text:
Temple • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card: Name "Follower", "Item", or "Spell". Look at the top four cards of your Fate deck. You may show one of those cards that is of the type you named, then put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "We have treasures that we never speak of." - Isawa Tamaki

card.name: Tetsuo - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Target an attachment: Destroy it.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with fewer Weapons: Destroy him.
card.flavor: "Stand tall, my brothers. While we remind the Empire of the Spider Clan's power, our brothers wage war for the Empress. A time of great glory comes very soon."

card.name: Iuchi Shunshi
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Shugenja • Unique • Doomseeker • Soul of Iuchi Karasu Experienced 2
Open: Target a Personality without attachments: He may not be assigned, and will not move, to battlefields.
card.flavor: He is the latest to uphold an ancient tradition. He does not know if his unique abilities will be needed, and he will fight for the Unicorn until then.

card.name: Moto Shunsuke
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest • Soul of Moto Akikazu
Shunsuke has a Force bonus equal to the highest number of dead Personalities in any one discard pile.
Limited: Target another player's discarded Personality: He becomes honorably dead.
card.flavor: "We bear the blessings of Meido and the blessings of Tengoku. The Living Goddess is proof.

card.name: Shinjo Baeshuko
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Soul of Shinjo Huang
card.flavor: "She rides into the front lines with a sense of abandon that would suit a Hida berserker. He recklessness hides a deep pain that she will not share with anyone. What could it be?" - Iuchi Shunshi

card.name: Utaku Tsukiko
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon • Soul of Utaku Fusae
card.flavor: "Your beauty inspires me to wax on with endless plays and poems. Will you one day do me the honor of your blessing?" - Anonymous note

card.name: Shinjo Eun-Sahng
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician • Soul of Shinjo Chu-Yeung
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "Our Lady has returned to us. We are blessed, and we will defend her with out lives and our souls."

card.name: Chuda Niiro
card.text:
Shadowlands • Shugenja
After Niiro enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: When the Spider joined the Empire there were those who were left behind. Unable to follow their new strictures, they became ronin, but where does their true loyalty lie?

card.name: Nosloc no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni • Cavalry
After Nosloc enters play: Lose 4 Honor.
card.flavor: Now within as well as without, the threat of the Shadowlands was eternal.

card.name: Ekichu no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni • Unique
After Ekichu enters play: Lose 8 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Rise."

card.name: Daigotsu Kendo
card.text: Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror
card.flavor: "Ours is a sacred task, endorsed both by the dark god and the Child of Heaven. Who else can claim as much? Let us carve our name in the very earth of this kingdom, that our memory might endure forever!"

card.name: Suiteiru no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
After Suiteiru enters play: Lose 4 Honor.
Open: Destroy your target unbowed Personality: Create a number of 1F Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni Followers equal to his Chi. Attach them to one or more of your Personalities. Lose Honor equal to the number of Followers this created.

card.name: Yung
card.text:
Monk • Unique • Soul of Yodin
Reaction: After one of your Rings enters play, bow Yung: Search your Fate deck for a Ring, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "Harmony is found in balance. Through balance the universe is orderly. Without it there is only chaos and suffering."

card.name: Nishimura
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Soul of The Dread Kar
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. You may discard a Kiho or Weapon from your hand; if you did, draw a card.
card.flavor: "His master was an enigma, but he at least was an excellent sensei." - Tetsuo

card.name: Blighted Region
card.text:
Singular
Battle: If you are the Defender, bow this card and choose your performing Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. If he moved and is now opposed, straighten him and gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: The area around the new Shadowlands would yield no crops, and none would eat them if it did.

card.name: Kaiu House Guard
card.text:
Siege • Unique
Will only attach to a Crab Clan Personality.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments whose unit has lower total Force than this unit: Destroy the target. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "You don't believe the efficacy of our machines! Let me show you."

card.name: Asahina House Guard
card.text:
Air • Unique
Will only attach to a Crane Clan Personality.
Battle/Open: Target your bowed Personality: Straighten him. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: The family is widely known for their pacifism. Many have set their beliefs aside since the Destroyer War, intent on protecting their loved ones with all of their talents.

card.name: Tamori House Guard
card.text:
Earth • Unique
Will only attach to a Dragon Clan Personality.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: It is encased in stone. Give it -4F. It may not perform actions.
card.flavor: They delve deeper and deeper into the heart of the volcano to improve their connection to the elements.

card.name: Ikoma House Guard
card.text:
Scout • Unique
Will only attach to a Lion Clan Personality.
Battle: Melee Attack with strength equal to this Personality's Personal Honor plus two. If this Melee Attack destroyed a card, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Since the first days, the Ikoma have stood guard.

card.name: Tsuruchi House Guard
card.text:
Scout • Unique
Will only attach to a Mantis Clan Personality.
Battle: Ranged 5 Attack that you may compare against Gold Cost.
card.flavor: "The forests of the Colonies may have their dangers, but we have learned to protect ourselves from the predators."

card.name: Asako House Guard
card.text:
Void • Unique
Will only attach to a Phoenix Clan Personality.
Battle/Open: Target a Personality: Set his Force equal to his Chi or Personal Honor. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The Asako were once thought of as unimportant. Never again."

card.name: Soshi House Guard
card.text:
Ninja • Unique
Will only attach to a Scorpion Clan Personality.
Political Battle/Open: Target a Personality: If it is a Combat Segment, bow him. If he is dishonorable, his controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: They fight their enemies on the battlefield and court - wherever they may be found.

card.name: Goju House Guard
card.text:
Shadowlands • Ninja • Unique
Will only attach to a Spider Clan Personality.
Battle: Put this card on the top or bottom of your Fate deck and target an enemy Personality: Put all cards without attachments in his unit on the bottom of their owner's appropriate deck.
card.flavor: "Your lair will remain unknown, master."

card.name: Moto House Guard
card.text:
Cavalry • Unique
Will only attach to a Unicorn Clan Personality.
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move this Personality there. If he is now there, Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "Our Champion leads us, and the Khan marshals our armies. We protect both."

card.name: Ikiryo
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Spirit
Battle: Destroy this card: Ranged Attack, which may target a Personality with attached Followers, with strength equal to the Chi of the Personality to whom this card was last attached. Lose Honor equal to that Personality's Chi and dishonor him.
card.flavor: "I have failed, scion... and I shall make sure you will not follow my mistakes."

card.name: Utaku Elite Guard
card.text:
Battle Maiden • Cavalry
Battle Maidens in this army have +1F while attacking.
card.flavor: The Battle Maidens remain one of the strongest military units in the Empire, but they suffered a defeat five years ago. Few remember now, yet they push harder than ever before to prove their worth to themselves.

card.name: Blade of Perfection
card.text:
Weapon
After this card bows: Straighten it.
Reaction: After the resolution of another player's action that destroyed this card or its Personality, choose your performing Personality: Attach this card to him, paying all costs.
card.flavor: A well forged blade will last through countless battles, never failing its bearer in times of need.

card.name: Sasumata
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card without a Weapon or Armor: Bow it.
card.flavor: Commonly used by magistrates to apprehend suspects, they are ideally suited to disarm foes.

card.name: Gift Armor
card.text:
Armor
Negate all current and new Chi penalties on this Personality.
Negate any destruction of this card, except for its Personality being destroyed.
card.flavor: "An armor worthy of gifting will not fail until its wearer is already dead." - Lady Doji

card.name: Kensai's Blade
card.text:
Weapon
This card has +1F while attached to a Kensai.
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Personality at the current battlefield: Attach this card from your hand to him, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "My rivals call katanas works of art. They are wrong. Katanas are tools of killing." - Lord Mirumoto

card.name: Reserve Weapon
card.text:
Weapon
Before this Personality focuses: You may give him +3 to his duel stat until the duel ends instead of focusing.
card.flavor: There are times when resources are depleted, soldiers are tired, and options are poor. It is good to have prepared for those times.

card.name: Ring of Fire
card.text:
Fire • Unique
After the resolution of a battle at a province, if you destroyed one or more provinces or enemy cards in that resolution: You may put this card into play from your hand.
Battle: Bow this card or discard it from your hand, destroy your performing Personality, and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Destroy him.
card.flavor: Vitality.

card.name: Ring of the Void
card.text:
Void • Unique
After you resolve your fourth or later non-Kiho action from Strategies in one phase: You may put this card into play from your hand.
Open: Bow this card or discard it from your hand: If any player has more cards in his hand than you do, or if this card is in play, draw a card.
card.flavor: Harmony.

card.name: Capturing the Soul
card.text:
Ritual
Limited: Bow this Shugenja and 0 or more of your other performing Shugenja, target a Personality, and remove this card from the game: If the total Chi of all your performing Shugenja is higher than three times the Chi of the Personality, remove him (and his attachments) from the game.

card.name: Consecration
card.text:
Earth
Open: Bow this card: Choose one or two of your provinces. After the first time this turn a Personality assigns or moves to an attacking army at one of those provinces' battlefields, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "This is sacred space. The Empire will not turn a blind eye to your deeds."

card.name: Nerve Strike
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Bow your performing Monk and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Reduce his Force and the Force of each of his Followers to 0. Cards in that unit may not perform actions until this battle ends.
card.flavor: "Urk!"

card.name: I Give You My Name
card.text:
Maho
Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy your target Human Personality: Search your Dynasty deck or discard pile for a non-Unique Oni with Gold Cost lower than or equal to the Human's Gold Cost plus the performer's Chi. Put the Oni into play, ignoring Gold Cost. Lose 2 Honor.

card.name: Summon Swamp Spirits
card.text:
Maho
Limited: Bow this Shugenja and target your Personality: Create a 1F Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Spirit • Swamp Spirit Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "Mindless, foul, and numerous. Do not take the minions summoned by tsukai lightly." - Isawa Mitsuko

card.name: The Kami's Blessing
card.text:
Kami
Battle/Open: Bow this card: Give this Shugenja a Force bonus equal to his Chi.
Battle: Bow this card and target one or two Samurai: Give each of them a Force bonus equal to this Shugenja's Chi.
card.flavor: "Know that the Heavens themselves support this endeavor." - Voice of the Emperor

card.name: Seeking the Way
card.text:
Air
Battle: Bow this Shugenja, move him home, and target an attacking Personality: Move him home. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You will no longer defile this place with your presence."

card.name: Walking the Way
card.text: Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy this card: Search your Fate deck for a card. Put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "I have never understood the Dragon desire to speak in riddles and conundrums. Working with the elements is complex enough without forcing your students to decipher what you are trying to say." - Kitsu Tamasine

card.name: Fields of Mercy
card.text:
Terrain
Before a card effect destroys a Personality in an army, if a card effect has destroyed another Personality in that army while this card was in play: Negate the Personality's destruction.
Battle: If there are no Terrains in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: An enemy's mercy is a terrible gift...

card.name: A Time for Mortal Men
card.text: Battle/Open: Destroy your performing Ancestor and target your Personality: Give him +3F.
card.flavor: The Heavens approve of the new Iweko line, yet they do not interfere.

card.name: A Paragon's Strength
card.text:
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon: Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Force. Lose 4 Honor.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Move him home. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Such a weak technique could never strike me down. Try again when you are serious, boy."

card.name: A Pure Stroke
card.text: Battle/Open: Target a Weapon: Raise its Force and Chi modifiers to twice its base Force and Chi modifiers (this does not affect negative base modifiers).
card.flavor: Kakita Han spent five years creating three perfect blades. One he kept by his side. One he gave to his betrothed. The last was stolen from his home. He will not set aside his vengeance until it is returned to him.

card.name: Ambush
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Create a battlefield (not at any province). Assign your Personality to attack there. Assign the target to defend there, even if he is bowed. Other Personalities will not move there. Fight a battle there (after this action's resolution). After the battle ends, lose 5 Honor.
card.flavor: "The bandits will never miss this golden opportunity. They expect easy prey, and I expect to wake my sleeping blade."

card.name: Aramoro's Promise
card.text:
Ninja
Limited: Choose your performing Saboteur or Ninja Personality: Discard a Dynasty card in a province. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "We swore to fight in the shadows to protect the Empire. We continue to do so, even when the Throne accepts the darkness into our midst."

card.name: Sanctioned Duel
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your Personality challenges the target. He may refuse; if he does, dishonor him and gain 2 Honor. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "Today I will uphold my clan's honor. Can the same be said for you?" - Kakita Mitohime

card.name: Banish All Doubt
card.text:
Tactical
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician: Look at the top four cards of your Fate deck. Put one of them in your hand and put the other three on the bottom of your deck in any order.
card.flavor: The Lion Clan Champion's recent ascension - and her brother's refusal of the position - has shaken her Clan. Gossips whisper that they may never recover under her rule.

card.name: Caught Unawares
card.text:
Open: If you control no Personalities, target one or two Personalities: Bow them. Negate their straightening (this turn). If it is not your turn, draw a card.
Battle: Target an enemy card with no unbowed attachments. Bow it.
card.flavor: "Where did they come from? Quick! Move the heavy infantry to our flanks!"

card.name: Confusion at Court
card.text:
Political
Reaction: Before an action resolves, if discarding the Imperial Favor is one of its base costs: Negate the action's effects.
card.flavor: "And I would be remiss if I did not congratulate Isawa Hirasu on his new, blushing bride? Love has brightened your cheeks, darling girl."

card.name: Deadly Orders
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Commander and target your Follower: Give it a Force bonus equal to twice its current Force. After this battle's resolution, destroy the Follower.
card.flavor: "This is an ogre, boys! You have three chances to kill it with your unit. Now attack it before it destroys any tactics you can make!"

card.name: Chikushudo's Trickery
card.text:
Earth • Forest
Open: Choose one or two of your performing unbowed Nonhuman Spirit Personalities, target another player's unbowed Personality, bow this Shugenja, and destroy this card: Create a battlefield. Negate all movement to it. Assign the target to attack there; he will not be destroyed during the battle's Combat Segment. Assign the performing Spirits to defend there. Fight a battle there.

card.name: Caught in the Act
card.text: Reaction: After another player's action targets one or more of your Personalities: Negate their bowing from the action's effects.
card.flavor: The feud between the former Emerald Champion and the former Kakita daimyo grew to epic proportions. Now, no one mentions it in polite company.

card.name: Control the Field
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality with Scout, Tactician, or 3 or higher Chi, and target a Terrain: Destroy it. You may take an additional Battle action to play a Terrain.
card.flavor: The Battle Maidens will never forget the Battle of Living Flames. They were outmaneuvered and overwhelmed by a smaller force. The shame will never leave them, though it has long passed into memory for the rest of the Empire.

card.name: Duel of Serpents
card.text:
Open: If another player has higher Family Honor than you, bow your performing Nonhuman or Spirit: Gain 3 Honor.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Nonhuman or Spirit and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: Those few Naga who remained awake waged a desperate war for survival against the castoffs of their own people.

card.name: Face of Ninube
card.text: Open: Shuffle your hand into your Fate deck: Draw a number of cards equal to the number you shuffled in.
card.flavor: "Your possessions, your titles, even your lives - these things you will sacrifice readily. But what of your souls, your essences, your very identities?" - The Shadow Dragon

card.name: Paid Off
card.text: Open: Target a Personality: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "The murder of an Imperial governor is a very serious matter," the Seppun said. "His murderer will be found. Now, you can cooperate with me or you can cooperate with my assistants. I will have answers either way."

card.name: Heavily Engaged
card.text: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield: Each player targets an unbowed Personality he controls there, if possible. Bow all targets.
card.flavor: Prolonged conflict fatigues even the most stalwart of bushi.

card.name: Oyo's Second Lesson
card.text:
Kiho
Battle/Open: Choose your performing dead Henshin and target your Personality: Your Henshin is reborn. Overlay him onto your Personality. Draw a card. You may take an additional action.
card.flavor: The wisdom of the Henshin often outlasts their mortal bodies.

card.name: Final Confrontation
card.text:
Iaijutsu • Political
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, take the Imperial Favor.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target one or two Personalities whose total Chi is lower than or equal to your Duelist's Chi: Bow them.
card.flavor: Disputes are still resolved by steel.

card.name: Meeting the Keepers
card.text:
Void
Reaction: After the resolution of an action from one of your Rings: Seach your Dynasty deck for an Event, show it, and put it on top of the deck after shuffling.
Open: Bow your target Ring: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: "I have met one. He was only a man, yet his eyes held an awareness that I could not fathom." - Moto Ming-gwok

card.name: Martial Instruction
card.text:
Kiho
Open: Bow your performing Monk and remove this card from the game: Search your Fate deck for a Kiho Battle Strategy, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "My lord's father has disappeared, I have duties to perform, and yet you prattle at me about skill at arms. Very well, I have shown you the skill in my arms."

card.name: Gold and Steel
card.text:
Battle/Open: Target one to three attachments with a Gold Cost of 0: Destroy them.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality with an equal or lower Gold Cost: Bow him. You may move him home.
card.flavor: "Honorable samurai cannot be bought, but you would be surprised at how many can be rented for a short time." - Yoritomo Hama

card.name: Mysterious Deaths
card.text:
Kolat • Unique
Limited: Each player targets a unit he controls with the lower total Gold Cost of all units he controls, if possible. Destroy all targets. Remove this card from the game. Lose 4 Honor.
card.flavor: "It is better to make things look like an accident, but sometimes one must cut corners. Kill him and leave no traces of your presence." - Master Tiger

card.name: Remember Your Ancestors
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy attacking Personality: His controller may destroy him. If he did not choose this, discard a card at random from his hand, and choose a player, who gains or loses 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "It would be so unfortunate for your family's name to be sullied." - Shosuro Makiko

card.name: Useful Connections
card.text:
Political
Open: Bow your performing Courtier and target one or more Personalities, up to an amount equal to your Courtier's Chi: Give Cavalry to them and to each of their Followers.
card.flavor: "He is magnificent! You must attend court with me next season so that we can display him properly!"

card.name: Hidden Defenses
card.text:
Battle: If you control no Personalities (in play), target one or two Personalities at any location: Bow them. Negate their straightening.
Reaction: After engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "Sometimes an improvised trap can be as helpful as a fortification." - Daidoji Kenshi

card.name: Solid Defense
card.text:
Political Reaction: Before the resolution of another player's action, discard the Imperial Favor unless you control a Personality with 5 or higher Force: Negate any Honor losses from the action's effects.
Battle: Target a Personality without attachments: Move him home.
card.flavor: To protect one's home is its own reward.

card.name: Relentless Conviction
card.text:
Unique
Battle: Target a dishonorable Personality: Destroy him.
card.flavor: "Face me, wretches! Face me, and I will show you the wisdom of the Empress who sent us here to dominate this cursed land!" - Daigotsu Ishibashi

card.name: Rend the Soul
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: Raise this card's Focus Value to 5. If your Personality wins this duel, he loses instead (the other Personality still also loses).
Battle: Choose your performing opposed Personality: Give him +5F. If the army he is in during this battle's resolution wins, this battle is tied instead. You will not destroy the province in this battle's resolution.
card.flavor: "The price! The price! It is paid!"

card.name: Stay Put
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Kensai and target an enemy card without attached Weapons or Armor: Bow it. You may attach a Weapon to your Kensai from your hand, paying all costs but paying 4 less Gold if he is defending.
card.flavor: "What do you value? Life? Honor? Glory?"

card.name: At Any Cost
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Will
Battle: If you control any units at the current battlefield, choose your performing dead Samurai: Bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs.
card.flavor: "I refuse to die! I will not die! I will stoop to any evil to cling on to this life."

card.name: Sacrifice of Pawns
card.text:
Political
Limited: Destroy your performing unbowed Courtier and target another player's Personality: His controller may destroy the target. If he did not choose this, search your Dynasty deck for a Personality and bring him into play, paying all costs but paying two more Gold. (Discard him if you are unable to play him.)
card.flavor: "Furikawari? Possibly."

card.name: Opportunistic Advance
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target another Personality in his army: Move the target to a battlefield.
card.flavor: "While the new governor takes charge, the Second City will be unsettled, and lords will attempt to increase the influence in the Colonies. We must make sure that our gain overshadows theirs." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Sneak Attack
card.text: Reaction: After engaging: The Attacker has the first opportunity to take a Battle action or pass in this battle.
card.flavor: Landing the final blow may be more important than the first, but done correctly, one blow may be both first and final.

card.name: Shadows Walk
card.text:
Fear • Ninja
Open: Bow one or more of your performing Shadowlands Ninja Personalities and target a card without attachments: If the card is an attachment, destroy it. If it is a Personality with Chi lower than or equal to the number of performers, permanently give him Ninja and Shadowlands and take control of him. Lose 3 Honor.

card.name: Steel on Steel
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Your performer duels the target. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: Throughout the years, there remained one simple way to resolve any difference, no matter how serious.

card.name: Strategic Strike
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Scout Personality: Ranged 6 Attack, which may target a Personality with attached Followers if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: "A well placed arrow can accomplish what an army cannot." - Tsuruchi Isas

card.name: Superior Opponent
card.text:
Fear • Iaijutsu
As a Focus Effect: You may destroy an attachment at the current battlefield if your Personality in this duel is there.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target an enemy unit: Bow each Follower and Personality in it with equal or lower Force than your Duelist's Chi.

card.name: The Empress' Address
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After the resolution of an action or a battle that destroyed any of your Personalities in a defending army, bow your performing Courtier or Empress and target your non-Unique Personality with your Clan alignment in your discard pile: Bring him into play (in your home), ignoring costs. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: Her voice was too pure for the people to bear.

card.name: The Serpent's Deception
card.text:
Fear • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing Monk and target an enemy Personality whose unit has lower total Force than your Monk's unit: Move the target home. Your Monk feigns his injuries. He contributes Force to his army even if bowed. Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "Perhaps my wound is fatal, and perhaps not. I will outlive you, however."

card.name: Plans Within Plans
card.text: Open: At your next opportunity to take an Open action, you may instead take a Limited action.
card.flavor:
"It was a great honor for me to dine with you last night, Nitoshi-sama. The food was excellent and the conversation was brilliant."
"I am pleased to hear it, Makiko-san," Nitoshi said. "I am sure I enjoyed it was well."

card.name: The Trap is Sprung!
card.text: Battle: If you have Reconnaissance, choose your performing unbowed Scout Personality, and target an enemy card: Bow it. Bow its unit if you are a Crane Clan player.
card.flavor: "War between the clans is strictly forbidden in the Empire. In the Colonies, it seems wise to permit a bit of leeway in the interests of stress reduction." - The Imperial Governor

card.name: The Law's Strength
card.text:
Political
Battle: Choose your performing Courtier or Magistrate and target a Personality: Move him home. If this did not move him home, destroy him.
card.flavor: "Manipulation, gossip, and deceit are powerful tools, but none can stand against the righteousness of the law. The Empress' will be done." - Kitsuki Daisuke

card.name: Unseen Assailant
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Bow your performing Ninja: Ranged 3 Attack. If the Ranged Attack targeted a Personality, you may compare it against his Chi.
card.flavor: "Wrong my family and I will not take vengeance tomorrow. I will wait years, until you have forgotten me, and then your death will simply be a mystery." - Shosuro Konishi

card.name: Veiled Menace
card.text:
Political
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier and target a dishonorable Personality: His controller loses 2 Honor. After each time he is assigned (this turn), his controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I think you may wish to choose your words more carefully. We all know how dangerous a misspoken word in court can be."

card.name: Soul's Sacrifice
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai with 3 or higher Personal Honor and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Permanently give your Samurai Shadowlands and Undead.
card.flavor: "If I had more, I would give it. As it is, I have only this meager life..."

card.name: Words Have Strength
card.text:
Political
You may only play one copy of Words Have Strength in reaction to any one resolution.
Reaction: After a battle's resolution, or the resolution of another player's Battle action, if the resolution or action destroyed any of your Courtiers or Magistrates: Choose a player who loses 3 Honor.

card.name: Qalyar
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Mountaineer • Scout
Recon Reaction: After engaging at Qalyar's battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Give its province +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: The final legacy of the Black Pearl was those Naga who refused sleep rather than abandon vigilance.

card.name: Ugulu no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
After Ugulu enters play: Lose 5 Honor.
Before a Human Personality moves to Ugulu's battlefield: Negate his movement.
card.flavor: The demons tested Rokugan's defense day and night. They lacked organization, but their sheer power more than compensated for that fact.

card.name: Undetectable Enemy
card.text: Reaction: After another player's action targets your Oni: Negate its effects.
card.flavor: "Do not think that the Empire is no longer troubled by oni. Our danger is greater than ever, for some have learned stealth and patience. Do not become so obsessed by the Spider than you lose sight of those who hide from them and us." - Kuni Renyu

card.name: Twist of Fate
card.text: Reaction: Before your Dynasty Phase ends: Take an additional Limited or Open action.
card.flavor: "Every day contains one thousand chances for your destiny to be changed. Choose a path, choose an ally, choose an enemy... each affects all we do and all we ever shall do." - The Tao of Shinsei

card.name: Rumors Travel
card.text:
Political
Limited: Until your next turn begins, before each time a player gains 1 or more Honor, reduce the gain by 1 if it is not during a battle or Attack Phase.
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "Did you hear what has happened?"

card.name: Otomo Demiyah
card.text:
Imperial • Courtier
Political Reaction: After Demiyah enters play: Choose a player, who gains or loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: The role of the Otomo is more important in times of peace than in times of war. In times of peace samurai need enemies and the Otomo provide them.

card.name: Akodo's Grave
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle: Bow and destroy this card and target a Terrain: Destroy it.
card.flavor:
"I do not understand why you would not accept the Championship, Kano."
"All I have done is for the good of the Lion, Dairuko-sama. You will rule, and I will serve you with all my skill."

card.name: Chugo Seido
card.text:
Temple • Singular
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Reaction: When another player's action would target one of your Personalities, destroy this card: Choose one of your Samurai at the same location. The action targets him instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "Bushido is our shield." - Shiba Sansesuke

card.name: Genmyo
card.text:
Ronin • Actor • Soul of Kyogen
Open: Target your Personality: Genmyo copies one of his keywords.
card.flavor: "Who am I? I am anyone. I am everyone. I am Rokugan."

card.name: Seppun Washi
card.text:
Imperial • Samurai • Imperial Bank of Rokugan • Banker • Soul of Seppun Ujifusa
Reaction: When paying a Gold cost, bow Washi: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor:
Washi is worth One Koku.
"It is said by some that war is good for the economy. Such men are not merchants, clearly."

card.name: The Power of a Word
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets your Courtier: The player may choose to lose 3 Honor. If he did not choose this, negate the action's effects.
Battle: Target one to three enemy dishonorable Personalities: The shadow of their shame shall fall upon their shoulders. Move them home.

card.name: Bandit Gang
card.text:
Bandit
After this card enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
After a battle resolution ends, if this card is at the current battlefield: You may pay 2 Gold. If you do not, destroy this card.
card.flavor: "Louts and buffoons, the lot of them. Wipe them out." - Doji Hakuseki

card.name: Preserving Honor
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality at the current battlefield: His controller chooses either to bow him, or to choose another location and move him there. If the bowing or movement is negated, remove the Personality from the game.
card.flavor: "Moto-san, Matsu-san, hear me!" Shiba Sansesuke cried out. "You cannot duel without first gaining your lord's permission! Would you shame your families by dying in a common brawl?"

card.name: The Power of One
card.text:
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Commander: Straighten his unit.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Commander and target one or two enemy units with a combined total Gold Cost equal to or lower than your Commander's unit's total Gold cost: Bow the targets.
card.flavor: "Never underestimate the danger posed by one truly brilliant officer." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: The Height of Courage
card.text:
Reaction: Before the resolution of another player's action, choose your performing Personality: Negate his movement from the action's effects.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Give him and each of his Followers +1F.
card.flavor: A samurai does not fear enemies or death. When his end comes, it comes in glory and valor. It comes as a legend.

card.name: Palace of the Breaking Dawn
card.text:
Your Ronin cards enter play paying 1 less Gold and ignoring Honor Requirements.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed, choose your performing opposed Ronin Personality: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: "Not since the Clan War have wave men been held in such esteem. The Legion of Two Thousand are men of honor indeed." - The Imperial Herald

card.name: The Imperial Treasury
card.text:
Imperial • Unique
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Mantis Clan player.
Bow this card: Produce 1 Gold, plus 1 additional Gold for each non-Unique Holding you control.
card.flavor: "The most expensive war in history, with half the Empire unable to produce crops. I suppose it is better than being bored." - Yoritomo Utemaro

card.name: Delayed Arrival
card.text: Choose a Personality in play. He may not be assigned to attack you until your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "I see the festivites began without me. Just as well, I suppose. You would need a short practice to have any chance against me."

card.name: Border Keep
card.text:
Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: If it is your first turn: Put one or more cards in your provinces at the bottom of your deck, refilling the provinces face-up.
Limited: Once per game: Put one or more cards in your provinces at the bottom of your deck, refilling the provinces face-up.

card.name: Fortifications
card.text:
Castle
Your provinces have +1 strength.
card.flavor: "And so this land, which once spawned a monstrous threat to the Empire, has been become its treasury. May it's descendants ponder this daily and consider how the Heavens rain their blessings upon our land. May they never falter in their devotion to the throne." - Chronicle of the Blossoming World, Part IV

card.name: Clan Standard
card.text:
Standard
Your Personalities with your Clan alignment at this card's battlefield have +1F, or +2F if they have any Followers.
card.flavor: The presence of a standard on the battlefield, held aloft proudly, is a great inspiration to troops. Being chosen to carry one is a sacred duty, and a great honor.

card.name: Deception Revealed
card.text:
Reaction: After the resolution of an action that bowed a Ring: Straighten it.
Battle: Target a Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. Bow it if you control a Ring.
card.flavor: "When will you ghosts realize you do not belong in this realm? I shall be forced to beat you until you concede defeat and disappear forever from Ningen-do."

card.name: My Enemy's Mercy
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Compassion
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: The enemy leader chooses to either bow him or move him home. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "It is noble to heal a wounded man, whether he be friend or enemy. One must never forget we are all servants of the same Empress." - Isawa Shunsuko

card.name: Ogre Savagery
card.text:
Fear
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Nonhuman Shadowlands Personality and target an enemy Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: "Taint no longer plagues us, but the Shadowlands are no less a place of menace. They are still the source of horrific beings who want to destroy us all." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Retribution
card.text: Reaction: After the end of an Attack Phase in which you were the Defender: Declare an additional Attack Phase against that phase's Attacker, in which neither player may invite allies and you may only assign one Personality. Give the Personality and each Follower in his unit +1F after he assigns.
card.flavor: "Landing the first blow is inconsequential. Landing the final blow is crucial."

card.name: In the Heart of Battle
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Duty
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Samurai: Straighten him and give him +3F. Destroy him before this turn ends.
card.flavor: "For my family."

card.name: Encircled Terrain
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle resolves: The Attacker and Defender, in the order of your choice, each choose one of their units at the current battlefield. Move all other units there home.
Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "This is fate, Crane. Let us finish this."

card.name: Extended Maneuvers
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle resolves: You may choose and straighten a Samurai Personality at the current battlefield, and you may choose and bow a non-Samurai Personality there.
Battle: If there are no Terrains at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: Weeks in the field purchase years of life.

card.name: Public Room
card.text:
Sake House
Open: Bow this card: Give each of your Sake tokens +1F.
card.flavor:
"We should really be going, you know."
"One more round for the road!"

card.name: Bar Fight
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, bow its winner.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: Melee Attack with strength equal to 4 plus the number of Sake tokens he has.
card.flavor: Peace for a samurai is a time of barely restrained aggression.

card.name: Folklore
card.text:
Battle/Open: Target an unaligned Personality: Give him -3F.
Battle: Choose your performing Human Personality and target a Nonhuman Personality: Move it home.
card.flavor: "Listen to the tale of Toki the Brave, children! He did what the samurai could not do, and for his valor he sits in the Heavens and smiles upon us today!"

card.name: Peace
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Search your Dynasty deck for a non-Unique Holding. Bring it into play (bowed), paying all costs.
card.flavor: "The defeat of the Destroyers and the taming of the Spider ushered in a period of peace desperately needed by an exhausted Empire. Guided by the Divine Empress' hand, Rokugan began to rebuild... and to expand." - The Ikoma Histories

card.name: Second City Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Destroy this card: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "In time, the glories of this city will eclipse all others, perhaps even those of the Imperial City." - Akodo Tsudoken

card.name: Govern the Land
card.text:
Open: Target a Holding in your discard pile: Bring it into play (bowed), paying all costs.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality and target a Follower or Item in your discard pile: Attach it to him, paying all costs.
card.flavor: Sometimes the ashigaru had to be reminded who the land belonged to.

card.name: Might of the Sun
card.text:
Fire • Thunder
This Shugenja has +4F.
Battle: Bow this Shugenja unless he is Fire or Thunder and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: Once kinsmen, once enemies, the shugenja of the Moshi taught the Phoenix much.

card.name: Expansion
card.text:
Forest • Unique
Until your next turn begins, before the first time each turn another player's card's effect destroys one or more of your Personalities, negate the destruction.
card.flavor: The Second City belonged to the people of Rokugan, but the ruined kingdoms remained a mystery.

card.name: Jungle Stockade
card.text:
Dojo • Forest
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold, or 4 Gold if paying for an attachment.
Open: Choose your two performing Personalities and target an attachment on one of them: Transfer it to the other Personality.
card.flavor: Building defenses means more than simply erecting walls.

card.name: Chikara - exp2
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Duelist • Kensai • Experienced 2 • Unique
Battle: Target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: He had seen the worst the Empire had to offer, but nothing could cause his love for it to waver.

card.name: Gozu
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Target a Terrain: Destroy it. You may discard a card. If you did, search your Fate deck for a Terrain, show it, then take an additional Battle action to play it, if legal; if not, discard it.
card.flavor: "My only motivation is just over the next hill."

card.name: Uta
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai
Uta may not be assigned, and will not move, into attacking armies.
Uta will not be destroyed to pay costs.
card.flavor: "He was found as a baby, bundled with swords to mark him a samurai, with no indication of his lineage." - Harue

card.name: Border Market
card.text:
Forest • Market
Open: Bow this card, choose your performing Personality, and target a non-Unique Follower or Item in your discard pile: Attach it to your performer, paying all costs.
card.flavor: Wherever men travelled, commerce followed.

card.name: Gozu's Guide
card.text:
Scout
Attaches to Gozu ignoring Gold Cost.
Battle: Give this battlefield's province -2 strength, or -3 strength if you have Reconnaissance.
card.flavor: The second was first, and the first was forgotten.

card.name: Patchwork Armor
card.text:
Armor
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, bow its winner.
card.flavor: "You may be my death, but you will remember you faced me until the end of your days!"

card.name: Well Protected
card.text: Reaction: After another player's action targets your Personality, bow or destroy his target Armor: Negate his destruction from the action's effects.
card.flavor: A samurai's sword is his soul, but his armor is his life.

card.name: Profits
card.text:
Before you produce Gold to pay for a card with a base Gold Cost of 1 or greater: You may reduce the total Gold produced by 1; if you did, put a Wealth token on this card after the other card enters play.
Limited: Put this card into play.
Reaction: When paying a Gold cost, if this card is in play, discard it: Produce Gold equal to the number of Wealth tokens on it before you discarded it.
card.flavor: To the crafty go the spoils...

card.name: Forgotten Outpost
card.text:
Castle • Forest
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
Limited: If another player has higher Family Honor than you: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The greatest and rarest treasure are those forgotten places that survived the death of the Kingdoms. What majestic secrets they hold!" - Isawa Tamaki

card.name: Re-fortification
card.text:
Siege
Limited: Target a Castle Holding in your discard pile: Put it into play, paying all costs.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, bow your target Castle and target an enemy Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Only a fool abandons something that was lost." - Kaiu Kawachi

card.name: Hotei's Contentment
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Before you gain Honor from the Proclaim action, if the Personality's base PH is 3 or lower: Increase the Honor gain by 1.
Open: Discard this card and target a Personality: He may not assign to, and will not move into, an attacking army.
card.flavor: The moments of peace are few, and thus must be savored all the more.

card.name: Lady Matsu's Rage
card.text:
Unique
After your action resolves that destroyed any Personalities: Remove them from the game.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed attacking Personality, target an enemy card, and discard this card: Bow the target. After the next time (this turn) it straightens, destroy it.
card.flavor: Let the Akodo plan. The Matsu will destroy.

card.name: Gaining Advantage
card.text:
Political • Winter • Unique
You may search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Strategy with a Political ability, show it, put it in your hand, and discard a card.
card.flavor: The Crane sought clear dominance with every small victory.

card.name: In Search of Guidance
card.text:
Unique
Search your Dynasty deck for a Sensei Personality. Refill this province with him, face-up.
card.flavor: "When seeking a teacher, first find those who know what you know, then those who know what you do not." - The Tao of Shinsei

card.name: Growing Hostility
card.text:
Unique
Destroy all non-Unique Holdings with a base Gold Cost of 0. Until the game ends, Holdings in and out of play have a minimum Gold Cost of 1.
card.flavor: The Spider were the victims, but they were not the only ones to suffer.

card.name: The Scorpion Wall is Finished
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, other players' actions will not discard cards from your hand, and after a player has resolved two actions that put cards in his hand in one phase, no more cards will be put into his hand that phase.
card.flavor: The Scorpion readily accepted the aid of the Crab - together they held a dark secret.

card.name: Terraced Farm
card.text:
Farm
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle: Bow this card: Give each of your Ashigaru cards at the current battlefield +1F.
card.flavor: There are many roads to prosperity.

card.name: Shiba Toshisugo
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
card.flavor: "Earth is strong in him and keeps his Fire steady," Sanetomo said. "He will serve the clan well in our unfortunate disagreements with the Lion Clan."

card.name: Shrine to Nimuro
card.text:
Temple • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you control a Tactician.
Limited: Bow this card and your performing Lion Clan Tactician, and target a province: Lower its strength to 0.
card.flavor: Lion's roar, Lion's courage, Lion's soul.

card.name: Staging Grounds
card.text:
Castle
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold, or 4 Gold if paying for a card with a base Gold Cost of 9 or more.
card.flavor: With the threat of the Taint gone, the Crab began making regular forays into the Shadowlands in hopes of reclaiming land for purification.

card.name: Surveillance Outpost
card.text:
Castle
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: If you have fewer provinces than each other player, or exactly one province, choose your performing Seige Personality: Give him Conqueror.
card.flavor: We saw the glint of steel, like teeth, from a long way off.

card.name: Temple to the Elements
card.text:
Temple
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
Open: Choose your performing Monk or Shugenja: Give him Air, Earth, Fire, or Water.
card.flavor: Each time the monk looked at the garden, the pebbles formed a different pattern.

card.name: Hiruma Moritoki
card.text: Crab Clan • Samurai • Scholar • Scout
card.flavor: "Observing the enemy is only half the task of a well-trained scout. The other half is knowing him."

card.name: Hida Osote
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Sensei • Loyal
After Osote enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
After the first time each turn another player's action targets your Crab Clan Personality at Osote's location: The player discards a card after the action ends.
card.flavor: "Practice the basics."

card.name: Hida Bakishi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Friend of Thunder
Reaction: After an action resolves that Bakishi performed and that destroyed a card at the current battlefield: The next time (this turn) another player's action targets Bakishi, negate its effects on him.
card.flavor: All berserkers throw themselves off the cliffs of sanity. Some never climb their way back.

card.name: Kaiu Tojikana
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
Limited: If none of your provinces have been destroyed since your last turn began, or you are a Scorpion Clan player: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: Thanks to the aid of the Kaiu, the castles of the Scorpion were never more resilient, if a little less menacing.

card.name: Kaiu Onizuka
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician • Unique • Topaz Champion
Battle: Ranged Attack with strength equal to the current battlefield's province's strength.
card.flavor: As the Empire continued to rebuild and expand, the value of the Kaiu's insights increased tenfold. Some became more important than the average.

card.name: Yasuki Makoto
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Kolat • Merchant
Your Holdings enter play paying 1 less Gold.
Battle: Even if Makoto is at home, bow her and target an enemy Personality: His controller may pay 4 Gold; if he did, he loses 1 Honor. If he did not, dishonor the target and move him home.
card.flavor: Few know the irony of her name.

card.name: Asahina Konomi
card.text: Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja • Artisan
card.flavor: "The breath of the world is my brush. The smallest hopes can fly when you paint them wings."

card.name: Daidoji Narizane
card.text:
Crane Clan • Imperial • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout • Yojimbo
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow zero or more different cards in his unit up to the number of Recon actions you have taken this turn.
card.flavor: "You only get one try, and one is not enough."

card.name: Daidoji Akeha
card.text:
Crane Clan • Daimyo • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After your Recon action from a Strategy resolves: Draw a card.
Recon Limited: Discard a card: Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique card with a Recon ability, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "Surely Kikaze's daughter will improve the luck of the Crane." - Doji Takara

card.name: Kakita Kae
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Storyteller
After a Battle action targets Kae, you may discard the Imperial Favor: If you did, negate Kae's destruction, bowing, and movement from the action's effects.
Battle: Move Kae home.
card.flavor: Even the Scorpion are wary of her sweet words.

card.name: Kakita Kenta
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate
Iaijutsu Reaction: After an action resolves during which Kenta won a duel, target a dishonorable enemy Personality at the current battlefield: Move him home.
card.flavor: "His technique is overshadowed by the uses he puts it to." - Kakita Gonji

card.name: Kakita Gonji
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Sensei • Loyal
After Gonji enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Before you focus: Once per duel, instead of focusing that time, you may give your Crane Clan Personality in the duel +4 to his duel stat until the turn ends.
card.flavor: "Watch again, and perfect your form."

card.name: Kitsuki Jakuei
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Imperial • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate
Political Reaction: After an action resolves during which Jakuei won a duel: Take the Imperial Favor.
Political Battle: Target an enemy Personality and you may discard the Imperial Favor: Bow the target. Move him home if you discarded the Favor.
card.flavor: "Are you certain this is not a counterfeit?"

card.name: Kitsuki Daisuke - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate • Experienced • Unique
Iaijutsu Reaction: After an action resolves during which Daisuke won a duel: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "I am just as mistaken about the evidence as you are mistaken about fashion trends at Winter Court. Tell me about your meeting with the silk merchant, or name your champion."

card.name: Mirumoto Kouzei
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai
Battle: Target an enemy card with equal or lower Force: Bow it.
card.flavor: "No matter how benign the Naga were once, if they are eager to leap onto my swords, I am happy to oblige them."

card.name: Mirumoto Hikaro
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Sensei • Loyal
After Hikaro enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Before you focus in a duel involving your Dragon Clan Personality: Once per duel, you may focus from your discard pile instead. Remove that card from the game after the duel ends.
card.flavor: Sun and Moon: two swords, two strikes.

card.name: Tamori Seiken
card.text: Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Cavalry • Mountaineer
card.flavor: "Master the earth, and you will have the most faithful of mounts. It does not tire, needs no food or water, and will never flee in fear. What more do I need?"

card.name: Togashi Rikyou
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Water • Monk • Tattooed
Battle: Even if Rikyou is bowed, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move him there. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "On the contrary," he called as he made his leap, "this is exactly what rooftops were made for."

card.name: Akodo Uehara
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Uehara has +1F while he opposes a Phoenix Clan Personality.
Limited: Look at the top card of your Fate deck. You may leave it there, discard it, or put it at the bottom of the deck.
card.flavor: He unfurled the scrolls on the table and frowned. The strategies used by the Unicorn's unknown attackers somehow felt familiar...

card.name: Ikoma Sido
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon
card.flavor: "Some of my brothers have found it difficult to adapt to life in the Colonies. There are treasures to find in these strange lands if one is brave enough to search for them."

card.name: Ikoma Yamahatsu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Imperial • Samurai • Elite • Scout
While you control a Terrain, your Ranged Attacks have +1 strength.
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: His father had the fortune to marry a Seppun wife. He gratefully accepted every opportunity his heritage opened to him and quickly rose in rank.

card.name: Kitsu Miro
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja • Sodan Senzo
Battle: Bow Miro: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality at the current battlefield. Remove him from the game after the battle ends.
card.flavor: "My brother taught me the ways of warfare, and a thousand ancestors bolster my weaknesses."

card.name: Ikoma Shika - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Battle: You may discard a card: Ranged 4 Attack, with +2 strength if you discarded a card; if that card was a Terrain, draw a card.
card.flavor: She was the first to discover the devastated remnants of the Unicorn caravan. Her expert eyes immediately scanned the battlefield for any signs of the departed attackers.

card.name: Akodo Tamisu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Sensei • Tactician • Loyal
After Tamisu enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
After your Tactical, Bushido Virtue, or Terrain action resolves: Give a Lion Clan Personality +1F.
card.flavor: "There is no greater virtue than to teach. There is no greater service to the future."

card.name: Ikoma Hakige
card.text:
Lion Clan • Daimyo • Samurai • Cavalry • Paragon • Loyal • Unique
Battle: Target another Personality: Move him home or give him a Force bonus equal to his Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "He is gruff and unpleasant, and often mistaken for a Matsu. But his skill and his honor are without reproach, and so we forgive him his eccentricities." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Kitsune Haruki
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Haruki enters play: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Deer • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Limited: If another player has higher Family Honor than you: Gain 2 Honor."
card.flavor: "Let others worry about the Empress and her promises."

card.name: Tsuruchi Shichiro
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Sensei • Loyal
After Shichiro enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
After a Ranged Attack action resolves that your Mantis Clan Personality performed: Once per battle, you may move him home.
card.flavor: "He does not rely on just words to inspire." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Moshi Tomiko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval
Battle: Bow Tomiko or one of her Spells: Ranged 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "These lands belong to the Mantis, and the interlopers sent by Iweko are not needed or wanted."

card.name: Tsuruchi Tomaru - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Twice per turn: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "With each mile we find wonders unimagined. The other clans sully this land as they scramble to place their claims. This place is to be unfolded, not torn open through petty squabbles."

card.name: Tsuruchi Shigekazu
card.text: Mantis Clan • Samurai • Scout • Naval
card.flavor: "The Spider were not welcomed openly, but at least they had a purpose. The other clans that are arriving, one by one, serve no purpose other than to take what belongs to us."

card.name: Yoritomo Kanaye
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Brute • Extortionist • Magistrate • Naval
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments, and you may pay Gold equal to its Gold Cost: Bow it. If you paid the Gold, destroy it.
card.flavor: "My loyalty lies with no governor."

card.name: Asako Kikugoro
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Void • Monk • Henshin
