Reaction: After your Ring or Henshin (including Kikugoro) enters play or overlays: Look at the top two cards of your Dynasty deck. You may put one of them at the bottom of the deck.
card.flavor: "Each step along the Path brings more of the world into view."

card.name: Asako Megu
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. You may target and straighten a Personality. If the enemy Personality is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "I am not satisfied with your answers, Matsu-san. Let us begin again."

card.name: Isawa Koiso
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Fire • Shugenja • Loyal • Unique
Limited: Bow Koiso, destroy your Shugenja with the base Fire keyword, discard a card, and target a non-Unique card without attachments in a unit: Destroy it.
Battle: Target a card without attachments in a unit: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Fire speaks to me. What will it say to you?"

card.name: Isawa Mina
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Shugenja
Battle: Target an attachment or token at the current battlefield: Destroy it. If this destroyed a card or token, give Mina two +1F Fire tokens.
card.flavor: "The Second City is the gate to many mysteries. The Lion err in thinking that we should be kept from them. And we do not need them to protect us from any dangers that lurk there."

card.name: Isawa Sanetomo
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Sensei • Loyal
After Sanetomo enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Once per battle, one of your Phoenix Clan Shugenja may perform the Equip Battle action even if bowed and even if unopposed.
card.flavor: "The elements support and nurture us. Why should I worry when they are with me always?"

card.name: Temple Fortress
card.text:
Castle • Temple
After the first time each turn you bow this card: Gain 1 Honor.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "I mourn their deaths, for I know their actions are not their own. They are compelled by a force they cannot resist, but we cannot spare their lives despite the fact." - Yung

card.name: Bayushi Tenzan
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal • Tasu's Sorrow
Battle/Limited: Target a Personality, or one or two Personalities if you control a Courtier: You may target a Shadowlands Personality. Give each target -3F. If this is the Combat Segment, dishonor them.
card.flavor: "Tasu helped stop Shoju when he rose. His grandson Tenzan hopes to do the same with Paneki." - Bayushi Keirei

card.name: Bayushi Nomen - exp2
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Experienced 2
Political Battle: Even if Nomen is not at the current battlefield, bow her and target a Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "It is a proud name, though I cannot exactly claim it is my own. But with it I will defend our clan against all who would harm it."

card.name: Shosuro Ryoichi
card.text: Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate
card.flavor: "With the wealth from the Colonies come those who wish to grow rich off of it. Which is fine, until one seeks to do it at the clan's expense. Then I must intervene and correct the wise or dispose of the foolish. Were you still alive, you could figure out which you were."

card.name: Shosuro Ietsuno
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Assassin
After a card from a deck refills Ietsuno's battlefield's province: Look at it. You may switch it with a card owned by the same player in another province.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: "I am always watching."

card.name: Bayushi Kazutoshi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Sensei • Experienced The Student • Loyal
After Kazutoshi enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Other players' Personalities in and out of play have their Honor Requirements increased by 10.
card.flavor: "I honor my sensei in all ways."

card.name: Soshi Yoshihara - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Air • Courtier • Shugenja • Magistrate • Experienced • Unique • Advisor to the Jade Champion
Political Open: Target a Holding or Personality: Its base abilities may not be used.
Political Open: Bow Yoshihara and target a Personality: Dishonor him. If you are a Scorpion Clan or Crab Clan player, his controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "They make it too easy, but I do not complain."

card.name: Sugihara
card.text:
Spider Clan • Kensai • Monk • Order of the Spider
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. If his Force is now 0, you may take an additional Battle action which Sugihara must perform.
card.flavor: "There is tranquility in the heart of the battlefield, and true knowledge in the arterial spray of my enemy as it splashes upon my mask."

card.name: Daigotsu Kazuko
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror
After Kazuko enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Fear Battle: You may destroy one of Kazuko's Followers: Melee 3 Attack, or Melee 6 Attack if you destroyed a Follower.
card.flavor: "The new governor's orders tie our hands. We are unable to follow the mandate and continue our plans."

card.name: Daigotsu Tenbatsu
card.text:
Spider Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Dark Prophet
Reaction: After engaging at Tenbatsu's battlefield: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. Put them back in any order. You may discard a Dark Virtue; if you did, draw a card.
card.flavor: "There is no point in holding back our potential. Give us freedom to run rampant upon our enemies!"

card.name: Daigotsu Takayasu - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
After Takayasu enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Maho Battle: Melee 6 Attack.
card.flavor: He was once a young man, struggling to utilize his inhuman powers. His mastery is now complete, and he leads the Spider into the face of death without hesitation.

card.name: Goju Gochiso
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Shugenja
After Gochiso enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: He could meld into every shadow with ease, and his powers have only grown stronger of late.

card.name: Shadow Dragon - exp2
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Dragon • Ninja • Shugenja • Cavalry • Conqueror • Experienced 2 • Unique
After Shadow Dragon enters play: Lose 5 Honor.
Shadow Dragon's abilities will not be copied.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Permanently give him Ninja and Shadowlands. Take control of him. Return control of him to his owner after the next time this game this ability is announced.
Open: If Shadow Dragon is dead: Bring it into play, paying all costs.

card.name: Daigotsu Susaiken
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Conqueror • Sensei • Loyal
After Susaiken enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Once per turn, you may refill one of your provinces face-up.
card.flavor: "The other clans embrace the importance of teaching. What they fail to understand is the content of the lessons that must be learned."

card.name: Iuchi Yuri
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Master of the Swift Waves
card.flavor: "We control land access to the Colonies. What do the Mantis control? The seas are too vast for any to claim dominion."

card.name: Moto Isul
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Battle: Even if Isul is at home, target a Personality: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: After the Unicorn caravan from the Colonies was attacked, Naleesh's distrust cast a wide net.

card.name: Moto Rani - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest • Experienced • Unique
Reaction: When paying for a Spell attaching to Rani, remove a dead Personality in your discard pile from the game: Reduce the Spell's Gold Cost by the Personality's Chi.
Battle: Even if Rani is bowed: Straighten her. You may move her home.
card.flavor: "Life is weak."

card.name: Shinjo Sarang
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander
Battle: Choose your performing Personality, and target your Follower at any location: Transfer it to the Personality. Straighten the Follower if the Personality is opposed or Spider Clan.
card.flavor: "Let others distrust the Spider. That will only make their support of the Unicorn all the stronger."

card.name: Shinjo Junpei - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician • Experienced • Unique
Tactical Battle: Even if Junpei is at home, choose your performing unbowed Personality: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "Was it the Ruhmal? Bandits? Maybe, but I cannot rule out any save the Spider. We will uncover this treachery together."

card.name: Shinjo Hayan
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Sensei • Loyal
After Hayan enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
After engaging: Once per turn, you may assign your (unbowed) Unicorn Clan Personality in your home to the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "First observe, and then act. First move, and then strike."

card.name: Utaku Lishan
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
While Lishan is attacking, she has +1F and +1PH.
Reaction: After you announce a Battle action, if Lishan is at the current battlefield, target a Personality or Follower opposing her: Give it a Force penalty equal to Lishan's Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "Rokugan is ignorant of what we have accomplished. They sleep while we serve."

card.name: Itoku - exp
card.text:
Monk • Paragon • Order of Strength • Tactician • Experienced Akodo Itoku • Unique
Itoku has +1F while a Lion Clan player controls him.
Reaction: After an action resolves which bowed your non-Void Ring: Straighten it. You may use each of its abilities an additional time this turn.
card.flavor: The legend of the Seven Sohei from the Destroyer War continues to inspire, even decades later.

card.name: Rokku - exp
card.text:
Monk • Order of Strength • Tactician • Zealot • Experienced Akodo Rokku • Unique
Rokku has +1F while a Lion Clan player controls him.
Reaction: Even if Rokku is bowed, after engaging, if any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Move Rokku there. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: First among the Seven Sohei, his path was ever true.

card.name: Makito - exp
card.text:
Shadowlands • Monk • Bloodspeaker • Order of Death • Student of Kinuye • Experienced Asako Makito • Unique
Makito has +1F while a Phoenix Clan player controls him.
After a card is destroyed: Give Makito +1F.
Maho Battle: Target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Chi: Destroy a card without attachments in his unit; this destruction will not be negated or delayed.

card.name: Rata
card.text:
Cultist • Gaijin
Reaction: After an action resolves that Rata performed and that destroyed a Personality: Rata sacrifices his victim's corpse. Draw a card.
card.flavor: "I know your words of power. Goju, Ninube, Shadow Dragon. They are words, nothing more. I will drink your shadows and spit on your corpses."

card.name: Sakti
card.text:
Berserker • Gaijin
Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Bow it. If it is a Personality, you may move it home.
card.flavor: "Do you think you know the darkness within, Spider? You know nothing. I will show you horrors you cannot imagine."

card.name: Tokiko - exp
card.text:
Void • Monk • Shugenja • Brothers of Rebirth • Experienced Isawa Tokiko • Unique
Tokiko has +1F while a Phoenix Clan player controls her.
Battle/Open: Destroy Tokiko and target your dead Personality: Bring him into play in your home or at the current battlefield, paying all costs but paying 7 less Gold.
card.flavor: "She was our conscience, and my salvation." - Makito

card.name: Gozaru no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
After Gozaru enters play: Lose 5 Honor.
After Gozaru is destroyed: It becomes discarded (not dead).
Battle: Target one or two enemy cards: Bow them. If you only targeted one card, destroy it.
card.flavor: "There is no peace in Jigoku. Many powerful demons refect the very concept." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: The Distant Reaches
card.text:
Forest • Singular
Open: Bow this card and target one or two attachments: Bow them.
card.flavor: The light places had fallen to darkness. The dark places had become something much worse.

card.name: Ashigaru Guards
card.text:
Ashigaru
This card has +1F for every two Farms you control.
card.flavor: "The attacks make the overland route even more perilous. We have increased the guards at the waystations, but that is a temporary solution. We must find and destroy those responsible for these raids." - Shinjo Min-Hee

card.name: Home Guard
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, give your Personality in it +3F.
This card has +3F while defending.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Even an indifferent soldier can become fearsome when he stands with is back towards his home. Never forget this, my father told me." - Kaiu Onizuka

card.name: Field Messenger
card.text:
Cavalry
Battle/Open: Target your Personality: Transfer this card to him.
card.flavor: "The winter is harsh, but no so much as to stop our messengers. We must speak to the Unicorn about these raids." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Flanking Unit
card.text:
Cavalry
As a Focus Effect: You may transfer a Follower from your Personality in this duel to another of your Personalities.
Battle: Target a unit at the current battlefield: Move it home or to an adjacent battlefield.
card.flavor: They can turn a battle's course.

card.name: Murderous Thieves
card.text:
Bandit
Battle: Bow this card: Melee 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "The Second City is safe to all, but the lands around it are dangerous for those who do not understand them. It is foolish of the new governor to permit other clans to intrude in places we have been exploring." - Yoritomo Emoto

card.name: Hiromi's Vassals
card.text:
Thunder
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, you may attach this card to one of your Personalities, ignoring Gold Cost.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "The seas grow strangely hostile, but the Mantis do not flinch." - Moshi Tomeno

card.name: Ninja Guards
card.text:
Ninja
Will only attach to a Ninja.
This card has a Force bonus equal to its Personality's base Force.
card.flavor: "The Crane are growing bold in their quest for power, but we have resources they cannot dream of." - Shosuro Hawado

card.name: Village Raiders
card.text:
Shadowlands
After this card enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
This Personality has Conqueror.
Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "The Ruhmal erred when they did this. Before, we killed for duty. Now it's for vengeance." - Daigotsu Negishi

card.name: Shamsir
card.text:
Weapon
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, you may attach this card to one of your Personalities, ignoring Gold Cost.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -5F.
card.flavor: As the virtues of gaijin weapons became well known, more were willing to cast aside tradition.

card.name: Dazzling Attire
card.text: Political Open: Bow this card: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: Some spend their entire lives avoiding the collective eyes of the court. Meanwhile, the bold are forever seeking its attentions.

card.name: Pillowbook
card.text:
Other players' cards' effects will not discard cards from your hand.
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
Other players' maximum hand sizes are reduced by 1, to a minimum of 7.
card.flavor: "It is impossible to know exactly how popular pillowbooks are throughout the Empire. Most who read them would never confess to it." - Doji Tatsuki

card.name: Armor of the Uruwashii
card.text:
Imperial • Armor
Melee Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -2 strength.
Reaction: Before another player's action resolves: Negate this Personality's movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "One of the Tsi latest creations, its craft is as legendary as its bearer." - Kaiu Tojikana

card.name: Splintered Weapon
card.text:
Weapon
As a Focus Effect: You may transfer an attachment from your Personality in this duel to another of your Personalities.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if this Personality is a Berserker.
card.flavor: Anything one can find can be a weapon...

card.name: Sankaku-Yari
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Melee 4 Attack, or Melee 5 Attack if the target is Cavalry.
card.flavor: "With this in your hands, even the boldest of their mounted warriors will think twice." - Daidoji Tametaka

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Lion - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Shinrai
Will only attach to a Lion Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Lion Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality at the current battlefield.

card.name: The Ancestral Sword of Hantei - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Akkuai-uo
Will only attach to a Spider Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Spider Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Target a card in a unit: You may destroy it if it is bowed or an attachment. Bow it. Straighten this Personality.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Unicorn - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Enginoshi
Will only attach to a Unicorn Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Unicorn Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it. Destroy it if it is not Cavalry and has no attachments.

card.name: The Menacing Sky
card.text:
Thunder
Limited: Bow this Shugenja unless he is Thunder, and target a Personality: After the next time (this turn) he assigns or an action resolves which moved him to a battlefield, bow him.
card.flavor: The skies opened up with furious vengeance, and the defenders wondered if foul play was at work.

card.name: Damning Ceremony
card.text:
Maho
Limited: Once per game: Give this Personality a permanent Force bonus raising his Force to equal his base Gold Cost. Permanently give him Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: There is never a shortage of men willing to trade their souls for power.

card.name: Centering the Soul
card.text:
Void
Reaction: After an action resolves, bow this card and target one of your Rings the action bowed: Straighten the Ring. If this Shugenja is Void, you may destroy this card; if you did, you may use the Ring's base abilities an additional time this turn.
card.flavor: "Listen to the candle's flame as it flickers in the wind."

card.name: Illusory Defense
card.text:
Air • Ritual
Your Air Shugenja have +1C.
Limited: Bow one or more of your performing Shugenja with 10 or greater total Chi, and remove this card from the game: Create a province to the left of your leftmost province which permanently does not hold Dynasty cards.
card.flavor: He wove his magic and felt the land change around him.

card.name: Inescapable Snare
card.text:
Earth
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy card: Bow it. If this Shugenja is Earth, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Struggle more, foolish creature. You only ensure your doom."

card.name: Extending Influence
card.text:
Air
After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Each other player loses 1 Honor.
Open: Destroy this card and target a Personality: The performing Shugenja copies one of the target's abilities which does not copy abilities.
card.flavor: The subtlest effects can have powerful repercussions.

card.name: Mara's Touch
card.text:
Pearl
While this Shugenja is Nonhuman, he has +2F.
Open: Give this Shugenja -2F: He changes shape. Give him Cavalry.
Battle: Give this Shugenja -2F: Ranged 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "I know you must still be alive, grandmother."

card.name: Delving into History
card.text:
Void
Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy this card: Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Spell that must share a keyword with the performer unless he is Void, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: The Asako and Ikoma know the strength of tradition and written history. All answers lie within their ancestors' actions.

card.name: Sudden Guardian
card.text:
Water
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja, choose your performing Spirit, and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If this Shugenja is Water, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Borrow my strength, scion. I shall protect you."

card.name: Ochiai's Bravery
card.text:
Fire
While this Shugenja is Fire, he has Duelist.
Battle: If this Shugenja is unbowed, bow this card and target an enemy Personality: This Shugenja duels him. Destroy a card without attachments in the unit of the duel's loser.
card.flavor: The Inquisitor temple brought forth a host of Phoenix magical might into the Colonies. The Lion fumed at its presence.

card.name: Incite the Phantoms
card.text:
Earth • Forest
While this Shugenja is Earth, your Spirits contribute Force to their army even while bowed.
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow your performing Spirit and target an enemy card: Bow it.
card.flavor: He stopped laughing as the twentieth creature appeared.

card.name: The Swell of Strength
card.text:
Water
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, you may attach this card to one of your Water Shugenja, ignoring Gold Cost.
This Shugenja has +2F.
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Reduce its Force to 0.
card.flavor: "Lend your strength to me, oh water kami."

card.name: The Cycle of Vengeance
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality lost it, give one of your Personalities two +1F Revenge tokens.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "Brother!"

card.name: Killing Intent
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to use the base Force of your Personality in this duel as his duel stat if he is at a battlefield.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. You may move him home.
card.flavor: His enemy's ferocity froze Hiro in place. The truth dawned upon him as he met the Crab's gaze. He would die if he made any movement.

card.name: Secret Reserve
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: Until this duel ends, give +1C to each Weapon attached to your Personality in this duel.
Battle/Open: Target one or more of your Items: Straighten them. You may transfer them to other Personalities you control.
card.flavor: The Yasuki merchants always seem to have the item you need before you realize you need it.

card.name: Astonishing Accusation
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After another player's Political action targets your Personality: Negate its effects.
Limited: Target a Kolat, Ninja, Shadowlands, or dishonorable Personality: His controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "You are mixed up in something horrible, I know it!"

card.name: The Host's Advantage
card.text:
Political • Winter
Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor and target an attachment: Destroy it.
Battle: Choose your performing Courtier at any location, bow him or discard the Imperial Favor, and target an enemy Personality: Bow him. His controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Unfortunately, my friends, there are liars standing among us."

card.name: Greasing the Wheels
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, lower the Gold Cost of its winner to 0.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier or Magistrate and target a Personality: You may pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost minus 6. If you did, move him home. Otherwise, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "Everyone has a price. The trouble lies only in finding it."

card.name: Inciting Mistrust
card.text:
Ninja
Reaction: After another player's Melee or Ranged Attack targets your Ninja: Show the card in the current battlefield's province. If it is a Personality, negate the Melee or Ranged Attack's effects.
Battle: Discard a card in the current battlefield's province: Draw a card.

card.name: Indecision
card.text:
Reaction: After an action resolves, if its player has resolved two or more actions which put cards into his hand this phase: He discards two cards.
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him there. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "Why do you hesitate? It is a simple matter, boy. Denounce our Yoritomo host for his smuggling ties, and everything will fall into place."

card.name: Deadly Discipline
card.text:
Fire • Kiho
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: Give him two +1F Fire tokens.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if your Monk has any Fire tokens.
card.flavor: It purifies, it strengthens, it destroys.

card.name: Deep Snows
card.text:
Winter • Terrain
After an action resolves: Bow any Personalities it moved. (Reactions trigger after traits.)
Reaction: After a Battle action resolves, if there are no Terrains in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "The raiders are not troubled by winter, so we must not be." - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Preserving Forces
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: Before your Personality in this duel is destroyed for losing it, you may destroy one of his Followers; if you did, negate his destruction.
Open: Target one or two Followers in your discard pile: Put them into your hand.
card.flavor: "I will say this for the Scorpion," Hida Horu said, "they know how to hold on in a fight. Almost like fighting alongside a Crab."

card.name: Moving and Unmoving
card.text:
Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield, choose your performing Kensai: Move him there. Straighten his unit if he moved.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Kensai and target an enemy Personality with lower Force: Move him home.
card.flavor: "When you have the sword in your heart, all manner of marvels will bloom." - Mirumoto Reiyu

card.name: Power of Strength
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality with 7 or higher base Force and target two enemy Personalities, each with unit Gold Cost lower than your performer's Gold Cost: Bow one of them. Ranged Attack with strength equal to the first target's Force, which may only target the other Personality (if legal).
card.flavor: "Strength is not just brute force, but the ability to apply it properly. Never forget this, or your enemies will teach it to you." - Hida Osote

card.name: Games of Will
card.text:
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card with lower Gold Cost: Bow it.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Negate all current and new Force penalties to him from actions. Negate all current and new effects from other players' cards that prevent him from contributing Force to his army.
card.flavor: "Ah, politics." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Pronouncement of Guilt
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit unless he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "Bring the guilty party. I would have him made an example to all." - Moto Rani

card.name: Exploited Advantage
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he moved, bow him and negate his (future) movement. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "What is the point of being better if you do not exploit it?" - Daigotsu Gyoken

card.name: Honest Assessment
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Honesty
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and target an enemy Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor: Bow him. Gain 1 Honor, or 3 Honor if your Family Honor is 9 or less.
card.flavor: There are moments when honesty is more appreciated than it would be otherwise.

card.name: Preceding Reputation
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality with fewer keywords, ignoring "Soul of" keywords: Bow all cards without attachments in his unit.
card.flavor: "Back! Back! Out of the way! Heimin fools, don't you know who I am!?"

card.name: Thick Marsh
card.text:
Swamp • Terrain
After this card enters play: Choose and bow an enemy card at the current battlefield.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: The commander's secret weapon. The commander's tactical nightmare.

card.name: Phantom Visage
card.text:
Fear • Ninja
Battle/Open: Bow your performing Ninja Personality and target a Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: Only a select few ever obtain the privlege to glimpse a Goju's true face.

card.name: Scouting the Pass
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, if you are the Attacker, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Choose and look at two cards in the Defender's hand. You have the first chance to take a Battle action in this battle, which must be performed by that Scout.
card.flavor: All clans condone the use of scouts, for the information they gather paves the path to victory.

card.name: Help from the Shadows
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing Personality in a Ninja unit: Move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "There is no such thing as a lone assassin." - Little Truths

card.name: Request Authorization
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target a Personality: Move him home.
Reaction: Before another player's Battle action resolves, target a Personality: Negate his movement to the current battlefield from the action's effects.

card.name: Perfect Sacrifice
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Perfection
Battle/Limited: Choose your performing Samurai: Give each Personality and Follower in his unit a Force bonus equal to its current Force. Before this turn ends, destroy his unit.
card.flavor: "Katsutoshi-sensei would have known how to deal with these beasts, and so do I!"

card.name: Pillar Tattoo
card.text:
Earth • Tattoo
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Monk: Give him +3F. If he is Earth, you may target and bow an enemy card without attachments.
card.flavor:
The budoka watched the Dragon monk feel the power of his kami's blood. "Is he strong?"
The poet smiled. "Listen..."

card.name: A Weak Poison
card.text:
Kolat
Open: Target a Personality: Reduce his Force to 0. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "If I wished him dead, he would be dead. I only wish him to be indisposed." - Yasuki Makoto

card.name: Sheathing the Sword
card.text:
Political
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier at any location and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: One samurai could defeat a hundred ashigaru, but one Imperial decree could silence ten thousand samurai.

card.name: Seeking the Question
card.text:
Void • Kata
Limited: If this card is in play: Look at the top card of any deck. You may put it at the bottom of that deck.
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata (in play).
card.flavor: "I can give you the answer, but it will not help." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Precision
card.text:
Reaction: After a Melee or Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it +2 or -2 strength.
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "The dead serve no one. The injured serve their enemy." - Ikoma Shika

card.name: Reckless Duel
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality: Your Personality duels the target. Bow the duel's loser. Move him home.
card.flavor: The Dragon would not rest until the Dark Naga revealed their secrets.

card.name: Riddle of Rebirth
card.text:
Void • Kiho • Riddle • Unique
Limited: Bow your performing Henshin, remove this card from the game, and target a Personality that shares a keyword with your Henshin: Put all cards in the target's unit at the bottom of his owner's appropriate decks in any order.
card.flavor: "Who have I been? Who shall I yet be? The very question thrills the soul!"

card.name: Ride the Breeze
card.text:
Air • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he moved and your Monk is Air, negate the Personality's (future) movement.
card.flavor: "Surrender yourself to the winds, my friend! I assure you, the experience is highly enlightening!"

card.name: Unsafe Passage
card.text:
Reaction: After an action targets your Commander: Negate his movement from its effects.
Battle: Target your Follower: You may take an additional action to use one of its base abilities, even if it is bowed or has already used the ability its maximum number of times this turn.
card.flavor: "Fall back!" the Moto shouted. "Tell the wagons to travel the secondary route! We will hold these gaijin devils!"

card.name: Broken Cipher
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may transfer a Spell from your Personality in this duel to another of your Shugenja at the same location.
Battle: If you have not put cards into your hand this phase and you have attached a Spell this turn: Draw two cards.
card.flavor: The ciphers used by shugenja families to protect their secrets are closely guarded. Those who betray the secrets are often short-lived.

card.name: Searching for Answers
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, gain 1 Honor.
Battle: If you are the Defender: Look at the top four cards of your Dynasty deck. If one of them is a Personality, you may put him into play at the current battlefield, ignoring Gold Cost. Put the remaining cards back in any order. Discard him after the battle ends.
card.flavor: "Tell me what you know. Now."

card.name: Stuck in Rokugan
card.text:
Winter
Open: Target a Holding. Straighten it.
Limited: Target a Celestial: Discard it.
card.flavor: There are few in the Empire who wish to travel to the Colonies, but during the long winter months, that number can temporarily grow quite high indeed.

card.name: Stand as the Mountain
card.text: Battle: Choose one or two of your performing Personalities with 7 or higher base Force: Straighten them.
card.flavor: "These paltry things?" Osote roared with laughter. "These are nothing. A moment's diversion before the day's true work begins. Enjoy!"

card.name: Surrounded!
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing unbowed Scout at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Ranged Attacks from your card effects during this battle have +2 strength.
card.flavor: "End their suffering. They do not deserve this terrible fate."

card.name: Tactical Trap
card.text:
Tactical
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician at any location and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. Bow him if he moved.
card.flavor: Never count on overwhelming odds.

card.name: The Bite of Winter
card.text:
Winter
Personalities and Followers have -1F. All players have the ability, "Open: Bow your Stronghold: Discard a card titled The Bite of Winter from play."
Limited: Put this card into play.
card.flavor: "Even my sword feels the cold," she complained.

card.name: The Heir's Wrath
card.text:
Imperial • Political • Unique
Limited: Target another player's Personality, pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost, and discard the Imperial Favor or bow a Personality with five or more Force: Lose 2 Honor and destroy the target; these effects will not be negated.
card.flavor: The condemned man's protests faded all too quickly.

card.name: Too Much for Mortals
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Spirit and target an enemy Personality: Bow him or destroy one of his attachments.
card.flavor: For the first time, he saw clearly how little he had lived up to his ancestor's valor.

card.name: Two Fronts
card.text: Limited: Target a province whose player has two or more provinces: During your next normal Attack Phase (this turn), create two battlefields associated with it instead of one.
card.flavor: "There is always a way to surround them," he said with a ferocious grin.

card.name: Unstoppable Strike
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Give him the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Destroy him."
card.flavor: He was still expounding on the virtues of different alloys long after the corpse had stopped moving.

card.name: Inexorable
card.text: Reaction: After another player announces a Reaction during the Combat Segment: Its effects will not negate other effects.
card.flavor: The only thing more terrifying than one thousand horsemen charging is two thousand horsemen charging.

card.name: The Snow Has Teeth
card.text:
Winter
Reaction: After engaging: The current battlefield's province has a maximum strength equal to its base strength until the end of the battle. Negate the next effect that would move one of your Personalities from its battlefield. After the next time this battle a Terrain enters play, destroy it.
card.flavor: Winter is a cruel ally.

card.name: Yojimbo Assemble
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Yojimbo, and target an enemy card with Force lower than your Yojimbo's Force plus the highest Chi among all Shugenja and Courtiers you control: Bow the target. Destroy it if it has no attachments.
card.flavor: Swords are not the only threats.

card.name: You Are Unworthy
card.text: Open: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an attachment with Force equal to or lower than your Paragon's Personal Honor: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "Not only does that sword have a better lineage than you do, even the tea we drank this morning has a better lineage than you do. Do not disgrace either again."

card.name: The Plain of Glass
card.text:
You do not lose Honor from Spider Clan and Fate cards you own.
You may use the rulebook Conquest ability twice per turn during the same battle.
Equipping Followers is a Battle/Limited ability for you.
card.flavor: Far to the west, on the desolate plains plagued by storms, the Spider held dominion of the ruined lands.

card.name: The Marshalling Fields
card.text:
After you announce a Terrain action: Once per battle, you may ignore any of its restrictions that are based on another Terrain being in play.
After the first time each turn one of your Terrain actions resolves: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Here we enact the largest-scale maneuvers learned from the gaijin book. For such to be needed, we would be indeed threatened." - Ikoma Shika

card.name: The Ki-Rin's Path
card.text: Your Tacticians have the ability, "Tactical Open: Give this Personality +1F and Cavalry."
card.flavor: "The sea routes of the Mantis took less time, but the distance between the Colonies' ports and the Second City made the overland route more practical. Thus the Unicorn maintained their prestige in the Colonies." - The Ikoma Records

card.name: Hofukushu's Vengeance
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Reaction: After the end of an Attack Phase in which you were the Defender, discard this card: Declare an additional Attack Phase against that phase's Attacker, in which you may only assign one Personality.
card.flavor: It is not wise to take the curse of a Fortune lightly.

card.name: Ritual of Sacrifice
card.text:
Ritual • Unique
The cultists of Ruhmal are restless. Until your next turn begins, after each time a card effect destroys a Personality, the player who last controlled him discards a card.
card.flavor: "The Goddess was destroyed, but she can be reborn! This is the way of the divine! Through death there is life!"

card.name: Gakku - exp
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Goblin • Scout • Experienced • Unique • Devourer of Gods
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Spider Clan player.
After Gakku enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Battle: Melee 7 Attack.
card.flavor: "I do not know what it is, only that I never knew fear before I heard its terrible scream."

card.name: Ritual Dagger
card.text:
Gaijin • Weapon
After this card enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Destroy this card: Melee Attack with strength equal to this Personality's Force before you destroyed this card.
card.flavor: "Foul deeds have awakened this blade's spirit, and what a terrible spirit it is. It calls out for sacrifice."

card.name: The New Foundries
card.text:
Limited: Put a Spell from your hand face-up underneath this card.
Battle: Any number of times per turn, discard a Spell from under this card: Either straighten one to three Shugenja at the current battlefield if the Spell is Air or Water, or Ranged 4 Attack if it is Earth of Fire, or draw a card if it is Void.
card.flavor: "As in the Empire, so in the Colonies." - Agasho Kurou

card.name: The Moon's Imperative
card.text:
Obsidian • Unique
Open: Target a non-Unique Holding: It produces 1 less Gold when it bows to produce Gold.
Open: Remove this card from the game and target one to three face-up Personalities in provinces: Discard them, refilling the provinces face-up.
card.flavor: "Weakness is to be overcome." - The Voice of the Obsidian Moon

card.name: The Sun's Aspiration
card.text:
Jade • Unique
Open: Target a non-Unique Holding: It produces 1 more Gold when it bows to produce Gold.
Open: Remove this card from the game and target one to three cards in your discard piles: Shuffle them into their appropriate decks.
card.flavor: "Virtue is to be nurtured." - The Voice of the Jade Sun

card.name: Distant Expansion
card.text:
Unique
Until your third turn from now ends, you have the trait, "In your Dynasty Phase, one time for each of your provinces destroyed this game, you may refill one of your provinces face-up."
card.flavor: As the colonies spread, events unfolding at the heart of the Empire seemed to matter less and less.

card.name: On
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, at the end of each phase, lower each player's Honor to what it was at the start of that phase plus 3 plus any Honor he gained from battle resolution that phase; this Honor loss will not be negated, substituted or reduced.
card.flavor: On is the face one presents to all others in Rokugan. To allow this to slip, to show emotion or otherwise act inappropriately, is a great dishonor.

card.name: Star-Crossed Lovers
card.text:
Political • Unique
Choose two Personalities controlled by the same player. Until the game ends, they may not be assigned, and will not move, to each other's battlefields.
card.flavor: She thought their happiness would bring two clans together. Instead, his pride tore them apart.

card.name: Discovering the Temple
card.text:
Unique
Search your Fate deck or discard pile for a card titled Blood of the Preserver, show it, and put it into your hand.
card.flavor: In the jungle depths, the Spider uncovered the Temple of Ruhmal. In the jungle depths, it was waiting for them.

card.name: Wartime Preparations
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, before the second or later time each turn another player's card's effect bows any of your Personalities during the Action Phase, negate that effect, and before the second or later time each turn another player's card's effect prevents any of your Personalities from assigning, negate that effect.
card.flavor: Even in times of peace, a samurai's duty is to prepare for war.

card.name: Humble Farm
card.text:
Farm
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle/Open: Destroy this card and target your Personality: Create a 2F Ashigaru Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "Even farmers can be used in many ways." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Versatile Farm
card.text:
Farm
Limited: Destroy this card: Search your Dynasty deck for a non-Unique Farm Holding with another title and put it into play, unbowed, paying 2 less Gold.
card.flavor: When the samurai ordered her to plant a new variety of rice, the farmer kept her thoughts to herself.

card.name: Fortress of Lidless Eyes
card.text:
Kolat • Unique
This card's base ability will not be copied. All players have the ability, "Open: Pay 6 Gold: Destroy a card titled Fortress of Lidless Eyes."
Open: Once per game, target a Personality: Bow him. Negate his straightening while this card remains in play.
card.flavor: It is better not to know.

card.name: Sheltered Port
card.text:
Port
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, plus 1 Gold for each other Holding you control that is a Market or Port.
card.flavor: Blue skies, fair winds, and limitless wealth: the best weather of all.

card.name: Platinum Mine
card.text:
Mine
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold, or 6 Gold if paying for an attachment.
card.flavor: The metal shone out of the depths like a promise.

card.name: Whispering Archive
card.text: Your Spells enter play paying 1 less Gold.
card.flavor: If you listened closely, you could almost hear the scrolls murmuring to each other of past wars and future wonders.

card.name: Small-Time Bully
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
After this card enters play, if you control a Courtier or Magistrate: You may dishonor a Personality (in play).
card.flavor: "Just two more koku," he said in a wheedling voice, "and the deed is done."

card.name: Chiisai
card.text:
Crab Clan • Nonhuman • Elephant
Will not attach Items. May not perform Iaijutsu or Political actions. Melee Attacks may not target Chiisai's Followers.
Fear Battle: Target an enemy Personality with 5 or lower Force: Chiisai charges him. Move him home.
card.flavor: Once it was determined that the beasts were not Oni, the Crab again proved their ingenuity.

card.name: Hida Bakari
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker
Bakari has -4F while he is unopposed.
card.flavor: "I once heard a monk say, 'If you do only one thing, and you excel at that one thing, then in all that you do, you will excel.' Who am I to argue with such wisdom?"

card.name: Hiruma Nikaru - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Experienced • Unique
Nikaru uses his Force as his duel stat in duels from other player's cards.
Battle: Negate the effects of the next Battle action this battle another player takes which targets Nikaru.
card.flavor: As the search for Fubatsu continued, many searchers began to lose their patience.

card.name: Hiruma Hikazu
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle resolution will not bow Personalities with unbowed Followers in Hikazu's army. (Their Followers still bow.)
card.flavor: "Shadowlands or the Ivory Kingdoms. It matters not which jungle."

card.name: Kaiu Fumiko
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
Reaction: After your Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it +2 strength. Gain 1 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card with Force lower than this battlefield's province's strength: Bow it. Give the current battlefield's province +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: "... these are conflicting orders..."

card.name: Kuni Renyu
card.text:
Crab Clan • Daimyo • Earth • Jade • Shugenja • Witch Hunter • Loyal • Unique
After an action targets Renyu: Reduce any Honor losses from its effects to 0.
Battle: Target an enemy unit: Its controller may choose to bow it and destroy all Shadowlands cards in it. If he did not choose this, create a province with a base strength of 4 to the left of your leftmost province.

card.name: Yasuki Ikke
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Tax Collector
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets one of your Merchants, pay 2 Gold: Either negate its effects on him or make the player lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Even if Ikke is not at the current battlefield, target your Merchant: Move him home.

card.name: Kazehime
card.text:
Crane Clan • Nonhuman • Kodama • Air • Shugenja • Spirit
Your maximum hand size is increased by one.
card.flavor: "Her laughter drives away sorrow and fosters strength. Her presence is proof that the Heavens approve our path." - Asahina Keigo

card.name: Asahina Keigo - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja • Experienced • Unique
Limited: Bow your target Temple: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Really, the matter is simple. We cannot judge if Fudo's writings are blasphemous without first understanding them, and for that we must study them deeply."

card.name: Daidoji Sosuke
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Merchant
Political Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target a Personality: Sosuke raises tariffs. Bow a card without attachments in the target's unit, or bow his unit if he is Mantis Clan.
card.flavor: "This discussion is over. Until you have paid, you will not unload. I am not interested in your protests."

card.name: Daidoji Tsunehiko
card.text: Crane Clan • Samurai • Iron Crane • Scout
card.flavor: "The Mantis boast of their mastery of the sea, but who builds a house on top of a wave? It is control of land that matters. Let them come ashore and we will show them mastery."

card.name: Kakita Saki
card.text:
Crane Clan • Artisan
Limited: Target your Personality: Create a +2F Armor Item with the trait, "Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting this Personality have -3 strength" and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "I could watch him work for hours. Metal shapes itself as meekly as paper under his hands." - Kakita Ichigiku

card.name: Kakita Ichigiku
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate
After Ichigiku challenges a dishonorable Personality during a Combat Segment: The challenge will not be refused; destroy that duel's loser in addition to other consequences of losing.
card.flavor: "Clearly you are guilty of something."

card.name: Kakita Tadanobu - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Iaijutsu Battle/Limited: Target another player's Personality: Tadanobu duels him. If it is your turn, the winner's controller draws a card. Bow the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "My blade is at your service, Lord Kakita. Name the man and I shall deal with him."

card.name: Shugorei
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Nonhuman • Golem • Earth • Shugenja • Protector • Spirit
Shugorei has -2F while it is your turn.
Limited: If you are a Dragon Clan player and none of your provinces have been destroyed since your last turn ended: Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Compared to other kami of the earth, these are highly energetic." - Tamori Shimura

card.name: Kitsuki Yoyugi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate
Political Open: Target a Personality and bow Yoyugi unless the target is non-Unique or Unicorn Clan: The target's base abilities may not be used.
card.flavor: "Call all the testimony you desire. They are still at fault."

card.name: Mirumoto Mitoshi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai
Battle: Target a Personality with lower Force: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: "I know I shall prevail. Do you?"

card.name: Mirumoto Rokai
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo
Reaction: After another player's action targets your Personality at Rokai's location, destroy Rokai: Negate your Personality's destruction from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "He is quiet and stolid, like the mountians we call home. He can be depended on, regardless of the task." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: Togashi Korimi - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Monk • Tattooed • Experienced • Unique
While Korimi is defending, negate her bowing from other player's actions.
Battle: Target an enemy card without unbowed attachments: Bow the target. You may discard a Kiho or Tattoo Strategy; if you did, destroy the target.
card.flavor: "The lessons of earth are rarely subtle in nature."

card.name: Togashi Kasuru
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Void • Monk • Tactician • Tattooed
Battle: If Kasuru is attacking, bow him or discard a card: Draw a card.
card.flavor: It is never wise to lightly ask an ise zumi to accomplish a task regardless of consequences.

card.name: Akodo Furu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Battle: Target a Personality with equal or lower Chi: Bow or straighten him.
card.flavor: A common strategy against the Lion is to strike directly at the army's command, to deprive the army of its general. Scholars often argue about whether or not this strategy is wise or foolish.

card.name: Ikoma Shuji
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
Battle: Ranged 4 Attack, with +1 strength if it targeted a Spider Clan Personality. You may discard a Terrain from your hand or destroy a Terrain in play; If you did either, draw a card.
card.flavor: "I do not trust them. The Spider are simply biding their time. And so, I bide mine."

card.name: Kitsu Sorano - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja • Experienced • Unique
Reaction: After Sorano enters play or overlays: Create two 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personalities.
card.flavor: "'Just a lone woman,' you say?"

card.name: Kitsu Kanae
card.text: Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry
card.flavor: "We speak not only with the spirits of the dead, but with the spirits of the living as well. Even this, however, is not quite as challenging as simply listening."

card.name: Matsu Rika
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Lion's Pride • Paragon
After your Bushido Virtue action resolves, three times per turn: Give Rika +1F.
card.flavor: In over a thousand years, the purpose of the Lion's Pride remains the same: find the leader of the threat to the Lion and destroy it.

card.name: Zlkyt
card.text:
Lion Clan • Nonhuman • Zokujin • Earth
Reaction: When paying a Gold cost, destroy your target Mine or Farm: Produce Gold equal to its base Gold Cost.
card.flavor: By placing Zokujin bosses in charge of their Zokujin miners, the Lion hoped to avoid the riots that had plagued them in the past.

card.name: Kitsune Kichi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Kitsune • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Kichi enters play: Create a 3F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Badger • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force to 0."
card.flavor: "The Empire is outraged at the Naga's violence. Many innocent creatures will suffer if they are not stopped."

card.name: Moshi Rukia
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval
Battle: Target an opposed attachment: Put it into its owner's hand. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "I stand in the face of the storm's greatest fury without fear or hesitation, and I am supposed to suffer insult from a Crane? Never!"

card.name: Tsuruchi Kosoko - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Ranged 6 Attack that may target a Personality with Followers.
card.flavor: "If you think the Colonies are where I can benefit the clan, my lord, then of course I will go at your discretion. If conflict with the Crane is inevitable, then I shall teach them to regret antagonzing the sons and daughters of the Wasp."

card.name: Yoritomo Kanahashi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Naval
Other player's Personalities and attachments (in play) have -2 Gold Cost.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he is Crane Clan, bow him.
card.flavor: "The other clans may think whatever they like. The Colonies are Mantis lands, and always will be."

card.name: Yoritomo Ebumi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Naval • Scout
Battle: One Ranged Attack from your next Ranged Attack action this battle may target a Personality with attached Followers. If you have Reconnaissance, you may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "I have lived my life in the jungles. I know no other world. The city, to me, is misery incarnate."

card.name: Yoritomo Tsang
card.text: Mantis Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Naval • Tactician
card.flavor:
"I think I have suffered enough of your honeyed garbage," the captian snarled. "I demand satisfaction!"
The Crane smiled. "Do you have a champion?"
Tsang stepped forward at once. "I will stand against the Crane, captain."

card.name: Agasha Kurou
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Daimyo • Earth • Void • Shugenja • Alchemist • Loyal • Unique
Battle/Open: Target a non-Unique Spell in your discard pile or under your Stronghold: Attach it to Kurou, paying all costs. You may take an additional action to use an ability on the Spell. Remove it from the game before the turn ends.
card.flavor: "The earth loves punctuation."

card.name: Asako Jirou
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate
Open: Target a Personality: If he is Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, his base abilities may not be used. Give him Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands.
card.flavor: "An accusation is a terrible thing to waste."

card.name: Asako Hayate
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Water • Monk • Henshin
Open: Give Hayate Cavalry, Naval, or Tactician.
card.flavor: From piercing ice to summer storm, water can adapt itself to any circumstance. So too did the Phoenix adapt, changing to suit the needs of the efforts in the Colonies.

card.name: Isawa Hinata
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Fire • Shugenja
card.flavor: "The exploration continues, my lord," she reported. "We have discovered amazing secrets, but the dangers are significant. We have lost a great many men and brilliant minds. We must have assistance, if we are to continue."

card.name: Shiba Shirou
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
Shirou has +2F while you control a Shugenja.
Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: Shirou's charge was always getting herself into the kind of difficulty that needed answering with a blade. That was part of her charm.

card.name: Shiba Kudome - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo • Experienced • Loyal • Unique • Legion of Flame
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Kudome duels him. Destroy the duel's loser. Give Kudome a +1F Fire token if she won and you control a Shugenja.
card.flavor: "There are always those who feel they must stand in the way of our wisdom. I would have it no other way."

card.name: Bayushi Tarou
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Enters play paying 2 less Gold if you control a Courtier.
card.flavor: "Next time, you talk less and I stab more," he admonished the startled courtier.

card.name: Bayushi Waru - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If you control a Courtier, negate the effects of the next action the target performs (this turn).
card.flavor: "It is no simple matter to cultivate such a glare, one that melts iron will like ice."

card.name: Shosuro Ryoken
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Magistrate
Political Reaction: After Ryoken enters play, target a Personality: Dishonor him.
Political Reaction: After a battle resolves, if Ryoken was at its battlefield during its resolution in which you destroyed a province or army: The enemy leader loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Fire is so pleasant. So cleansing."

card.name: Shosuro Keirei - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Acrobat • Experienced Bayushi Keirei • Unique
Battle: Move Keirei from the current battlefield to a different battlefield. You may target and give a Personality at Keirei's new or previous location two -1F/-1C Poison tokens.
card.flavor: The man they call Shosuro's Hand is as skilled as he is mysterious, as aged as he is deadly.

card.name: Shosuro Nobu
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: "In point of fact," he said, "that was my second-best technique. This is my strongest form."

card.name: Bayushi Misaki
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Nonhuman • Tamamo-no-Mae • Courtier
Open: If it is another player's turn, target one of his Personalities: Before this phase ends, straighten him. Before this turn ends, if the Personality was not assigned to attack this turn, dishonor him and his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "She favors red." - Soshi Yorimi

card.name: Daigotsu Arakan
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Commander • Conqueror
After Arakan enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. Bow it if its Force is now 0 or it is Lion Clan.
card.flavor: "The Lion consider themselves our superiors. They will learn that none can stand above the Spider. None."

card.name: Daigotsu Rafu
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Paragon • Dark Dementia
After Rafu enters play: Lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: "I see... ravens... falling from the sky with red eyes. Red with fire. Burning land and stone death. Broken bones. Rivers running, full of death. The moon."

card.name: Goju Bunoro
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Displacer
After Bunoro enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Target a non-Unique enemy Personality: Turn all cards in his controller's provinces face-up. You may overlay a face-up Personality in one of the provinces on the target, refilling the province with the target.
card.flavor: "The Scorpion control the shadows. We control the darkness."

card.name: Kenta
card.text: Spider Clan • Monk • Conqueror • Kensai • Order of the Spider
card.flavor: "We do not care if the land we conquer is claimed by the Empress. We can take the land at will. If she claims it and we decide it should not belong to her any longer, then it will not."

card.name: M'rika
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Bog Hag • Shugenja • Artisan • Loyal
You may ignore M'rika's Loyal restriction if your Stronghold is The Forgotten Temple.
After M'rika enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "At times, a matronly stateswoman of the Otomo family. At others, the radiant beauty of her younger days. What a mercurial woman." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Yamazaki - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider • Experienced • Unique
Once per phase, before you lose exactly 1 Honor: Negate the loss.
Fear Battle: Target another Personality: Yamazaki threatens him. Straighten him. If Yamazaki has a Weapon, you may target and bow an enemy card.
card.flavor: "I am a monster killer. Most of them look like men."

card.name: Quelsa
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Pearl • Shugenja • Jakla
Quelsa has +2F while he has a Spell.
Quelsa attaches Spells paying 2 less Gold.
card.flavor: Some remembered the last orders of their dark leader. Only death would stop them - theirs or their enemies'.

card.name: Niiro no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
After Niiro enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Will not attach cards.
Battle: Melee 5 Attack. Give the target a -5F token (if he is still in play).
card.flavor: "The Spider forget themselves. I will remind them." - Chuda Niiro

card.name: Chuda Hitaka - exp
card.text:
Shadowlands • Shugenja • Corrupter • Experienced Hitaka • Unique
After Hitaka enters play: Lose 4 Honor.
Limited: Target a non-Stronghold Jade card: Destroy it.
Limited: Destroy Hitaka and target an Oni in your discard pile: Bring it into play, paying 9 less Gold.
card.flavor: "Were you fools enough to think me dead?"

card.name: Sanzoko
card.text: Ronin • Samurai • Cavalry
card.flavor: "I have been called a thief. I have been called insolent, I have been called reckless and headstrong. Call me what you will, but I call myself a child of the sun."

card.name: Shinjo Jong-Ho
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Tactician
Reaction: After a Tactical action Jong-Ho performed resolves, target a card opposing him with lower Force: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Every battle is a puzzle to be solved before any blood is spilt."

card.name: Longtooth - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Nonhuman • Dog • Cavalry • Experienced Unicorn War Dogs • Unique
Will not attach cards.
Battle: Target an enemy Follower or Personality without Followers: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "In a pack of devoted war dogs, he is without question the alpha. Loyal, fearsome, and powerful, he is what all our beasts should be." - Moto Taha

card.name: Moto Morio
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander
Battle: Choose your performing Follower: Melee Attack with strength equal to its Force.
card.flavor: The strength of the Khol lies in their organized movements and deadly efficiency, more than raw strength.

card.name: Shinjo Min-Hee
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Tactician • Loyal • Unique • The Khan
Limited: Target a Follower in your discard pile: Put it into your hand.
Tactical Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it. Remove it from the game if it is Dragon Clan. You may discard a Follower (from your hand); if you did, draw a card.
card.flavor: "She leads the clan. I protect it."

card.name: Iuchi Haruma
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Death Priest
Battle: Bow one of Haruma's Spells: Give him +2F. Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: The kami speak to him with discordant tongues. Rather than shy away from the danger of corruption, he embraces the chance for power.

card.name: Utaku Sung-Ki
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
card.flavor: "My wonderful Usa has been my steed and companion ever since my gempukku. I do not know if I have the strength to face the perils of the battlefield without him."

card.name: Natural Aviary
card.text:
Forest
Limited: Pay 2 Gold and target your Personality: Create a 1F Nonhuman • Falcon • Cavalry Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: "Magnificent, are they not? I would not see their home despoiled by conflict." - Kitsune Kichi

card.name: Fallow Lands
card.text:
This province has +2 strength.
Reaction: After a Melee or Ranged Attack is targeted: Give it -2 strength.
card.flavor: "The kami here are strong. I do not know what caused the devastation, but I believe the land can be renewed." - Agasha Kurou

card.name: Elephant Caravan
card.text:
Nonhuman • Elephant • Cavalry
Fear Battle: Target an enemy card with equal or lower Force: If it is bowed or an attachment, destroy it. Bow it.
card.flavor: "Do I worry about bandits? Are you joking? I worry more about flies giving the elephants some new sickness than I worry about bandits." - Ide Aritsao

card.name: Wasteland Scout
card.text:
Cavalry • Scout
Recon Reaction: After engaging at this card's battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. Give your other Followers there +1F.
card.flavor: "I have seen Lion hunting parties, my lord. I do not know what they seek, but their movements bespeak a great urgency."

card.name: Heavy Chargers
card.text:
Cavalry
Battle: If this card is opposed, discard a card: Give this card +3F.
card.flavor: "The purpose of ashigaru is not necessarily to earn victory. To simply delay an enemy's cavalry, and immobilize them for archers, can be a victory in itself." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Nikutai
card.text:
Nikutai
Reaction: Even if this card is bowed, after a Follower in this unit bows: Straighten it.
Battle: Melee 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "The rank of nikutai shall be first among a gunso's men, to lead when the gunso can not. It is a sacred trust." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Shieldman
card.text:
This Personality may not be assigned to, and will not move into, an attacking army.
Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -3 strength.
Reaction: After another player's action resolves which destroyed a card in this unit: Gain 2 Honor.

card.name: Lookout
card.text:
Ninja
Will only attach to a Ninja.
Reaction: After you announce a Ranged Attack action, destroy this card: One Ranged Attack from that action may target a card in the Defender's home.
card.flavor: "That one," she whispered.

card.name: Vanquisher's Armor
card.text:
Armor
Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting this Personality have -5 strength.
card.flavor: The plates are heavy but sturdy. The armor is decorative, but designed to intimindate. It has become increasingly popular in the Colonies.

card.name: Vanquisher's Blades
card.text:
Weapon
Reaction: After this card enters play: Create a +2F/+1C Weapon Item and attach it to this Personality (if legal).
card.flavor: They are designed for only one purpose: death. They serve their purpose well.

card.name: The Victor
card.text:
Armor
This Personality has Conqueror.
card.flavor: The armor is designed for fashion more than function, but the famous armorer Kaiu Janasu has crafted it for many generals.

card.name: The String of the Colonies
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "I don't understand. How can this strange bow be stronger than my dai-kyu?" - Tsuruchi Nobukatsu

card.name: Blood of the Preserver
card.text:
Unique
Battle: Remove this card from the game: Each player chooses zero to two Personalities at the current battlefield. Remove them from the game; cards and tokens stay attached to them. After the next turn begins, each unit enters play in its owner's home, ignoring costs, restrictions, and entering-play effects; then, give them each three +1F Blood tokens.

card.name: Pure Strike Blade
card.text: Weapon
card.flavor: It is a wonderfully crafted weapon, devoid of any blessings or enchantments. Those who face it in battle swear otherwise.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Crab - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Yuruginai
Will only attach to a Crab Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Crab Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle/Open: Even if this card is bowed: Straighten this unit.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Crane - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Megumi
Will only attach to a Crane Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Crane Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Political Open: Target a Personality or Follower and you may discard the Imperial Favor: Give the target -4F. If you discarded the Imperial Favor, gain 1 Honor.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Phoenix - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Keitaku
Will only attach to a Phoenix Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Phoenix Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle/Open: Target your honorably dead Phoenix Clan Personality: Bring him into play at this card's location, ignoring costs. Remove him from the game before the turn ends.

card.name: Beseech Sakkau
card.text:
Earth
Limited: Bow this Shugenja, you may destroy this card if he is Earth, and target your Spirit Personality: If you destroyed this card, gain Honor equal to the Spirit's Personal Honor; if you did not destroy it, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Some call it mischief, but the spirits are not to be questioned.

card.name: Channel the Moon
card.text:
Maho
While this Shugenja is Shadowlands, your opposed Nonhumans have +1F.
Open: Bow this card and choose your performing Nonhuman: Give him the ability, "Battle: Melee Attack with strength equal to this card's Force." Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: The gaze of the moon never wavers.

card.name: The Earth's Hunger
card.text:
Earth
Battle: Bow this Shugenja, or bow this card if he is Earth, and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: This earth was not Rokugan, but the spirits answered the call just the same.

card.name: Our Ancestor's Call
card.text:
Water
Battle: If this Shugenja is opposed, destroy this card: Create a 2F/2C/3PH Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality with your Clan alignment at the current battlefield. If this Shugenja is Water and defending, create two such Personalities instead.
card.flavor: When you respect your forebears, you never stand alone.

card.name: Ward of Air
card.text:
Air
Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets this Shugenja, or any Personality you control if this Shugenja is Air, destroy this card: Negate the target's destruction from the action's effects.
Battle: Move this unit home.
card.flavor: "Defeat me? You cannot even touch me."

card.name: Purify the Soul
card.text:
Air
Attaches to an Air Shugenja paying 2 less Gold.
Reaction: Before an action resolves, bow this card: Negate its effects which give Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands to Personalities you control.
card.flavor: Purity is its own reward.

card.name: Set the Fields Aflame
card.text:
Air • Fire
While this Shugenja is Air or Fire, he has +1F.
Battle: Target a Terrain and destroy this card: Destroy the Terrain.
Open: Target a Region and destroy this card: The Region's abilities may not be used.
Limited: Target a Holding and destroy this card: Bow the Holding.

card.name: Thunder's Stamina
card.text:
Thunder
This Shugenja has +3F.
While this Shugenja is Thunder, battle resolution will not bow cards in this unit.
card.flavor: The Mantis see the chaos of the Second City, but they are accustomed to chaos.

card.name: Touch the Emptiness
card.text:
Void
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -2F. If this Shugenja is Void, negate the effects of the next action the target performs.
card.flavor: Some say that nothing is stronger than everything. They are wrong. Nothing is everything.

card.name: The Wave Persists
card.text:
Water
While this Shugenja is Water, he has +2F.
Reaction: After engaging, if this Shugenja is not at the current battlefield, target your Personality there: Before this battle resolves, move the target home, and if he moved, move this Shugenja to the current battlfield.
card.flavor: They make planning futile.

card.name: Yari of Air - exp
card.text:
Air • Experienced
After this card enters play, if this Shugenja is Air: Gain 1 Honor.
Limited: Once per game: Create a +1F/+1C Air • Weapon Item with the ability, "Battle: Give each Personality and Follower in the enemy army -1F" and attach it to one of your Personalities.

card.name: Your Heart's Enemy
card.text:
Air • Fear
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Chi than this Shugenja: Give the target -4F. If this Shugenja is Air, actions the target performs may not target this Shugenja.
card.flavor: Strength of spirit is strength. Strength of will is strength. Strength of purity is strength.

card.name: Fields of Victory
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle's resolution: If your army has more total Force than the enemy army, reduce the Force of each Personality and Follower in the enemy army to 0.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.

card.name: Theological Indecision
card.text:
Limited: Target a Celestial: Discard it.
Battle/Open: Target a Personality with 3 or higher Chi: Give him -2C.
card.flavor: Faith seems indestructible until even the slightest doubt enters the mind.

card.name: Paralyzing Touch
card.text:
Atemi • Kiho
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, negate the effects of the next action performed by it's winner.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy Personality: Move him to a different battlefield. Bow him if he moved.
card.flavor: The slightest touch can floor an enemy if it is powered by the monk's chi.

card.name: Thuggish Techniques
card.text: Limited: Bow your performing Personality or Follower and target a Personality without attachments and with lower Force, or target a Follower: Bow it.
card.flavor: Ronin will resort to baser methods should they lose their patience.

card.name: Power of the Night
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality, bow him if he is not Shadowlands, and target a Personality: Before this battle resolves, give him -3C.
card.flavor: Despite their legitimacy, the Spider Clan remains as ruthless as ever.

card.name: Easy Persuasion
card.text:
Reaction: After a Personality enters play, if his controller paid less than his base Gold Cost for him, bow your performing Merchant: The Personality's controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor, or 3, whichever is lower.
Battle: Pay Gold equal to a target unit's Gold Cost minus 5: Move it home. Its controller loses 2 Honor.

card.name: Crowded Streets
card.text:
Terrain
After an action resolves that one or more of your Personalities at the current battlefield performed: You may move any of those performers home.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there. If you are the Defender, you may take an additional Battle action.

card.name: Serenity in Air
card.text:
Air • Kata
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all other Kata in play.
Battle/Open: If this card is in play, target your Personality and, if this is the Action Phase, discard a card: Straighten him.
card.flavor: "Do not allow the commotions of the mortal world to disrupt your meditation, or you will never find your center."

card.name: Cowed and Defeated
card.text:
Political
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier or Magistrate and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller loses 1 Honor. After the next time (this turn) another player's action resolves that targeted your performer or a battle resolves which destroyed him, the target's controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "In the next world, tell them... never cross a Scorpion."

card.name: Shinobi Assault
card.text:
Ninja
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality and target another player's Personality: Create a battlefield (not at any province). Assign your Personality to attack there. Assign the target to defend there, even if he is bowed. Fight a battle there, in which you have the first opportunity to take a Battle action or pass. Lose 5 Honor.

card.name: Scorn the Weak
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Give him -5F. If his Force is now 0, his controller loses 1 Honor and you may target and dishonor a Personality.
card.flavor: Weak vassals reflect poorly on their lord.

card.name: Defensive Grill
card.text: Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, target a Personality there: Move him to an unresolved battlefield where he would be opposed.
card.flavor: Generals seek to confound, outflank, and stymie their foes. Victorious generals deny their opponents such opportunities.

card.name: The Lesson of Earth
card.text:
Earth • Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target another player's Personality: Move him to the current battlefield. If your Monk is not Earth, straighten the target's unit.
card.flavor: "Earth abides, Earth endures. To understand earth, one must do the same." - Agasha Kurou

card.name: Burning Fury
card.text:
Fire
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality: Melee Attack with strength equal to 3 plus the number of Fire tokens on him and the number of Rings you control.
card.flavor: "Some say the ise zumi excel at combat due to their martial disciplines. Others, that they understand the Tao. I think some of them were berserkers in their past lives." - Kakita Takara

card.name: Steady Resolve
card.text: Reaction: Before a battle resolves, choose your performing opposed Samurai Personality at the current battlefield: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: Samurai do not rout easily. Even in grim circumstances, they seize upon opportunities to prevail.

card.name: Forge Your Soul
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Personality: Show the top four cards of your Fate deck. You may attach one of them that is a Weapon to him, paying 4 less Gold. You may shuffle your deck. If you did not show a Weapon and he is a Kensai, draw a card.
card.flavor: Weapons are not merely tools. They are extensions of the wielder, reflections of the soul.

card.name: Direct the Path
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Henshin and target an enemy card without attachments: Put it on top of its owner's deck.
card.flavor: "You will be ready very soon, brother. Focus on the spirit, not the body." - Asako Nobunori

card.name: Pure Intent
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing opposed Personality: Give him a Force bonus equal to his Personal Honor. Gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You will not stop me."

card.name: Subtle Games
card.text:
Political
Limited: Bow your performing Courtier and target a Personality: Dishonor him. Draw a card.
card.flavor: It is shameful to simply cause another to lose face. Courtiers hone their skills to cause others to dishonor themselves.
