card.name: Grief
card.text:
You may only play one copy of Grief in reaction to any one resolution.
Reaction: After an action resolves whose effects destroyed a Personality, target a Personality controlled by the same player: He is overcome with grief. Dishonor him. His controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "Why can I not forget?"

card.name: Unfortunate Hesitation
card.text: Battle/Open: Target a Personality: His controller may choose to bow him. If he did not choose this, he must pass at his next opportunity this phase to take a Battle, Limited, or Open action.
card.flavor: "When steel comes out, you think of the fight. None of your sensei's pretty words will save you if you are not ready to kill." - Yamazaki

card.name: Forthrightness
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Honesty
Limited: Choose your performing Samurai and show a Strategy in your hand: After the next time you resolve an action from a card with the Strategy's title this turn, if you have announced no other actions on Strategies between now and then, permanently give your Samurai the ability, "Limited: Gain 1 Honor."
card.flavor: "Send my rival a letter declaring my intentions."

card.name: Duel to First Blood
card.text:
Iaijutsu
As a Focus Effect: Give +1 Focus Value to each of your focused cards.
Battle/Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's Personality: Your Personality challenges the target. He may refuse; if he did, draw two cards. Bow the duel's loser.

card.name: Running Battle
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Scout Personality and target an enemy Personality: Give him -4F. If you have Reconnaissance, you may target one of his attachments and put it in his owner's hand. You may move your Scout home.
card.flavor: "It is always best to choose your battlefield. Sometimes I choose to make it move with me." - Tsuruchi Tomaru

card.name: Kitsuki Methods
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier and target another player's Personality: That player may choose to discard a card at random from his hand. If he did not choose this, either gain 2 Honor, or the target's controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "So very annoying." - Bayushi Waru

card.name: Kuon's Legacy
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality with 7 or more base Force: His eyes go dead. Straighten him. Give him +3F. He may not perform actions. You may target and bow a card at his location.
card.flavor: "He will be forever honored. We shout his name as a battle cry, and even the berserkers hear it and redouble their efforts." - Hiruma Nikaru

card.name: Lessons Never Forgotten
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Yojimbo: Melee 4 Attack. If you own a dead Courtier or Shugenja, you may target and destroy an attachment.
card.flavor: "The war taught many of our young samurai a great lesson: when you have something to lose, you have something to gain. I suppose we should thank the Scorpion for that, at least." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: Two-Fold Virtue
card.text: Battle: Target your Paragon: Create a Personality with the same base Chi, Personal Honor and keywords as the target, whose base Force equals that target's Personal Honor. Remove the Personality from the game after the battle ends.
card.flavor: "A samurai who embraces bushido will never be weak. When his body fails him, his spirit will rise up and strike." - Kitsu Sorano

card.name: Watchers in The Dark
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Scout at the current battlefield and target a card in a unit there: You have Reconnaissance there. Abilities on cards (now) in the target's unit may not be used.
card.flavor: "Good commanders can anticipate the enemy. Great commanders already know what the enemy is going to do." - Akodu Furu

card.name: Preserving Beauty
card.text: Battle: If any enemy units are at the current battlefield: Before this turn ends, gain 3 Honor if that battlefield's province has not been destroyed.
card.flavor: "Defeating an enemy without destroying him is the most noble victory of all." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Crippled Sensei
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, choose a player who loses 2 Honor.
Reaction: After one of your Personalities is destroyed: Create a Maimed • Retainer Holding with the ability, "Battle/Open: Destroy this card and target a Personality: Straighten him. Rehonor him."
card.flavor: He somestimes wonders, did he cheat death, or did death cheat him?

card.name: Overcome Adversity
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Paragon and target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force by your Paragon's Force. Draw a card. You may take an additional Battle action. Lose 5 Honor.
card.flavor: "If you are not willing to do anything to win, then you do not deserve victory." - Daigotsu Aya

card.name: Unstable Ground
card.text:
Mountain • Terrain
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield, bow your performing Scout and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it. Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "Swordsman are taught to watch their opponent's eyes. Around here, they should be watching the ground." - Hiruma Hikazu

card.name: Captured Convict
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target an enemy Personality: Move him home. If he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands, choose a player who gains or loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Do not grant me the pleasure of a third time, you fool!"

card.name: Regret
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, its winner's controller loses 1 Honor for each card he focused.
Open: Target one or more Followers or Items in your discard pile: Attach them to any of your Personalities, paying all costs.
card.flavor: A sword strike, once made, cannot be withdrawn.

card.name: Methodical Questioning
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Knowledge
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Samurai and you may bow him: He interrogates a witness. Look at the top 3 cards of any Fate deck. Put them back in any order. If you bowed your Samurai, put this card into your hand from your discard pile before this turn ends.
card.flavor: "Oh, yes! Now I remember!"

card.name: Forged Documents
card.text: Open: Target a Personality: You deceive him with a forged order. His controller puts all cards in his provinces at the bottom of his Dynasty deck in any order, refilling them face-up.
card.flavor: "Kitsuki-san, if you believe the Scorpion have been forging these documents, where is your family's vaunted evidence?" The magistrate had no reply.

card.name: Social Grace
card.text:
Political
Reaction: After another player's action targets your Courtier: Negate his dishonoring from the action's effects.
Open: Choose your performing Courtier and target another player's Personality: Give him a Force penalty equal to your Courtier's Personal Honor. After each time he is assigned to attack this turn, gain 2 Honor.

card.name: Spiritual Manipulation
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Spirit Personality and target a Personality controlled by the active player: His controller must declare a normal attack this turn and assign the target (if legal).
card.flavor: The voices in his head convinced him of the certainty of his actions.

card.name: Strong Defenses
card.text:
Siege
Reaction: After a Ranged or Melee Attack is targeted: Give it -3 strength.
Battle: Choose your performing defending Personality: Give him +5F. Straighten him before this battle resolves.
card.flavor: To those on the Wall, nothing had changed. They fought and won, or fought and died, just as before.

card.name: Unexpected
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. You may bow your Personality; if you did, draw a card.
card.flavor: If the first strike is the last strike, then the victor is not always the strongest.

card.name: Tactical Assault
card.text:
Tactical
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tactician and target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: They were not prepared for this new mode of assault. The unprepared usually do not get another change to prepare.

card.name: The Game Has Changed
card.text: Battle/Open: Choose your performing Commander and target one to three Personalities controlled by the same player: Straighten zero or more of their attachments, then transfer zero or more attachments among any of the targets.
card.flavor: "I trust there will be no questions," the Khan said dryly. There were no questions.

card.name: I Cast Two Shadows
card.text:
Ninja
Reaction: After an action resolves which moved your Personality in a Ninja unit home: Move him to a different battlefield than the one from which he was moved home.
card.flavor: Even the roads are subject to the vagaries of shadows.

card.name: Deep Roots
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality with 7 or more base Force: Negate all current and new Force penalties on him and effects which prevent him from contributing Force. He contributes Force while bowed.
card.flavor: "If you hit me one more time," he said mildly, "I might lose my temper."

card.name: Sudden Movement
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, give its winner +3F.
Battle: Target two Personalities controlled by the same player at different locations: Switch their locations. If they moved, straighten their units.
card.flavor: "I did not realize you were a grasshopper!"

card.name: Void Tattoo
card.text:
Void • Tattoo
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality, target a Tattoo Strategy in your discard pile, discard a card unless your Personality is Void, and remove this card from the game: Put the Tattoo into your hand. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: The world has five smiles on one face.

card.name: Bishamon's Tower
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Berserker or unbowed Personality and target an enemy card with lower Force and no attachments: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "I will oversee the Colonies for you if you wish, brother, but I will require vassals of great strength and determination to do so." - Kuni Renyu

card.name: Twin Forks City
card.text: After an action resolves that created a duel your Personality won during a Combat Segment, once per Personality per battle: Negate his next bowing, movement, or destruction from other players' cards' effects.
card.flavor: "It is an essential link between the coast and The Second City. We must protect it from the Mantis at all costs." - Daidoji Sosuke

card.name: Atosa
card.text:
Gaijin • Sensei
After Atosa enters play: Lose 2 Honor and discard all other Sensei Personalities you control.
Your Gaijin Personalities in and out of play (including Atosa) have your Clan alignment.
card.flavor: "These foreigners need to be reminded that they discovered nothing."

card.name: Ancient Armor of the Qamar - exp
card.text:
Armor • Experienced • Unique
Will only attach to a Crab Clan or Naga Personality.
Negate any destruction of this card, except for its Personality being destroyed.
Reaction: After another player's action targets this Personality: Negate his destruction from the action's effects.

card.name: Battle Standard of the Naga - exp
card.text:
Standard • Experienced • Unique
Will only attach to a Lion Clan or Naga Personality.
Your other Personalities and Followers at this card's battlefield have +1F.
card.flavor: "We shall remember what they once stood for, and when they are wiped from the world, that memory shall be all that remains." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: The Isha's Yumi - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique
Will only attach to a Mantis Clan or Naga Personality.
Battle: Bow this card or, if you are a Mantis Clan player, discard it from your hand: Ranged 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "It is exquisite beyond reckoning. We shall see it put to good use." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: The Pearl-Encrusted Staff of the Cobras - exp
card.text:
Pearl • Experienced Pearl-Encrusted Staff • Unique
Will only attach to a Spider Clan or Naga Personality.
Reaction: Before a Battle action resolves, target a Personality: Negate his movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "The lessons of the Quelsaurth are well-remembered." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: The Yari of the Shabura
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Will only attach to a Crane Clan or Naga Personality.
Reaction: After engaging, target a Personality opposing this card: While this card remains in play, actions he performs this battle may not target cards in this unit (when the action is performed).
Battle: Destroy this card: Ranged 4 Attack. You may put this card into your hand after this battle ends.

card.name: The Blade of the Balash
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Will only attach to a Dragon Clan or Naga Personality.
Battle: Bow this card or, if you are a Dragon Clan player, discard it from your hand: Melee 5 Attack.
card.flavor: "There are many differences between our people, but a great warrior should be respected." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: The Sacred Rosary of the Constrictors
card.text:
Unique
Will only attach to a Phoenix Clan or Naga Personality.
Limited: Discard all your Celestials in play. Search your Dynasty deck or discard pile for a Celestial. Put it into play. If you searched your discard pile for it, remove this card from the game.
card.flavor: "We have learned much. There is yet more." - Shiba Tsukimi

card.name: The Blessed Mantle of the Greensnakes
card.text:
Unique
Will only attach to a Unicorn Clan or Naga Personality.
When a Lobby action checks Family Honor, your Honor is treated as 20 points higher. This Personality may lobby ignoring the cost of bowing.
Limited: Bow this card and discard the Imperial Favor: Draw a card.

card.name: The Arcane Cloak of the Chameleons
card.text:
Unique
Will only attach to a Scorpion Clan or Naga Personality.
Other players may not target cards in this unit with actions if there are any other legal targets in this army.
Battle: Move this Personality home.
card.flavor: "Such enticing secrets." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Suitengu's Blessing
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Limited: Once per game, target a Personality: Give him Naval while this card remains in play.
Battle: Discard this card and choose your performing Personality: If he would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if he moved.

card.name: Treasure Hunter
card.text:
Scout
Reaction: After a battle resolves, if this card's army destroyed a province, destroy this card: He plunders enough wealth to retire. Create a Holding with the trait, "Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold", and put it into play (bowed).

card.name: Charter of the Legion of Two Thousand
card.text:
Singular
Limited: Bow this card: Create a 2F/2C/2PH Ronin • Samurai Personality.
card.flavor: "Let it be known that the Legion of Two Thousand, for their valor and service during the time of the Destroyer War, shall function as an extension of the Imperial Legions, enforcing the law of the Empress and answerable to her and her Chosen." - The Voice of the Empress

card.name: Six-Ring Sword
card.text:
Weapon
Before the first time each turn another player's effect from a card destroys this card: Negate this card's destruction.
card.flavor: "If you break your opponent's blade, then yours is the only sword that matters, isn't it?" - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Plantation
card.text:
Farm
Your Stronghold produces one more Gold, to a maximum of five, when paying for a non-Personality card.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "In time, the prosperity of the domesticated Colonies once again restored the Empire to its full glory." - The Miya Histories

card.name: Sea & Sky
card.text:
Pearl
Battle/Open: Destroy this card and target a Region or Terrain: Either destroy it or permanently remove its traits and abilities.
card.flavor: "We are not without our own blessings of your Thunn-der. We know it by a different name, but it answers to our call as well as yours."

card.name: Tess'kss
card.text:
Nonhuman • Ningyo • Pearl • Shugenja
Battle: Target an enemy card: Bow it.
card.flavor: "The Dark Naga's influence is powerful. To resist it is foolish. Accept it and become one with the world. Humans need not bother; they will be destroyed regardless."

card.name: Jade Embrace
card.text:
Earth • Jade
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality: Remove one of his abilities. If this Shugenja is Earth, reduce the target's Force to 0. If the target is an Oni, destroy it and this card.
card.flavor: "Your place is not in this world, demon. The earth itself denies you."

card.name: Seppun Ichigo
card.text:
Imperial • Samurai
Ichigo has +1F for each Dojo you control.
card.flavor: "It is most curious, to see the Imperials and ronin standing shoulder to shoulder. Men like Ichigo, devoted to duty at the expense of all else, make such things possible." - Seppun Ritisharu

card.name: Through the Breach
card.text:
Siege
Limited: Target a Castle Holding: Permanently remove one of its non-Gold-producing traits or abilities.
Limited: If you control a Personality, pay 4 Gold: Create a 4F/2C/0PH Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni Personality. Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "Crush the humans!"

card.name: Ki no Oni
card.text:
Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni
After Ki enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle/Reaction: After another player's Battle action targets Ki, or as a Battle action, destroy him: Create three 2F/1C/0PH Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni • Podling Personalities in your army.
card.flavor: "Left unchecked, they would overrun the world." - Kuni Renyu

card.name: Imperial Charter
card.text:
Imperial
Limited: If it is not your first turn: Starting with you, each player may create an unbowed Holding with the trait "Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold."
card.flavor: There is nothing within the Empire or the Colonies that cannot be granted by the will of the Divine Empress.

card.name: Retired Sensei
card.text:
Retainer
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle: Even if this card is bowed, target your Personality: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: "Your form is strong, but your spirit is not committed to it. Still your thoughts and become one with the steel. That is the path to victory."

card.name: Legendary Rivalry
card.text: Battle/Open: Target a Unique Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: When two souls meet on the field of battle, when honor's demands must be answered, when armies stand with bated breath... that is the birth of legends.

card.name: Quicksand
card.text: Battle: Destroy this card and target a Follower or Personality without Followers at this province's battlefield: Destroy it.
card.flavor: The domestication of the Colonies proceeded slowly for many years, and for good reason. The rapid expansion authorized by the new governor came with a number of deadly perils that claimed many lives.

card.name: Seppun Ritisharu
card.text:
Imperial • Unique • Imperial Treasurer
Your Holdings produce 1 additional Gold when they bow to produce Gold.
card.flavor: "The Seppun are the largest of the Imperial familes, and the family with the most difficult logistics. Fortunately they have brilliant souls who ensure they are never without what they require." - The Voice of the Empress

card.name: The Wall is Breached
card.text:
Unique
You may destroy the province from which this card resolved; if you did, choose a unit and destroy it.
card.flavor: "Demons spill forth, only to find their deaths! Let the spawn of evil come! They will learn that even demons must fear the Scorpion!"

card.name: Tales of Valor
card.text:
Unique
After your next End Phase begins, if you did not put any cards in your hand since the resolution of this Event, draw two cards.
card.flavor: Over the course of decades, the quiet intensity and visceral starkness of the Turquoise Champion's poems gained an incredible following among the people of Rokugan.

card.name: Closing the Gap
card.text:
Unique
Reaction: After an action resolves that moved a Personality to or from the current battlefield, choose your performing Personality: Move him to the current battlefield, or from the current battlefield to your home. Straighten his unit if he moved.
card.flavor: "Seal the breach at all costs! We will seal it with our bodies if we must!"

card.name: Wildfire
card.text: Open: Target a Fortress tile: Flip it face-up or face-down (unless it is a player's last face-up Fortress).
card.flavor: Striking an enemy's holdings renders him unable to make war. Burn enough, and all that must be done is wait long enough for the inevitable to take place.

card.name: The Sincerity of the Dragon
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if you won it, give all your provinces +2 strength.
Battle/Open: If you are a Dragon Clan player, choose your performing unbowed Dragon Clan Personality: Name a number. After the next resolution this turn of your action from another Strategy or Ring with a base Focus Value equal to the number, draw a card, and choose a player, who discards a card. Remove this card from the game.

(MRP)
card.flavor: Speak only your soul and know only peace.

card.name: The Honesty of the Phoenix
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: You may choose (now) to delay the effects of losing this duel until after the next Dynasty Phase begins.
Battle/Open: If you are a Phoenix Clan player, choose your performing unbowed Phoenix Clan Personality: Name a card. After the next resolution this turn of your action from another Strategy or Ring with that title, draw a card, and choose a player, who discards a card. Remove this card from the game.

(MRP)
card.flavor: Suffer not a lie to grow in your spirit.

card.name: Perplexing Guests
card.text:
Reaction: After another player's action targets your Personality: Discard him.
Battle: If there are any enemy units at the current battlefield: Create a 1F/1C/1PH Monk Personality on your side there. Remove him from the game when the turn ends.

(MRP)
card.flavor: "He has not moved in three days! I hope our northern guests will not make our home familiar grounds."

card.name: Fudo - exp
card.text:
Nonhuman • Fudo • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
Fudo may not assign, and will not move, to battlefields unless it has 5 Charging tokens. After Fudo is assigned: Remove two of its Charging tokens.
Reaction: Twice per turn, after an action targets Fudo, remove one of its Charging tokens: Negate the action's effects on it.
Limited: Give Fudo two Charging tokens.
Battle: Target an enemy unit: Destroy it.

card.name: Verdant Jungle
card.text:
Forest
Your Nonhuman Personalities enter play from this province paying 1 less Gold.
Reaction: Before an action resolves, bow this card: Negate its effects that move any Personalities into an attacking army at this province's battlefield.
card.flavor: "Its bounty is without limit." - Tsuruchi Tomaru

card.name: Dark Naga Scouts
card.text:
Nonhuman • Naga • Scout
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "We embrace the philosophy of the Shahismael, and for that alone we are given some degree of autonomy. Better lost by one's actions than in one's sleep."

card.name: Exquisite Blade
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
After this card bows: Straighten it.
Battle: Melee 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "It can be difficult to find appropriately flattering terms that are not already associated with a different smith. I find it very tiresome." - Kitsuki Daisuke

card.name: Heart of Fudo - exp
card.text:
Fudo • Experienced • Unique
Limited: Give this Personality one Charging token, or two if any other player has 20 or higher Family Honor or more provinces than you.
card.flavor: "It possesses some manner of life, although of what sort I could not say. It pricks my conscience, and so I must think not of it." - Yung

card.name: The Deciding Moment
card.text:
Unique
Limited: If another player has 40 or more Honor, has 5 Rings in play, or you have -20 or lower Honor: The Dynasty Phase comes before the Attack Phase this turn.
Battle: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "And throughout its history, the Empire has seen the birth of villains, even those with godlike power." - The Tale of Rokugan III

card.name: Akuma's Power
card.text:
Shadowlands • Dark Fortune • Unique
Limited: Destroy your performing unbowed Shugenja, destroy your leftmost province, and discard this card: Create a 9F/5C/0PH Shadowlands • Nonhuman • Oni Personality with the performer's title and base Gold cost; it enters play ignoring costs. Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "Means and ends. Weak souls can mistake one for the another, but the strong will always triumph."

card.name: Megumi's Guidance
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
While your army is opposed, it has +2 total Force, or +3 if you are the Defender.
Battle/Open: Discard this card and choose your performing Personality: Negate his destruction from other players' cards' effects (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: The Fortune of Heroic Guidance is a benevolent being.

card.name: Offering Reverence
card.text:
Festival • Unique
For each dead Personality in your discard pile, create a 2F/2C/3PH Samurai • Ancestor • Spirit Personality with your Clan alignment. If this created no Personalities, you may shuffle this card into your deck instead of discarding it after this Event resolves.
card.flavor: "Even peasants honor their ancestors. No samurai should ever neglect these rituals." - Kitsu Kagako

card.name: Starting on the Path
card.text:
Unique
Until your second turn from now begins, you have the ability, "Limited: Target a Ring in your hand: Put it into play."
card.flavor: "Other monks talk to hear themselves talking. Mukudori-sensei says only what needs to be said." - Hiruma Sawai

card.name: Dark Experiments
card.text:
Unique
Choose a province. Permanently give it -2 strength and destroy any Region attached to it. Until the game ends, after a Region attaches to it, destroy the Region, and after a Holding enters play from it, give the Holding a -1 Gold Production token.
card.flavor: "What an interesting effect this item has." - Daigostu Kanpeki

card.name: Incredible Tragedy
card.text:
Unique
Until your second turn from now begins, Personalities may not be assigned during the Cavalry Maneuvers Segment.
card.flavor: The changes in climate, the slight difference in diet, and a dozen other things made the horses skittish. When the wildfire broke out, many were already so anxious that they could not recover from it.

card.name: Farmer's Market
card.text:
Farm • Market
Your maximum hand size is increased by 1.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "Look at them, their blissful lives. They have no notion of what is happening beyond their village." Muroken nodded. "As it should be."

card.name: Temple to Fudo
card.text:
Fudo • Temple
After this card enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
This card will not straighten before your third turn.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold and lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Despite the efforts of the Brotherhood, Fudo's teachings thrived in the Imperial Colonies.

card.name: Hachi's Revenge
card.text:
Ship • Unique
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are a Crane Clan player.
Open: Target a non-Unique Holding: You blockade it. Bow it.
card.flavor: The Mantis believed that they could not be matched at sea. They were unpleasantly surprised.

card.name: Incense Mill
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle/Open: Target a Personality: Negate all current Force penalties on him. Negate any cards' effects that say he may not perform actions (this turn).
card.flavor: Kodo, the art of fragrance, is highly valued by warriors. Some believe it makes them better warriors.

card.name: Second City Port
card.text:
Port
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Open: Bow this card and target a Port or Market: Straighten it.
card.flavor: Even as the conflict grew heated, the Crane and Mantis avoided skirmishing in any port with Imperial holdings. They both knew that violence there would be bad for business.

card.name: Small Library
card.text:
Bow this card: Produce 3 Gold.
After this card enters play from a province: Refill it face-up.
card.flavor: Even a minor library is a considerable demonstration of a lord's wealth and influence.

card.name: Overlooked Palace
card.text:
Ninja
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Destroy this card: Create a 0F/2C/0PH Ninja Personality with your Clan alignment.
card.flavor: Skilled ninja are undetectable in shadows, but the true masters hide in plain sight.

card.name: Hiruma Sawai
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Fudo • Scout
Battle: Target two Personalities controlled by the same player: Transfer a Follower from one to the other. If you have Reconnaissance, you may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "The Colonies are a strange place indeed, but with your help, Sawai-san, we can take what we need from it and go home. That is what we all want, is it not?" - Kuni Renyu

card.name: Hida Kaiji
card.text:
Crab Clan • Nonhuman • Mutant • Berserker
Before the first time each turn another player's action moves Kaiji: Negate his movement from that action.
Battle: Target an enemy card with lower Force: Bow it. Destroy it if it has no attachments.
card.flavor: "He found something terrible within the ruins, something that changed him forever. He lives and serves, but will never again truly be one of us." - Hiruma Nitani

card.name: Hiruma Nitani - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Jade Hand • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Ranged 6 Attack.
Battle: Target an enemy card with the base Shadowlands keyword: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "The world has changed, but there is still evil in it. I care not what form it takes. I shall scour it from the face of the world."

card.name: Kaiu Okaru
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Brash • Siege • Tactician
(The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -3F. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: The warrior nodded. "Your words make sense, friend Sawai. Why should we not find our own path?"

card.name: Yasuki Baiko
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant
Political Limited: Discard the Imperial Favor and target a dishonorable Personality: His controller loses 1 Honor.
Political Open: Pay 2 Gold: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: Throughout the Colonies, the words of Fudo reached the ears of Crab warriors. And many found the words pleasing indeed...

card.name: Yasuki Tsujiken - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Oyabun • Experienced • Unique • Favored of the Void Dragon
Open: Target a Holding or your Stronghold: Bow or straighten it.
Limited: Pay 5 Gold: Draw a card.
Limited: Bow Tsujiken and target a Personality: Dishonor him. His controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I can get you what you need, my friend. There is just one question I must ask..."

card.name: Asahina Tsugio
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Shugenja • Overconfident
(Each other player may draw a card after an Overconfident card enters or leaves play.)
Other players' maximum hand sizes are increased by 1.
card.flavor: "These are the 'children of Thunder?' The masters of the sea? So far I am unimpressed!"

card.name: Asahina Akikusa
card.text:
Crane Clan • Daimyo • Air • Shugenja • Loyal • Unique
Reaction: After an action on your Air Spell resolves: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "If there is one thing I have learned from my mother's life, it is this: all things are impermanent."

card.name: Kakita Yusugi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
You may take the Proclaim Reaction to Yusugi entering play even if you have already used the Proclaim ability once this turn.
card.flavor: "Is that your grandfather's stance? I can now see why he is dead."

card.name: Doji Yuka
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier
After Yuka performs a Political action: Give her +3C until it ends.
card.flavor: "For what shame were you sent to the Colonies, my lady?" Yuka smiled at her yojimbo. "Yusugi-san, did they not tell you? I came here willingly."

card.name: Daidoji Kitahime
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Iron Crane • Scout
Battle: Bow Kitahime unless you have Reconnaissance: Ranged 4 Attack.
card.flavor: When she came of age, Keiko took her grandmother's name and her mother's title. The Lady of Horses was a compassionate leader, but in her heart she never forgave the Lion Clan.

card.name: Doji Mitsuru
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Magistrate • Naval
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Mitsuru duels him. Bow the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "The Mantis Clan's greed and ambition knows no bounds. But they are not above the law. Their abuse of their clan's charter end here!"

card.name: Kitsuki Minori
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Duelist • Magistrate • Overconfident
Minori does not have Overconfident (in and out of play) if any other player is Lion Clan. (Each other player may draw a card after an Overconfident card enters or leaves play.)
card.flavor: "They cannot be bothered to learn the nuances of court. My words, and my blades, shall rally the Empire to our cause."

card.name: Mirumoto Houken - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Kensai • Experienced • Unique • Master of the Blade • Favored of the Water Dragon
Battle/Open: Even if Houken is bowed: Straighten his unit. You may move him home, or, if he would be opposed, to the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "Seamless motion."

card.name: Mirumoto Michi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Kensai
Battle: Even if Michi is bowed: If he would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. If he moved, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "Your home is not safe from me."

card.name: Togashi Noboru
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Brash • Tattooed • Unique
(The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle: Target an enemy Personality with lower Chi: Noboru pushes him to a new path. While you have at least one unit in your current army, the target's Force contributes to that army's total Force instead of his controller's.
card.flavor: "Father is wise, yet knows nothing of this world."

card.name: Tamori Tamoko
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Shugenja • Alchemist
Open: If it is not your turn, target an unbowed Personality controlled by the active player: Before the turn ends, gain 1 Honor if he was not assigned to attack your provinces this turn.
Reaction: Before an action resolves, target a Personality: Negate either his movement or straightening from the action's effects.

card.name: Tamori Takeshi
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Artisan • Incense Master
Open: Target your Personality: Takeshi helps him meditate. Effects of actions the target performs will not be negated.
card.flavor: "Focus! Why must my students lack even the most basic of skills?"

card.name: Togashi Hiroto
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Tattooed
Reaction: After Hiroto enters play: Give him four +1F Fire tokens.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. Destroy it if it is an attachment.
card.flavor: The tattooed men of the Dragon are widely feared for their unpredictable natures and capacity for destruction.

card.name: Ikoma Aimi
card.text:
Lion Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Sensei • Loyal
After Aimi enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your Lion Clan Personalities (in play) have Courtier but do not have Cavalry, Commander, Deathseeker, Paragon, Scout, or Tactician.
card.flavor: "Words are the greatest weapons."

card.name: Kitsu Kouki
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
Battle: Bow Kouki and target an enemy Personality: Give him -3F.
card.flavor: When they came for him, they saw one man. When they died, they had lost count of the spirit warriors.

card.name: Akodo Hotaka
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Paragon
Hotaka has +1PH if any other player is Dragon Clan.
Hotaka may not perform Dark Virtue actions.
The amount of Honor you need in order to win an Honor Victory is reduced by Hotaka's Personal Honor minus one.
card.flavor: "Fight justly and you fight to win."

card.name: Ikoma Masumi
card.text:
Lion Clan • Imperial • Samurai • Brash • Scout
(The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it.
card.flavor: "Another fine spot for an ambush," the scout mused.

card.name: Akodo Michitsu
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Battle: Target an enemy attachment: Destroy it.
card.flavor: "We are the hammer, the world the anvil, and our enemies are the impure steel that shall be purified by our power and will."

card.name: Matsu Koyama - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Imperial • Samurai • Paragon • Yojimbo • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Give each other Lion Clan Personality in your army a Force bonus equal to his own Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "The Shogun's man is a peerless warrior, entrusted with the most important tasks. It is honor that elevates him, but honor that blinds him as well." - Yasuki Tsujiken

card.name: Kitsune Merihiko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Reaction: After Merihiko enters play: Create a 0F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Bee • Cavalry • Spirit • Swarm Personality with the ability, "Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 4 Attack."
card.flavor: "Don't worry about our holdings here. No Crane will get past my vigilance."

card.name: Moshi Ino
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Shugenja • Naval
Battle: Ino summons a storm. After the next action not performed by a Thunder Personality resolves this battle, the player who took it chooses to discard a card or bow the performer. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "She is like a grandmother to us all, and I will use her blessings to bring glory to her and all our clan!"

card.name: Thunder Dragon - exp2
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Nonhuman • Dragon • Thunder • Shugenja • Cavalry • Hero • Naval • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique
After Thunder Dragon performs an action: Other players may not take Reactions until it ends.
The Thunder Dragon inspires. Your Mantis Clan Personalities have +1F and the ability, "Battle: Target an enemy card without unbowed attachments: Bow it."
card.flavor: "Go well, my children."

card.name: Tsuruchi Nobukatsu - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Naval • Sensei • Experienced • Unique • Ruby Champion
After Nobukatsu enters play or overlays: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your Mantis Clan Samurai in and out of play have Magistrate.
Battle: Target a Personality at any location: Bow him.
card.flavor: "Not the most promising class I have ever seen, but I will turn them into magistrates regardless."

card.name: Tsuruchi Kohrogi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Brash • Naval • Scout
(The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle: Ranged 2 Attack.
card.flavor: "The Crane? What are they but a band of spoiled children? We will drive them from the Colonies with little effort."

card.name: Yoritomo Iwashi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Naval
Limited: If Iwashi has been in an attacking army when it won a battle since your last turn began, target a Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: "Now things will get interesting. We have many advantages, but we must push them to their limit if we are to defeat the Crane and claim their holdings."

card.name: Yoritomo Akukiho
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Mercenary • Naval
Battle: Target a Weapon in your hand: Attach it to Akukiho, paying all costs. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "You have served long as a mercenary," Hiromi said. "Have you forgotten what it is like to serve your clan?" "Never, my lord," Akukiho replied. "All I have done is kept myself sharp for the day you needed me."

card.name: Asako Chukage - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Water • Monk • Shugenja • Cavalry • Henshin • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Limited: Bow your target Ring: Draw a card.
Battle: Even if Chukage is bowed: If he would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. If he moved, straighten his unit. If there are now more units there on the enemy side than on yours, you may target an enemy unit and move it home.

card.name: Asako Jukko
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Void • Monk • Henshin
Battle/Open: Target a Personality with 1 Force or greater: Switch his Force and Chi. You may switch Jukko's Force and Chi.
card.flavor: "Do not do this. It will not end the way you would like."

card.name: Asako Rikate - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Shadowlands • Earth • Monk • Golden Arm • Henshin • Experienced • Unique • Blood of Kinuye • Favored of the Earth Dragon
Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Reduce his Force to 0. Give him -2C.
card.flavor: He tells himself he shall not succumb. Is it hubris or insight that fills him?

card.name: Asako Kijo
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Overconfident
(Each other player may draw a card after an Overconfident card enters or leaves play.)
Other players' maximum hand sizes are increased by 1.
card.flavor: "The other clans must face the truth. Purity must be attained, not assumed!"

card.name: Shiba Iaimiko
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Yojimbo
Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F. If its Force is now 0 and you control a Shugenja, you may target and destroy a card without attachments in the target's unit.
card.flavor: "I promise, you will be safe."

card.name: Bayushi Mugoshi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Fudo • Overconfident • Student
(Each other player may draw a card after an Overconfident card enters or leaves play.)
Political Reaction: After Mugoshi enters play, choose a player: You slander him for not accepting the teachings of Fudo. He loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: A razor tongue cuts as surely as a blade.

card.name: Bayushi Makubesu
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Imperial • Courtier • Samurai • Bitter Lies • Magistrate
After Makubesu enters play: Create two 1F Followers and attach them to one or two of your Personalities.
card.flavor: "Most magistrates retire before his age, but Makubesu continues to serve. It is almost as if something drives him... perhaps something left unfinished?" - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Bayushi Shibata - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Imperial • Courtier • Resourceful • Scout • Experienced • Unique • Imperial Explorer
Battle: Even if Shibata is not at the current battlefield, target an attacking Personality: Shibata draws on his knowledge of the land. Bow the target. Give the current battlefield's province +3 strength if the target is dishonorable.
card.flavor: "These events were inevitable. Those who did not see them coming are simply fools."

card.name: Shosuro Hawado - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Shadowspawn • Experienced • Unique
Reaction: After a Battle action resolves, if Hawado is at the current battlefield, target a Personality that performed it: Move him from his current location to another.
card.flavor: "Let her hunt them, my lord. She is the only one who can." - Shosuro Aroru

card.name: Soshi Kodanshi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja
After Kodanshi enters play from a province: Create a 0F/2C/0PH Scorpion Clan • Ninja Personality.
card.flavor: "If this conflict is to remain invisible, then so shall I."

card.name: Yogo Heijin
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Cursed • Paragon • Yojimbo • Loyal
Battle: Target your Courtier and an enemy Personality: Move them to the current battlefield. Straighten the enemy Personality's unit.
card.flavor: Some Yogo seek to defeat their curse through their own death. But even death can be a betrayal.

card.name: Yogo Ugimori
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Air • Shugenja • Kuroiban
Reaction: After Ugimori enters play from a province, choose a player: He may not take the Proclaim Reaction until your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "There is a temple in the jungles that the Spider did not report. Go and find it." - Bayushi Shibata

card.name: Goju Yurushi - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Experienced • Loyal • Unique • Dragon Child
After Yurishi enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Other players may not target Yurishi with actions if any other legal targets are available.
card.flavor: "My special child," the Shadow Dragon chuckled. "Born not just of my spirit, but my flesh as well."

card.name: Goju Asuka
card.text:
Spider Clan • Infiltrator
After Asuka enters play: You may give control of her to another player.
Asuka may not assign, and will not move, into a defending army.
After a Straighten Phase begins: Choose your bowed non-Spider Clan Personality. Negate his straightening this phase.

card.name: Ninube Hajime
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Ninja • Shugenja
After Hajime enters play: Lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy Personality at the current battlefield: Hajime turns his mind to rice pudding and he wanders off. Move him to a different location.
card.flavor: "Do not fear death. I will be a greater you than you have ever been. Feel honored in this."

card.name: Masayoshi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai • Order of the Spider
Reaction: After Masayoshi enters play: Create a +4F/+1C Weapon Item and attach it to him.
card.flavor: Like phantoms, the Spider agents slipped beyond the Lion border and into one of their most remote Colonial holdings. "Do not let it touch your flesh!" the monk snarled as they ladled out the blood. "I do not wish to carry your carcass out of here!"

card.name: Daigotsu Yamato
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Brash • Commander • Conqueror
After Yamato enters play: Lose 1 Honor and if any other player is Scorpion Clan, permanently remove Brash from Yamato. (The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle/Open: Target your Follower at any location: Transfer it to Yamato. You may take an additional action.

card.name: Daigotsu Yutaka
card.text:
Spider Clan • Shadowlands • Samurai • Paragon • Dark Will
After Yutaka enter play: Lose 1 Honor.
Yutaka may not perform Bushido Virtue actions.
Battle: If Yutaka is dead and he would be opposed: Bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying 3 less Gold if you have taken a Dark Virtue action this phase.

card.name: Naka Mahatsu - exp
card.text:
Ronin • Air • Earth • Fire • Thunder • Void • Water • Shugenja • Alchemist • Experienced Mahatsu • Unique • Grand Master of the Elements
Reaction: If it is the Action Phase or Mahatsu is at the current battlefield, before an action with Thunder or an element keyword resolves: Negate its effects.
Limited: Search your Fate deck for a card with Thunder or an element keyword. Show it. Put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "All are one, child. We are nothing."

card.name: Chuda Seki
card.text:
Shadowlands • Shugenja • Plague
After Seki enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Reaction: After Seki enters play, target a Personality: Give him a -1C Plague token.
card.flavor: "What amazing tools these are! A pity there are so few of the big ones around. Imagine what I could do with carriers who could follow directions!"

card.name: Mukudori
card.text:
Fudo • Sensei • Unique
After Mukudori enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your other Fudo cards enter play paying 1 less Gold.
Limited: Bow three of your Fudo cards: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Understanding breeds understanding."

card.name: Otomo Suikihime
card.text:
Imperial • Courtier • Unique • Second City Governor
You may not assign, and will not move, Suikihime to battlefields. Suikihime will not become dishonorable. Other player's Political actions may not target Suikihime.
Reaction: Once per game, after Suikihime enters play, if no other player controls The Forgotten Temple: Suikihime grants you new lands in the Colonies. Gain a province to the left of your leftmost province. After the next time this game Suikihime leaves play, destroy your leftmost province.

card.name: Tanemono
card.text:
Ronin • Void • Shugenja • Ishiken
Tanemono will not be controlled by a Phoenix Clan player.
Battle/Open: Switch Tanemono's Force and Chi.
card.flavor: "My honored father thinks I will grow weak and crawl back to his clan. The Void contains the Phoenix but it does not need them, and neither do I."

card.name: Seppun Nagi
card.text:
Imperial • Magistrate • Sensei • Emerald Magistrate
After Nagi enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your other non-Loyal Magistrate Personalities in and out of play have your Clan alignment.
card.flavor: "A magistrate's highest duty is to serve the Empire's law. Do whatever else you must, but do that."

card.name: Zansho
card.text:
Samurai • Sensei
After Zansho enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your Followers have +1F or a Force bonus equal to their Honor Requirement, whichever is greater.
card.flavor: "Come talk with me, and I will tell you how to be a leader of men."

card.name: Moto Miyu
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja • Cavalry • Conqueror • Death Priest
card.flavor: Words of death rose in the shugenja's mouth, and ranks upon ranks fell away before them.

card.name: Moto Taigo
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Commander • Conqueror • Tactician • Loyal • Unique • Shogun
Taigo may perform up to three Tactical actions per turn.
Tactical Battle: Target an enemy Personality: Bow him. If he is Infantry, you may target and destroy a card without attachments in his unit.
card.flavor: "He is a dour man, and personally I find his motives suspect. He has never failed in his duties, however, and his man Koyama is a paragon of honor." - Seppun Ritisharu

card.name: Shinjo Katsuo
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Brash • Cavalry • Commander
Katsuo does not have Brash if any other player is Lion Clan. (The Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack.)
Battle/Open: Target your Follower: Straighten it. You may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "You had me the first time."

card.name: Moto Aoi
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Tactician
Battle/Open: Even if Aoi is at home, bow him and target a Personality: Give him +4F.
card.flavor: "You will receive reinforcements at the right moment. Have faith."

card.name: Utaku Chikako
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Battle Maiden • Cavalry • Paragon
Your dishonorable Battle Maidens do not have a maximum Personal Honor of 0 from the rulebook.
Limited: Gain 2 Honor. You may not declare an attack this turn.
card.flavor: In her meditations, she saw tranquil formations.

card.name: Utaku Hirononri
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Stable Master
Open: Bow Hirononri and target a Stables or Cavalry card: Straighten it.
card.flavor: It was rarely a good sign when a horse laid down.

card.name: Tested Land
card.text:
After this card enters play: Attach it to another player's province (that can attach a Region; that player now controls it.)
After a Holding is revealed in this province: Discard it and this card.
card.flavor: "These lands were not like this the last time I came through. It is as if they have been cursed by all Seven Fortunes, and not even mold will grow now." - From the last, unsubmitted report of a missing Tsuruchi scout

card.name: Ronin Ambushers
card.text:
Ronin • Scout
After this card bows: Straighten it and, if you do not control a Terrain, negate its (future) straightening until this phase ends.
card.flavor: The practice of hitsuke, setting fires to distract the targets of ambushes, was condemned by the Great Clans. Yet oddly it did not stop.

card.name: Horseback Warriors
card.text:
Cavalry
Battle: Melee 4 Attack, or Melee 5 Attack if the target is Infantry.
card.flavor: "In many ways, it is preferable to overestimate the ability of the enemy cavalry." - Ikoma Natsu

card.name: O-Yoroi Troops
card.text: Reaction: After another player's action targets a card in this unit: Negate the action's effects on this card.
card.flavor: "It is a matter of regret to allow the moment when one should die to pass by." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Water Spider Adept
card.text:
Ninja
Will only attach to a Ninja.
card.flavor: Many students of shinobi dojo take odd, esoteric names. They believe it grants them power.

card.name: Cavalry Detachment
card.text:
Cavalry
Reaction: After another player's action targets this Personality, remove this card from the game: Create a 3F/1C/2PH Samurai • Cavalry Personality with your Clan alignment at the target's location. Transfer the target's attachments to the created Personality.

card.name: Aka-beko
card.text: Negate all (current and new) Force and Chi penalties to this Personality from other players' actions.
card.flavor: A long time ago, a virtuous cow showed its devotion to a temple it had helped build by staying at the site. The aka-beko brings good fortune in its memory.

card.name: Blades of the Black Dragon
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Battle: Bow this Personality unless he is Nonhuman: Melee Attack with strength equal to his Force.
card.flavor: "There once was a warrior, more demon than man, named Mirumoto Taki. He fell to darkness, and carried these blades with him." - Mirumoto Houken

card.name: Bokken of the Ruby Champion
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Attaches to a Ruby Champion ignoring costs.
Battle: Target one or two enemy Personalities or Followers with 6 or lower Force each: Bow them.
card.flavor: "A sensei's duty is to teach, and while injury can harm instruction, bruises can be very educational." - The journal of Yasuki Miliko

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Dragon - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Suryn
Will only attach to a Dragon Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Dragon Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
After this card enters play: Search your discard pile, then deck, for a Ring. Show it. Put it into play or your hand.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Mantis - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Nobori Raiu
Will only attach to a Mantis Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Mantis Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Gain 2 Honor.
Battle: Pay zero or more Gold: Give this Personality a Force bonus equal to the amount paid plus two, or Melee Attack with strength equal to twice the amount paid.

card.name: Celestial Sword of the Scorpion - exp
card.text:
Weapon • Experienced • Unique • Churetsu
Will only attach to a Scorpion Clan Personality.
This card has +1F for each Scorpion Clan Personality you control.
After this card enters play: Choose a player. He loses 2 Honor.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Bow it. You may discard a card in the current battlefield's province. If you discarded a Personality or you control a Courtier, destroy the target.

card.name: Unparalleled Sword
card.text:
Weapon
This Personality has Kensai.
Battle: Melee 4 Attack.
card.flavor: Its blade was compared by many to a sliver of Emma-O himself. Surely even the Fortune of Death could not be more dangerous.

card.name: Hato-gurama
card.text:
Your minimum Fate deck size is decreased by one.
You may not choose this card to be discarded as a cost or effect of your actions if you have other cards in your hand.
card.flavor: It seemed like nothing but a simple toy.

card.name: Kama
card.text:
Weapon
May attach to a Personality with exactly one Weapon.
After this card attaches (or transfers): Dishonor this Personality unless he is Mantis Clan.
This Personality may attach two Weapons.
card.flavor: "They work better in pairs." - Tsuruchi Nobukatsu

card.name: Ki-Uso
card.text: Effects of Political actions this Personality performs will not be negated.
card.flavor: "It will be as you say," the courtier murmured, but he could not hide his disaffection. She smiled.

card.name: Kimono of the Turquoise Champion
card.text:
Unique
This Personality has +1PH if he is a Turquoise Champion.
Reaction: Before an action resolves, bow this card: You silence your enemies with your creative genius. Negate any Honor losses until the action ends.
card.flavor: "Hear my words, and the tale of a hero." - Matsu Kasei

card.name: Light Armor
card.text: Armor
card.flavor: He stopped complaining about the number of times he had to have his armor repaired after the battle maiden pointed out that his skin was still intact.

card.name: Mantle of the Jade Champion - exp2
card.text:
Experienced 2 • Unique
Attaches to a Jade Champion ignoring costs.
This card has a Force bonus equal to the highest Focus Value among Spells in its unit.
Reaction: Even if this card is bowed, when paying for a Spell: Produce 4 Gold.
card.flavor: "Purity is strength." - The teachings of Kuni Daigo

card.name: Mantle of the Onyx Champion
card.text:
Unique
Attaches to an Onyx Champion ignoring costs.
This Personality has Shadowlands. This card has a Force bonus equal to the highest Focus Value among Spells in its unit. Spells in this unit have Maho.
Maho Battle: Ranged 5 Attack.

card.name: Mempo of the Amethyst Champion
card.text:
Unique
Attaches to an Amethyst Champion ignoring costs.
You may use Favor abilities one additional time per turn.
After you announce the rulebook Favor Political Battle action: It may target any player's unit, and even if it is not attacking.
Reaction: After you discard the Imperial Favor: Take the Imperial Favor.

card.name: Moksha Patam
card.text:
After an action resolves, if a player gained Honor from its effects: Give this Personality a +1F Token.
Battle: Target a Personality: Move him home. While this card is at the current battlefield, negate his movement to it. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Ascending and descending. Descending and ascending. The snakes seem to smile.

card.name: Sandalwood Incense
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, gain 2 Honor or draw a card.
Open: Put this card on top of your Fate deck: Meditation begets readiness. Straighten the Personality to whom this card was last attached.
card.flavor: Sometimes the smoke helps no-thought along.

card.name: Okesa-goma
card.text: Battle: Bow this card and target a Nonhuman or Shadowlands Personality: Move him home.
card.flavor: The straw horse had great virtue, despite its humble appearance.

card.name: Mining Apparatus
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Remove this card and any number of Holdings you control with total base Gold Cost of 10 or higher from the game: Gain a province to the left of your leftmost province.
card.flavor: It was not good land, but it was land.

card.name: The Emerald Armor - exp2
card.text:
Armor • Experienced 2 • Unique
Attaches to an Emerald Champion ignoring costs.
This Personality has +1PH and Imperial • Magistrate.
Other players may not target this Personality with actions while there is another Personality at his location who is a legal target for the action.

card.name: The Ivory Sword
card.text:
Weapon • Unique
Attaches to an Ivory Champion ignoring costs.
This Personality has Magistrate.
After an action resolves that was performed by a dishonorable Personality while he opposed this card: His controller chooses and discards a card.
card.flavor: "I will execute my duties with honor and grace. I will bring glory to the Colonies, and the Governor." - Shinjo Tselu

card.name: The Obsidian Armor
card.text:
Armor • Unique
Attaches to an Obsidian Champion ignoring costs.
This Personality has Shadowlands.
Fear Battle: Target an enemy unit: Bow each Personality and Follower in it with 5 Force or lower.
card.flavor: "I fear there were others, before Hotako." - Ikoma Ayumum

card.name: The Topaz Armor - exp
card.text:
Armor • Experienced • Unique
Attaches to a Topaz Champion ignoring costs.
After this card enters play: Choose two keywords; Courtier, Samurai, Archer, Artisan, Cavalry, Duelist, Elite, Historian, Kensai, Magistrate, Stalwart.
This Personality has the two keywords last chosen from the previous trait.

card.name: Scent of Dishonor
card.text:
Air
Open: Bow this Shugenja unless he is Air, destroy this card, and target a Kolat, Ninja, Shadowlands, or dishonorable Personality: Bow him.
card.flavor: "They must not be allowed to hide from us," Yogo Rieko whispered to her students. "Seek them out through the kami. Find them, and we shall insure their crimes are punished."

card.name: Deafening Thunder
card.text:
Thunder
Battle: Bow this card and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it a Force penalty equal to this Shugenja's Chi. If its Force is now 0 or this Shugenja is Thunder, you may destroy this card; if you did, take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: She opened her mouth as if to shout, but thunder was all that the Crane legion heard, or would ever hear again.

card.name: Master of Beasts
card.text:
Maho
Battle/Open: Even if this card is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja and target one or two Shadowlands Nonhumans: Straighten them.
card.flavor: "I want Omoni!" Chuda Seki hissed to the others. "Find him! With his secrets made ours, we will change the face of the Empire forever!"

card.name: Extend the Soul's Boundaries
card.text:
Void
This card enters play paying 1 less Gold for each Ring you control.
Battle: Destroy this card, bow this Shugenja, destroy him unless he is Void, and target an enemy Personality: His controller may shuffle him and his attachments back into their owner's decks. If he did not choose this, take two additional Battle actions.

card.name: Step Through the Void
card.text:
Void
Battle/Open: Destroy this card unless this Shugenja is Void: Remove this Shugenja from the game; his attachments stay attached. Before this turn ends, put his unit into play, ignoring costs, entering-play effects, and restrictions.
card.flavor: "All places are one, when the tapestry of the universe is folded upon itself. Make use of the Void, and all is possible." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Immolation
card.text:
Fire
This Shugenja has +3F, or +4F while he is Fire.
card.flavor: "There are a myriad of uses for the power and majesty of fire. Frankly, however, my favorite is the most obvious one." - Isawa Koiso

card.name: Nature's Wrath
card.text:
Earth
If this Shugenja is Earth, he may perform this card's Battle action even if it is in your home.
Battle: Bow this card and target your Nonhuman Personality: If he would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "By the Fortunes!" the scout screamed.

card.name: Peace of the Kami
card.text:
Water • Kami
If this Shugenja is Water, he may perform this card's Battle action even if it is in your home.
Battle: Bow this card and target your Personality or Follower: Negate all current effects on it from other player's cards. Negate its (current and new) Force penalties from actions. If it is a Spirit, straighten it.
card.flavor: "The mercy of the spirits is vast, my brother."

card.name: The Earth's Strength
card.text:
Earth • Water
Battle: Bow this card and target your Earth or Water Shugenja: Straighten him. Gain 1 Honor if he is an Alchemist and opposed.
Reaction: Before an action resolves, bow this card and target a defending Personality: Negate his movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "The statue came to life! Briefly!" - Agasha Kurou

card.name: Suitengu's Path
card.text:
Water
This Shugenja has Naval.
card.flavor: "Dragon of Thunder, Fortune of the Sea," she whispered, "grant me your wisdom, that I might do your will." The sea surged, and took form.

card.name: Brotherhood Schism
card.text:
Open: Until the turn ends, Rings will not enter play if their owner has already put a Ring into play this turn.
Limited: Target an Event in another player's discard pile: End all of its ongoing effects. Shuffle it into its owner's deck.
card.flavor: The proliferaction of Fudoism throughout the Colonies led to heated discussions among certain sects as to what the Brotherhood's response should be.

card.name: Military Promotion
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Tactician and target your Personality: He may assign even if bowed. Give him Elite (Elite cards contribute Force even if bowed).
card.flavor: "Your deeds have gained much glory for the clan, my friend. People, important people, have taken notice."

card.name: Black Marketeering
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality whose unit's total Gold cost is 10 or lower: He defects. Take control of him (he joins your army). Dishonor him. Destroy any of his Followers whose Honor Requirement he now fails to meet. Give control of him to his owner before the turn ends.
card.flavor: "This artifact is one of a kind, my friends. If you find my price unacceptable, perhaps we can make an arrangement for certain... favors?"

card.name: Ruthless Onslaught
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: The next time this battle another player's Battle action would target one of your cards, it targets your performer, if legal. If he has 7 or more base Force, you may take an additional Battle action (after this action ends).
card.flavor: Hida Kaiji leapt from the tower, plummeting nearly one hundred feet to attack the things that had emerged from the jungle. He landed unharmed. His battle cry, his comrades knew, was as much anguish over his survival as rage.

card.name: An Insult Answered
card.text:
Iaijutsu • Revenge
Reaction: After another player's performed Limited or Open action resolves which caused you an Honor loss, choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target the action's performer: Your Duelist duels the target. Destroy the duel's loser. Give the duel's winner two +1F Revenge tokens.
card.flavor: "Have you forgotten me, dog?"

card.name: Requesting Reinforcements
card.text: Battle: Bow your performing Scout and target a face-up Scout Personality in your province: Bring the target into play at the current battlefield, paying all costs. If you have Reconnaissance, you may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "There will come a time when you will find yourself at the mercy of enemies, and to survive and fulfill your duty, you will need aid. Do not be so proud that the rest of us must carry your burden after your death." - Tsuruchi Nobukatsu

card.name: Ceaseless Vigil
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, straighten a Personality.
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Yojimbo: The next time (this turn) another player's action would target one of your Personalities, it targets the Yojimbo instead, if legal. You may take an additional action.
card.flavor: At its zenith, the Obsidian Moon's faint light filtered in and highlighted the rapt, alert face of the dutiful yojimbo.

card.name: Debt to the Kaiu
card.text: Limited: Permanently give each of your provinces +1 strength.
card.flavor: "In times of peace, when coffers are filling and defense is on the minds of all just lords, why should the Kaiu not be called upon often? And why should we not receive just compensation for our time and skill?" - Kaiu Onizuka

card.name: Defensive Blockade
card.text: Battle: Target an attacking Follower or Personality without attachments: It does not contribute Force to its army's total Force this battle.
card.flavor: "Cut the bridge. Send scouts to find if there is another way reinforcements could reach the enemy."

card.name: Shield Formation
card.text: Battle: Target your defending Personality: Give him and each of his Followers +3F.
card.flavor: "The differences from traditional formations are subtle, but important. The strength of this form is magnified tenfold, and that is why we use it." - Akodo Uehara

card.name: Two Stings
card.text:
Battle: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 4 Attack.
Battle: If this card is in your discard pile, bow your performing Personality or Follower: Ranged 4 Attack. Remove this card from the game.
card.flavor: A Wasp never strikes a single time.

card.name: Dragon Tattoo - exp
card.text:
Fire • Tattoo • Experienced
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality who has not performed an action from a Dragon Tattoo this game: He is imbued with the mystical power of the Dragon. Permanently give him the ability, "Fire Limited: Give this Personality a +1F Fire token."
card.flavor: "Our name is a common term. Some tend to forget the power it bespeaks." - Togashi Noboru

card.name: Exchange of Letters
card.text: Open: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target another player's unbowed Personality: Neither may perform actions this phase.
card.flavor: Ties of friendship, ties of duty, even ties of blood... all require effort to maintain over such distances as between the Empire and the Colonies.

card.name: Martial Manipulation
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Control
Limited: Choose your performing Samurai and target another player's Personality: Neither Personality may be assigned to battlefields.
card.flavor: Whether one warrior to another, or one army to another, the battlefield can be used for treachery as well as violence.

card.name: Unsettling Doubts
card.text:
Open: Target a Ring which did not last enter play by its own text: This is not true enlightenment. Permanently remove its abilities.
Limited: Target one or more cards in your provinces: Discard them. Refill the provinces face-up from the bottom of your deck.
card.flavor: Hesitation, particularly when justified, can be disastrous.

card.name: My Lord's Favor
card.text:
Political
Open: Choose your performing Personality: Take the Imperial Favor.
Battle/Open: Discard the Imperial Favor and target your unit: Straighten it.
card.flavor: "Make sure that he is given all that he requires in order to discharge his duty."

card.name: Vengeful Dismissal
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Personality and target an enemy Personality with lower Chi: Move him home.
card.flavor: "Now it is the Mantis who have no time for your foolishness, old man. Did you think we had forgotten your insult?"

card.name: Exquisite Gifts
card.text:
Political
Battle/Open: Target one to three non-Ring cards in discard piles: Remove them from the game.
Limited: Choose your performing Personality: Permanently give him the ability, "Limited: Bow this Personality: He humbles his enemies with a gift. Gain 1 Honor, or 2 Honor if he is an Artisan."

card.name: Out of My Sight!
card.text: Open: Target another player's Personality: Permanently give him Brash (the Defender may draw a card after a Brash card is assigned to attack).
card.flavor: "Color your words any way you like, Lion, but the Unicorn will not cede control of the Ki-Rin's Path to you or anyone else! The Empress has given us our task, and we shall fulfill it ourselves!"

card.name: Turning Away
card.text:
Kiho
As a Focus Effect: You may discard your Personality in this duel (ending the duel without resolution).
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, choose your performing Monk at any location and bow your target Ring: Give the current battlefield's province +3 or -3 strength.
card.flavor: "What did you seek here?"

card.name: Sharing Gossip
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Courtier: After this action ends (and this card is in your discard pile), gain 1 Honor for each card titled Sharing Gossip in all player's discard piles.
card.flavor: "Honorable samurai never gossip, of course. They simply share stories about interesting people." - Doji Dainagon

card.name: Imperial Protection
card.text:
Political
Open: Target a Personality: After the next time this turn he is assigned to attack, dishonor him and his controller loses Honor equal to his base Personal Honor.
Open: Each of your provinces has +2 strength for each dishonorable Personality attacking it.
card.flavor: The Empress's presence calms the inflamed soul.

card.name: Learning
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality and a Battle Strategy in another player's discard pile: Its abilities may be used an additional time this turn. Your Personality copies a keyword on an enemy Personality. You may take an additional action to play the Strategy for one of its actions. After it resolves, remove it from the game.
card.flavor: "Nice trick." - Yoritomo Akukiho

card.name: Manipulate Energies
card.text:
Kiho
Open: Choose your performing unbowed Henshin and target a Personality: Permanently give him, or remove from him, Cavalry, Naval, or Tactician.
card.flavor: "We are all capable of wonders, but so few of us are capable of believing it. It requires discipline and practice to become what we are." - Asako Karachu

card.name: Turning the Story
card.text:
Political
Reaction: Before a Proclaim action resolves: Negate its effects.
card.flavor: "Yes, the story of your cousin's battle is quite entertaining," Bayushi Shibata said. "Equally entertaining is the story of what he was doing in that district at the time. Allow me to tell it."

card.name: Courting Trouble
card.text: Open: Target another player's face-up Personality in or out of play: Permanently give him Overconfident (each other player may draw a card after an Overconfident card enters or leaves play).
card.flavor: "Ships can be very dangerous places, and the sea gives no testimony. Other clans should talk softly in our waters, because they do not know the risks they run." - Yoritomo Iwashi

card.name: Determined Challenge
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing unbowed attacking Personality and target an enemy Personality: Move the target to the current battlefield. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "There is no room for doubt when you are guarding one of the Walls. Find your foe and destroy it. That is all there is." - Hida Watari

card.name: Embracing Battle
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, bow the winner.
Limited: Choose your performing Paragon: He may assign even if bowed. Give him Elite (Elite cards contribute Force even if bowed).
card.flavor: "It matters not what it does, as long as it gives opportunity. Only in battle will my name shine." - Daigotsu Aya

card.name: Wide Valley
card.text:
Terrain
Before an action's effect destroys a card in a unit: Negate the destruction.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "The valley has been the sight of a hundred battles over a thousand years, but somehow it always endures. It is beyond destruction." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Fair Warning
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: After this duel ends, if your Personality won it, you may give a Personality -4F.
Open: Target another player's Personality: After the next time this turn he is assigned to attack or is destroyed, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: Most clans value misdirection in war, at least in varying degrees. The Crab are unique in that they show their opponents exactly what to expect from them.

card.name: Shifting Terrain
card.text:
Terrain
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
Reaction: If this card is in play, when another player's action would target one of your Personalities, choose your performing Personality: The action targets him instead, if legal.
card.flavor: "If you are unsteady, so too is the ground you touch."

card.name: Virtuous Charity
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Compassion
Open: If it is not your turn, choose another player: You come across some starving peasants in need. You, then the player, each pay zero or more Gold. Whoever paid more Gold gains Honor equal to the difference between the two amounts paid, or 4, whichever is less.
card.flavor: Charity and virtue are often one.

card.name: Incriminating Testimony
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target an enemy Personality: Bow him. Give this battlefield's province a strength bonus equal to your Courtier's Chi.
card.flavor: "Stay your blade, Yusugi. You will only justify him to the guards."

card.name: Metsubushi
card.text:
Ninja
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja: Ranged 4 Attack. The next time this battle the enemy leader takes a Battle action, if it can legally target the Ninja, it must target him.
card.flavor: It is often difficult for a ninja's opponent to discern which attacks are merely distractions.

card.name: Unexpected Obstacle
card.text: Battle: Target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -4F.
card.flavor: "Spend little time on the plan, for the only thing that is certain is that everything will go wrong." - Tangen's Lies

card.name: Ingenuity
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate and target one or two Personalities: Dishonor them. Draw an additional card during your next End Phase.
card.flavor: "A little humiliation will be good for them." - Bayushi Makubesu

card.name: Sentinel Spirit
card.text: Open: If it is not your turn and the active player controls any Personalities, choose your performing unbowed Spirit: After the next Dynasty Phase begins, if it was opposed this turn, gain 2 Honor, and if no units were assigned to attack this turn, gain 3 Honor if your Honor is lower than each other player's.
card.flavor: "When one prepares for war, one should be prepared to see anything. Anything." - Kitsu Sorano

card.name: Sticks and Stones
card.text: Battle: Ranged 1 Attack. If the Ranged Attack destroyed a card, draw a card; if it destroyed a Follower, you may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "We cannot wield a katana, but we do not need one to deal with you, wretch!"

card.name: Advanced Intelligence
card.text:
You may only play one copy of Advanced Intelligence per battle.
Reaction: After a Recon Strategy's action resolves: Draw one card for each action from a Recon Strategy you have taken this battle.
card.flavor: "My lord, I know where they are heading."

card.name: Testimony
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed honorable Personality and target a Personality with lower base Personal Honor: Dishonor or rehonor the target.
card.flavor: "I witnessed it myself," the samurai-ko said calmly, despite the murmurs.

card.name: The Arrow's Eye
card.text: Battle: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each Follower in the target's unit.
card.flavor: He had just enough time to see the blur before his world narrowed to a single, red-black point.

card.name: Grappling the Snake
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk: After the next time (this turn) an action targets him, you may choose either to negate its effects on your Monk, or to bow the unit of one Personality that performed it after the action resolves. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "Getting closer was your mistake."

card.name: Urgency
card.text:
Political
Open: Each player may only take two more non-Reaction actions this phase.
Limited: Pay 2 Gold: Draw a card.
card.flavor: The clamor rose as everyone strove to be heard first.

card.name: Two Hands
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Kensai: You may take two additional Battle actions from cards in his unit. Other actions will not give you new additional Battle actions this battle.
card.flavor: He was the first to draw his sword, but he was not the last.

card.name: Sound the Retreat
card.text:
Kata
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata in play.
Battle: If this card is in play, choose your performing Personality: Move him home. If he moved, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "Better to get revenge another day," she said philosophically.

card.name: Harsh Taskmaster
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Commander and target a Follower in your hand or discard pile: Attach it to him, ignoring costs. Destroy it before this battle resolves. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "That is exactly what the reserves are for," he said coldly.

card.name: Dubious Resources
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Create a 2F Ronin Follower and attach it to him.
