card.flavor: "Gunso, assemble the legion!" the command came. "An enemy force approaches the city, and we will be ready to face them!"

card.name: Renyu's Wrath
card.text:
Siege • Unique
Battle: Bow this card and target a Region (at any location) or a Terrain: Destroy it.
Battle: Bow this card: Ranged 4 Attack, with +1 strength if this Personality is Siege or Earth.
card.flavor: "If this place will nto benefit us, it becomes just another problem. And we of the Crab understand what to do with problems."

card.name: Paneki's Mask
card.text:
Shadowlands • Unique
Limited: If this card is in your hand, target your dead Personality who was in play during your last turn: Bring him into play, ignoring costs and restrictions, and permanently give him Shadowlands • Undead. Attach this card to him (you must pay its cost). Lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "Strange how such a simple thing can be so unclean." - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Thunder Bow
card.text:
Thunder • Weapon
Negate other players' cards' effects that prevent this Personality from performing actions.
Battle/Open: Target your Personality at any location: Transfer this card to him.
card.flavor: "With it, the thunder in your soul is made manifest," Tsuruchi Shichiro said. "Show the Crane what that means."

card.name: Chiyurei's Axe
card.text:
Weapon
Attaches to Hida Chiyurei paying 2 less Gold.
You may compare Melee Attacks this Personality performs against their targets' base Force.
card.flavor: "I suppose you could call it a brutal weapon, but sometimes you need to kill brutal things. Katana are for honorable combat, not red butchery." - Hida Chiyurei

card.name: Anchored in Earth
card.text:
Earth
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this card and target your defending Spirit: Give it +3F and Elite (Elite cards contribute Force while bowed).
card.flavor: "Not all denizens of Chikushudo are gentle. Some can be roused to a brutality that puts the Hida to shame." - Asako Kyuudo

card.name: Scorching Lash
card.text:
Fire
This Shugenja has Duelist while he is Fire.
Battle/Open: Remove a non-Ring card in any discard pile from the game, and target a Personality: Give him +3F or -3F.
card.flavor: "Fire need not always completely destroy. Sometimes the ability to inflict harrowing pain is enough to stop a conflict." - Isawa Koiso

card.name: Blood Wave
card.text:
Maho
Battle: Even if this unit is not at the current battlefield, bow this Shugenja and destroy your target Personality or Follower: Two consecutive Ranged Attacks, each with strength equal to half your target's Force, rounded down.
card.flavor: "A proper tsukai finds uses even for his broken tools." - Chuda Niiro

card.name: Unbound Essence
card.text:
Void
Limited: Bow this Shugenja, destroy this card, and target a Personality who must be non-Unique unless this Shugenja is Void: Show cards from the top of the target's controller's Dynasty deck until you show a Personality or you show all cards in the deck. If you showed a Personality, overlay him on the target.

card.name: Opening the Veil
card.text:
Earth • Water
Your Stronghold has +1 Gold Production for each Spirit you control.
card.flavor: "The Spirit Realms outside our own can be difficult to reach, even for skilled shugenja. Certain places are closer to other Realms, however, and there this task is easier." - Kitsu Sorano

card.name: The Sky's Barrier
card.text:
Air
Battle: Destroy this card and target an attacking Personality: Give him Elite (Elite cards contribute Force even if bowed). He does not contribute Force while unbowed. If this Shugenja is Air, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You Moshi think you understand the sky, but you know only fury and not subtlety." - Asahina Akahiko

card.name: Blood of Isawa's Tribe
card.text: After this card attaches: Choose an element keyword (Air, Earth, Fire, Void, Water) in this Shugenja's keywords or text. While this card is attached, replace all instances of the keyword on this Shugenja with another element keyword that you choose now.
card.flavor: "Isawa was a visionary, but he lacked the stomach to adapt when his blood magic became corrupted. The Phoenix are not strong and wise in their art. They are simply cowards." - Chuda Hitaka

card.name: The Thunderer's Protection
card.text:
Thunder • Armor
This Personality has +4F.
Reaction: After an action targets a card in this unit, bow this card: Bow the action's performer (if any) after the action resolves.
card.flavor: "You should have stayed in your temples. The world is a dangerous place, Asahina-san." - Moshi Rukia

card.name: Read the Essence
card.text:
Void
Open: Bow this card and target one face-down card in a province, or one or two such cards if this Shugenja is Void: Turn the targets face-up.
card.flavor: "In the Void, all things are seen and heard. But if you wish to find just one man, you must learn to find a raindrop that has already fallen into a pool." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Path to Inner Peace
card.text:
Water
Battle/Open: Bow this card and target a Personality: Negate all Force penalties on him and other players' cards' effects that prevent him from performing actions.
card.flavor: "The wound is too deep for me to aid right now. Instead, I will give you a blessing to wash away the pain." - Isawa Mizuhama

card.name: Earth's Protection
card.text:
Earth
Battle: Bow this card and give the current battlefield's province a bonus, or a penalty if you are defending, from 1 up to its current strength: Give this Shugenja an equal Force bonus. Negate his next bowing or movement from other players' cards' effects if he is Earth.
card.flavor: "Borrowing the mountain's strength can be useful, if dangerous when done recklessly." - Tamori Yayu

card.name: Witness the Untold
card.text:
Void
Reaction: After your Ring enters play, bow this card: Look at the top three cards of your Dynasty or Fate deck. Put them back in any order.
card.flavor: "Some are blessed with a moment's glimpse into the infinite only once in their lifetime. But in that glimpse, all that is told and untold of the universe is seen, and a wise person can change their entire fate." - Isawa Tomohiro

card.name: Touch of the Night
card.text:
Ninja • Fear
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Ninja Personality: Give each Personality and Follower opposing him -2F.
card.flavor: The touch of the Ninube grows stronger in the corners of the world.

card.name: Overpower
card.text:
Open: If it is the active player's first or second turn: No Attack Phase may be declared.
Limited: Target your discarded (not dead) Personality: Put him into one of your provinces, discarding any card currently there.
card.flavor: "Fool! You insult me with your feeble strength."

card.name: Truce
card.text: Reaction: When paying for a Personality with a Clan alignment different than your own: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: The Imperial Legions stood at the walls of the Second City. Those trapped within began to find common ground where they once held none.

card.name: Bamboo Tattoo
card.text:
Tattoo
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Tattooed Personality: Permanently give him Stalwart (Stalwart cards negate their first bowing each turn by other players' cards).
card.flavor: "Bamboo endures, and so do I."

card.name: Charge Into Danger
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: If he assigned to, or would be opposed at, the current battlefield, move him there. If his base Force is 7 or higher, straighten him.
card.flavor: The berserkers of the Crab leap into the heart of danger, caution thrown to the wind. This tactic rarely works for those without their insanity.

card.name: Sudden Blockade
card.text: Open: If it is not the active player's first turn, target a province: Cards will not enter play from the province (this turn).
card.flavor: The ships of the Mantis Clan appeared without warning. The menace in their actions was unmistakable.

card.name: A Close Call
card.text:
Reaction: After a Personality with an Armor is targeted by a Melee or Ranged Attack: Negate its effects.
Battle: Target a Personality with an attachment: Give him +2F.
card.flavor: He charged into the rain of arrows without hesitation. His trust in his armorer was absolute.

card.name: Imprudent Misstep
card.text:
Political
Limited: Target another player with 30 or more Family Honor: He commits a public breach of etiquette. He loses 5 Honor.
card.flavor: No samurai climbs quite so high that he can safely disregard propriety. Carelessness is the fortunate man's undoing.

card.name: Vital Pathways
card.text:
Terrain
After this battlefield's province is destroyed, if you are the Attacker: Draw a card, or two cards if your current army was ever opposed during this battle.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: The Colonies had built few major roads when the Imperial Legion arrived. Control of seemingly insignificant pathways proved vital. - The Imperial Histories

card.name: Mutual Support
card.text: Battle: Choose two or more of your performing opposed Personalities, each with a different Clan alignment: Give each performer +2F.
card.flavor: "A pity you came here. Our Hiruma friends have some concerns with your behavior."

card.name: Courteous Gift
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Courtesy
Limited: Bow your performing Samurai, target a face-up card in a province, and choose another player: He may draw a card. Reduce the target's Gold Cost (this turn) by 2, or 4 if the player drew a card.
card.flavor: "A proper guest always offers a gift, to show appreciation to his host." - Lady Doji

card.name: Suck the Marrow
card.text:
Maho • Plague
Open: Bow and destroy your performing Shugenja and target a Personality: Give the target a -1F/-1C Poison token. Lose 3 Honor. Until the game ends, after each Events Phase begins, give the target a -1F/-1C Poison token.
card.flavor: "Not the strongest maho curse, but one of the most debilitating." - Kuni Renyu

card.name: Generational Gap
card.text: Open: Target two Personalities with the same Family name: They may not be assigned to the same battlefield.
card.flavor: One generation raised during a time of war, and another raised during a time of peace. The differences in philosophy can be significant, and even family bonds can be tested.

card.name: Warded Premises
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle's resolution: Negate all Force bonuses from actions to cards at this battlefield.
Battle: Even if you control no units at the current battlefield, if there is no Terrain in play there: Put this card into play there.
card.flavor: "Even the most serene places can become a place of death. All that is required is intent." - Ikoma Satoru

card.name: Defensive Stance
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing bowed Personality: Straighten him. Give him +3F.
card.flavor: The arrival of the Imperial forces touched off a series of events both predictable and amazing. In all quarters of the Second City, inside and out, samurai prepared to defend honor and clan the best way they knew how. - Chronicle of the Orchid Lands, Part I

card.name: Drain of Effort
card.text:
Open: Until this phase ends or a player has discarded two cards from this effect, after each action other than this one resolves, its player discards a card.
Open: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Clearly, claims must be checked, but this is getting out of hand. No sooner do we resolve one claim dispute when two more take its place! It is as if some malevolent force is directing it all." Kitsuki Jakuei

card.name: Duty Over All Things
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing discarded Yojimbo: If he would be opposed, bring him into play at the current battlefield, paying 3 less Gold if you control a Courtier or Shugenja.
card.flavor: "I would have preferred to go to the next world without ever spilling the blood of your noble people. Unfortunately for us both, my duty demanded otherwise."

card.name: Calling the Darkness
card.text: Limited: Bow your performing Personality: Give him three +1F tokens and permanently give him Shadowlands. Straighten him before the turn ends. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "No member of the Empire may be tainted without their consent. But now that war has come, how many are secretly begging my father for his blessings?" - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Now We Are Enemies
card.text: Battle: Target two Personalities in the same army that do not share a Clan alignment: Give each target -3F.
card.flavor: Under the press of events, alliances shifted and died. Samurai who had served together for years now found themselves on opposite sides of a battle. - Chronicle of the Orchid Lands, Part II

card.name: Bonds of Hospitality
card.text:
Political
Limited: Target a bowed Personality: Put this card into play. While this card remains in play, negate the target's straightening, and his controller has the ability "Open: Pay 4 Gold: Discard a Bonds of Hospitality."
card.flavor: "No, Bayushi-san, I could not send you out into that terrible rain. I will pour you a cup of tea, and we can discuss the Tao." - Kitsuki Yutaku

card.name: A Threat Enacted
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed non-Duelist Courtier Personality, target a Personality with equal or lower Personal Honor, and discard the Imperial Favor: Destroy a non-Unique card in his unit without attachments. Dishonor him (if he is still in play).
card.flavor: "You were warned, and yet you persisted."

card.name: A Cleansing Breath
card.text: Battle/Open: Target your Personality at any location: He centers himself. Negate other players' cards' effects that prevent him assigning, moving or performing actions. If he is a Kensai, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "We do not know why the Lion have attacked the Spider encampments with our advisors. They have brought no testimony, levied no charges. While we find the truth of the matter, we cannot simply allow this to go unanswered." - Mirumoto Kojinrue

card.name: Shifting Waves
card.text:
Kiho
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Henshin and target a Personality: Switch the target's Force and Chi.
card.flavor: "In one moment, the monk was on her feet, all traces of serenity replaced by a fury I would never thought her capable of."

card.name: Kitsuki Judgment
card.text:
Political
Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Magistrate, target a Human Personality, and pay Gold equal to his unit's total Gold Cost, +8 unless he is dishonorable, Kolat, Ninja, or Shadowlands: He commits seppuku.
card.flavor: "It appears the Lion are not baseless in their claims, Daigotsu-san. There will be repercussions to both clans for the Dragon who have died over this dispute."

card.name: Harmony
card.text:
Void • Kiho
Open: Choose your performing Monk: Permanently give him the trait, "You may bow this card instead of bowing a Ring to pay a cost."
card.flavor: "It is a simple truth that so many seekers would ignore - we do not search for enlightenment. We are enlightened; we simply do not realize it." - Yung

card.name: Martyr's Call
card.text: Battle/Open: Destroy your performing Paragon and target one or two of your other Personalities: Give them +3F and Stalwart (Stalwart cards negate their first bowing each turn by other players' cards).
card.flavor: "They are powerful, but they are merely flesh. I will show you!"

card.name: Without Mercy
card.text:
Dark Virtue • Determination
Reaction: After a Battle action performed by your Samurai Personality resolves, if the action did not target an enemy card: Take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "Why are you reaching for this, Kakita-san? I was told your school only requires one strike." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Nocturnal Attack
card.text:
Ninja
Limited: Bow your performing Ninja Personality: The option to create an Attack Phase comes after the Dynasty Phase this turn.
card.flavor: "I wish to speak to the disgraceful abomination that calls itself the Shadow Dragon. Kill anyone you must to make this happen." - Bayushi Kazutoshi

card.name: Ready the Defenses
card.text: Open: Choose your performing Personality and target a province: While at the province's battlefields, other players' Personalities and Followers have -1F and, if your performer is a Tactician, your Personalities and Followers there have +1F.
card.flavor: "We have little information on their exact strength, but we must assume it is a complete Imperial Legion and plan accordingly." - Akodo Chiyo

card.name: Recruitment Effort
card.text: Open: Destroy your target non-Unique Holding: Create a 3F/3C/2PH Samurai Personality.
card.flavor: "The Mantis have assets we cannot counter through politics, to be sure, but there is very little that cannot be countered with unlimited wealth." - Doji Iza

card.name: Scandalous Gossip
card.text:
Political
Open: If (and only if) this card is in your discard pile, remove it from the game and target a player: He must choose and bow one of his unbowed Personalities, if possible. Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "They say the Imperials were dispatched by the Empress herself in order to rein in the Governor! Can you imagine such a thing?"

card.name: Ambush Tactics
card.text:
Recon
Battle: Bow your performing Personality: Ranged 3 Attack with +2 strength if your performer is a Scout. You may move him home.
card.flavor: With the government of the Colonies distracted by the events at the Second City, skirmishes among the Great Clans became increasingly frequent, and increasingly deadly.

card.name: Imperial Deployment
card.text:
Imperial
Open: Choose your performing Personality: The Empress dispatches him to the Colonies. Negate other players' cards' effects that prevent him assigning. After the next time this turn an attack is declared, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "Go and bring law to the lawless." - Utaku Ji-Yun

card.name: Trusting Instinct
card.text:
Reaction: After a Ranged or Melee attack is targeted: Give it -2 strength.
Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Move him to a battlefield where he would be opposed.
card.flavor: "Your belly can perceive things your mind cannot. It can tell you how to act, even before the threat has appeared. A samurai trusts his belly. This is called 'Haragei.'" - Mirumoto's "Niten"

card.name: Tactical Sacrifice
card.text: Limited: Choose your performing unbowed Commander, destroy his performing Follower, and target a Follower, or Personality without attachments, with Gold Cost equal to or less than twice your Follower's Gold Cost: Destroy the target.
card.flavor: "There comes a time when the value of a vassal must be weighed against the value of victory. This is the unfortunate reality of war." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Improper Papers
card.text: Reaction: Before an action resolves, target a Personality: Negate his movement from the action's effects.
card.flavor: "A thousand pardons, but it appears these papers are inadequate to pass the border."

card.name: The Last Move
card.text:
Political
Battle: Destroy your performing unbowed Courtier and target an enemy Personality: Dishonor him. You may target and destroy a card without attachments in his unit.
card.flavor: For all their perceived faults, many still underestimate the lengths of a Scorpion's devotion.

card.name: Spiritual Coelescence
card.text: Battle/Open: Destroy your performing Spirit Personality and target another Spirit Personality: Give it a permanent Force bonus equal to the performer's Force. It permanently copies the performer's abilities which do not themselves copy abilities. You may take an additional action.
card.flavor: All things echo in ways man cannot perceive.

card.name: Avenging the Fallen
card.text: Battle: Choose your performing Personality: Straighten him. If another player's Battle action has destroyed one of your Personalities this battle, negate the performer's next destruction from cards' effects (this turn).
card.flavor: An oath to avenge fallen comrades is gravely serious. Nothing else can exist in the warrior's mind once the promise is spoken. A samurai's word and deed are as one.

card.name: The Passing of Tradition
card.text:
Battle/Open: Choose your performing Personality and target your Personality: The performer permanently copies a keyword from the target, other than Courtier, Samurai, or Shugenja.
Limited: Target your discarded Personality: Put him into ones of your provinces (face-up) discarding the card currently there.
card.flavor: "May the ways of our ancestors live on in you."

card.name: In the Right
card.text:
Political
Battle: Bow your performing Courtier at any location and target one or more attacking cards, up to half your Courtier's Chi, rounded down: Bow the targets.
card.flavor: "The only excuse the Mantis have for their attacks is greed for power and plunder," the Crane said. "What else would you expect?"

card.name: Forgotten Teachings
card.text: Open: Target another player's Sensei Personality: Remove all traits and abilities from him (this turn).
card.flavor: "The young learn too late that they ought to learn from the past." - Moto Taha

card.name: Eye of the Sword
card.text:
Iaijutsu
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Duelist and target an enemy Personality: Your Personality duels the target. Give the winner two +1F tokens. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "Victory in a duel is the purest kind." - Doji Genshin

card.name: Spoils of Exploration
card.text:
Kata
After a battle resolution ends in which you destroyed an army or province: Draw a card.
Limited: Put this card into play. Discard all your other Kata in play.
card.flavor: "Surely my lord will not notice if a few baubles go missing."

card.name: Forest Cover
card.text:
Recon
Reaction: After engaging, choose your performing Scout Personality at the current battlefield: You have Reconnaissance there. You may attach a Follower to him from your hand or discard pile, paying all costs. If you did, draw an additional card during your next End Phase.
card.flavor: "Very satisfying when they realize we were there all along."

card.name: Frozen in Place
card.text: Battle/Open: Target a Personality: Give him -3F/-1C.
card.flavor: "It's amusing, the look they get when it dawns on them that the only way to escape justice is to grow wings." - Hiruma Akio

card.name: Pierce the Tapestry
card.text:
Kiho • Void
You may include up to seven copies of this card in your deck.
Battle: Choose your performing unbowed Monk and target an enemy Personality or Follower: Give it -3F. If it has no attachments and you have played two or more other Pierce the Tapestry this battle, destroy it. If this did not destroy it, you may take an additional Battle action to play a Pierce the Tapestry.

card.name: Harbor of Kalani's Landing
card.text:
Port • Terrain
Negate Personalities' movement to or from this battlefield.
Battle: If there is no Terrain in play at the current battlefield: Put this card into play there. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "We will return every fire to them tenfold." - Moshi Rukia

card.name: Journey's End Keep - exp
card.text:
Imperial • Experienced
"Imperial" is a Clan alignment, and it is your Clan alignment. You may not buy Personalities with Clan discount if Imperial is their only Clan alignment. If no other player has an Imperial Stronghold, you begin the game with the Imperial Favor. This card does not produce Gold when paying for Personalities.

card.name: Kenro-ji-jin's Bounty
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Reaction: When paying for a Farm: Produce 1 Gold.
Limited: Discard this card: Your Farms produce 1 additional Gold when they bow to produce Gold (this turn).
card.flavor: "Few samurai regularly pay homage to the Fortune of Soil, but all should. His largesse permits our very survival." - Agasha Kurou

card.name: Diplomacy Talks
card.text:
Unique
Until your next turn begins, after each time a player creates an Attack Phase, destroy his rightmost province.
card.flavor: "The Crane are masters of diplomacy, but have encountered few foes as recalcitrant as the Mantis. Still, in the aftermath of the battle, even the Mantis desired peace." - Asako Kikugoro

card.name: Colonial Farm
card.text:
Farm
Enters play paying 1 less Gold if you are a Lion Clan player.
Bow this card: Produce 5 Gold.
Limited: Bow this card and target your Personality: Create a 1F Ashigaru Follower and attach it to him.
card.flavor: As with the Empire, the Colonies depend upon them.

card.name: Seppun Barru
card.text:
Imperial • Samurai • Commander
Battle: Give your Followers in Barru's army +1F.
card.flavor: "The commander has entrusted to me the safe-keeping of Journey's End City and the supply chain that ensures the Imperial Legion is prepared for anything. I will do precisely that."

card.name: Fusako
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Duelist • Unique
Iaijutsu Limited: Target another player's Personality: Fusako challenges the target. His controller may bow him; if he is now bowed, he may refuse the duel. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "My mother once walked the path of the wave man. She came to serve the Dragon, and was a great hero. I shall walk her path again, and my greatness shall eclipse even hers."

card.name: Renewed Lands
card.text: After a Farm Holding enters play from this province: Give it a +1 Gold Production token and refill this province face-up.
card.flavor: "I do not understand. A year ago this land was dead." - Matsu Koyama

card.name: Daifuke
card.text: Open: Target another player's Follower or Personality: Switch the target's and this card's Force.
card.flavor: "Self-righteous buffoon! Do you think your ridiculous philosophy makes you a better man? A better warrior? I will see your innards in the dirt!"

card.name: Furugaro
card.text:
Fudo
Limited: Destroy this card and target Fudo: Give him two Charging tokens.
card.flavor: "I know my path is true. Your path is of no concern to me. Insist upon confronting me, and you shall be shattered on the mountain of my certainty."

card.name: Peace Treaty
card.text: Limited: If there are more than two players, choose a player. He may choose to sign a peace treaty with you. If he chose this, then until your next Events Phase begins, neither of you may declare an attack against, or ally against, the other. If he did not choose this, you gain 3 Honor and he loses 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "I want to know the truth behind this Battle of Ten Thousand Martyrs. If that means peace, then so be it." - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Sanctuary of the Waves
card.text:
Water
Battle: Bow this card and target this Shugenja, or, if this Shugenja is Water, you may target another of your Personalities: Move the target to the current battlefield if he would be opposed there. Straighten him if he moved.
card.flavor: "The sea is a thing of great destructive power, but also great mercy and salvation." - Asako Chukage

card.name: Interrogation
card.text:
Reaction: Before another player's action resolves: Negate its effects that bow, destroy, or discard your Holdings, Regions, or Terrains in play.
Open: Pay 2 Gold: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "We know you were involved in the blighting of our lands, Spider. That you will not confess is meaningless. Now we have a much more important question, and one you will answer: what weapon brought about this renewal?"

card.name: Lantern of Revelation
card.text:
Nemuranai
Limited: Look at the top card of one of your decks. You may put it at the bottom.
card.flavor: "It sees perfectly in any darkness, revealing all that its light falls upon. I find it a wretched inconvenience and would see it destroyed." - Shosuro Hawado

card.name: Summon Fushicho
card.text: Limited: Bow this Shugenja and destroy this card: Search your Fate deck for an Item, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "In times of great peril, it can be quite an advantage to hold the favor of the Celestial Heavens and its denizens."

card.name: Fudo's Assurances
card.text:
Fudo • Unique
Battle/Open: Straighten a Ring.
Open: If you control five Fudo Rings that last entered play by their own text, destroy a Province.
card.flavor: "Seek your own path. Ignore the philosophies thrust upon you by others. Only you can choose that which is right for you." - The writings of Fudo

card.name: Hantei's Guidance
card.text:
Kami • Unique
The rulebook's Favor Political Battle action has Absent for you, and you may target any Personality with it. (Absent actions can be taken without presence.)
Political Interrupt: Discard this Celestial. Negate a Political action.
card.flavor: The resolve of Rokugan's first Emperor was unshakable.

card.name: P'an Ku's Madness
card.text:
Dragon • Unique
Limited: Give a target card a Madness token.
Open: Discard this Celestial. A target Personality with a Madness token cannot attack or defend.
card.flavor:
Power of Heaven
Essence of the mortal world
All lost to madness.

card.name: The Madness Spreads
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Until your second turn from now begins, once per turn, you may take a Limited action on a Strategy as an Open action.
card.flavor: Even in the simplest of activities, the madness began to manifest itself among those who seemed most unlikely...

card.name: Dark Audience
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Search your Fate deck for two attachments with different titles. Show them. Another player chooses one of them and removes it from the game. Put the other attachment in your hand.
card.flavor: With the truth behind the Blood revealed, the other clans sent their finest to petition the Spider for its use.

card.name: Rampant Paranoia
card.text: Limited: Until your next turn begins, other players' cards will not destroy your Personalities in a defending army.
card.flavor: "Commander, how can we know if those outside the gates are corrupted?"

card.name: Riot in the Second City
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Each player targets and bows an unbowed Samurai.
card.flavor: In the year 1199, according to the Isawa calendar, the previously unseen influence of the mad dragon, P'an Ku, reached into the hearts of many within the Colonies, and the result was madness and suffering on an undreamt of scale.

card.name: The Empire's Foe Exposed
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Target two Unique Personalities in play, exactly one of which is yours. Your Personality challenges the other Personality. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: Doji Hakuseki looked upon the face of the being that had threatened her Empire, and she felt the sin of hate in her heart.

card.name: An End to Hostilities
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Until the game ends, each player draws two cards instead of one at the end of his turn if he put no other cards in his hand that turn.
card.flavor: With the news of P'an Ku's involvement, the Governor and the Commander agreed to set aside their conflict in the interest of a greater threat.

card.name: The Second Battle of Beiden Pass
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Until the game ends, this Province does not hold Dynasty cards and has +10 Province Strength.
card.flavor: "There are times in history when madness has inspired incredible victories," Ikoma Natsu said. "How am I to feel about this?"

card.name: An Empire of Madness
card.text:
Unique
Until the game ends, each player has the ability, "Open: Your target Personality with a Madness token commits Seppuku" and any player who ends his turn with 20 or more Madness tokens on his Personalities loses the game.
card.flavor: Through the haze and the veil of time, the magistrates beheld a terrible sight... a land ruled by fear and madness.

card.name: False Ring of Fire
card.text:
Fire • Fudo • Unique
Does not count towards an Enlightenment Victory.
Open: If your maximum hand size is 10 or more, put this Ring into play and lose 2 Honor.
Interrupt, [BOW]: Reduce all Honor gains and losses from an action by 2.
card.flavor: Passion.

card.name: Border Keep - exp2
card.text:
Experienced 2 • Unique
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if paying for a Holding.
Limited: Once or twice during your first turn (only), put one or more cards in your Provinces at the bottom of your deck, refilling them face-up.
card.flavor: As the madness grew, the clans secured their borders for fear that it would consume them all.

card.name: Recruitment Station
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle/Open, [PAY *], [BOW]: Equip a Follower, paying 2 less Gold.
card.flavor: "Weapons, armor, maps, rations... whatever you require, it can be found here. Use it sparingly, that those who come after might make use of it as well."

card.name: Temple of Tengen
card.text:
Temple • Unique
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited, [BOW]: Draw a card. Discard a card.
card.flavor: "Gather the lore and the secrets of the Colonies, and we shall return it to the Empire. The Phoenix alone shall not harvest such bounty." - Rokkaku

card.name: Colonial Dojo
card.text: [BOW]: When paying for a non-Unique Samurai, he enters play for 0 Gold.
card.flavor: "My Lion brothers, others may have mocked us for the hours we spent in the dojo. But it was those lessons, that strength, that brotherhood, from which we have gained the strength to resist this madness. Now to the streets! And let us bring order to the city once more!"

card.name: Colonial Temple
card.text:
Temple
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
[BOW]: When paying for an attachment, it enters play for 4 less Gold.
card.flavor: "Draw strength from prayer and from within, my brothers. Seek the wisdom of the Heavens and the failings of the flesh and the mind cannot overcome your strength of spirit."

card.name: Questionable Merchant
card.text:
Retainer
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle: Move a target attacking Personality home. Destroy this Holding.
card.flavor: "This draught will protect you from the unfortunate business of the day, my friend. There may be some ill effects, yes, but you will not go mad. That's something, isn't it?"

card.name: Fudoist Advisor
card.text:
Fudo • Retainer • Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your Province and refill it face-up.)
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited,[BOW]: Destroy a Madness token.
card.flavor: Even heretics have their uses.

card.name: Temple of Madness
card.text:
Temple
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited, [BOW]: Give a target card a Madness token.
card.flavor: "You worship your gods, samurai, and I shall worship mine. Look at the Colonies and ask yourself, which is more powerful?" - Takujin

card.name: Suikihime's Chambers
card.text:
Imperial
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold, or 4 Gold if paying for a Unique Personality.
Limited, [BOW]: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "It has briefly been my prison, perhaps, but this plague of madness shall see it once again my throne." - Otomo Suikihime

card.name: Hida O-Ushi - inexp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Bully • Samurai • Inexperienced • Loyal • Unique
Limited: Bow a target Personality with lower Force.
card.flavor: "My grandmother was beautiful and powerful, feared and yet desired by all who knew her. Would that I could have known her, to rejoice in such a perfect daughter of Hida." - Hida Kisada

card.name: Hiruma Nikaru, the Flesh Eater - exp2
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Fallen • Experienced 2 • Unique
After Nikaru enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Nikaru uses his printed Force as his duel stat.
card.flavor: "Tear your flesh! Drink your bones! Everything about honor is a lie, and I will show you the truth in pain and suffering!"

card.name: Kuni Renyu - exp2
card.text:
Crab Clan • Daimyo • Earth • Jade • Magistrate • Witch Hunter • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Shugenja • Unique
After Renyu enters play, create a 1F Dog • Nonhuman Follower and attach it to him.
Earth Battle: Bow a target enemy card with Shadowlands or without attachments.
card.flavor: "This land is a festering cesspool. I would say let the madness claim it, but that it might threaten the Empire."

card.name: Hiruma Ogata
card.text:
Crab Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Scout
After Ogata enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Ogata has +1F for each opposing Madness token.
card.flavor: "You want to see it?! You want to see the darkness we have held at bay?!"

card.name: Yasuki Tono - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Experienced • Unique
Open, [BOW]: Straighten a target Holding or Shosuro Kameyoi.
card.flavor:
"Your methods are disgraceful," Renyu sneered.

"I do only what I must, to prove worthy of a woman I do not deserve," Tono countered.

card.name: Doji Hakuseki - exp3
card.text:
Crane Clan • First Magistrate • Imperial • Magistrate • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced 3 • Unique
After you Proclaim another Personality: Gain 1 Honor.
Iaijutsu Battle: Hakuseki challenges a target enemy Personality. Bow the duel's loser. Destroy the duel's loser if the duel was against The Dark Naga.
card.flavor: "At last I know my enemy."

card.name: Kakita Hideo, the Fallen Keeper - exp2
card.text:
Crane Clan • Fallen • Keeper of Obsidian • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced 2 • Unique
After Hideo enters play, lose 3 Honor.
After Hideo wins a duel, give him two +1F tokens.
card.flavor:
"Can that truly be the same Kakita Hideo from Ayano-Sensei's tales?"
Jun'ai looked grim. "Not every man breaks in the same way."

card.name: Kakita Ichigiku - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Magistrate • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Battle: If no other player has more Family Honor than you, give Ichigiku +3F, or +4F if you control Kitsuki Kinaro.
card.flavor: "For all her serenity, there is something inside her that she refuses to show the world. Perhaps that is why I find her so fascinating." - Kitsuki Kinaro

card.name: Doji Hoturi - inexp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Clan Champion • Samurai • Duelist • Inexperienced • Loyal • Unique
Iaijutsu Battle: Hoturi challenges a target Personality. If the target is honorable, his controller may dishonor him and move him home to refuse the duel. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: The scion of the Crane slew a thing that wore his face. What does that do to a man?

card.name: Daidoji Adachi
card.text:
Crane Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Scout
After Adachi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
After an action from a card opposing Adachi resolves, if its unit's Personality has more Madness tokens than printed Personal Honor, his controller discards a card.
card.flavor: "Animals! You are all animals!"

card.name: Kitsuki Daisuke - exp2
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Magistrate • Duelist • Experienced 2 • Unique
Limited: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. If you find an Iaijutsu Strategy, you may show it, put it into your hand, then discard a card. Put the remaining cards back in any order.
card.flavor: "What an amusing testimony. Suikihime-sama may not be as amused, I fear."

card.name: Kitsuki Kinaro - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Magistrate • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Iaijutsu Open, [BOW]: Bow a target Personality with lower Personal Honor. Gain 1 Honor if you control Kakita Ichigiku.
card.flavor: "No one has ever accepted me for who I am. No one. Except for him." - Kakita Ichigiku

card.name: Mirumoto Kazuya
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Expendable • Kensai
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Kazuya enters play, lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Behold. The true nature of the world."

card.name: Togashi Mitsu - inexp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Samurai • Tattooed • Inexperienced • Unique
Fire Battle/Open: Give Mitsu +1F Fire tokens until he has exactly five.
Fire Battle: Destroy zero or more Fire tokens on Mitsu. Ranged Attack with strength equal to the number of tokens destroyed.
card.flavor: "Born of the world, but with a soul unlike any outside the Heavens. Never another like him shall there be." - Mirumoto Shikei

card.name: Togashi Noboru, the Shattered Star - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fallen • Fire • Monk • Tattooed • Experienced • Unique
After Noboru enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Fire Battle: Bow a target enemy Personality. Give Noboru a Force bonus equal to the target's Force.
card.flavor: "Father was a fool to cast this aside. I alone know what is best."

card.name: Akodo Tsudoken - exp2
card.text:
Lion Clan • Commander • Fallen • Samurai • Experienced 2 • Unique
After Tsudoken enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Tireless Battle/Open: Straighten your target Lion Clan or Fallen Personality. (You may use Tireless abilities even if bowed.)
card.flavor: The light in his eyes was not fire, but something darker.

card.name: Ikoma Aimi - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Courtier • Samurai • Experienced • Unique
Political Limited, [BOW]: Discard a card. Gain Honor equal to its Focus Value, plus 1 if Shiba Iaimiko is in play.
card.flavor: "Change is something that cannot be avoided, Iaimiko. Still, we should ever strive to retain those things which are honorable, and resist those things which are not. Only then can we be truly pure."

card.name: Ikoma Natsu - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Magistrate • Samurai • Warden • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Natsu will not join a Unicorn Clan player.
Open: Give a target Personality Cavalry.
card.flavor: "The Unicorn may be astonished to hear this, but we too breed horses."

card.name: Ikoma Ayumi
card.text:
Lion Clan • Fallen • Magistrate • Samurai • Cavalry • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Ayumi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "I have no choice. It's bigger than us. You cannot stop what is coming..."

card.name: Matsu Nimuro - exp2
card.text:
Lion Clan • Clan Champion • Samurai • Duelist • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Tactician • Unique
Nimuro's printed ability will not be copied.
Limited: Once per game, create a Personality titled The False Nimuro with Nimuro's printed Force, Chi, Personal Honor, and keywords.
card.flavor: "A single mistake cannot wash away a life of honor and glory. The Golden Lion will forever be remembered among our greatest heroes." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Yoritomo Tonogi
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Fallen • Magistrate • Samurai • Expendable • Naval
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Tonogi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "They are mine. Understand? All of this is mine!"

card.name: Moshi Tomiko - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Experienced • Naval • Shugenja • Unique
Limited: Bow your target unbowed Ring or Moto Ming-Gwok. Draw a card.
card.flavor: "Friend Moto-san, I pray that the Fortunes watch over you in your distant land. I fear for your sanity, and that of all those who suffer the curse of P'an Ku's attentions..."

card.name: Tsuruchi - inexp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Wasp Clan • Daimyo • Master Bowman • Samurai • Scout • Inexperienced • Unique
Open: Give Tsuruchi Arrow tokens until he has exactly five.
Battle: Destroy zero or more Arrow tokens on Tsuruchi. Ranged Attack with strength equal to twice the number of tokens destroyed. You may use this action three times per turn.
card.flavor: "Who could think a man called the Little Wasp could be such a perfect master of death?" - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Yoritomo Kanaye - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Brute • Extortionist • Fallen • Magistrate • Samurai • Experienced • Naval • Unique
After Kanaye enters play: Lose 3 Honor.
Actions on your Strategies cost 1 less Gold.
card.flavor: The dark veil of the future parted for the magistrates, and they witnessed men transformed into monstrosities who feasted on violence and blood.

card.name: Yoritomo Minori - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Amethyst Champion • Half-Naga • Magistrate • Samurai • Experienced • Naval • Unique
Limited: Put your target discarded (not dead) Personality face-up into one of your Provinces, discarding any card currently there. Discard a Fate card.
card.flavor: "Your people gave me the gift of life, serpent. I now repay it with the gift of merciful death.

card.name: Asako Chukage - exp2
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Fallen • Henshin • Monk • Water • Cavalry • Experienced 2 • Shugenja • Unique
After Chukage enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Water Battle: Straighten or bow a target card without attachments in a unit. If you control a Ring, you may remove both it and the target from the game.
card.flavor: "Water's mysteries sometimes destroy."

card.name: Asako Kaitoko - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Emerald Champion's Advisor • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Void • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
Personalities with Fallen, Kolat, Ninja, Nonhuman, or Shadowlands opposing Kaitoko have a maximum Force of 3, and actions from cards in their units may not target Kaitoko.
card.flavor: "It is the duty of the Phoenix to extinguish the dangers to our spirits."

card.name: Isawa Tsuke - expCoM
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Elemental Master • Fire • Duelist • ExperiencedCoM • Loyal • Shugenja • Unique
Fire Limited, [BOW]: Tsuke challenges a target Personality. Both players must focus at least once in the duel. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "Even the greatest among us can lose their way. Perfection is absent in the mortal realm, save for the Empress herself. I think of Tsuke and find only a man placed in an impossible position, who did what he must." - Isawa Koiso

card.name: Isawa Ryuzo
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fallen • Fire • Shugenja
After Ryuzo enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Fire Open: Target two Personalities, each with more Madness tokens than printed Personal Honor. They will not attack or defend in the same army.
card.flavor: "This rice is delightful! But slightly overcooked."

card.name: Shiba Iaimiko - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Open: Bow your target unbowed Shugenja or Ikoma Aimi to give Iaimiko +1F, Cavalry, or Conqueror. You may use this action three times per turn.
card.flavor: "Aimi-sensei, I find that the Colonies inspires in me significant change. It is my hope that it is a positive thing, but I must confess that I have fears."

card.name: Bayushi Kahoku - exp2
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Final Student • Magistrate • Samurai • Experienced 2 • Unique
Limited: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. You may show one of them that is a Political Strategy and put it in your hand. Put the remaining cards back in any order.
card.flavor: "These are trying times for both Empire and Colonies. The secrets of the Final Student shall see them to an end."

card.name: Bayushi Nitoshi - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Clan Champion • Courtier • Fallen • Ninja • Samurai • Shoju's Soul • Sociopath • Experienced • Unique
After Nitoshi enters play, all players lose 3 Honor.
Ninja Battle: Melee 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "I sail on a sea of blood in a ship of bones. Why did I ever deny that which is within me?"

card.name: Bayushi Kachiko - expCoM
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Empress • Imperial • Seductress ExperiencedCoM • Unique
Personalities and Followers have -1F while they are Fallen, Nonhuman, or attacking you.
Political Open, [BOW]: After the next time this turn a target Personality attacks, his controller loses 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "A magnificent beauty. If she had abandoned unfortunate emotional burdens, what might she have become?" - Bayushi Nitoshi

card.name: Yogo Katsuta
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Yojimbo
After Katsuta enters play, lose 2 Honor.
After a Personality commits seppuku, his controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I loved her. That is why I had to save her..."

card.name: Shosuro Kameyoi - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
Political Open, [BOW]: A target player loses 1 Honor.
Political Limited, [BOW]: Dishonor a target Personality not named Yasuki Tono.
card.flavor: Even as she ended one life, she thought of another. "Is he safe?" The thought fluttered in her mind like a trapped bird, ignoring all else.

card.name: Daigotsu Arakan - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Commander • Samurai • Shadowlands • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
After Arakan enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Maho Battle/Limited, pay * Gold: Equip a non-Unique Follower in your discard pile to Arakan or Zansho. Permanently give the Follower Shadowlands • Undead. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Rise. My son wishes to meet you."

card.name: Kokujin - inexp
card.text:
Monk • Shadowlands • Tattooed • Duelist • Inexperienced • Unique
After Kokujin enters play, lose 6 Honor unless you are a Spider Clan player.
Battle: Kokujin challenges a target enemy Personality. Destroy the duel's loser or, if Kokujin wins, you may destroy one of your Personalities (at any location) to take control of the loser (he joins Kokujin's army).
card.flavor: "Is madness a thing that can be perfected?" - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Daigotsu Gyoken - exp3
card.text:
Spider Clan • Commander • Fallen • Shadowlands • Samurai • Conqueror • Experienced 3 • Unique
After Gyoken enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Negate Gyoken's first destruction each game from another player's card.
card.flavor: "Nothing shall strike me down. Never again."

card.name: Ichiro Otani, the Stone Breaker
card.text:
Badger Clan • Samurai • Shadowlands • Unique
Otani will not enter play if your Family Honor is 0 or above.
Battle: Otani challenges a target enemy Personality to a duel of Force. Items do not give bonuses to Force during this duel. Bow the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "Hungry again. Always hungry."

card.name: Nishiguchi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Fallen • Monk • Kensai
After Nishiguchi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality a Force penalty equal to the number of Madness tokens he has.
card.flavor: "None of you are worthy of your lives."

card.name: Susumu Kuroko
card.text:
Spider Clan • Courtier • Daimyo • Magistrate • Loyal • Unique
After you Proclaim Susumu Takuan, gain 2 Honor.
Political Limited, [BOW]: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: Her family is small and often detested across the realm. Kuroko smiles politely and plans.

card.name: Asukai, the Tireless
card.text:
Crane Clan • Earth • Monk • Conqueror • Unique
Asukai enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of Earth.
Other players' cards will not affect your Provinces' strengths.
card.flavor: "There is no greater satisfaction than that which comes from honest work."

card.name: Iuchi Takaki
card.text:
Disciple of P'an Ku • Fallen • Cavalry • Expendable • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Takaki enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Engage: Give a target card a Madness token.
card.flavor: "The Lords of Death, the Kami - all delusions! Now I see what is real!"

card.name: Takujin
card.text:
Fudo • Monk • Expendable • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
You have +1 maximum hand size.
card.flavor: "My path may lead to your death or to mine, samurai. What matter such things, if the goal be enlightenment?"

card.name: Asako Usohara
card.text:
Fudo • Monk • Shugenja • Unique
Usohara's abilities will not be copied.
Limited, [BOW]: Search your Dynasty discard pile, then deck, for a Fudo Celestial. Put it into play.
Limited: Put a Fudo Ring from your hand into play. This counts as playing it by its own text. Remove Usohara from the game.
card.flavor: "Heresy? New wisdom is always seen as such."

card.name: Hamuro, the Wise
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Monk • Void • Cavalry • Unique
Hamuro enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of the Void.
Void Limited: Draw three cards. Remove Hamuro from the game.
card.flavor: "What we really need," he said wryly, "is a better catalog."

card.name: Tochiko, the Jagged Tusk of Death
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Boar Clan • Samurai • Unique
Tochiko has +2F while opposing a Personality or Follower with lower Force.
card.flavor: "Chokei was a liar, and the others are merely shades of once-living souls. I am the last true blood of the Boar, and I offer my service to the Mantis, that I might gain glory for my people one last time before we all disappear from the world."

card.name: Jikoji, Fist of Stone
card.text:
Lion Clan • Earth • Monk • Unique
Jikoji enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of Earth.
Earth Battle: Give each of your attacking Lion Clan Samurai in Jikoji's army +1F.
card.flavor: Rock and bone both crumble if you hit them hard enough.

card.name: Kasuga Aizawa, the Razor's Edge
card.text:
Crab Clan • Tortoise Clan • Merchant • Unique
[BOW]: Produce 1 Gold.
card.flavor: "The world is vaster by far than most samurai ever realize. There are wonders and threats that most can never imagine. P'an Ku? Fudo? Mere annoyances compared to some."

card.name: Kimura, Forgiver of Sins
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Air • Monk • Unique
Kimura enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of Air.
Air Limited: Discard a card. Increase the Honor you gain from your next Proclaim this turn to equal the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: "They say Compassion is the most complex virtue. How man complicates his own life!"

card.name: Komori Miyano, the Shadow Wing
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Bat Clan • Air • Shugenja • Unique
Air Limited: Create a 0F/2C/0PH Bat • Nonhuman • Cavalry Personality. Remove it from the game after your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "We can communicate with the Empire almost as quickly as the Mantis and Phoenix, and without the unpleasant price they pay."

card.name: Morito Inoue, Scourge of the Plains
card.text:
Lion Clan • Ox Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Unique
Limited: Straighten another player's target Holding whose Gold Cost is lower than Inoue's Force. You, and not its owner, may use its Gold-producing traits (this turn) as if you controlled it.
card.flavor: Live by the sword, profit by the sword.

card.name: Nishoji, the Steel-Eyed
card.text:
Crab Clan • Earth • Monk • Unique
Nishoji enters play ignoring Gold cost if you control the Ring of Earth.
Nishoji uses his printed Force as his duel stat.
card.flavor: "Fudo-worshipping fool! Your idiocy brought us to this disaster, and I will see you properly punished for it!"

card.name: Okazaki, Breaker of Wills
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Monk • Water • Naval • Unique
Okazaki enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of Water.
Water Limited: Give another target Mantis Clan Personality Conqueror.
card.flavor: "Your dissembling is entertaining but ultimately futile. Speak the truth. It is inevitable."

card.name: Otomo Suikihime, Queen of Fools - exp
card.text:
Courtier • Fallen • Imperial • Second City Governor • Experienced • Unique
After Suikihime enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Other players' Political actions may not target Suikihime. Suikihime may not attack.
Limited, [BOW]: Search your Dynasty deck for a Fallen Personality. Put him into one of your Provinces face-up, discarding any card currently there.

card.name: P'an Ku - exp
card.text:
Dragon • Fallen • Mad Dragon • Nonhuman • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Open, [BOW]: Give a target card a Madness token.
Limited, [BOW]: P'an Ku may remain bowed. Take control of a target Personality with more Madness tokens than printed Personal Honor and remove those tokens. The target will not commit seppuku until P'an Ku straightens or leaves play. After P'an Ku does, give control of the target to his owner.
card.flavor: Even the Heavens can be shattered...

card.name: Akumasa
card.text:
Disciple of P'an Ku • Fallen • Shugenja
After Akumasa enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Open: Target another player's Personality who has a Madness token. After the target attacks this turn, draw a card.
card.flavor: "To truly understand, you must let go of everything. Order, discipline, sanity - all just distractions, my friend!"

card.name: Rokkaku, Master of Scrolls
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Monk • Void • Unique
Rokkaku enters play ignoring Gold cost if you control the Ring of the Void.
Void Limited, [BOW]: Look at the top four cards of your Fate deck. You may put one on the bottom. Put the rest back in any order.
card.flavor: "Secrets. More precious than any treasure."

card.name: Sengmai, the Unbreakable
card.text:
Fire • Monk • Shadowlands • Unique
Sengmai enters play ignoring Gold cost if you control the Ring of Fire.
Sengmai will not enter play if your Family Honor is 0 or above.
After Sengmai enters play, put a Kiho in your discard pile into your hand.
card.flavor: "I am changed, but remain unbroken."

card.name: Hantei XVI - inexp
card.text:
Emperor • Imperial • Samurai • Inexperienced • Unique
You ignore Hantei XVI's Honor Requirement if you control the Imperial Favor.
After Hantei XVI enters play, search your discard pile or Fate deck for a non-Unique Political Strategy. Show it. Put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "Dearest mother, please stand still for Tsuneo-san. That is an order from your son and Emperor."

card.name: Suzume Shindo, the Final Blade
card.text:
Crane Clan • Sparrow Clan • Samurai • Duelist • Unique
Shindo will not join a Spider Clan player.
You have the first opportunity to focus or strike in duels where Shindo is the challenger.
card.flavor:
She promised, "Father, I will not fail you."
"Remember the first lesson," he replied.

card.name: The Dark Naga - exp
card.text:
Champion • Naga • Nonhuman • Pearl • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
After The Dark Naga enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Open, [PAY *]: Equip a Nonhuman Follower in your hand or discard pile to The Dark Naga, paying 4 less Gold.
Pearl Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 9 Attack.

card.name: The Shakash - exp
card.text:
Commander • Naga • Nonhuman • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
While you control three or fewer Personalities, your other Nonhuman Personalities and Followers enter play for 1 less Gold.
Home Battle: Move your target Personality at any location to The Shakash's location. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: "I will end their search, master."

card.name: Toku Saiga, the Metal Storm
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monkey Clan • Samurai • Kensai • Unique
Saiga has +1F/+1C for each of his Weapons.
card.flavor: "There are few who approve of me. No matter. I will laugh and laugh at the looks on their faces when they fall to the ground, helpless before my blades."

card.name: Tonbo Inuyama, the Eye of Tomorrow
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Dragonfly Clan • Void • Shugenja • Unique
Void Limited: Look at the top card of a deck. You may put it on the bottom.
card.flavor: "You see coins," he said, eyes dancing. "I see windows into tomorrow."

card.name: Tsi Hayamizu, the Hand of Steel
card.text:
Oriole Clan • Artisan • Samurai • Unique
Hayamizu will not join a Scorpion Clan player.
Hayamizu has +1F for each Mine you control.
card.flavor: "The wise man knows worthy weapons are made with purity. Not just of the steel, but of the spirit and body as well. No pile of filthy Shosuro money will make me forget that."

card.name: Tsiang, the Benevolent
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Monk • Unique
Tsiang enters play ignoring Gold cost if you control the Ring of Water.
Home Water Battle, [BOW]: Straighten one or two target cards in units. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: "I had occasion, in my youth, to walk among your lost friends, the Horiuchi. I would honor their memory with my service to your clan."

card.name: Asp Skirmisher
card.text:
Naga • Nonhuman • Scout • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
Asp Skirmisher will not join a player who controls a Human Personality.
card.flavor: "Distract the humans," the Dark Naga ordered, "while I move to crush their reckless incursion."

card.name: Usagi Seki, the Untouchable
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Hare Clan • Samurai • Unique
Seki has +5F while other players' cards are resolving.
card.flavor: The fifth and final bandit struck the dirt just after his blade slipped from his fingers. Seki stood alone with a satisfied smile. Not one of his enemies had so much as touched him.

card.name: Yunmen, the Whisper
card.text:
Spider Clan • Air • Monk • Cavalry • Unique
Yunmen enters play ignoring Gold Cost if you control the Ring of Air.
Air Open, [BOW]: Give one to three target cards Cavalry.
card.flavor: "Fudo may be the easier path, my lord, but there are alternatives to madness."

card.name: Zansho - exp
card.text:
Commander • Samurai • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
Zansho will not join a Spider Clan player.
Battle: Bow Zansho's target unbowed Follower. Ranged Attack with strength equal to its Force, plus 2 if the Ranged Attack targets Daigotsu Arakan.
card.flavor: "I told you I would come, father. I told you why."

card.name: Iuchi Karasu - inexp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Doomseeker • Inexperienced • Shugenja • Unique
Home Battle: Target two Personalities at any location controlled by the same player. Switch their locations. Straighten each one of them that is not Fallen or Nonhuman. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: "Would that we all could have such unbreakable, insurmountable will as he." - Moto Naleesh

card.name: Moto Xin
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Cavalry • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Xin enters play, lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "My ancestor Tsugi's face is everywhere. I kill all who dare lay claim to his legacy."

card.name: Moto Ming-Gwok - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Death Priest • Moon-Blessed • Water • Cavalry • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
Water Battle: If there is a dead Personality in any discard pile, Ranged 3 Attack.
Open: Bow or straighten a target Ring or Moshi Tomiko.
card.flavor: "My friend Tomiko, the Moon has blessed me with insight that I think you may find of great interest..."

card.name: Moto Taigo, the Skull Taker - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander • Fallen • Samurai • Cavalry • Conqueror • Experienced • Unique
After Taigo enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Interrupt, [BOW]: If the action moves any units, you may destroy a target card without attachments in one of them.
card.flavor: "They dared call my father a monster? I shall show them what a monster truly is, and then they shall wish for his return!"

card.name: Shinjo Tselu - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander • Imperial • Ivory Champion • Magistrate • Samurai • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Limited: Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Cavalry Follower, show it, and put it in your hand. Then, discard a card.
card.flavor: "I did not ask for this burden, as my father and grandmother did not ask for theirs. But I shall shoulder mine as they did, with honor and dignity."

card.name: Naga Remnants
card.text:
Naga • Nonhuman
Battle: Bow a target enemy attachment.
card.flavor: "The Akasha sleeps without rest. Its fevered whispers strike terror into my heart. What is this darkness that spreads across the realm? What can I do to save my people?"

card.name: Fudo's Fiends
card.text:
Fudo • Monk • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: They seem reasonable at first glance, yet the maddened gleam in their eye soon betrays their fanaticism.

card.name: Thunderous Legion
card.text:
Imperial • Cavalry
Battle: Destroy a target enemy card without attachments.
card.flavor: "Ours is a proud history, and we shall prove worthy of the name this day."

card.name: Aberrations
card.text:
Disciple of P'an Ku • Fallen
Battle: Discard the top card of a Fate deck. Give this Follower a Force bonus equal to the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: They should not exist, not in the maddened form that drives them. Yet they rage across the countryside, unbidden and unchecked.

card.name: False Ring of the Void
card.text:
Void • Fudo • Unique
Does not count towards an Enlightenment Victory.
After a battle resolves where you destroyed a Province, you may put this Ring into play and lose 2 Honor.
Engage, [BOW]: A target Personality at any location will not move this turn.
card.flavor: Hatred.

card.name: Shinobi Vassal
card.text:
Ninja
Will only attach to a Ninja. You may Equip this Follower as a Battle action.
Battle: Destroy a target enemy card without attachments. Destroy this Follower.
card.flavor: "Many assets are expendable. Some are not." - Bayushi Kazutoshi

card.name: Maddened Horde
card.text:
Fallen • Unique
Battle: Discard the top card of any Fate deck. Melee Attack with strength equal to the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: "Burn! Burn it all! It's all a lie, and it all has to burn!"

card.name: Reconnaissance Scouts
card.text:
Scout
Engage: You have Reconnaissance at this battlefield. If you are the Attacker, you have the first opportunity to take a Battle action or pass. You may target and give an enemy Personality or Follower -3F.
card.flavor: "My lady Hakuseki, we have discovered the temple. It was where you believed it would be."

card.name: Lone Sentry
card.text:
Cavalry
Will only attach to a Tactician.
card.flavor: "Guard the roads, the waystations, the inns. If these Fudoist wretches lift their heads, I want them cut off." - Shinjo Kinto

card.name: Blood of the Preserver - exp
card.text:
Experienced • Unique
Maho Battle/Open, pay * Gold: Target your dead Personality. Bring him into play if his Gold Cost is equal to or less than the amount paid. Lose 2 Honor. Destroy this Item.
card.flavor: "The blood of a gaijin god can have so many uses. Especially when the god is dead and cannot object."

card.name: The Egg of P'an Ku - exp
card.text:
Experienced • Unique
Limited: Bow one of your target unbowed Personalities. Remove this Item from the game. Create a copy of a target Personality, ignoring costs and restrictions. Bow the second target. He will not straighten, attack, or defend until after your next turn begins. Remove the copy from the game after your next turn begins.
card.flavor: A fragment of divine madness, given form.

card.name: Heart of Fudo - exp2
card.text:
Fudo • Experienced 2 • Unique
Limited: If this Personality is unbowed, search your Fate deck for a card and put it into your hand. Bow this Personality. Destroy this Item.
card.flavor: As the heresy of Fudo spread, more than one samurai found its appeal irresistible. - The Age of Exploration, Third Scroll

card.name: Koan's Jingasa
card.text:
Koan • Unique
This Personality has Shugenja, may not have more Spells than Koan cards attached, and he need not bow for his Spells with an odd Focus Value (0 is even).
card.flavor: "A hundred ronin in a thousand years have taken that name. Are we really supposed to believe they all wore this hat?" - Soshi Yoshihara

card.name: Koan's Robes
card.text:
Koan • Unique
This Personality has a Force bonus equal to the number of other Koan cards in this unit.
This Personality need not bow for his Spells with an even Focus Value (0 is even).
Negate the first destruction each turn of cards in this unit from another player's card.
card.flavor: "Where did you find this?" - Isawa Teiko

card.name: Koan's Scroll Satchel
card.text:
Koan • Unique
Open, [BOW]: Give Home to one or more Spells in this unit, up to the number of Koan cards in this unit. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: "Just a pack of old scrolls. Nothing worthy of such attention." - Asahina Keigo

card.name: Koan's Staff
card.text:
Koan • Unique • Weapon
Fire Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 3 Attack with +1 strength for each other Koan card in this unit.
card.flavor: "My old friend's walking stick. Yet the spirits within it sing as though they are newly awakened." - Togashi Mitsu

card.name: Justice of the Crane
card.text:
Weapon
This Personality has Magistrate.
Battle: Dishonor a target enemy Personality. If this Personality has the printed Magistrate keyword, you may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "Every Crane magistrate is given one, though some know how to use it better than others." - Kakita Ichigiku

card.name: Armor of the Mad
card.text:
Armor
This Personality has Fallen and a maximum Personal Honor of 0.
Battle, [BOW]: Give one or two target enemy cards a Madness token.
card.flavor: "Take it up, and receive our master's most blessed sacraments." - Akumasa

card.name: Parangu
card.text:
Weapon • Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
card.flavor: "A crude, flawed, and indelicate implement, good only for the roughest of tasks. Fortunate then, that this is a rough land." - Yoritomo Kanahashi

card.name: Hidden Power
card.text:
Unique
Limited: If this Shugenja is unbowed, put a Spell in your discard pile into your hand. Bow this Shugenja. Remove this Spell from the game.
card.flavor: "The foolish dig for shining treasures, but we have learned great secrets from the fallen Kingdom's history." - Asako Chukage

card.name: Soul of Earth
card.text: Earth Battle, [BOW]: Give your target defending Personality a Force bonus equal to his Personal Honor plus 1.
card.flavor: "The earth is drawn to my spirit and honor. In turn, I ask it to be drawn down on your army instead." - Tamori Yayu

card.name: Flame Lash
card.text:
Fire
Fire Open, [BOW]: Destroy a target attachment.
card.flavor: "You won't be needing that," Ino said as the fire burned her enemy's sword hand. "Or that. Or that..."

card.name: Blade of Storms
card.text:
Weapon
Attaches to a Thunder Shugenja for 1 less Gold.
Thunder Battle, [BOW]: Give this Shugenja +2F.
card.flavor: Rainfall, lightning strike, storm's glory.

card.name: Koan's Whisper
card.text:
Koan • Unique
Void Limited, [BOW]: Reduce a Province's strength to 0. If its player has two or more Provinces, you may remove five Koan cards you control from the game to destroy it.
card.flavor: The greatest walls can be overcome by a word.

card.name: Tempest of Air
card.text: Air Open: If this Shugenja is unbowed, give a target Personality or Follower a Force penalty equal to this Shugenja's Chi. Bow this Shugenja.
card.flavor: The enemies of the Crane staggered and fell backwards under the relentless wind. Their boats were pushed away from the shore, and still more Asahina stood to strengthen the prayer.

card.name: Typhoon Surge
card.text: Water Battle: Move a target Personality at any location to the current battlefield. Straighten his unit if you do not control him. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: Water is never still.

card.name: Among the Clouds
card.text: Air Open: If this Shugenja is unbowed, target a Personality with Force equal to or less than this Shugenja's Chi. Give the target and each of his Followers Cavalry. Bow this Shugenja.
card.flavor: The shugenja's chant was lost in the sound of the winds that sped them along.

card.name: The Tale of the Disgraced
card.text: Battle: Bow your target unbowed Personality. Bow a target enemy card. If your Personality is Fallen or a Magistrate, straighten him before this battle resolves.
card.flavor: Some could fall prey to their own emotions without the aid of the Mad Dragon. Their histories would be stricken from the records, never to be told again.

card.name: A Magistrate Falls
card.text: Iaijutsu Limited, [PAY 2]: Your target unbowed Personality challenges a target Personality. The challenge may be refused unless exactly one of the targets is Fallen or The Dark Naga. Destroy the duel's loser.
card.flavor: The Naga's blade tore through Hakuseki's robes, her flesh, her bones. As she fell, she knew she was dying. She felt no regret, for she had lived with honor.

card.name: Death of the Winds
card.text: Battle, [PAY 2]: Target your unbowed Tactician. Search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Battle Strategy and take an additional action to play it.
card.flavor: They were the most important men in the Empire yet it did not matter now. Even they could do nothing against the numbers that surrounded them. Kaneka slowly raised his blade and heard a deep laugh echo through his mind.

card.name: False Ring of Water
card.text:
Water • Fudo • Unique
Does not count towards an enlightenment victory.
Battle: If the current battlefield's Province Strength is 11 or greater, put this Ring into play and lose 2 Honor.
Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: Envy.

card.name: Delicate Gamble
card.text: Political Limited: Bow your target unbowed Courtier. Discard the top card of another player's Fate deck. A target player gains or loses Honor equal to the discarded card's Focus Value or 3, whichever is lower. If he lost Honor, he ignores Honor Requirements this game.
card.flavor: "It is a dangerous game you play, Shosuro-san," she said softly. "It would be best to reconsider."

card.name: No Way Out
card.text:
Terrain
After this battle resolves, if its Province was not destroyed, destroy the targets of this card's action. Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play. Target zero to two attacking cards.
card.flavor: The gamble had gone on too long. They could not escape the consequences now. They rushed forward, heads held high.

card.name: Invocation
card.text:
Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Limited: Until your next turn begins, Honor gains are reduced by 1 unless the player controls a Spirit.
card.flavor: The Mad Dragon's reach could be stopped, should the Heavens interfere.

card.name: Deliberations
card.text: Battle, pay * Gold: Ranged Attack with strength equal to the amount you paid minus two.
card.flavor: Even the most dishonorable action could be weighed for its benefits versus its fallout. He carefully thought over the assassination, and placed his seal on the scroll.

card.name: Looming Danger
card.text: Battle: Bow your target unbowed Personality. Destroy a target enemy unit with lower total Force than your Personality's (current) Force.
card.flavor: "I do not believe your lies, Dragon!" he snarled. "I share my strength with no one!"

card.name: Overwhelming Chaos
card.text:
Unique
Open: Each player shuffles his hand into his deck, then draws as many cards as he shuffled into his deck.
card.flavor: The world turned and the fates weaved its tale. The tiniest ripple could devastate the lives of thousands of samurai. One day, it did.

card.name: Unbearable Weight
card.text:
Unique
Limited, [PAY 4]: Discard the top card of a Fate deck. You may target a Personality and give him a Chi penalty equal to the card's Focus Value. If this destroyed the target, his controller puts this Strategy in his hand.
card.flavor: No one mind could ever hope to contain the burden of P'an Ku's madness.

card.name: Fires of Turmoil
card.text: Battle: Discard the top card of a Fate deck. Target a card without attachments. If the discarded card's Focus Value is odd, bow the target (0 is even). Otherwise, straighten it. Move its unit home if the target has a Madness token.
card.flavor: The madness struck across the battlefield, leaving casualties on both sides without reason.

card.name: Temple Grounds
card.text:
Terrain
If you do not control a Cavalry unit here, negate each Battle action taken by a player without units here.
Battle/Engage: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: Dozens of Naga swarmed over the temple grounds, but the magistrates did not falter. Their purpose was too great. It could not be set aside.

card.name: Strength of the Divine
card.text: Battle: Target your opposed unbowed Paragon. Give him +2F or +2PH. Melee Attack with strength equal to his Force or Personal Honor.
card.flavor: The shadow wound its way through the palace, seeking a foothold in the mind of the Empress. But the light of the divine was too great, and the shadow was banished.

card.name: Strength in the Earth
card.text:
Kiho
Earth Battle: Target your unbowed Monk. Melee Attack with strength equal to his Force, which may target a card in the Defender's home.
card.flavor: "Your madness and steel will not lead you to victory, brother. The earth protects me from both."

card.name: Moments of Destiny
card.text: Battle, [PAY 1]: Target your Personality at home. If he would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. If he is a Yojimbo, give him Expendable (this turn).
card.flavor: In moments when the force of destiny moves in the mortal realm, the souls of heroes are steeled against the insidious touch of madness.

card.name: The False Path
card.text:
Your non-Unique Monk and Fudo Personalities in and out of play have Monk • Fudo. Fudo Personalities join you for 2 less Gold. You ignore Honor Requirements of your Fudo cards. You do not lose Honor from Fudo cards you own. You may not win by Enlightenment.
Limited, [BOW]: Search your discard pile or deck for a Fudo Ring, show it, and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: Truth to oneself, at the cost of honor.

card.name: Foothold of the Mad
card.text:
If there is no other Foothold of the Mad player, you go first. You do not lose Honor from cards you own. Fallen Personalities join you for 2 less Gold. Personalities and Followers have -1F for each of their Madness tokens.
Limited, [BOW]: Give a target card a Madness token.
Limited, [BOW]: Your Holdings enter play paying 2 less Gold (this turn).
card.flavor: All is lost.

card.name: False Ring of Air
card.text:
Air • Fudo • Unique
Does not count towards an Enlightenment Victory.
After you win a battle in which there was ever a unit on the opposing side, you may put this Ring into play and lose 2 Honor.
Absent Battle, [BOW]: Give a target Personality -3F. (Absent actions can be taken without presence.)
card.flavor: Falseness

card.name: The Heavens' Blessing
card.text:
Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Open: Until the game ends, a player must pay 2 Gold to draw a card from effects of his own Strategies during an Action Phase.
Open: No player can gain Honor in Action Phases (this turn).

card.name: Suikihime's Sanction
card.text:
Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Limited: Permanently give your target non-Loyal, face-up Personality in or out of play your Clan Alignment.
card.flavor: "The province is infested with madness and Fudoism. Burn it. In its entirety."

card.name: False Ring of Earth
card.text:
Earth • Fudo • Unique
Does not count towards an Enlightenment Victory.
After you win a duel against a Personality who shared no keywords with your Personality in the duel, you may put this Ring into play and lose 2 Honor.
Other players have -1 maximum hand size.
card.flavor: Pride.

card.name: Bamboo Harvesters - exp2
card.text:
Forest • Experienced 2 • Unique
This Holding enters play bowed. (It straightens normally on your first turn.)
[BOW]: Produce 0 Gold. Give this Holding a +1 Gold Production Wealth token.
card.flavor: Even in the resource-rich Colonies, there are few materials as fast-growing and as versatile as bamboo.

card.name: Family Maneuvers
card.text: Until your next turn begins, your Personalities have +1F while in an army with another Personality with the same Family Name.
card.flavor: "There is no greater strength, no greater resource, than those who share your bloodline. A family's abilities can be harnessed in war to tremendous effect, and should be." - Akodo's "Leadership"

card.name: Sacred Temples
card.text:
Temple
Other players' actions will not discard cards from your hand.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "They were sacred once, to the Ivory Kingdoms. They can be sacred again, albeit to different gods and different rituals." - Asako Chukage

card.name: Bandit's Sanctuary
card.text:
You may include up to five copies of this card in your deck.
After this card enters play, if you have a Clan alignment: Lose 3 Honor.
Bow this card: Produce 2 Gold, or 3 Gold if you are paying for a Ronin.
card.flavor: "I do not care where they are hiding. They cannot hide well enough to escape." - Shinjo Tselu

card.name: Tamahime - exp
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Sensei • Tactician • Experienced • Unique
After Tamahime enters play or overlays: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your other Ronin Personalities have Tactician.
Your other Ronin cards enter play paying 1 less Gold.
Battle: Target an enemy card without attachments: Destroy it.

card.name: Tamahime
card.text:
Ronin • Samurai • Sensei • Tactician
After Tamahime enters play: Discard all your other Sensei Personalities.
Your other Ronin Personalities have Tactician.
