card.flavor: "The fury and brilliance of Tamago tempered by the patience and wisdom of Utagawa. If you hope to defeat her, best to kill her in her sleep. Otherwise, you will fail." - Genjiro

card.name: Ambush Pass
card.text:
Singular
Your Ronin have +1F.
card.flavor: "These bandits have preyed upon too many caravans already. Spread word of a new caravan, one loaded with riches bound for the Empire. When they throw open the carts, the bandits will find only justice awaiting them within." - Shinjo Tselu.

card.name: Unseen Assassins
card.text:
Ninja • Assassin
Limited: Bow and destroy this card and target a Follower: Destroy it. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "I have heard your sensei experienced a tragic accident. I am here to offer my condolences, and to extend to you the same opportunity that we once offered him."

card.name: Family Sword
card.text:
Weapon
Open: Even if this card is bowed, target your Personality with the same Family Name as this Personality: Transfer this card to the target.
card.flavor: Not every family carries a blade of great power, but every family has a blade that it cherishes.

card.name: Enigmatic Pendant
card.text:
Nemuranai
Limited: Destroy this card and discard your hand: Draw a number of cards equal to the number you discarded.
card.flavor: "This entity or individual, this so-called 'Boyoh'... I think there are secrets." - Yasuki Tono

card.name: It Was a Cat
card.text:
Ninja
Open: Bow your performing Personality or Follower: Look at the top three cards of a deck, or four cards if the performer is a Ninja. You may discard one of them. Put the rest back in any order. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Hello, little one. Was it you making all that noise out here?"

card.name: Fallen
card.text:
Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Battle/Open: Bow a target Fallen card.
card.flavor: Madness always defeats itself.

card.name: Jizo's Mercy
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Battle: Move a target attacking Personality home.
Battle: Discard this Celestial. In this battle's resolution, before you destroy the Province, gain 4 Honor instead.
card.flavor: The merciful act with gentleness and compassion. In the eyes of samurai, even an act of mercy can seem like cruelty.

card.name: Losing the Way
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Until your turn begins three turns from now begins, each player may put no more than one Ring into play per turn.
card.flavor: Seen through the lessons of Fudo, many things in the Colonies seemed reasonable and righteous. Consequences were ignored in favor of a new freedom.

card.name: Legionnaire's Appointment
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Permanently give your target Personality Conqueror.
card.flavor: "We will restore order!" the commander cried over the shouts of the chaos. "For the Empress. For Rokugan!"

card.name: The Fever Breaks
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Destroy all Madness tokens.
card.flavor: In the chaos, it was the Phoenix who began to understand what was happening. The Second City and everything near it was engulfed in chaos, but not even the Isawa knew who was gripped by madness and who was simply acting of their free will.

card.name: General's Hatamoto
card.text:
Retainer
Battle, [BOW]: Give a target Personality or Follower +2F.
card.flavor: "I am the culmination of generations of tactical experience and genius. I can turn an overwhelming force away with the right commands... but only if I have capable soldiers to relay my orders." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Hida Iguchi
card.text: Crab Clan • Samurai • Cavalry
card.flavor: "The Crab have the strength of the mountain, but on occasion we possess the speed of the avalanche as well."

card.name: Kakita Izumiko
card.text:
Crane Clan • Samurai • Duelist
After Izumiko wins a duel, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The bandits had among them a fire shugenja. He believed his magic would give him an edge. He died surprised and disappointed."

card.name: Mirumoto Tsuda
card.text: Dragon Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Duelist
card.flavor: "Forgive me, my friend. I understand all too well seeking your own path, but you have followed yours to dishonor and heresy, and I will not stand for it."

card.name: Akodo Daiken
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Conqueror
card.flavor: "You notice the sword, but honor is my blade. It is stronger than any steel could ever be."

card.name: Tsuruchi Nishima
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Thunder • Cavalry
After Nishima assigns in Infantry Maneuvers, give him Naval.
card.flavor: "You charged me in hopes of victory after I slew your three comrades from afar. You are naturally very distressed to find my skill with a blade equal to that of the bow."

card.name: Isawa Hikarou
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Shugenja
Hikarou has +1F for each of his Fire Spells.
card.flavor: "My brother always said water is strength," he said with a chuckle, "but my brother happens to be wrong."

card.name: Bayushi Aibako
card.text: Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Bitter Lies • Conqueror
card.flavor: "Once my order was something of a jest, an amusement to befuddle the other clans. No longer. Now, when filth like you hear the name Bitter Lies, you feel only fear."

card.name: Daigotsu Hirose
card.text:
Spider Clan • Samurai • Shadowlands • Cavalry
After Hirose enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "My father rode upon a demon steed of fire and bone. I have but a simple horse, but I find that I need little else to serve my lord."

card.name: Utaku Sang-Ju
card.text: Unicorn Clan • Battle Maiden • Paragon • Samurai • Cavalry
card.flavor: "I trust my spear, my horse, and my clan," Sang-Ju said, "not necessarily in that order."

card.name: P'an Ku Cultist
card.text:
Disciple of P'an Ku • Fallen
After this Follower enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Limited: Give a target card a Madness token.
card.flavor: "I have strong hands," he whispered, "but my master's grip is stronger."

card.name: Simple Spears
card.text:
Expendable • Weapon
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: "Well, you only have to last one battle," mused the warrior.

card.name: Trembling Earth
card.text:
You may Equip this Spell as a Battle action to your Earth Shugenja at any location.
Home Earth Battle: Bow a target enemy card. Destroy this Spell. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: Their shouts were swallowed by the earth's rumbling.

card.name: A Glimpse of Fate
card.text: Battle/Open: You may discard a card. Draw cards until you have exactly two cards in your hand.
card.flavor: Forboding filled the explorer's heart as she gazed upon the statue. "I must warn them," she said to herself.

card.name: Elemental Adroitness
card.text:
Unique
Battle: Straighten a target Ring. Before this phase ends, put this Strategy into your hand.
card.flavor: The world itself dances to those who know its music.

card.name: Family Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Battle, [BOW]: Give each of your Followers at this battle +1F.
card.flavor: "Countless generations of my family have trained in this dojo. You should feel blessed I have broken your nose on its floor." - Hida Osote

card.name: Family Sensei
card.text: This Follower has +1F while you control a Dojo.
card.flavor: "You need have no fear of me," he said dryly, "but my students are another matter."

card.name: Inari's Festival
card.text:
Festival • Unique
Limited: Give your non-Unique Holdings +1 Gold Production until your next turn begins.
card.flavor: A celebration of the Fortune of Rice's merciful aspect leads to long celebrations of bounty and generosity.

card.name: A Fever in the Blood
card.text:
Personalities and Followers have -1F while attacking.
Limited: Put this Event into play. Discard it after your next turn begins.
card.flavor: "The land itself added to the conflict, as loyal samurai and Fallen alike found themselves beset with fever and weakness. True-hearted samurai drew on the strength of honor and forged on. The Fallen had no such resources." - Chronicle of the Heretic War, Part I

card.name: Journey's End Siege
card.text:
Unique
Limited: Defending players may not play Terrains (this turn). After the first time you destroy a Province in battle this turn, if you do not have more Provinces than the Defender (at that time), gain a Province.
card.flavor: "This is a simple problem. We are going to take back Journey's End City, and anyone who tried to stop us can die beneath our charge." - Shinjo Tselu

card.name: Riding to the Rescue
card.text: Limited: Your Cavalry Personalities and Followers have +1F while attacking and opposed (this turn).
card.flavor: "Not content to let the honorless retain Journey's End City, the children of Shinjo assembled their forces and rode to battle. With bushido in their hearts and steel in their hands, they engaged the Fallen." - Chronicle of the Heretic War, Part III

card.name: Abundant Farmlands
card.text:
Farm
After each player's turn begins, straighten this Holding.
[BOW]: Produce 1 Gold.
card.flavor: "I find that personal oversight can greatly enhance the productivity of even minor holdings." - Kaiu Esumi

card.name: Productive Mine
card.text:
Mine • Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your Province and refill it face-up.)
[BOW]: Produce 4 Gold.
card.flavor: "Humans finally realize that working with mujina better than foolish attempt at slavery. They smarter than Kuni, I think." - Nijugun

card.name: Exquisite Silk Works
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited: Target a dishonorable Personality. His controller loses 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "By the Fortunes! Where in the world did you find so many cocoons?" - Moto Ming-Gwok

card.name: Fudoist Temple
card.text:
Fudo • Temple
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
Open, [BOW]: Give a target Personality and each of his Followers Cavalry.
card.flavor: "A Shinseist temple, you say? Why don't I recognize the statue, then?" - Hida Watari

card.name: Glassworks
card.text:
Retainer • Singular
Your Items have +1F.
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "The Unicorn have lauded the virtues of glass for many centuries. Only now do we appreciate their wisdom." - Isawa Shunsuko

card.name: Slave Pits
card.text:
Mine
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
[BOW]: If you did not go first this game, produce 3 Gold. Lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "It seems the Ivinda also discovered how to enslave the copper goblins for mining." - Kitsuki Yataku

card.name: The Tower of Vigilance
card.text:
Fortification
(Fortifications attach, straightened, to the Province from which they entered play.)
Engage, [BOW]: If you have any units at this battlefield, create a 0F/2C/2PH Samurai • Guard Personality there. Remove him from the game after this battle ends.
card.flavor: "Almost as impressive as the Wall." - Kitsu Miro

card.name: Imperial Explorer's Dojo
card.text:
Imperial • Dojo
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Limited, [BOW]: Put a target Terrain in your discard pile into your hand. Destroy this Holding.
card.flavor: "Life in the deep jungle can be oddly tranquil, sometimes." - Doji Kazuo

card.name: Jade Mine
card.text:
Jade • Mine
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold. This Holding will not straighten until after your next Action Phase.
card.flavor: "It is valuable to us, yes, but I feel trading at a reasonable rate to the Crab is the only honorable thing to do." - Asako Karachu

card.name: Coastal Pearl Bed
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
Open, [BOW]: A target Holding's abilities may not be taken (this turn).
card.flavor: "These Naga have pearls much like those from our home, though they are far more savage than the Naga we know." - Kuni Shinoda

card.name: The Breeding Ground
card.text:
Stables
Limited, [BOW]: Give your target Personality Conqueror.
card.flavor: "The Spider have found new sources of strength in the Colonies. We should do the same. Perhaps these things that Etsui discovered have some use, my lord?" - Tsuruchi Isas

card.name: Hida Gojiro
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Fallen
Invest [PAY 4]: Give Gojiro two +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
After Gojiro enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: Not all Crab who fall are victims of the Taint.

card.name: Hida Tadama
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Commander • Favored of the Celestial Dragon • Samurai • Unique
After the first time each phase Tadama is destroyed, bring him into play in your home, ignoring costs, and bow him.
card.flavor: "I carry the Heaven's power! Flee or die!"

card.name: Kaiu Sokakaze
card.text: Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician
card.flavor: "The Kaiu were not idle in the peace that followed the Destroyer War. When the Dark Naga came, they were ready." - Otomo Hiroshi, Chronicle of the Serpent War

card.name: Toritaka Chokichi - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Battle: Bow a target Spider Clan Personality or, if Chokichi has a Follower, bow a target enemy card without attachments.
card.flavor: "Serpents or Spider, it makes no difference. All enemies of the Crab will perish."

card.name: Toritaka Iabuchi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 2 Attack.
card.flavor: "I have heard the voice of my ancestor, and I will obey... whatever the cost."

card.name: Yasuki Daisuki
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Merchant • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: "A dangerous assignment? Surely not. My lord loves me too much for that."

card.name: Asahina Kitiaru - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Monk • Experienced • Unique
Limited, [BOW]: Search your discard pile, then Fate deck, for a Ring. Show it and put it in your hand. Discard a card.
card.flavor: "Purify your heart. Only when you perceive your center can you be sure what desires are yours, and what is being forced on you by another."

card.name: Asahina Shigemitsu - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Favored of the Air Dragon • Cavalry • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
Open, [BOW]: Target one or two of your Provinces. After the first time this turn a Personality attacks one of those Provinces, gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Peace, yes! But not at the cost of our honor! Never at the cost of honor!"

card.name: Daidoji Soken
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Merchant
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
card.flavor: "I am no warrior, and nothing I can do can stop the Fudoists or their incomprehensible enemies. But I can put tools into the hands of those that can, and I will work night and day to see that this is done."

card.name: Doji Razan
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier • Magistrate • Samurai • Duelist
Invest [PAY 1]: Give Razan a +1C token. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
Limited: Destroy a target Fudo card. Destroy Razan.
card.flavor: "Destroy this shrine! We shall have no more of this heresy!"

card.name: Daidoji Tametaka - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Commander • Iron Crane • Samurai • Scout • Experienced • Unique
Tametaka loses any duel against Yoritomo Hiromi.
Battle: Reduce the Force of a target enemy Personality or Follower to 0.
card.flavor: "Many Daidoji call themselves 'Iron Cranes'. Tametaka is one of the few who deserve the name. What a fight that was!" - Yoritomo Hiromi

card.name: Daidoji Tobei
card.text:
Crane Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Scout • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
After Tobei enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 2 Attack.
card.flavor: "No clan or family was left untouched by the madness; it struck whenever and wherever a weakness could be found." - Chronicle of the Heretic War, Part II

card.name: Kitsuki Nakai - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Magistrate • Samurai • Topaz Champion • Duelist • Experienced • Unique
Open: Give a target Personality -2F, or -3F if he is dishonorable.
card.flavor: "You are not the first Topaz Champion to find yourself in the Colonies, my friend," Kaiu Onizuka said with a smile. "Let us see what grand work we can find you."

card.name: Mirumoto Bojan
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
After Bojan enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "P'an Ku!" he rasped. "P'an Ku! Do not withhold your blessings! Shower them upon us!"

card.name: Mirumoto Katagi - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Experienced • Kensai • Unique
Battle, [PAY *]: Equip a target non-Unique Weapon in your discard pile to Katagi.
card.flavor: "The Colonies have provided me with a multitude of new weapons to master. Shall I show you, Crab? Or you, Scorpion? Who wants to be first?"

card.name: Mirumoto Omero
card.text: Dragon Clan • Samurai • Conqueror • Kensai
card.flavor: "Given a choice, I would not call the Spider allies. My lord wishes it, however, so I will slay any Crab or Scorpion who wishes them harm. That is the role of a samurai."

card.name: Tamori Jinai
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Alchemist • Earth • Shugenja
Battle: Bow a target enemy card without attachments.
card.flavor: "All things are made of the elements. If you entreat them properly, they can take familiar, and useful, forms."

card.name: Togashi Noritada
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Fire • Monk • Tattooed
Invest [PAY 3]: Give Noritada two +1F Fire tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "Most believe the Fire Dragon to be them most devastating. Few consider the power of the Frost Dragon."

card.name: Akodo Dairuko - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Clan Champion • Paragon • Samurai • Steel Lion • Conqueror • Experienced • Loyal • Tactician • Unique
Battle: Bow a target enemy Personality with lower Personal Honor. Destroy him if he is Unaligned.
card.flavor: "We shall wait no more! The Lion Clan marches today, and we shall not rest until Legulus is crushed beneath our feet."

card.name: Akodo Kamina - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Experienced • Tactician • Unique
Battle: Ranged 3 Attack, or Ranged 4 Attack if the target is Lion Clan or Unaligned.
card.flavor: "No rest. No compromise. We will not rest until our Clan is pure and whole, a forged blade against the enemies of the Empire."

card.name: Akodo Nojima
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Fallen • Cavalry
After Nojima enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Destroy Nojima if he is ever in an army with a Personality with 3 or more Personal Honor.
card.flavor: His entire Clan had turned against him. No matter. He would keep moving and fight on for as long as he lived.

card.name: Ikoma Ayumu - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Hero • Samurai • Experienced • Tactician • Unique
Will not gain Fallen or Shadowlands.
The rulebook Tactical Advantage is an Open action for you if you target Ayumu with it.
card.flavor: "Ayumu is a beacon of hope to us all. Despite temptation, he remained true to the Clan." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Ikoma Jeiku
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
Invest [PAY 1]: Refill the Province Jeiku entered play from face-up. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: He has taken to the customs of the outsiders with gusto, but the brothers of his legion still look upon him with respect.

card.name: Kitsu Ririko
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Destined • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
Ririko enters play ignoring Honor Requirement if you are a Unicorn Clan player.
card.flavor: "Relax, brother. This pain shall end soon."

card.name: Kitsune Yuko
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Kitsune • Nonhuman • Spirit • Shugenja
Invest [PAY 2]: Gain 1 Honor. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
Limited, [BOW]: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Don't be surprised, Doji-san. There is more to the Mantis than war."

card.name: Moshi Rukia - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Experienced • Naval • Shugenja • Unique
Battle: Bow a target enemy card without attachments. Destroy it if it is an attachment.
card.flavor: "Unfair? Blasphemous? The Crane are merely jealous. It is unfortunate for them that not one among the Asahina can match my power or resolve."

card.name: Moshi Sasako - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Thunder • Conqueror • Experienced • Naval • Shugenja • Unique
Tireless Battle: Straighten Sasako. (Tireless actions may be taken while bowed.)
card.flavor: "The suffering... the slaughter. This war has ended just as Master Chukage predicted before he gave me the texts he had found and bid me to flee. I do not know what madness he has discovered, but it has wounded the Mantis deeply."

card.name: Tsuruchi Gombei
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Fallen • Samurai • Scout • Naval
After Gombei enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "No! This war is not over! It will not end until every mewling Crane and their peasant servitors have bled to death before me!"

card.name: Yoritomo Mikaru
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Charitable • Magistrate • Samurai • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
Limited, [PAY *]: Recruit a target Holding in your Province (entering play bowed), for 1 less Gold.
card.flavor: "Food, instead of spears. Clothing, instead of armor. My kin sometimes forget all the good koku can do."

card.name: Yoritomo Hiromi - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Clan Champion • Samurai • The Growing Storm • Thunder • Experienced • Kensai • Loyal • Naval • Unique
Battle, [PAY *]: Ranged Attack with strength equal to the Gold paid.
card.flavor: "The Crane are finished, and their general beaten. But we must not rest, my friends - we have been betrayed."

card.name: Asako Karachu - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Golden Arm • Henshin • Monk • Protector of the Second City • Experienced • Unique
Open: Give Karachu Cavalry, Conqueror, or Naval.
card.flavor: "Resisting temptation is not a difficult matter. It simply requires discipline and dedication."

card.name: Asako Ifukube
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Inquisitor • Destined • Expendable • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: "The stories of this Blood must surely be exaggerated. Nothing could possess the power these rumors claim. Tell me, my friend... what really happened?"

card.name: Isawa Hajime
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fallen • Fire • Shugenja
Invest [PAY 3]: Give Hajime two +1F Fire tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
After Hajime enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "Hahahaha! Pretty!"

card.name: Isawa Koizumi
card.text: Phoenix Clan • Air • Shugenja
card.flavor: "These lands are not beyond redemption. We must find the peace within ourselves and make it manifest here. The Colonies can be tamed. This can become a land like unto the Empire, if we are but strong enough."

card.name: Isawa Norimichi - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Elemental Master • Experienced • Loyal • Shugenja • Unique
Your other Earth Shugenja have +1F.
Battle: Give this Province +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: "The earth can be loud, like the avalanche, or quiet, as the stone. The avalanche's strength is fleeting, but the stone's strength can be eternal."

card.name: Shiba Tsurao
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower -2F.
card.flavor: "What do you suppose this thing is?"

card.name: Bayushi Amorie
card.text: Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Cavalry
card.flavor: The Scorpion Shinobi are trained to misdirect their opponents, obfuscate their attacks, conceal their objectives, and cling to the shadows. But some occasions require more overt methods.

card.name: Bayushi Manami - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Paragon • Samurai • Yojimbo • Experienced • Loyal • Unique
During battle resolution, Manami's army has +2F.
card.flavor: Against prepared assailants, most Scorpion Yojimbo only succeed in buying their charges a few moments of time. But then, a few moments of time is all they need.

card.name: Shosuro Nigawa
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Magistrate • Samurai
Invest [PAY 3]: Give Nigawa two +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "I find that justice is like an arrow. Once its target is clear, its touch is unavoidable. Especially if the guilty do not see it coming."

card.name: Soshi Kodanshi - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Experienced • Unique
Limited: Bow your target unbowed Ninja Personality. Bow a target Personality; if he is Fudo or Fallen, he will not straighten this turn.
card.flavor:
"How do you tell the two cults apart?"
Kodanshi blinked. "I don't," he replied.

card.name: Yogo Takashi
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Fallen • Destined • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
After Takashi enters play, lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "A city of fools. I expected no less from the backwash of the mainland."

card.name: Yogo Nobukai
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo
Open: If it is your turn or you control a Courtier, give a target Personality -2F.
card.flavor: Takashi's activities did not concern Nobukai. The yojimbo's mind was filled only with his duty; to protect his charge. The cruelty of the Yogo Curse knew no limits.

card.name: Daigotsu Kikumura
card.text:
Spider Clan • Commander • Samurai • Shadowlands
If you are a Dragon Clan player, Kikumura's Invest is [PAY 2].
Invest [PAY 4]: Create two 1F Followers and attach them to Kikumura. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "Tell me again, brother Dragon. Tell me how we must earn the respect of these savages."

card.name: Daigotsu Ryuko
card.text:
Spider Clan • Fallen • Paragon • Samurai • Shadowlands • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
After Ryuko enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Battle, [BOW]: Melee 2 Attack.
card.flavor: "The simple devastation of my enemies is my art. You shall be a masterpiece."

card.name: M'rika - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Artisan • Bog Hag • Nonhuman • Shadowlands • Experienced • Loyal • Shugenja • Unique
Open, [BOW]: Bow a target Personality.
card.flavor: "What a masterpiece my darling niece has created here. I have not felt such excitement in years. What meaning do a few deaths possess when they serve to dispel my ennui?"

card.name: Ninube Onchi - exp
card.text:
Spider Clan • Imperial • Imperial Explorer • Ninja • Shadowlands • Scout • Cavalry • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
After Onchi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Actions from cards in other players' units may not target Onchi.
card.flavor: "Discover what Renyu is planning. If that kabuki-wearing fool wants a war, I shall gladly oblige." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Lao-she
card.text:
Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai
Home Battle: If Lao-she would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. (Home actions may be taken from home.)
card.flavor: "I have seen the power of the Blood. I know what secrets it holds. The other clans... they know nothing."

card.name: Susumu Haikaro
card.text:
Spider Clan • Courtier
Negate Haikaro's destruction from battle resolution.
card.flavor: "I find that an occaisional tour of the battlefield does wonders for improving my perspective in court. Would that I could observe the battle at the Second City! How marvelous it must be!"

card.name: Chuda Hikano
card.text:
Shadowlands • Shugenja
After Hikano enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Home Battle, [BOW]: Straighten your target Oni. (Home actions may be taken from home.)
Maho Limited: Destroy a target Ikoma Ayumu. Destroy Hikano.
card.flavor: "Flee to the Colonies if you want, you armless old fool. It will not save you from my wrath."

card.name: The Lost Colossus
card.text:
Earth • Golem • Nonhuman
After The Lost Colossus enters play, bow it.
Will not attach cards. Will not challenge. You may not target The Lost Colossus with Political actions.
card.flavor: The earth shuddered, and ancient stone and soil shattered as it rose. "Well," Daizu said calmly, "that certainly is impressive."

card.name: Abdollah
card.text:
Gaijin • Jackal • Shugenja
After Abdollah enters play, lose 2 Honor and create a 2F/2C/0PH Nonhuman • Shadowlands • Undead Personality.
card.flavor: "I will gladly bargain with this demon Nitoshi if it allows me to avoid my enemies, friend Keirei. You think there are not worse things in the world than a silly six-armed goddess?"

card.name: Legulus
card.text:
Commander • Gaijin • Yodotai • Conqueror • Unique
After Legulus enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -3 strength.
Limited: Search your deck for a Yodotai Legionnaire Follower. Show it. Put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "You took my goddess, samurai. I will take everything from you in return."

card.name: Boyoh Mercenary
card.text:
Mercenary
After Boyoh Mercenary enters play, discard a card.
After Boyoh Mercenary's army destroys a Province, draw a card.
card.flavor: "Men of war in service to some sort of ancient cult," Bayushi Kahoku mused. "What an interesting enigma. What measure of secrets might they reveal?"

card.name: Hoshoku-sha
card.text:
Nonhuman • Wani
Battle/Open: Destroy your target Personality: Give Hoshoku-sha +2F.
card.flavor: "The Wani are said to be ancient creatures, older than man, and failed rivals of the great Elemental Dragons. No one has seen one in seven centuries. Why now?" - Kuni Kiyoshi

card.name: Utaku Sayaka
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Battle Maiden • Paragon • Samurai • Cavalry
Invest [PAY 3]: Give Sayaka two +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: She breathed in deep and waited for the serenity to pass over her. It was a brutal affair, killing those you had once called family. Duty and honor, it seemed, weighed greatly.

card.name: Ide Hinobu
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Courtier • Merchant
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
card.flavor: "There is no shame in dealing with money to support your clan. I simply wage battle with our enemies on a different plane."

card.name: Moto Daiken
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Death Priest • Water • Cavalry • Shugenja
While you control any Ancestor Personalities or have any dead Personalities in your discard pile, Daiken has +1F.
card.flavor: "We have had troubles with the Lion Clan in the past, but that is no concern. We shall bring forth the might of the Unicorn to their aid during this time of need."

card.name: Shinjo Kinto - exp
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander of the 9th Legion • Commander • Imperial • Samurai • Scout • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Home Battle: Move Kinto home or, if he would be opposed, to the current battlefield. (Home actions may be taken from home.)
card.flavor: The rebellion would be stopped, he swore to his ancestors.

card.name: Shinjo Tselu - exp2
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander • Imperial • Ivory Champion • Magistrate • Samurai • Cavalry • Experienced 2 • Unique
Limited, [PAY 2]: Create a 1F Cavalry Follower and attach it to your target Personality.
card.flavor: "No man can follow a commander if he does not draw respect. I shall lead the charge myself."

card.name: Shinjo Yoshie
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander • Fallen • Samurai • Cavalry • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
After Yoshie enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Battle: Give a target enemy Infantry Personality or Follower -3F.
card.flavor: "They come for us now, but we are ready."

card.name: The Bestial Ones
card.text:
Nonhuman
After this Follower enters play, lose 1 Honor and discard a card.
Engage: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower -2F.
card.flavor: "They follow the herds of elephant men. I do not know what they are." - Togashi Sakata

card.name: Clay Kshatriya
card.text:
Clay Soldier • Nonhuman
Invest [PAY 5]: Give this Follower two +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "I have heard of their like before. The Four Winds used them to advance upon the City of the Lost. Interesting." - Kitsu Fukui

card.name: Elephant Cavalry
card.text:
Elephant • Nonhuman • Cavalry
Will only attach to a Human. Cards in this unit have Cavalry.
Melee and Ranged Attacks targeting cards in this unit have -2 strength.
card.flavor: "All things considered, I prefer a horse. But they have their uses." - Utaku Lishan

card.name: Enslaved Djinn
card.text:
Djinn • Fire • Nonhuman • Spirit
After this Follower enters play, search your discard pile, then deck, for another Enslaved Djinn. Show it. Put it into your hand.
card.flavor:
"My service comes at a price, little priestess."
"You will serve, spirit," Sorano smirked. "You will serve, and I will hear no complaint."

card.name: Frontier Farmer
card.text:
Ashigaru
You may Equip this Follower from your discard pile.
card.flavor: "This is a place of peace and serenity. We will preserve it always, that there might be a calm in the eye of whatever storm may arise." - Iuchi Yupadi

card.name: Camel Mounts
card.text:
Camel • Nonhuman • Cavalry
Will only attach to a Human. This Personality has Cavalry.
Home Battle: Move this unit to the current battlefield if it would be opposed there. (Home actions may be taken from home.)
card.flavor: "She is no artist, but one must respect the Imperial Governor for her skill at crafting lies. Perhaps one day she will embrace a more... practical art." - Daigotsu Yajinden

card.name: Kamalakar's Harem
card.text:
Gaijin
This Personality may not attack.
Limited, [BOW]: Dishonor a target Human Personality. Destroy this Follower.
card.flavor: "Should not the last living kin of the Rajah live in comfort? These lovely companions help me consider the gravity of my responsibilities."

card.name: Scholarly Hermit
card.text:
Fudo • Gaijin • Monk
Limited, [BOW]: Put a Ring from your discard pile into your hand. Destroy this Follower.
card.flavor: "What topic would you like to discuss today, friend Tsukasa?"

card.name: Spawn of Vritra
card.text:
Nonhuman • Spawn of Vritra
Will not attach to a Water Personality.
Battle: Ranged 6 Attack.
card.flavor: "These accursed beasts destroy water with their very presence. Destroy them wherever you find them, and pray we never encounter their progenitor." - Ikoma Shinju

card.name: Spitting Llama
card.text:
Nonhuman • Cavalry
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower -3F.
card.flavor: "Filthy, disgusting beast!" Tsimaru spat. "Wait, don't kill it! Perhaps... that is how it shows affection?"

card.name: Aulus
card.text:
Gaijin • Yodotai
After this Follower enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Legionnaires in this unit have +1F.
card.flavor: "The men are ready, Praefectus. We will end these samurai."

card.name: Yodotai Legionnaire
card.text:
Gaijin • Legionnaire • Yodotai
You may include any number of this Follower in your deck.
After this Follower enters play, lose 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "You were not blessed to be born Yodotai, but you have become like us through Praefectus Legulus's leadership. Rejoice!" - Aulus

card.name: Watersteel Sword
card.text:
Nemuranai • Water • Weapon
Water Open: Target a non-Unique Weapon attached to this Personality. Copy an ability on it that does not itself copy ability, to this Weapon (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: "A fascinating weapon," Kanpeki mused. "With all manner of possibilities."

card.name: Divination Bowl
card.text:
Limited, [BOW]: Look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. Put them back in any order.
Limited, [BOW]: Draw a card. Destroy this Item.
card.flavor: "I carried some of the sacred water back to the Second City with me. I may never unlock its full potential, but I will never stop trying." - Isawa Shunsuko

card.name: Kshatriya Artifacts
card.text:
Gaijin
Fudo and Fallen Personalities have -1F while opposing this Item.
card.flavor: In the name of the Phoenix Clan, Shiba Sansesuke discovered great treasures of the fallen Ivory Kingdom. At night, however, he wonders what manner of trouble he claimed with it.

card.name: Lantern Oil
card.text: The Attacker may not take Engage actions at this Item's battlefield.
card.flavor: "What a wondrous substance, this oil. It makes for efficient lighting, efficient transport, and efficient sabotage. I simply cannot stress how valuable a versatile tool is for... an actor. This lesson I have learned from the famed Shosuro Atesharu." - Shosuro Rin

card.name: Map of the Northern Colonies
card.text: Other players' Terrains will not destroy your Terrains at this Item's battlefield.
card.flavor: "I made a few poor quality copies to sell to the Scorpion. They were desperate to see what was in them, and I am curious as to why they showed such naked interest." - Yoritomo Aranai

card.name: Seppun's Blessed Blade
card.text:
Weapon
This Item's Force modifier equals this Personality's Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "Protectors of both the Empress' body and spirit. They never forget that strength forges steel, and hands carry it, but honor guides it." - Shinjo Tae-hyun

card.name: Red Hunger's Fang
card.text:
Weapon
After this Item enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Battle, [BOW]: Give a target enemy Personality a -1F/-1C Poison token.
card.flavor: "These Colonies have given me such an interesting array of materials to work with." - Kaiu Nakano

card.name: Shard of the Great Death's Bones
card.text:
Shadowlands
After this Item enters play, lose 2 Honor, create three 1F Nonhuman • Raptor • Shadowlands • Undead • Cavalry Followers, and attach them to your Personalities.
card.flavor: "Weapons could be made from the bones we found, but what kind of man would use them?" - Tamori Kazushige

card.name: Translated Story of Shaharazad
card.text: Limited, [BOW]: Give this Item a +1F token.
card.flavor: "Of course no one admitted to finding the gaijin story interesting, but that didn't stop everyone at the Winter Court from wanting to read it. Just out of passing curiosity, of course." - Bayushi Harunayi

card.name: The Thunder Resounds
card.text: Thunder Battle: Target a Spell at this battlefield, or at any location if the target is Thunder. Copy an ability on it that does not itself copy ability, to this Spell (until the turn ends).
card.flavor: "They say lightning never strikes the same place twice. Shall we test this theory?" - Moshi Ino

card.name: Constructing the Self
card.text: Air Limited, [BOW]: This Spell may remain bowed. Create a 0F Illusion • Nonhuman • Cavalry • Shugenja Personality with this Shugenja's Chi and Personal Honor. After the next time this game this Spell straightens or leaves play, remove the Illusion from the game.
card.flavor: The kami of Air are fond of games, moreso when the participants are unaware that they are being played with.

card.name: Kiyoshi's Wrath
card.text: Earth Battle, [BOW]: Bow a target enemy Follower or Personality with 4 or lower Force.
card.flavor: Serenity and balance are valued by samurai, who must maintain a pristine "face" at all times. But the Kuni have learned that rage can be an asset... once one knows when and how to release it.

card.name: Poison the Cup
card.text:
This Shugenja has Shadowlands.
Maho Limited, [BOW]: Remove a target token from a Personality and give him a -1C Plague token. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "It is a truly foul magic that turns one's strength into poison." - Kuni Shinoda

card.name: Cast Aside Appearances
card.text: Earth Limited, [BOW]: If this Shugenja is Human, permanently give him Nonhuman, +2F, and the ability, "Battle: Bow a target enemy card with lower Force." Destroy this Spell. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "When directly confronted, any animal will show its true colors." - Isawa Norimichi

card.name: Steal the Candle's Flame
card.text:
Fire Interrupt, [BOW]: Give a Melee or Ranged Attack +2 strength.
Fire Battle: Ranged 0 Attack.
card.flavor: "Even if it looks worse than it really is, that can still be bad enough." - Bayushi Makubesu

card.name: My Ancestor's Steed
card.text: Home Water Battle, [BOW]: Move your target Spirit Personality at any location to the current battlefield. (Home actions may be taken from home.)
card.flavor: "I remember Yuichi," Kanae said, then whispered a prayer. Made of wind and starlight, the horse appeared. "She serves you still, honored ancestor."

card.name: Study the Wheel
card.text: Void Limited, [BOW]: Turn a card in a Province face-up (if needed) and give it Kharmic. (Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your Province and refill it face-up.)
card.flavor: "To know the future is both a burden and a blessing. 'With our minds we make the world.' Not that I've seen it, it cannot be stopped."

card.name: Gates of Chikushudo
card.text: Open: Target your created Spirit Personality. Create a Personality that permanently copies the target's printed keywords, traits, abilities, and stats. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: "They say deer of this size were once human in their previous lives." Kagako gestured to the shocked Crane. "I think this one remembers you."

card.name: Befriend the Tides
card.text: Water Battle, [BOW]: Move this Shugenja from the current battlefield to an adjacent battlefield.
card.flavor: "Clear waters hide nothing, yet they always seem to surprise my enemies." - Asako Chukage

card.name: The Tao of Fudo
card.text: Battle/Open: Target your Ring in your discard pile or in play. Straighten it or put it in your hand. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: "I reject all external influences. I refect all external authorities. My path is my own; for that reason, it is true." - The Tao of Fudo

card.name: Focus on the Flame
card.text: Fire Iaijutsu Battle, [BOW]: This Shugenja challenges a target enemy Personality. During the duel, if this Shugenja is Fire, he has Duelist. Bow the duel's loser. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: "In the past, there is no learning. In the future, there is no living. There is only this moment." - Naka Mahatsu

card.name: Unsettling Gathering
card.text: Limited, [PAY *]: Target an attachment with Gold Cost equal to or lower than the amount paid. Transfer it to any player's target Personality (this may change control of the attachment).
card.flavor: A wry smile crossed Waru's face. Every person in the room would have been killed if they had been seen by 'honorable' Rokugani. He wondered if the same was now true of him.

card.name: A New Perspective
card.text: Battle, [PAY 2]: Create and attach a 1F Follower to each of your opposed Personalities at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: "What is this?" Bayushi Kahoku muttered to himself. The carvings were unlike anything he had ever seen before, and the entire area seemed to resonate with power.

card.name: A Welcome Reprieve
card.text: Open: Target your honorable Personality. Other players' actions may not target him this phase.
card.flavor: "It is a strange name for a village. But then I suppose we are in a strange place. I would swear I saw Tamori Chieko standing over there just the other day, for instance..." - Bayushi Shibata

card.name: Ritual Preparation
card.text: Battle: Straighten your target card in a unit.
card.flavor: "Never neglect the task of probing an enemy's strengths. It is an essential step in the preparation for war. Give each step the reverence it deserves, and they will shield you from the disgrace of defeat." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Ashalan Ambush
card.text: Limited, [PAY 8]: Create a 4F/4C/0PH Ashalan • Nonhuman • Shugenja Personality.
card.flavor: "You've come to the wrong lair, friend," the Ashalan hissed. Tanzaki's eyes widened as his gaze fell upon the dozens of other Ashalan, rousing from their rest.

card.name: Chaos of Battle
card.text: Battle: Give one or two target opposed Personalities a Force bonus equal to the number of different Clan alignments on Personalities at the current battlefield.
card.flavor: In the heart of the battlefield, it is often hard to discern foe from ally.

card.name: Boiling Point
card.text:
As a Focus Effect: Give +1F to your Yojimbo at the same location as your Personality in this duel.
Battle/Open: Bow your target unbowed Personality at any location. Straighten another target Personality.
card.flavor: The situation would not have deteriorated so quickly had the Bayushi slowed his 'witty' banter.

card.name: The Crystal Tears
card.text:
Terrain
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play. You may target and bow a Personality with 4 or more Force or a Fallen, Ninja, or Shadowlands card. After this Terrain is destroyed, straighten the target.
card.flavor: "I do not know if these crystals have the same properties as those in the Empire, but I will find out." - Kaiu Onizuka

card.name: Recovering What Was Lost
card.text: Absent Engage: If he would be opposed, move your target Personality at home to the current battlefield. Give him +2F if he is a Tactician. (Absent actions can be taken without presence.)
card.flavor: "Twenty-five years and still such treasures to be found. What wonders remain hidden?" - Akodo Makotai

card.name: Merchant Patronage
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Political Interrupt: If the action is on another player's Holding, you choose who gains or loses any Honor from it. If you control a Courtier, you may bow him to increase the gain or loss by 1.
card.flavor: "I think this one shows promise, don't you?"

card.name: Defensive Formation
card.text: Battle: Give one to three of your target defending Personalities +2F.
card.flavor: "When one possesses something that others desire, they may find themselves beset by enemies. If that occurs, then it falls to the virtuous to stand shoulder to shoulder with those beset and follow the path of the righteous."

card.name: Iaijutsu Dojo
card.text: Iaijutsu Battle: Your target unbowed Personality challenges a target enemy Personality. Dishonor and bow the duel's loser.
card.flavor: "If you are dedicated to victory, his two blades should mean nothing to you. Widen your stance, and attack again." - Kitsuki Horume

card.name: Trade Embargo
card.text:
You may only play one copy of Trade Embargo per turn.
Open, [PAY 4]: All non-Unique Holdings produce 1 less Gold (this turn).
card.flavor: "I am afraid your shop will need to be closed temporarily. I apologize for the inconvenience. It really is quite necessary."

card.name: New Cavalry Tactics
card.text: Engage, [PAY 3]: Target your Personality. Create and attach two, or three if the target is a Commander, 1F Elephant • Nonhuman • Cavalry Followers to him.
card.flavor: "They are riding those... those behemoths? I did not see that coming. That... is actually a very good idea." - Kitsuki Horume

card.name: Honor Replaces Rage
card.text: Open: A target Personality has -2F while attacking this turn.
card.flavor: "Your courage honors us both, Shiba-san. Let this conflict be at an end."

card.name: Nubane's Defense
card.text: Battle: Give one or two of your target Personalities +1F for each Ring you control.
card.flavor: "This place is claimed by the Dragon Clan. No other shall have it while I live." - Kitsuki Nubane

card.name: Exotic Farmlands
card.text: Battle, [PAY *]: Target your Personality. Create and attach to him a 1F Ashigaru Follower for every 3 Gold you paid, rounded down.
card.flavor: "I do not know who ruled here before, and I must say lentils are a poor substitute for rice. But the farmers eat them readily enough." - Shinjo Tselu

card.name: Mukudori's Wisdom
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Battle/Open: Straighten or bow a target Ring.
card.flavor: "The ways of Fudo are simple, yet infinite. Find your own truth, regardless of others."

card.name: Ivinda Village
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Open, [PAY *]: Give Cavalry to a number of target cards equal to the amount of Gold you paid.
card.flavor: "Tsai-Tsu saw something. This land is not so empty as we believed." - Tamori Sugi

card.name: Unexpected Discovery
card.text: Battle: Move your target opposed Personality (at the current battlefield) to an adjacent battlefield.
card.flavor: "The ship's name is blasphemous, as near as I can translate it. But the design... fascinating." - Yoritomo Tarao

card.name: Practicing Kata
card.text:
Kata
You may Equip as a Battle/Open action once per turn.
Limited: Put this Kata into play. Discard all your other Kata in play.
card.flavor: "Drill your men daily. Laziness breeds defeat." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Hidden Storehouse of House Rafiq
card.text: Battle, [PAY 3]: If you (after playing this card) have fewer cards in your hand than each other player, draw two cards.
card.flavor: "Of call the things I care about," Yasuki Dokansuto said, "Daigotsu Kanpeki's opinion is not on the list. He will yield it up to us, or we will take it. Those are the choices."

card.name: Holding Cells
card.text: Kolat Battle, [PAY 4]: Target a Personality. Before this battle resolves, bow him. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "They will be useful to us in the struggle with both Fudo's adherents and his enemy. But something about the place chills my blood." - Yoritomo Kanaye

card.name: Ivory Magistrate Outpost
card.text:
Open: Straighten your target Magistrate.
Battle: Straighten your target Personality.
card.flavor: "Mai-san, I do not have vast armies to support me, but I am a magistrate and I have a sword. All that I have will be used to end these evils." - Doji Razan

card.name: Lakeside Retreat
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle resolves, straighten a Personality or Follower.
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: "There's no point in bearing the burdens of responsibility if you can't sometimes put them down and enjoy life." - Yoritomo Kanahashi

card.name: Lessons from the Heralds
card.text: Battle: If one of your Personalities has won a duel this turn, look at the top three cards of your Fate deck. Put one into your hand. Put the rest back in any order.
card.flavor:
"Just because you discovered this location does not make you responsible for defending it, Yoshitada."
The Crane smiled. "I disagree."

card.name: Lost Caravan
card.text: Open, [PAY 3]: Straighten your target Stronghold or Holding.
card.flavor: "Beginning any new venture now is perilous; who can sort one's own good intentions from the promptings of our mysterious enemy? But some opportunities are too good to waste, regardless of the risk." - Mirumoto Yumaru

card.name: Allied Efforts
card.text: Battle: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower -3F.
card.flavor: "As strange as the conflicts that surround me are, as incomprehensible as the originators of those conflicts are, for my own taste these new allies are even stranger and more incomprehensible. The world outside the Empire is vast and terrifying." - The private journals of Kitsuki Jakuei

card.name: A Doomseeker's Tomb
card.text: Limited, [PAY 1]: Give your target Personality a +1F/+1C/+1PH token.
card.flavor: "I knew there were those who had come before me - other Doomseekers - but I had never dreamed to speak with the spirit of one. It was not mere chance that brought me to that place." - Iuchi Shunshi

card.name: Friends in the Jungle
card.text: Battle/Open, [PAY 1]: Give your target Nonhuman Personality +2F/+2C.
card.flavor: "They are not without merit," Kaitoko explained. "They are clever, are eager to help, and have an unsettling ability to move about these jungles unseen. Better allies than foes, I think."

card.name: The Eternal Rainbows
card.text:
Terrain
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play. Your target opposed Personality has +2F (while this card is in play).
card.flavor: "It is remarkable, to say the least. We must not let it slip from our hands." - Matsu Koyama

card.name: Looting the Ruins
card.text:
Terrain
After this battle resolves, if this Terrain is in play, put it into your hand.
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: Katagi does not speak of the weapon he found, nor the visions of bloodlust and fire that have plagued his mind since.

card.name: Claiming the Ruins
card.text: Limited, [PAY 2]: Put a non-Unique Item from your discard pile into your hand.
card.flavor: "What we have lost in lives we have more than regained in what we have recovered here. Knowledge, weapons, and secrets that only the Dragon can be trusted to keep safe." - Mirumoto Kojinrue

card.name: The False Route
card.text: Battle: Create a battlefield without a Province. Move your target Personality and a target enemy Personality there; if your Personality is a Scout, straighten his unit.
card.flavor: "A clever trick, gaijin," Dairuko acknowledged. "It will not be enough. Jeiku, find the real trail. Do whatever you must, but find the gaijin."

card.name: Sorrowful Prayer
card.text: Limited: Shuffle one to three target non-Unique Strategies in your discard pile into your deck. Remove this card from the game.
card.flavor: "The names of those who succumbed will be blotted out of their family's history. Those who held true to their honor and raised their sword in the Empress's name earned ageless glory. Thus the Heavens reward virtue." - Chronicle of the Heretic War, Part IV

card.name: Outnumbered
card.text: Battle: Give all your opposed Personalities with Followers at the current battlefield +1F. Give all enemy Personalities there without Followers -1F.
card.flavor: What makes a warrior a samurai? That in the absence of hope, he will fight regardless.

card.name: Tactical Setback
card.text: Absent Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -2F. (Absent actions can be taken without presence.)
card.flavor: Even the greatest general cannot account for everything.

card.name: Strength of the Bear
card.text: Battle: Bow your target unbowed Personality. Bow a target enemy card with lower Force than his. If your Personality has 5 or more printed Force, straighten him.
card.flavor: "You seem surprised," Nikaru said. The Ebonites attacked, and the Crab Berserker lost himself in the battle.

card.name: The Final Lesson
card.text: Limited: Permanently give one or two of your target unbowed Personalities Expendable. (Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: Everyone is expendable.

card.name: The Tomb of Sun Tao
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
Open: Put a target Ring into its owner's hand.
card.flavor: Hachiro reverently removed his kabuto. "For centuries, we have wondered what became of you."

card.name: Uncovering Treasures
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold. Discard this Strategy from play.
Limited, [PAY 2]: Put this Strategy into play.
card.flavor: "The Guardian Singh," Yoritomo Singh breathed. Tears swam in his vision. "I thought I would never lay eyes upon it again."

card.name: Blood of Shahai
card.text:
Dark Fortune • Unique
Maho Battle/Open: Give -1C to a target Personalty with lower Chi than his printed Chi.
Maho Battle: Discard this Celestial. Give each Personality at this battlefield a -1C Blood token.
card.flavor: "Learn this lesson well: Blood and power are the only truths. All else is illusion." - Shahai

card.name: Lost Blade of the Maharaja
card.text:
Weapon
Battle, [BOW]: Bow a target Personality with Force equal to or lower than this Personality's.
card.flavor: "A fine weapon, even for something of gaijin make. It is fit as an armament for some lost king or a gift to a noble samurai. I am not worthy of even touching it." - Hida Yamadera

card.name: A Great Victory
card.text: Limited: After each battle resolution (this turn) in which your army destroyed an enemy army or Province, give each of your Personalities in that army a +1F/+1C token.
card.flavor: "I never thought I would want to share a victory with you," Tsudoken said over the cheers. "I never thought I would let you," Yuri replied with a grin.

card.name: Imminent Victory
card.text: Battle: If you destroy the enemy army or Province in this battle's resolution, give a +1F/+1C token to each of your Personalities in your army (at battle resolution).
card.flavor: "This is the hard part," the commander said to her aide. "Their blood is up, but will their discipline remain?"

card.name: Oracle of the Void - exp
card.text:
Void • Oracle • Retainer • Experienced • Unique
Negate this card's destruction.
Limited: Bow this card: The next two cards in provinces you refill (this turn) may be refilled face-up.
Limited: Bow this card: Draw a card.
card.flavor: "I see all. There is nothing beyond my sight."

card.name: Hidden Weapons
card.text:
You may Equip Weapons from under this Holding as a Battle/Limited action.
Limited: Put a Weapon in your hand under this Holding (face-down).
card.flavor: Honorable clans do not engage in deceit and misdirection. However, where they choose to store their weapons is no one's business but their own.

card.name: Armed Rice Farmer
card.text:
Ashigaru • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: He had never been so far from home before.

card.name: Rice Farmer
card.text:
Ashigaru • Kharmic
(Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card from your hand to draw a card.)
card.flavor: His back hurt, but the rice was coming along nicely.

card.name: Imperial Sword
card.text:
Imperial • Weapon
This Personality has +1F while he is Imperial.
card.flavor: Let this blade guide your honor.

card.name: Chagatai's Wrath
card.text:
Unique
Limited: End the Action Phase. Discard this Celestial.
card.flavor: "I do not care what the reality of the situation is. I care only that my father is remembered as the great man he was. If it is only the peasants who remember him, that is a start." - Moto Taigo

card.name: The Inevitable Grasp of Conquest
card.text:
Maigo no Musha • Unique
Your Personalities have Conqueror.
Battle: Destroy one of your Provinces. Other players' cards will not destroy your Personalities this battle. Discard this Celestial.
card.flavor: As the threat of the Yodotai lingered in the mortal world, so too did it begin to manifest in the worlds beyond.

card.name: The Ways of Sensei Wu
card.text:
Fortune • Unique
Battle: Put a target Battle Strategy from your discard pile into your hand. Discard this Celestial.
card.flavor: "A sensei from the early Empire, a man who studied the ways of Akodo and Sun Tao. He sits amid the Heavens as a Fortune, and we venerate him." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Changing the Game
card.text: Limited: Search your hand, then your discard pile, and then your Fate deck for a card titled Blood of the Preserver. Show it. Remove it from the came to gain 2 Honor.
card.flavor: "Unfortunate circumstances prevent me from presenting this to your mother, as would be my wish," Kanpeki said with a low bow. "In her stead, naturally, I sought out the most worthy scion of the Imperial families to serve as her representative."

card.name: Marriage of the Emerald Champion
card.text: Limited: Put this Event into play. Target your Personality. While this Event remains in play, he will not be dishonored and you will not lose Honor from other players' actions that have targeted him. After your second turn from now begins, discard this Event.
card.flavor: The wedding of an individual like the Emerald Champion is an occasion of rare gravity indeed. The intended's family gains incredible wealth and renown, and typically hosts a celebration of enormous scope.

card.name: The Asahina's Shame
card.text: Open: Players may not use abilities on Personalities this turn.
card.flavor: "For centuries, you concealed the presence of a heretical sect from the Brotherhood of Shinsei within our lands because you believed that they were harmless eccentrics."

card.name: Purge of Fudoism
card.text: Limited: Starting with you, each player targets (if possible) and destroys a card with the printed Fallen, Fudo, or Shadowlands keyword.
card.flavor: Throughout the Colonies, the monasteries and hidden strongholds of the Fudo cult were sought out and put to the torch. Those who had embraced the blasphemous philosphy either recanted and were taken into custody, or refused, and were slain outright.

card.name: House of Prophecy
card.text:
Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
card.flavor: "The name is completely preposterous, and the claims they make are nigh blasphemous, but occasionally I find them useful." - Otomo Suikihime

card.name: Exotic Market
card.text:
Market
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
[BOW]: When paying for an Item, it enters play for 3 less Gold.
card.flavor: "The Colonies are a remarkable place. The things I see each day in this market are unlike anything ever encountered in the Empire."

card.name: Well-Defended Farm
card.text:
Farm
Your Ashigaru Personalities and Followers have +1F while opposed.
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
card.flavor: "Our lords depend upon our farms, and we shall not disappoint them! If you take our land it will only be because we have already fallen!"

card.name: The Sorrow - exp
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Magistrate • Paragon • Samurai • Yojimbo • Experienced Bayushi Tenzan • Loyal • Unique
While you control a Courtier, The Sorrow's printed ability is Battle/Limited.
Battle: Give a target Personality -4F.
card.flavor: "What drives you to him, Tenzan? Her order? Your grandfather's legacy? Your father's failure? Maybe it is your wife's willingness to drown in the darkness with you? Oh Tenzan, ever the Sorrow, ever the fool." - Bayushi Misaki

card.name: Jade Pearl Inn
card.text:
Interrupt: After you Recruit this Holding from a Province, search your Dynasty deck for a non-Unique, Gold-producing Holding with a printed Gold Cost of 1 and refill the Province face-up with it.
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
card.flavor: A night of food, drink, and conversation can reinvigorate farmers, merchants, and samurai alike.

card.name: Nexus of Lies
card.text:
After another player loses Honor from a card he owns, increase the loss by an amount equal to half his Starting Family Honor, rounded down.
[BOW]: Produce 4 Gold.
card.flavor: Amid a web of lies and falsehoods, sometimes the most dangerous thing one can hear is the truth...

card.name: Suana Dojo
card.text:
Dojo
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold, or 4 Gold if your Stronghold has a 3 or lower Gold Production.
card.flavor: Many among the Brotherhood's sohei venerate the memory of Suana, a great teacher whose prowess in battle, once so moved, was without equal.

card.name: Yukihime's Hot Springs
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 1 Gold.
Open, [BOW]: A target Holding's abilities may not be used.
card.flavor: "Good day, brothers! I do not know about you, but I plan to stew in the springs so long I forget my own name!"

card.name: Hida Kaiji - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Mutant • Nonhuman • Experienced • Unique
Will not attack or defend with other Personalities, and other Personalities will not attack or defend with Kaiji.
Kaiji has +2F while unopposed, or +1F for each Personality opposing him with 6 or lower printed Force.
card.flavor: "Run, little worms!"

card.name: Hida Kurabi
card.text:
Crab Clan • Berserker • Hero • Imperial • Destined • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
card.flavor: "Kisada-sama, what happened at the Second City was not some mere power struggle. There is more to the story."

card.name: Hiruma Koru
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Scout
Invest [PAY 1]: Create a 0F Follower and attach it to Koru. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "His mother was a Yasuki. Still, you wouldn't guess it from the way he fights." - Kaiu Esumi

card.name: Yasuki Jiro
card.text:
Crab Clan • Courtier • Kolat • Merchant • Shadowlands
Political Limited, [PAY 3]: Dishonor a target Personality.
card.flavor: "I am sure this is all a misunderstanding. Please, let this gift for your family serve as my amends."

card.name: Kaiu Gorobei
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege
Battle: Discard a card to bow a target enemy card with Force equal to or lower than the discarded card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: "The Kaiu contributed greatly to the reconstruction of the Second City after the chaos ended." - Journal of Otomo Hiroshi

card.name: Kaiu Esumi - exp
card.text:
Crab Clan • Samurai • Siege • Experienced • Tactician • Unique
Battle: Destroy a target enemy attachment.
card.flavor: "He seems to grow only more callous with each passing year." - Kaiu Kawachi

card.name: Asahina Umehiko
card.text:
Crane Clan • Air • Gardener • Expendable • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed).
Your Political actions may not target Umehiko.
card.flavor: "Our family once sheltered the followers of Fudo, thinking them harmless, if a bit confused. That time is over, and now I will aid in cleansing the Empire of their wrongful thinking."

card.name: Daidoji Gensai
card.text:
Crane Clan • Iron Crane • Samurai • Scout • Cavalry
Home Battle: If Gensai would be opposed, move him to the current battlefield. After he moves, you may discard a card to make a Ranged Attack with strength equal to the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: "It would be easy, so easy, to take the shot. Were we not enemies a short while ago? Why do we now treat the Mantis as partners?"

card.name: Daidoji Tametaka - exp2
card.text:
Crane Clan • Commander • Iron Crane • Samurai • Scout • Experienced 2 • Unique
Mantis Clan players ignore Tametaka's Honor Requirement.
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality three -1F tokens.
card.flavor: "Our deals with the Mantis benefit both clans, filling our coffers and giving them a reason to watch out for our interests. What more could a Daidoji ask for?"

card.name: Doji Kurohime
card.text:
Crane Clan • Courtier
Limited, [BOW]: Straighten a target Honor-producing Holding that has not produced Gold this turn.
card.flavor: "No, I do not want to talk to you and no, you may not sit at my table. Bother me again and I will show you what my real anger looks like."

card.name: Doji Tatsuki - exp
card.text:
Crane Clan • Artisan • Courtier • Orator • Samurai • Turquoise Champion • Experienced • Unique
After another player's turn begins, straighten Tatsuki.
card.flavor: "Divine Empress, honored members of the Imperial Court, I bring you a tale of grief and woe, a tale of courage and duty fulfilled. I bring you the tale of the Imperial Legions and their fight to cleanse the Colonies of an insidious foe."

card.name: Kakita Ujirou
card.text:
Crane Clan • Magistrate • Samurai • Duelist • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Ujirou enters play for 2 less Gold if any other player is Mantis Clan. Ujirou enters play for 4 less Gold if you are the Defender.
card.flavor: "I am not impressed by doors."

card.name: Mirumoto Hatsuto
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Kensai
Battle: Give a target enemy Infantry Personality or Follower -3F.
card.flavor: "I long for a foe worthy enough to warrant my getting down from my horse. So far, not one have presented them self."

card.name: Kitsuki Miroken
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Courtier • Magistrate
Miroken has +2F while opposing a dishonorable or Gaijin card.
card.flavor: The Dragon were known to many for their acceptance of strange ways, but even they could not abide the notion of gaijin infiltrating the lands of Rokugan.

card.name: Mirumoto Kalen - exp
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Samurai • Cavalry • Experienced • Unique
Fire Battle: Ranged 3 Attack. You may take an additional action to use Kalen's second printed ability.
Fire Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: As his hands touched the bow, it seemed that the whispers of the wind grew louder and more lucid, almost like voices. "It cannot be," he whispered.

card.name: Tamori Shinji
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Earth • Reserve • Shugenja
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Enters play for 4 less Gold if you are the Defender.
card.flavor: "The mountain does not move, eh, Crab? We shall see about that!"

card.name: Togashi Obote
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Monk • Tattooed • Void
Void Limited: Discard a card to give Obote a Force bonus equal to its Focus Value.
card.flavor: "In times of conflict and uncertainty, it becomes more important than ever to seek the center and find peace."

card.name: Togashi Noboru - exp2
card.text:
Dragon Clan • Daimyo • Fire • Monk • Tattooed • Experienced 2 • Loyal • Unique
Political Limited: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: "Apologize? Kuni Renyu is as unworthy of my apology as he is the regard many hold him in. In a just world, his idiocy and recklessness would be punished and bring him shame. Among the Crab, I suppose, such things are virtues."

card.name: Akodo Kano - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Master Tactician • Samurai • Experienced • Tactician • Unique
Kano's Force bonuses from the rulebook Tactical Advantage action are increased by 2.
card.flavor: "The blood of champions flowed through Kano's veins, and great was his desire to further prove his worth, even after the final defeat of the Dark Naga." - The Ikoma Histories

card.name: Akodo Uehara - exp
card.text:
Lion Clan • Imperial • Imperial Explorer • Samurai • Scout • Experienced • Tactician • Unique
Limited: Put a target Terrain from your discard pile into your hand. Discard a card.
card.flavor: "Many years have I taught at the War College. Now my clan has a different need of me. I cannot hesitate in teh faceof duty."

card.name: Ikoma Takakura
card.text: Lion Clan • Samurai • Scout
card.flavor: Dairuko drew her generals and scouts to her. "The fate of the Empire rests with us. We must slow our enemy and decieve him, or the war will come to our Empire anew. I will not allow that."

card.name: Kitsu Tamao
card.text:
Lion Clan • Water • Shugenja
Interrupt: After you Recruit Tamao, create a 2F/2C/3PH Lion Clan • Ancestor • Samurai • Spirit Personality.
card.flavor: "Your marriage seems to have softened you, brother. Does this mild weather disturb your stomach?"

card.name: Matsu Miura
card.text:
Lion Clan • Samurai • Naval
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower a Force penalty equal to Miura's Personal Honor.
card.flavor: "You must spend more time with the living, sister. You seem to have confused pity for discomfort."

card.name: Matsu Ryohei
card.text:
Lion Clan • Paragon • Samurai • Cavalry • Destined • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
card.flavor: The threat posed by the Yodotai was not yet concluded.

card.name: Kitsune Merihiko - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Ivory Champion's Advisor • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
Your Nonhuman Spirits have the ability, "Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 3 Attack."
card.flavor: Following the war with the Crane, few will ever underestimate the children of Chikushudo again.

card.name: Kitsune Yamazaru
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Earth • Shugenja
Interrupt: After you Recruit Yamazaru, create a 3F/2C/3PH Mantis Clan • Monkey • Nonhuman • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Battle: Discard a card to give a target enemy Personality or Follower a Force penalty equal to the card's Focus Value."
card.flavor: "Let them play with us, friend."

card.name: Moshi Ikako
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Air • Fire • Naval • Reserve • Shugenja
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Fire Battle: Ranged 1 Attack.
card.flavor: The Moshi family's familiarity with both Air and Fire serves them very well indeed.

card.name: Tsuruchi Shusaku
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Go Master • Samurai • Scout • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
Repeatable Battle, [PAY 2]: Give Shusaku +1F.
(Repeatable actions may be used any number of times per turn.)
card.flavor: "I find the game offers many insights for my other duties."

card.name: Yoritomo Toganin
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Samurai • Magistrate • Naval
Invest [PAY 5]: Give Toganin three +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
Toganin has +1F if any other player is Crane Clan.
card.flavor: The Colonies offered unprecedented opportunities for gain, and for graft.

card.name: Yoritomo Yashinko - exp
card.text:
Mantis Clan • Courtier • Experienced • Unique
Crane Clan players may Proclaim Yashinko.
[BOW]: Produce 3 Gold.
card.flavor: "A pity my husband is not here to show them what proper artwork is. Did I tell you of the sculpture he made in the Otomo Winter Court? These youngsters simply lack that sort of talent."

card.name: Isawa Tsumaro
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Air • Elemental Master • Tejina • Loyal • Shugenja • Unique
Air Home Engage: Move your target Air Shugenja home. Create a 0F/3C/0PH Air • Illusion • Shugenja Personality at the current battlefield; remove him from the game after the battle ends. While the Illusion is there, abilities on the target's spells have Home.
card.flavor: "Believe what your eyes tell you? Ridiculous!"

card.name: Asako Misora
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Inquisitor • Magistrate • Expendable • Shugenja
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: The convergence of both P'an Ku and the cult of Fudo within the Colonies left the Inquisitors intensely distrustful of almost everyone. Those who could do so took comfort in the service of the earth itself, rather than risk their trust in others.

card.name: Isawa Ikariya
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Fire • Reserve • Shugenja
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Fire Battle: Ranged Attack with a strength equal to the number of Spells in this unit.
card.flavor: "Pray that the general does not signal for me to join the battle. Your side would not endure it."

card.name: Natsumi - exp
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Nonhuman • Ryu • Water • Cavalry • Conqueror • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
Will not attach Followers or Items.
card.flavor: "It is simply an amazing creature. Raw power and beauty given form. Its nature is mercurial, and its wrath both easily aroused and placated. That it is willing to enlist such wrath for our needs is both a blessing and a terrible risk." - Asako Chukage

card.name: Shiba Heirei
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Samurai • Yojimbo
Battle: If Heirei is opposed, discard a card to give him a Force bonus equal to the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: "There are a great many things that remain unknown about the history of the Fudo movement. With what I have learned, I must believe that this is for the best."

card.name: The Broken Man
card.text:
Phoenix Clan • Earth • Henshin • Monk
Invest [PAY 5]: Give The Broken Man two +1F tokens. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
Earth Battle: Bow a target enemy card with lower Force.
card.flavor: "The secrets of the Earth shattered his mind. He has recovered, but all trace of his old life are lost forever."

card.name: Bayushi Mifuyu
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Magistrate • Samurai
Battle: Give a target enemy Personality -3F.
card.flavor: "So our little criminal thinks to lose himself in the chaos lingering in the Colonies? How droll. Disorder is a weapon in the hands of a Scorpion, and I will wield it like any other."

card.name: Bayushi Jin-e
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja
Will not attach Armor.
Ninja Open, [BOW]: Give a target Personality and Jin-e each a -1F/-1C Poison token.
card.flavor: "It is an unfortunate death, but one must be practical. Not every samurai can die gloriously, and not everyone deserves an honorable death. A man like me knows this better than any."

card.name: Bayushi Wateru
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Ninja • Samurai • Yojimbo • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Ninja Interrupt: After you Recruit Wateru during battle, take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "She is fast and discreet... the perfect yojimbo, really."

card.name: Bayushi Dijuro
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Samurai • Siege • Tactician • Unique
Siege Battle, [BOW]: Ranged 3 Attack. If this destroyed a card, give this Province +2 or -2 strength.
card.flavor: "Patience is the foundation of strength. Those who do not understand this have already lost the battle."

card.name: Shosuro Chizuru
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Actor • Artisan • Loyal
Open: Discard a card to give a target Personality a Force or Personal Honor bonus equal to the card's Focus Value. The target has a maximum Personal Honor of 4.
card.flavor: "What a grand time! What a glorious place! Already I have been a Shinjo, a Mirumoto, and a Yasuki. What will be my next role in the Second City?"

card.name: Shosuro Takazaki
card.text:
Scorpion Clan • Courtier • Ninja • Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed).
Political Engage: Other players do not gain Honor for destroying your cards in this battle's resolution.
card.flavor: "No, my Crane friend, I do not think so."

card.name: Daigotsu Kanpeki - exp2
card.text:
Spider Clan • Clan Champion • Monk • Paragon • Samurai • Conqueror • Experienced 2 • Kensai • Loyal • Unique
Tireless Open: Take the Imperial Favor. (You may use Tireless abilities even if bowed.)
card.flavor: Kanpeki met the accusing eyes of the court. "What ha happened in the past is irrelevant," he said. "We were at war then. It is different now. I serve the Empress, just as you do."

card.name: Goju Obayashi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Ninja • Shadowlands
After Obayashi enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Ninja Tireless Battle: Move Obayashi home. (You may use Tireless abilities even if bowed.)
card.flavor: The creature faded away with a low hiss. The apprentice made to sheath his weapon, but Kodanshi granned his arm. "No!" he whispered. "It is not truly gone!"

card.name: Nonaka
card.text: Spider Clan • Monk • Kensai
card.flavor: "There will never be peace between us!" the Crab shouted, and charged. "I disagree," Nonaka whispered, and bug his blade into the Crab's belly.

card.name: Daigotsu Chiboshi
card.text:
Spider Clan • Commander • Samurai • Shadowlands • Conqueror • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
Battle, [PAY *]: Equip a Follower to Chiboshi. You may take an additional Battle action.
card.flavor: "Is there any challenge in leading soldiers with no will?"

card.name: Susumu Takada
card.text:
Spider Clan • Courtier • Master of Guile • Loyal
Invest [PAY 3]: Discard a card to gain Honor equal to its Focus Value. (After this card enters play, you may also pay the Invest cost to get the effect, once.)
card.flavor: "It is called the Blood of the Preserver," Takada told the court, "and it is our gift to Iweko Shibatsu."

card.name: Daigotsu Endo
card.text:
Spider Clan • Nonhuman • Samurai • Shadowlands • Undead • Destined
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
Limited, [PAY *]: If Endo is dead, Recruit him.
card.flavor: He stared at his decayed hand. "Emma-O has forgotten me," he whispered hoarsely.

card.name: Usui
card.text:
Earth • Fudo • Monk
After Usui enters play, lose 1 Honor.
Earth Battle: Give this Province +2 strength.
card.flavor: "Fudo fought the Mad Dragon centuries ago. His teachings exposed it to us. Were it not for this, the dragon would never have been defeated!" The monk sneered. "You should be thanking us!"

card.name: Iweko Seiken
card.text:
Heir • Imperial • Paragon • Samurai • Unique
Seiken will not be dishonored or gain a Clan alignment.
