Interrupt: After you Recruit Seiken, Recruit a non-Unique Samurai with lower Gold Cost, ignoring costs.
Political Open, [BOW]: Take the Imperial Favor.
card.flavor: "Why does my little brother defend them? He knows their evil best of all."

card.name: Iweko Shibatsu
card.text:
Courtier • Heir • Imperial • Unique
Spider Clan players ignore Shibatsu's Honor Requirement. Will not gain a Clan alignment.
After Shibatsu enters play, gain 3 Honor.
After Shibatsu leaves play, lose 10 Honor.
Limited, [BOW]: Gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "I do not begrudge my brother his popularity. I only wish he would open his eyes."

card.name: Kitsune Kichi - exp
card.text:
Earth • Kitsune • Nonhuman • Onyx Champion • Shadowlands • Experienced • Shugenja • Unique
After Kichi enters play, lose 3 Honor and create a 4F/2C/0PH Badger • Nonhuman • Shadowlands • Spirit Personality with the ability, "Battle, [BOW]: Melee 4 Attack."
card.flavor: "I will not," she rasped. "I refuse to die."

card.name: Isidoros
card.text:
Gaijin • Yodotai
After Isidoros enters play, lose 2 Honor.
Battle: Straighten your target Follower.
card.flavor: "I do not wish to spend another moment in these wretched lands. Do you?" When none answered, he snarled, "Then do not question the commander again!"

card.name: Ide Mutsuken
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Courtier • Imperial • Liaison • Unique
Open, [BOW]: The active player must choose and bow one of his unbowed Personalities.
card.flavor: "Lady Suikihime, it is a radiant pleasure to see you once again. Your return to power will be cause for celebration, certainly. The Unicorn would be delighted to arrange the festivities, if you wish."

card.name: Iuchi Wattu
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Water • Shugenja
Limited: If Wattu is face-up in your Province, put him in your discard pile, honorably dead. If there are no other dead copies of Wattu there, refill the Province face-up.
card.flavor: "The river yield their bounty readily to those who know the proper means to ask. Arrogance ill suits a priest of the kami."

card.name: Moto Paikao
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander • Samurai
Battle: Discard a card to give a target enemy Personality or Follower a Force penalty equal to the card's Focus Value.
card.flavor: The cultists adopted a fighting stance, but the Unicorn only laughed. "Good!" he bellowed. "I was afraid this would be boring!"

card.name: Shinjo Kinto - exp2
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Commander of the 9th Legion • Commander • Imperial • Samurai • Scout • Cavalry • Experienced 2 • Unique
Battle: Target two Personalities at different locations controlled by the same player. Switch their locations. After they move, straighten their units if you do not control them.
card.flavor: "I have taken a city, spent time as a 'guest' of the Spider, and now relinquish the city back to the woman from whom I took it. This is a mad land."

card.name: Shinjo Sujikaro
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Samurai • Cavalry
Battle, [BOW]: Melee 3 Attack.
card.flavor: The Unicorn forces were driven to the brink of exhaustion, serving as they did at the forefront of the Imperial Commander's war against the cult of Fudo. Others aided in the purge, to be sure, but Shinjo Kinto truly trusted none save his own kinsmen.

card.name: Utaku Sakiko
card.text:
Unicorn Clan • Battle Maiden • Samurai • Cavalry • Destined • Reserve
(You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)
(Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
card.flavor: "Shh, little one. Do not worry. Our time will come soon, and then we shall ride."

card.name: Seasoned Ashigaru
card.text:
Ashigaru
Melee Attacks may not target this Follower.
card.flavor: "You may take rest from your worries, my lord samurai-sama. No enemy shall threaten this place in your absence. We shall not permit such a thing."

card.name: Black Riders
card.text:
Cavalry
Limited: Straighten another player's target Holding with Gold Cost equal to or lower than this Follower's Force. You, and not its owner, may use its Gold-producing and cost-reducing traits (this turn) as if you controlled it.
card.flavor: Their unit's name skirts the edge of heresy, resembling as it does the lost Black Guard of the Dark Moto.

card.name: Disciples of Ganesh
card.text:
Gaijin
This Follower has +2F while defending.
After this Follower is destroyed during battle, gain 1 Honor.
card.flavor: "The god of our fathers was lost long ago to the demon goddess Kali-Ma. We pay homage to his memory and pray for his return."

card.name: Senior Infantry Legion
card.text: Other Followers in this unit have +1F.
card.flavor: "In a well-structured fighting force, the young and inexperienced among your men will look to the veterans, those with experience and age, to distinguish them, and they will draw strength from their company." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Floating Reserve
card.text:
Reserve
(You may Equip a Reserve attachment, if it would be opposed, as a Battle action.)
card.flavor: "Foolish generals build armies that are like the mountain or the burning plains. Build an army like the wind and the river, and you shall wind your way to victory." - The Journal of Yogo Haruto

card.name: Long-Range Scouts
card.text:
Scout • Cavalry
Home Battle/Open: Transfer this card to your target Personality. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: "Not one of those cultists escapes us, do you understand? Kinto demanded of the scouts. "You will scour every inch of this insane land until we have cleansed them all."

card.name: Band of Brothers
card.text:
Ronin
After this Follower enters play, target one or two of your Personalities. Create and attach a 1F Follower to each of them.
card.flavor: "Good to see you again, my friends! Let me purchase a bottle and we shall fill our bellies with lies and sake!"

card.name: Front Rank Troops
card.text:
Expendable
(Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: "Their survival is highly questionable, but their glory is absolutely assured." - Akodo Dairuko

card.name: Court Scribe
card.text: Political Open, [BOW]: Increase the next Honor gain or loss (this turn) from your cards by 1 (Proclaiming gains are not from your cards).
card.flavor: "yes, very good, my lord. I think perhaps, if I may, a reference to the lady Doji-sama's recent performance in the poetry contest might emphasize your point with even more strength."

card.name: Legion of the Fallen
card.text:
Nonhuman • Shadowlands • Undead
After this Follower enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Before the first time this game another player's card destroys this Follower, negate the destruction.
card.flavor: "Deploy them against the Crab only when there is no chance of defeat," Kanpeki ordered. "I will not fuel Renyu's pitiable attempts to brand us traitors to the throne."

card.name: Commander's Steed
card.text:
Horse • Nonhuman • Cavalry
Will only attach to a Human.
This Personality has Conqueror.
card.flavor: "An exquisite, powerful creature. Fit only for those who prove themselves worthy and deserving of command." - Shinjo Kinto

card.name: Legulus's Legion
card.text:
Gaijin • Yodotai
After this Follower enters play, lose 3 Honor.
Battle, [BOW]: Melee Attack with strength equal to this Follower's Force.
card.flavor: "Remember your training, men, and today you will baptize your blades in the blood of samurai!" - Aulus

card.name: Ominous Armor
card.text:
Armor
Before another player's card destroys this Personality, destroy this Item instead.
card.flavor: "If your demeanor and appearance inspire fear in your opponent, your victory is many steps closer before the battle has even begun." - Tangen's Lies

card.name: Stonemason's Hammer
card.text:
Weapon
This Personality has +1F while he is Siege.
Battle, [BOW]: Give this Province +2 Strength.
card.flavor: "The reconstruction of the Second City will be my glorious exit from this life. I shall leave my station as a samurai fulfilled, knowing that I aided in the most significant reconstruction of this generation." - Kaiu Iemasa

card.name: Khalimpeh-jiak
card.text:
Weapon
Engage, [BOW]: Give a target enemy Personality or Follower -2F.
card.flavor:
"What in the realms is that?" Esumi demanded.
"I have no idea," Gorobei grunted. "It looks ridiculous."
"Should we try it?" Esumi asked.
"Of course we should!"

card.name: Fortune's Favor
card.text:
Nemuranai
As a Focus Effect, the duel's winner may take an additional action.
Ranged and Melee Attacks targeting this Personality have -2 strength.
Before another player's card destroys this Personality during the Action Phase, negate the destruction and destroy this Item.

card.name: Dagger of Crystal Wind
card.text:
Nemuranai • Weapon
After your turn begins, give this Personality a +1F Obsession token; then, if he as more Obsession tokens than printed Chi, destroy him.
card.flavor: "I hear strange whispers in my mind whenever I hold the blade; whispers I cannot quite understand, that make me think of darkness and luminescent tattoos."

card.name: Ningen's 'Treatise on the Nezumi'
card.text: Multiplayer Open, [BOW]: Target a player. Until your next turn begins, each of you must invite the other to ally (if legal), and during Maneuvers, the invited one must assign a unit to an army where the other has a unit, and may not assign units elsewhere.
card.flavor: "It is rumored that my predecessor had a fondness for the simple, innocent Nezumi. I can understand how their childlike demeanor might be pleasant company." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Tankoji
card.text:
Weapon
Battle, [BOW]: Actions from cards in a target Personality's unit may not target cards in this unit.
card.flavor: "Haha! What do you expect to do with that thing? It is not a real weapon, after all, and... Agh! Stop! I'm sorry! Stop hitting me!"

card.name: Tiger Claw
card.text:
Weapon
Battle, [BOW]: Melee 3 Attack.
card.flavor: "It is a violent, primal weapon. It calls to mind the savagery of a wild beast and gives those who wield it a fearsome edge that their opponents cannot hope to match." - Nonaka

card.name: Tsujiken's Coin
card.text:
[BOW]: Produce 2 Gold.
This card is worth 1 Koku.
card.flavor: "Take this as a token of my appreciation," the crime master said with a smile. "If anyone mistreats you, simply show it to them. If they do not cease, then I will want to know their name for a brief conversation."

card.name: Versatile Blade
card.text:
Weapon
Battle: Discard a card to straighten this Personality.
Home Battle: If this Personality would be opposed, discard a card to move him to the current battlefield. (Home actions may be used from home.)
card.flavor: It does a great many things well.

card.name: The Earth's Armor
card.text:
Earth
While this Shugenja is defending, other players' cards will not bow him.
card.flavor: Norimichi's laughter rang out across the plain. "A mere priest?" he chuckled. "Defenseless? My poor children, you have made the most terrible mistake of your lives. Let me show you what the power of Earth can do."

card.name: Blistering Rain
card.text: Water Battle, [BOW]: Give a target Personality or Follower a Force penalty equal to your target Personality's Chi.
card.flavor: "If you were ill prepared for the weather, my dears, you should have remained at home."

card.name: Searing Siege
card.text: Repeatable Fire Battle: Discard a card to make a Ranged Attack with strength equal to its Focus Value or this Shugenja's Chi, whichever is higher. (Repeatable actions may be used any number of times per turn.)
card.flavor: "It is quite pretty, really, is it not?" - Isawa Koiso

card.name: The Wind's Champion
card.text: Air Open, [BOW]: Bow this Shugenja to create a 2C/0PH Illusion • Samurai • Spirit Personality with Force equal to this Shugenja's Chi, plus 1 if he is Air. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: "Where is your courage now?" the Crane said with a laugh. "Fleeing before nothing? What a shameful disgrace to live with."

card.name: Yojimbo of Earth
card.text: Earth Limited, [BOW]: Create a 1F Clay Soldier • Nonhuman • Yojimbo Follower and attach it to your target Shugenja without Followers.
card.flavor: "Thank you for this gift. I will use it in good faith, and it shall be returned when my task is complete."

card.name: Drawing on All Things
card.text:
This Shugenja has the element keywords of every Ring you control.
Open, [BOW]: Bow your target unbowed Ring. Straighten this Shugenja.
card.flavor: "Wind and stone, stream and flame. All that is and is not can be channeled by the spirit that balances itself in harmony with the universe."

card.name: Banished from the Realm
card.text: Open, [BOW]: Give your target Spirit Expendable. (Draw a card after your Expendable card is destroyed.)
card.flavor: "If I am to be denied the company of my ancestors," the Lion growled, "then I see no reason I should have to tolerate the presence of lesser spirits."

card.name: Mystical Augmentation
card.text: Void Battle, [BOW]: Give a target Personality +1F, or +2F if this Shugenja or the Personality is Void or a Yojimbo.
card.flavor: "Your assistance is very much appreciated. Let me do what I can to make your efforts more effective."

card.name: Hitomi's Devotion
card.text:
Earth
Battle resolution will not destroy cards in this unit while defending and, if this Shugenja is Earth, while attacking.
card.flavor: "The spirit of our late lady is with you," the Tamori whispered. "Her will, her strength, can be yours as well. You must simply accept her gifts."

card.name: Chikushudo's Infusion
card.text:
This Shugenja has Cavalry while he is Shadowlands.
Open, [BOW]: Give a target Nonhuman card Cavalry.
card.flavor: With just a little bit of aid from one such as myself, the flesh of a natural creature can share in both the power of Jigoku as well as the Realm of Animals." - Kitsune Kichi

card.name: Reverse Fate
card.text: Void Interrupt, [BOW]: Give the first card discarded by the action +1FV or -1FV. (This does not affect cards focused in a duel).
card.flavor: "That which was shall not be, and that which would not have been, is. The tapestry of the Void allows all things to be rewritten." - Isawa Kimi

card.name: Sailor's Warning
card.text: Thunder Battle, [BOW]: Target your Personality. Ranged Attack with strength equal to his Chi. Destroy this Spell.
card.flavor: "There are those who claim that the Moshi have become merely an extension of the Yoritomo family. What these individuals fail to realize is that we have only adapted. We have added the strength of our cousins to our own." - Moshi Ikako

card.name: Move the Troops
card.text: Open, [PAY 2]: If this Strategy is in your discard pile, put it into your hand before this phase ends.
card.flavor: "Soon, we may not be able to engage the Spider without political ramifications. We must act, and quickly, before opportunity escapes us."

card.name: Provoked Violence
card.text: Political Open, [PAY *]: Bow your target unbowed Courtier. Destroy a target attachment with Gold Cost less than or equal to the amount of Gold paid, plus 3 if you control a Yojimbo.
card.flavor: "Be on your guard," he warned. "He is impatient, and I may prod him into a foolish reaction."

card.name: Two Steady Breaths
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 2] (You may pay the Discipline cost to play this card from the discard pile. Remove it from the game after the action resolves.)
Limited, [PAY 1]: Give your target face-up Personality out of play Destined. (Draw a card after your Destined card enters play.)
card.flavor: "Calm your mind," he cautioned the young warrior. "The secret of the universe lies where the world stands still."

card.name: Respect
card.text:
Kata • Kharmic
When Recruiting a Personality, if his Honor Requirement is higher than his owner's Family Honor, he costs 2 more Gold to Recruit.
Political Limited: Put this Kata into play. Discard all your other Kata.
card.artist: "Let us be reasonable to each other."

card.name: A Small Favor
card.text: Battle, [PAY 3]: Bow a target Personality. Lose 1 Honor.
card.flavor: The request had come easily to his lips, and the answer now lay in his hand. The pouch weighed heavily, burdened by the expectation of the future.

card.name: Lonely Battlefield
card.text:
Terrain
Personalities without Followers have -2F. Commanders have +1F.
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: The Colonies had seen much chaos over the years, and the bloodshed was not yet done.

card.name: Unchecked Fury
card.text:
Kata
Limited: Put this Kata into play. Discard all your other Kata in play with different titles.
Battle, [PAY *]: If this card is in play, Equip a Spell to your target unbowed, opposed Shugenja. You may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "You should fear the wrath of the Kuni," he said quietly. "Let me remind you why."

card.name: Absolution
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card to draw a card.)
Interrupt: Negate an Event's effects.
card.flavor: "The acts of the cultists were neither your fault, nor your responsibility. Rise, and serve us, stronger than ever."

card.name: Benediction
card.text: Open: Destroy your target Holding. Give a Province +3 strength.
card.flavor: Despite the chaos, despite the conflict, and despite the unchecked madness, the priests continued their sacred work without ceasing.

card.name: Unholy Strike
card.text:
Battle: Melee 2 Attack.
Interrupt: Give a Melee or Ranged Attack +2 strength.
card.flavor: "A wild beast may be tamed," he snarled, "but what makes it no less dangerous. You would be wise to consider that before you speak to me again."

card.name: Expensive Achievement
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 2] (You may pay 2 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Battle: Give this Province +2 or -2 Strength.
card.flavor: When need drives, few samurai care about expenses.

card.name: Hold the Walls
card.text:
Terrain
Attacking Personalities and Followers have -1F.
Battle: Destroy a Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: Even the Kaiu can have trouble breaching a well-constructed fortress.

card.name: Desire
card.text: Political Open: Bow your target unbowed Human Personality. Target another player's unbowed Human Personality. His controller may bow him and gain 1 Honor. If he did not choose this, dishonor both targets, and both their controllers lose 3 Honor.
card.flavor: "Love is a game in Rokugan's courts... but sometimes the game costs both players their hearts, or even their lives." - Doji Shizue

card.name: Mercantile Conflict
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 1] (You may pay 1 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Political Open: Bow your target unbowed Courtier. The next two Honor losses from your cards (this turn) are increased by 1 each.
card.flavor: "An unfortunately accident, my friend."

card.name: Demonstrating Technique
card.text: Iaijutsu Political Limited: Your target unbowed Personality challenges another player's target Personality. Each Personality must focus exactly once, if possible. The winner draws a card. Dishonor the loser.
card.flavor: The rivalry between the Kakita and the Mirumoto will likely never be resolved, but each generation tries anew.

card.name: A Warrior's Brutality
card.text: Battle: Give your target opposed Personality +3F.
card.flavor: "When the time comes to fight, cast yourself into battle with no thought for your own survival." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Unpleasant Truths
card.text: Battle: Give a target Personality a Force penalty equal to his printed Personal Honor. If he is dishonorable, bow him.
card.flavor: "In my life, I have often found that honor is not a guarantee of virtue." - The Writings of Agasha Kitsuki

card.name: Banzai!
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 2] (You may pay 2 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Battle: Give your target opposed Personality +2F.
card.flavor: Every foe trembles to hear the victory shout of a true samurai.

card.name: Return to Action
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 2] (You may pay 2 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Absent Battle: If you are the Defender, target your Personality at home and move him to this battlefield. After he moves, straighten him.

card.name: The Legion's Might
card.text:
Battle: Ranged 1 Attack.
Favor Political Battle: Discard the Imperial Favor to make a Ranged 3 Attack.
card.flavor: The soldiers of the Imperial Legion are among the finest in Rokugan. A single legion's support can turn the tide of a war.

card.name: Never Without a Weapon
card.text: Battle, [PAY 5]: Discard a card to create a Weapon Item with a Force Modifier equal to the discarded card's Focus Value and attach it to your target Personality.
card.flavor: "Crab-san, I am not interested in listening to you blather about your clan's 'slighted honor.' If you will not let me drink in peace, you will give me the satisfaction of a rousing brawl, and as long as I have a hand, I can find a weapon." - Mirumoto Hatsuto

card.name: Grasp the Swords
card.text: Battle: Give your target Personality with a Weapon +2F/+2C. If he is a Kensai, you may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "The madness of P'an Ku, the squabbles between the Commander and the Governor, the uproar over the Fudo cult... none of it matters when you have steel in your hands. Then there is only the present moment and the strike that defines it." - Mirumoto Hatsuto

card.name: Lost Equipment
card.text: Engage: Bow a target enemy attachment.
card.flavor: "The followers of Fudo may be slightly less mad than P'an Ku's victims, but they are no less dangerous. It is our task to root out all who harbor forbidden texts, and we will not be stopped. Incidentally, if you do not remember to bring all of your spells, you cannot stop us." - Asako Misora

card.name: Lost in Transit
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 1] (You may pay 1 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Battle/Open: Bow a target attachment.
card.flavor: "My new orders would be far more likely to be obeyed if I could read them." - Hida Kurabi

card.name: Find Your Center
card.text:
Kata • Kharmic
Limited: Put this Kata into play. Discard all your other Kata in play.
Battle: If this card is in play, straighten a Ring.
card.flavor: "Anyone can find their center in the quiet of a temple. Only one who truly understands the flow of the elements can do it in the tumult of battle." - Togashi Noburo

card.name: Knowledge and Power
card.text:
Discipline [PAY 1] (You may pay 1 Gold to play this Discipline from your discard pile, then remove it from the game after its action resolves.)
Limited, [PAY 1]: Destroy one or two of a target Personality's tokens. Give him as many +1F tokens as the number of tokens this destroyed.
card.flavor: "I understand!"

card.name: Planted Evidence
card.text: Ninja Limited, [PAY 10]: Destroy a target Personality with 3 or lower Chi, or with 4 or lower Chi if you control a Ninja Personality. Lose Honor equal to your Starting Family Honor.
card.flavor: "The Crab do not know enough to let sleeping horrors lie. I am going to enjoy this." - Goju Obayashi

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Battle, [PAY 4]: Target your opposed Personality. Put a non-Unique Battle Strategy from your discard pile into your hand. If your Personality is a Magistrate, you may take an additional action.
card.flavor: "My arm will be sore for days, but it will be worth it. I slipped those papers on him as neat as you please." - Yoritomo Tarao

card.name: The Way of the World
card.text: Absent Battle: If he would be opposed, move your target Personality at home to the current battlefield. If he is a Monk, give him +2F.
card.flavor: "Kuni Renyu was not totally satisfied with the peace brought by the defeat of P'an Ku and sought to make his dissatisfaction known to Togashi Noburo. Noburo would not yield the point, and so the Crab and Dragon were slowly but surely brought into conflict." - Asako Chukage

card.name: Directing the Battle
card.text: Battle, [PAY 4]: If there are enemy units at this battlefield, search your Fate deck for a non-Unique Battle Strategy. Show it and put it in your hand.
card.flavor: "We cannot afford bad decisions. We cannot afford failure. The Yodotai must not become interested in the Colonies, and we must do everything we can to make sure they do not." - Akodo Kano

card.name: Marshal Your Strength
card.text: Battle: Give your target Personality Force and Chi bonuses equal to his Personal Honor, minus 1 if he is unopposed.
card.flavor: "After a victory, tighten your helmet cord." - A soldier's proverb.

card.name: Steal an Advantage
card.text:
This Strategy's ability is Battle/Engage if you control a Scout at this battlefield.
Battle: A target enemy card may not use one of its abilities (you choose).
card.flavor: "The superior warrior is not always the victor. If your opponent has better options than you, seek to eliminate those options." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Concealed Reserves
card.text: Battle: Give Reserve to your target Personality in a Province. (You may Recruit a Reserve card, if it would be opposed, as an Absent Battle action.)

card.name: Dying Remonstration
card.text:
Bushido Virtue • Sincerity
Political Open: Your target unbowed Human Personality commits seppuku. A target player loses Honor equal to the Personality's Personal Honor or 4, whichever is lower.
card.flavor: Kanshi was the samurai's final means of protest. Where all words would fail, the pinnacle of persuasion was a quiet death.

card.name: Breaking the Rhythm
card.text:
As a Focus Effect, if you win this duel, gain 1 Honor and give the winner +1F.
Absent Battle: Negate a target Personality's current Force bonuses or penalties (you choose). (You may take Absent actions without presence.)
card.flavor: "Disrupt your enemy's rhythm, and he cannot recover. Strike when his timing does not allow him action. Strike when he thinks you cannot." - Mirumoto's Niten

card.name: Strategic Withdrawal
card.text:
As a Focus Effect, if you win this duel, draw a card.
Battle: Move your target Personality home. You may target an enemy Personality and give him -3F.
card.flavor: "I still cannot see the difference between this and retreat." - Moto Xiao

card.name: A Moving Battle
card.text:
Terrain
Before this battle resolves, you may move one of your opposed attacking Personalities at this battlefield to an adjacent, unresolved battlefield.
Battle: Destroy a target Terrain (if able). Put this Terrain into play.
card.flavor: "A samurai's mind may desire peace, but his heart aches for war." - Daigotsu Kanpeki

card.name: Expanding the Gardens
card.text: Limited: Give one or two target Gold-producing Holdings +1 Gold Production each (this turn).
card.flavor: A kyuden's gardens are often as memorable as the palace itself, weighing heavily in the minds of potential dignitaries. Rival lords are always expanding their grounds, waging polite wars to outdo one another.

card.name: Thoughtless Sacrifice
card.text: Battle: Target your unbowed Personality. Target an enemy unit with Force equal to or lower than your Personality's Force, or Force plus Personal Honor if he is defending. Destroy both targets.
card.flavor: "In true combat, self-preservation cannot be your goal. Every thought, every motion, indeed every breath, must be spent only towards the destruction of your enemy." - Akodo's Leadership

card.name: Unseemly Alliance
card.text: Political Open: Bow your target unbowed Courtier. All Personalities have -1F for each Clan Alignment in their army (this turn).
card.flavor: "There are three aspects to making an unlikely alliance work. First, know his strengths. Second, know his weaknesses. Last, and most important, know when to stay out of his way." - Bayushi Makubesu

card.name: Suffer the Consequences
card.text:
Kharmic
(Repeatable Limited, [PAY 2]: Discard a Kharmic card to draw a card.)
Battle, [PAY *]: Destroy a target enemy Follower or Weapon with Force less than or equal to the amount of Gold paid plus 2.
card.flavor: "The enemy is disarmed, my lord," he sputtered, "at little cost."
